story:
• Check out our Thank You Program where you can earn your BW-Space for free

BW- Space Underwater Drone: The Smartest and Most Affordable Submersible Drone with 4K/UHD Camera for Underwater Exploration.

 

 

BW-Space is the first personal Unmanned Underwater Vehicle (UUV) kit with auto-piloting and auto-adjust lighting technologies that makes it simple for anyone to explore or capture amazing underwater photos and videos like the professionals.

 

 

BW-Space's manual or autonomous piloting controls, automatic LED lighting adjustments, and superior power is designed to be affordable for both hobby and/or commercial uses.  

 

 

We've perfect our second generation drone by adding smarter features typically found on aerial quadcopters.

Our Youcan Robot engineers pride themselves in creating a user-first, design centric product, and re-thinking UUV drone technology for all.

Our award winning BW-Space underwater drone leverages the knowledge our engineers learned manufacturing and piloting our first generation BW-1 drone in 2016. 

 

 

Underwater Photography on your BW-Space Drone.

Capture stunning underwater photos in ultra high definition and videos in 4K with BW Space's waterproof diving camera.

 

* Video quality dependent upon connection speed

 

* Video quality dependent upon connection speed

 

 

❶

BW-Space UUV Drone Features 

 

Autonomous smart modes, ultra high definition waterproof camera, and easy to use design features are impressive for all.

 

Smart Underwater Drone Modes

 

Underwater Camera & Photography

 

Underwater ROV Submarine

 

 

Click Here to Save 50% Off Retail

 

 

 

 

❷

BW-Space Drone Press & Reviews

 

See what the experts say about our BW-Space Smart Drone by the Youcan Robot team.

 

"Youcan Robot's second drone brings smart tracking where users can lock in and follow their target, making shooting images more precise" —  Deeper Blue

 

"BW-Space boasts a fixed depth and direction control algorithm to ensure your it stays in a stable position in the water even when faced with currents" —  Digital Trends

 

"Dual LED spotlights illuminate subjects with built-in light sensors automatically adjusting outputs from 0 to a combined 1,380 lumens" —  New Atlas

 

 

 

 

 

❸

Smart Underwater Drone Technology

 

BW-Space is the first underwater drone with smart imaging, tracking, and lighting for effortless piloting and videography.

By integrating smarter and more utonomous technology with underwater robotics, Youcan Robot opens the door to nearly anyone to photograph, research, or explore the world's oceans or lakes.

 

A.I. Image Recognition & Auto-Follow Mode

The BW-Space underwater camera uses artificial intelligence to first discover, then lock its targeting onto, and then automatically follow anyone in the water. 

BW-Space's intelligent tracking mode navigates using algorithms that are much smoother than manual drone piloting, allowing for better camera stabilization as it traverses underwater while allowing the pilot more time to focus capturing their underwater videos.

When the Intelligent Tracking Mode is enabled, BW-Space's underwater camera uses cutting-edge image recognition technology to identify any person, snorkeler, and/or diver in view. Once enabled, simply point the underwater camera at your target within a distance 0.5 to 7 meters away and a yellow frame will appear on your target indicating that its algorithms have recognized a target to track.

Once initiated, Intelligent Tracking Mode will automatically follow that person throughout the water wherever they go without any user piloting control required.

 

Auto-Adjusting Underwater LED Lighting

The BW-Space underwater lighting sensors solve the problem most beginners have with too much, too little, or erratic lighting as your drone films at different depths.

When the 'Smart Auto-Adjust Lighting Mode' is enabled, BW-Space's powerful Dual LED Lights automatically adjust anywhere from 0 to 1,380 Lumens to maintain optimal lighting. For example, as the submarine ascends or descends the underwater drone lights will automatically adjust to maintain consistent lighting using its recommended or your custom selected brightness levels:

  • Descends/Increases — Automatically increase LED light brightness as natural sunlight decreases as you go deeper.
  • Ascends/Decreases — Automatically decrease LED light brightness as natural sunlight increases as you come to the surface.

*Demo in Tech Specs section below

 

 

 

❹

Underwater 4K/UHD Drone Photography

 

It's easy to capture UHD photos or 4K video with BW Space's waterproof diving camera and underwater photography app.

Even without the smart tracking autonomy and intelligent auto-adjust lighting, BW-Space's underwater cinematography is impressive with its superior image quality and included photography app.

 

Ultra-HD & 4K Waterproof Diving Camera

BW Space is your new underwater photographer and videographer for capturing professional UHD photo and 4K video or live-streaming to the web.

BW-Space integrates a high-performance professional quality underwater camera capable of recording 4K HD video (3840×2160 pixels) at 30fps and capturing photos at 12,000,000 pixels in Ultra HD that are stored internally to its 128 gigabyte memory card and streamed directly to your smart device.

For the professional underwater videographer, BW-Space offers complete camera setting customization and integrates a 1/2.5-inch CMOS digital image sensor that produces extraordinarily clear, sharp digital pictures, while also allowing you to capture both video, single shot photo, and/or continuous shot photo bursts.

 

Underwater ROV Camera Photography App

BW-Space's underwater submarine rover instantly transmits live-streaming video signals to your smartphone/tablet app from depths up too 100 meters using its WiFi repeater and connected tether.

The YoucanDive iOS or Android app powers both the underwater drones live-streaming camera for navigation and the 4k/UHD camera settings on its waterproof diving camera.

 

Live Streaming Underwater Drone HD Video

From the BW-Space remotely operated vehicle (ROV) iOS or Android app you are able to view real-time video from your drone to control submarine navigation, preview custom photo/video image settings, and/or send 1080P HD (1920x1080 pixels) live-streaming video directly to any number of platform on the web for everyone to see what your drone sees underwater in real-time.

 

Customize & Share Your Underwater Photography

In addition to customizing photo/video recording quality and camera image settings (ISO, Exposure, White Balance, EV, etc), the BW-Space Drone Camera App allows you to export instantly to your phone/tablet with the push of a button and/or wirelessly to your computer via Youcan Assistant Video Export Software with ease.

No matter if you prefer to navigate your BW-Space by remotely operated vehicle (ROV) drone controller or by iOS/Android device touchscreen display, capturing custom photo/video is effortless.

 

 

 

❺

BW-Space Engineering & Design

 

BW-Space's underwater robot has enough power and control to conquer the most demanding of commercial dives, yet designed for everyone.

With longer range, extended battery, and deeper depths, BW-Space can tackle a long day filming vacation dive videos or support an industrial dive crew to limit their workloads.

 

Robotic Submarine Rover Performance

Youcan Robots engineers designed our second generation underwater robotics hardware for longer battery life, further range, and better communications of any other drone.

BW-Space's thrusters, communications interface, wifi repeater, streamlined design, waterproof casing, and electronics technology are phenomenal, allowing its submersible drone rover to efficiently outperform others:

  • Top Speed — 2 meters/second (4kts) from 3 powerful submarine thrusters.
  • Diving Depth — 100 meters (328ft) with unique water sealing technology.
  • Operating Time — 7 hours of shooting from 13,600mAh high-capacity battery.
  • Max Thrust — 4.6kg forward and 3.0kg reverse propeller power.

 

Submarine Piloting by App or Controller

Your BW-Space remotely operated vehicle has two unique ways to control with your touch screen display or its professional drone remote control.

BW-Space gives you options on how you pilot its submersible using autonomous underwater tracking, simple tablet/smartphone display controls, and using its professional ROV controller.

 

Touchscreen Smartphone or Tablet Display Drone Controls

Designed to be easy to use and quick to get started, you can control the BW-Space submarine using any iOS or Android tablet or smartphone for quick dives by simply pressing the on screen controls via the YoucanDive App.

 

Remotely Operated Vehicle (ROV) Controller Drone Controls

For more advanced UUV pilots, BW-Space has an optional professional remote control with advance features designed for better piloting and underwater cinematography.

 

Auto-Following & Autonomous Drone Piloting

Upon selecting your preferred piloting option above, switch BW-Space into its smart tracking mode to discover and track people or divers.

 

Wifi Repeater & Underwater Drone Tethering

Unlike aerial quadcopters, all underwater ROV's face the challenge of transmitting signals from their robotic underwater submarines to its above water remotely operated controllers.

Behind the scenes, video and navigation transmissions between the underwater robot and your smart device are rather complex but our engineers created an affordable method that makes it rather simple for the drone user.

 

An affordable and simplistic solution to a difficult and challenging problem:

In the rare instance you lose connection, battery dies, or drone gets stuck, the tether also serves as an expensive, high-tech rope to easily pull the rover up to the water's surface.

 

 

 

❻

Select Your BW-Space Package

 

To determine which BW-Space package is best for you, simply decide how you'd like to pilot and how much range you need.

Each of BW-Space's underwater drone kits include (1) BW-Space Rover, (1) Waterproof Carry Case, (1) WiFi Repeater, and (1) Battery Charger with the only kit variations being your preference on display only or remote control piloting and three options for tether lengths.

 

 

Basic BW-Space: 50m Tether (No Controller)

Our basic BW-Space underwater drone kit is geared towards beginners or hobbyist looking for an easy and affordable drone without the need for advanced piloting controls.

Basic BW-Space Underwater Drone Kit Includes: Savings of $990 off the $1,649 retail price + Priority early October delivery date + Touchscreen app only piloting controls + 50 meter drone tether for average range

 

 

Standard BW-Space: 50m Tether + Controller

Our standard BW-Space underwater drone kit is comes with a professional remote control that attaches to your smartphone or tablet for advanced piloting.

Standard BW-Space Underwater Drone Kit Includes: Savings of $870 off the $1,749 retail price + Priority early October delivery date + Advanced piloting remote ROV controller + 50 meter drone tether for average range

 

Advanced BW-Space: 100m Tether + Controller

Our advanced BW-Space underwater drone kit includes the remote control and double the range of standard model by extending tether length to 100 meters.

Advanced BW-Space Underwater Drone Kit Includes: Savings of $850 off the $1,849 retail price + Priority early October delivery date + Advanced piloting remote ROV controller + 100 meter drone tether for medium range

 

Premium BW-Space: 150m Tether + Controller

Our best underwater drone kit includes the professional remote and maximizes BW-Space's operating range with a 150 meter drone tether for the deepest dives.

Advanced BW-Space Underwater Drone Kit Includes: Savings of $890 off the 1,949 retail price + Priority early October delivery date + Advanced piloting remote ROV controller + 150 meter drone tether for maximum range

 

 

 

❼

BW-Space Drone Tech Specs

 

INSERT CATEGORY SUBTITLE HERE

 

INSERT LEAD OPENER HERE

 

BW-Space UUV Drone Technical Specifications

  • Drone Design: Dimensions: 20x15x5in / 52x39x14cm — Weight: 4.2KG / 9.3lb — Thruster Config: 2 Horizontal + 1 Vertical

  • Underwater Camera: Sensor: 1/2.5 CMOS — Effective Pixels: 12MP — Storage: 128 Gigabyte SD Card

  • Underwater Lights: Smart Modes: Auto-Adjusting — Configuration: 2 LED Lights

  • Rover Battery: Rated Capacity: 6800mAh × 2 / 73.44 wh × 2 — Battery Life: 3-7 hours

  • YoucanDive App: iOS Requires: iOS 10.3+ — Android Requires: 4.4.0+ — PC: Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Safari

 

SEE DETAILED TECH SPECS HERE

 

 

 

 

❽

Latest BW-Space News & Updates

 

Check out BW-Space's timeline for October delivery, initial underwater drone prototype beta tests, and more.

Latest Kickstarter & Indiegogo updates:

  • Kickstarter Update #1 - How Its Made: BW-Space: In-Depth Delivery & Manufacturing Timeline

  • Kickstarter Update #2 - Technical Specifications: BW-Space: Hardware, Software, and Electronics Specs

  • Kickstarter Update #3 - Testing & Prototyping: Youcan Robot Underwater Drone Testing & Prototyping

 

 

 

 

❾

October 2018 Delivery Timeline

 

Youcan Robot has been developing its second generation underwater drone for 2.5+ years and is ready to deliver!

October delivery is right around the corner... Check out a tour of our factory to see our engineers at work and order your drone today to save $990 off its October retail price.

 

 

BW-Space Production & Delivery Schedule:

  • ☑ Review & Factory Engagement — Completed

  • ☑ Design Blueprints & Prototyping — Completed

  • ☑ Tooling, FA Inspection & Testing — Completed

  • ☑ Shipping Package Development — Completed

  • ☑ Pilot Production & Quality Inspection — Completed

  • ☐ Mass Production & Backer Delivery — Scheduled to start September 2018.

 

SEE DETAILED MANUFACTURING SCHEDULE

 

 

 

 

❿

Meet the Youcan Robot Team

 

Founded in 2016, Youcan Robot is an integrated company in the world of world-class underwater robot products.

Our team of engineer launched the first underwater UAV BW1 in 2016 and in 2017, then developed the world's first mass-produced consumer-grade underwater robot —Blue Water One.

 

Behind the Scenes at Youcan Robot Factory

 

See Youcan Robot Team in Action

 

Youcan Robot Team Bios

Snow Lee — Founder & CEO - Graduated from East China University of Science and Technology, master of control engineering, has extensive experience in video information processing technology worked in the domestic well-known semiconductor company. 20 years experience in R&D and manufacturing.

 

Zhixiang  Xu — Co founder & Chief Consultant Scientist - The former Shanghai University Professor, a former researcher at the Robotics Research University of Pittsburgh, former executive director of the Shanghai Institute of image and graphics.Extensive robotics resources and familiarity with robotics.

 

Zander Hu — Co founder & CTO  -  As a senior engineer with more than ten years of experience of R&D and management, was responsible for development and promotion of multimedia products in Shanghai Best Electric Co., Ltd.. Having obtained a number of invention patents, he established a design standard of multimedia product system, and undertaken research and development of the company's major leading-edge project to achieve its technology transformation. He successfully cooperated with HITACHI, TOSHIBA, KONE and other multinational companies to help the company significantly increase sales of multimedia products. 

 

Jenny Pan — Co founder & CMO  - With extensive experience in marketing, committed to developing cutting-edge applications for underwater robots.Responsible for the development of domestic and international market strategies, channel development, etc.

 

Yankan — Co-founder & GM of JP Company -  Graduated from Chuo University in Japan, he has worked for ICT companies, international trade and logistics companies. With more than 8 years of consulting and marketing experience, he is committed to serving customers in Japan and overseas, and offering best overseas after-sales service. As aGM, he will promote our products to the international market and take the lead in opening up overseas markets. 

 

Lauren Ye — Algorithm Engineer 

 

Ivy Liu  — Marketing Specialist

He successfully cooperated with HITACHI, TOSHIBA, KONE and other multinational companies to help the company significantly increase sales of multimedia products.  Jenny Pan — Co founder & CMO  - With extensive experience in marketing, committed to developing cutting-edge applications for underwater robots.Responsible for the development of domestic and international market strategies, channel development, etc. Yankan — Co-founder & GM of JP Company -  Graduated from Chuo University in Japan, he has worked for ICT companies, international trade and logistics companies. With more than 8 years of consulting and marketing experience, he is committed to serving customers in Japan and overseas, and offering best overseas after-sales service. As aGM, he will promote our products to the international market and take the lead in opening up overseas markets.  Lauren Ye — Algorithm Engineer  Ivy Liu  — Marketing Specialist

story:
Hi everyone! Thanks for checking out our product. It has been more than a year since we started designing the perfect camera strap and finally, we think we are on to something with our new prototype. Introducing: the Sling Strap. As the name suggests, it uses the classic sliding sling functionality, but there's a twist: premium materials as oil-tanned leather and 100% wool, along with a multitude of color combinations make our Sling Strap something special, worth all the countless hours we put into designing and making it as practical and pretty as possible.

Now is the time when we need your help. Take a look and if you like what you see, help us spread the word or better yet, get yourself a camera strap you will love.


Why do I need a Leather Sling Strap?

  • Style is your life and fashion is your passion. Your look needs to be in perfect color harmony.
  • You want to have the coolest strap without compromising practicality.
  • You want the best for your camera... ultimate quality materials and perfect functionality.
  • You love leather. 

  • The beauty of this product lies in well chosen quality materials. The oil-tanned leather offers superb durability, resistant to everyday wear and tear, while still being soft to the touch. The wool felt keeps the strap in place, minimizing any risk of slipping from your shoulder.
  • You can personalize your strap by choosing the color of leather, color of wool felt and color of the top stitch on the outer neck strap. This gives you 80 possible color variations you can choose from. For more information, you can check out our Colorpicker at www.doublecrossleather.com.
  • The strap is handmade by skilled craftsmen in Slovakia (European Union) and proudly marked with our brand, which is based on the Slovak national symbol.

    • Sling Camera Strap

    • The comfortable leather shoulder strap with non-slip wool felt has a width of 4cm (1.6inch).
    • Shoulder strap continues with smooth PAD strap with silky touch and color according to leather color choice. It's 2,5 cm (1inch) wide.
    • The strap includes metal hook with screw lock and 1/4 inch screw to be attached to the tripod mount of your camera.
    • The length can be adjusted from cca 115cm - 145cm (46inch - 58inch) by sliding attached buckle along the PAD strap.

    The Sling strap fits all cameras equipped with 1/4 screw hole for tripod. To use the strap, mount the screw part onto your camera's tripod mount. Wear the Sling strap over your shoulder and fasten the metal hook to the screw part, which is attached to camera. Lock the metal hook with screw lock. Now you are ready to go.


    Choose Your Color Combination

    That strap in the picture is nice, but what if my favorite color is blue? With Double Cross Leather, you can have the choice! Feel free to pick between 80 unique color combinations. Choose pure elegance of classic natural look or stand out from the crowd using wilder color combinations that better suit your style.

    Try our Color Picker

    Colours to choose from:

    Leather (and PAD):

    Felt:

    Top stitch:

    The top stitching that encircles the whole shoulder pad can match the color of the leather, or the color of felt.


    Why Choose Us?

    Here is a short list of reasons:

    • Made with premium grade oil tanned leather, 100% wool felt and stitched with a durable thread
    • Customization - Select your color combination
    • 2-Year Guarantee. We will repair or replace any defects in materials or workmanship
    • Affordable. Premium leather straps of this quality can cost upwards of 100€.
    • Simple and flat profile.
    • Secure, tested extensively on multiple camera types
    • Fashionable 
    • Handmade by skilled craftsmen in Slovakia - European Union
    • Proudly marked with our company signature
    • Made with LOVE :-)


    Why we went with Indiegogo?

    • We need yourhelp to start a proper business. 
    • You give us ideas to make our straps better.
    • With your investment, we can arrange higher stocks of materials and arrange shorter delivery time.
    • Larger material orders reduce costs and make the final product price lower.
    • More orders mean lower price on shipping.

    After Funding

    Our team is ready to start creating your one of a kind Leather Camera Strap.  Our prices are discounted during our Indiegogo campaign!  Help us bring our work to you in the shortest delivery time possible by reaching our 3,450€ goal!  

    We have a good start and are confident that this product will be successful. We already have the necessary machinery and team ready for the manufacture. 

    Purchasing Materials - Everything is lined up to get started and we are ready to order materials as soon we receive funding (or even as soon as the campaign goal is successfully reached). Leather can be expensive, but if we reach our funding goal, we will be able to purchase large quantities at a lower cost. Same for Wool felt and other parts. This will help us being able to bring you a quality product for lower price.

    E-Shop - Our goal is to make our future customers' lives easier. With Your funding, we can fund the development of our own e-commerce website. This will make it easier for you to choose, purchase, and receive our products. The basic template for our website is already launched at www.doublecrossleather.com.

    Production Plan

    Once the campaign is successfully funded, we will collect everyone’s requests about their prefered color combination. 

    Then, we will use that information to start production of your rewards.  After completion, we will ship your new Leather Sling Strap directly to you!

    Optimistic plan:

    Before the successful completion of our campaign, we can take a short-term loan to order materials before receiving funds from Indiegogo to make everybody happy as soon as possible - until the end of August. We can make further preproduction steps, after we see the campaign succeed. This would make the delivery time even shorter.


    About Shipping

    After selecting a perk, you can now add shipping to your contribution.

    Slovakia 5€

    EU Countries: 10€

    USA: 15€

    Rest of the World: 20€

    Please be aware that for deliveries outside the EU, you may have to pay import fees on arrival.

    We will ship products all over the world to destinations available by DHL. You can order with confidence, safe in the knowledge that we will do our best to get your goods to you as quick as we can. It takes just a few days to deliver your order, wherever you are, however we can't to guarantee exact delivery times due to unexpected delays that could occur with customs.


    Share Us With the World!

    Like and share us on Facebook and stay in touch for more news!

    We are on Pinterest! Just pin something from our site for your friends

    www.doublecrossleather.com

    If you love our project, please be sure to share it.

    Thank you so much for all your support!

    Risks and Challenges

    The main risk of any project like this is delays in materials and, subsequently, production. We have been making leather goods for some time now and have learned the importance of sourcing, manufacturing, and meeting our schedule goals. We are confident though that there will be no hiccups or delays that could influence the provided timeframe.

    We pride ourselves in providing great customer service and promise to communicate frequently and openly. You can support this project and be confident, that your questions and feedback will be answered.

story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Jefferson Mann, 35 years old, 7 years lived in Israel, and there I´ve acquired the entrepreneurship on my vains. With a backgroung in Telecommunications, had worked as business developer and business integration between Brazil and Israel.
  • The goal of this campaign is to reach the biggest number of people to support and fund our project that is already on its shipping stage. The main goal is to provide access to as many people as we can so they can enjoy our device and technology on their day-by-day use.
  • Our achievement is to provide better quality photos using mobile phones, for an accessible price to people that can´t effort a better smart phone with a better built in camera, as well people that uses videos on social media to promote their business.

What We Need & What You Get

Our Campaigns needs your commitment to fund, share and you will get our device for the perk chosen by you for a special price.

Our target of 100k USD shall be invested into PPP ( People, Process and Product) part of it will be invested on Marketing campaings, Worldwide logistics and shipment process, which enables us to create a stronger brand into the market.

  • Our unique perks. Be excited!
  • 5$ - Thanks for your support. Every little bit helps bring us closer to our goal. Provide high quality photos with a simple device :-)
  • 19$ Myself unique - 1 device
  • 65 $ MySelf family pack - 4 devices
  • 92$ MySelf colors - 6 devices.
  • The funds will be invested into all the described areas as mentioned before, and, if we still need to add the missing part, we will manage to do so due to other investors behind the company.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • With several years of success in business development, and a solid idea as MySelf Mobile, when we found ourselves at the last step of the production, it is more than clear that things will flow with the contirbutors support.
  • We do believe that most of the hardest challenges has been solved already, we are just in need to create a strong network so the product can trail it´s way to the success.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would like to invite you that can´t contribute monetarily, to let people know about our idea and product, share with family and friends, send it to us, and you may get a free device as a gift.

  • You are more than welcome to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
As drone lovers, we have found out that everybody wants to fly one nowadays, but are hesitant to spend a lot of money for one when they think they’ll only fly it a few times before crashing it.  

 

That's why we decided to create Fairy, a pocket drone that anyone can fly and take anywhere. Fairy is affordable, easy to fly, and have extensive features that make it ideal for first time navigators.  

With the Fairy, you will get all the amazing images and 1080P FHD aerial videos with ease anywhere, anytime. Turn Fairy into your personal air camera with a single touch thanks to its intuitive remote controller and app. Designed for its portability, Fairy can be folded into the size of a phone. Thanks to its 140g weight, no FAA registration is required, so enjoy its 16mins flying time with a single charge.  

The Fairy drone has been designed with a high-performancing camera and a Sony 1/3” (CMOS) sensor to deliver 1080P full HD videos (30 fps) and 8-megapixel images. The camera can be manual tilted down to 60 degrees. With its continuous capture and delay capture mode, Fairy can be your personal autonomous flying photographer! 

With a single touch you can set Fairy to track you while you’re taking pictures or videos. Just turn on the auto-tracking and put away your phone to enjoy a ‘hands-free’ video shooting experience. 

Built for easy and smart use, Fairy’s SLAM 3D precise position hovering technology is like having a tripod in the air. Fairy will maintain the altitude that you choose to give you the perfect pictures with all the right angles. All you have to do is place the drone, pick you favorite position, pose, and Fairy will do the rest. 

To make the flying experience even more fun, Fairy comes with a motion control mode. You can turn your phone into a motion sensing controller to navigate the Fairy. Tilt your phone in any direction and Fairy will follow in real time. 

*Actual shot by Fairy Drone

*Actual video shot by Fairy Drone 

 Check out the prototype review from 3rd party reviewer - Jay Drone

To make your first drone flying experience even easier, we’ve designed the Fairy to return to its home location with a single touch. Just in case Fairy does goes too far, we have integrated a smart function that allows Fairy to go back to its initial starting point if its out of range or if the signal is lost.  

Fairy features a dual-band GPS that tracks its exact position and starting point. So, even if you lose it in the clouds, just wait at the starting point and it will be back to you.  

Personalize it to your needs and choose between 3 different sensitivity modes: low, medium, and high. Each mode provides a different flying experience: smooth flying to record steady videos, normal flight, or take it to the next level with the high sensitivity mode to make it fly like a race drone. Thanks to its four high speed brushless motors.

Despite its size, the Fairy is designed to last longer than other pocket drones in the market. Due to its interchangeable battery, it can lasts up to 16 mins of fly time with a single charge.  

 

Built with light and resistant materials, the Fairy only weighs 140g. No FAA registration is required. 

Compact and portable, the Fairy can be folded into the size of a phone to take anywhere anytime. 

Share your moments on your favorite social media with a single touch thanks to its EasyShare function by using Fairy’s App. 

For those who want to have complete control and take their flying experience to the next level, an attachable controller has been designed to let you take flight like a pro.  

 

The free iOS and Android app is easy to set up and even easier to use. It’ll only take you 30 seconds to learn how to fly the Fairy. Just search the name "Simtoo" to download the Fairy app from the App Store or the Google Play store. 

Just Connect and Fly 

With three simple steps, the Fairy is incredibly easy to use.

1. Fairy Dorne x1 

2. Charge Adapter x1

3. Battery x1

4. Micro USB Cable x1 

5. Controller x1 (Only available for the Controller Combo)

Since 2013, our team has been engaged in developing fly control systems and solutions for drones in a B2B setting. Within two years, our fly control system modules have been already installed in 50,000 drones. 

With years of experience in flying control systems, app development, and industrial design, we aim to make high-tech, easy-to-fly drones that everyone can have access to whether you’re an expert or just a beginner.   

With two years of hard work, we’re now presenting you our Fairy drone. Powered by a SIMTOO flight control system, Fairy is an easy-to-fly drone to capture all your moments.

story:
As an angler with over 20 years experience of fishing with professionals, what annoys me the most is not seeing what i am catching beneath the water.

We love fishing and we have fished all over the world, yet, none of us really "sees" what happens or how fish really takes the bait. We now bring you Anglereye! The smallest Full HD camera that fixes to any fishing line whatever fishing rig you are using. 

100% have reported improved fishing skills, increased fish haul and knowledge since using Anglereye, including professional anglers and boatsmen.

 
 

We know that a lot of projects face the same problem, Fulfillment! We have started making Anglereye since 2016, and the ONLY REASON WHY WE ARE JUST LAUNCHING THIS PROJECT HERE ON INDIEGOGO IS THAT WE! WANT! IT! TO! BE! READY!, unlike others, we are now as ready as it needs to be, all we need is your help, and we can get our mold ready and start mass production.

Some might wonder, why does our shipping cost more than others? Due to recent regulations on Lithium batteries, every Angerleye will only be shipped via DHL, FEDEX or UPS, so you can be rest assured that you will receive  your Anglereye within a week of dispatch.

 

 

 

 

Yes, we do have many problems we need to face and to be solved, like shipping products with batteries, we see people charging only $10 for shipping a product with Lithium batteries, so beware of products that contain Lithium batteries with a low shipping cost, because it could take months to get to you if you are half way round the world. With us, every Angerleye will only be shipped via DHL, FEDEX or UPS, so no worries, coz you know we gotcha! 

We are teamed with a trading company that is working with an overwhelming amount of well experienced suppliers and factories that have been producing great products such as Robi, R2D2 robot, Millennium Falcon and more. And all that access to different factories have allowed us to solve all sorts problem that we have encountered. From technical, molding and package problems are now an advantage to us.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

        

  

             

 

 

Like us, follow us and share us on

Facebook

https://www.facebook.com/AnglereyeFishingCamera/

Youtube

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSuqi2OFUvqwY6surusuyeg

INSTAGRAM

https://www.instagram.com/anglereyefishingcamera/

Twitter

https://twitter.com/AnglereyeEric

Are the clips you are showing real?

Yes! All of our clips are filmed with Anglereye, and that is the only reason why we are just launching Anglereye, unlike others, we want you to receive exactly what you backed. What’s more is that we want you to know that we are ready, all R&D that needs to be done is done, only minor upgrades, modifications and quality check before you receive your Anglereye.

 

When will Anglereye be ready?

We already have our functional prototype of Anglereye ready and already gone deep sea fishing with so, all we need is your help, with your help, we will be able to start making molds and start mass production once our Indiegogo funding target has been achieved and all of our beloved backers will be enjoying your own Anglereye in less than 3months.

 

How much will Anglereye cost?

Suggested retail price would be at around USD$159.99, so be the early bird and get your Anglereye with a super exclusive price.

 

What if there is no/not enough light down the sea?

Anglereye has an extra low lux sensor with built-in LEDs, so you won’t have to worry about the light source, even if you are fishing at night. For best video capturing results, convenience and battery saving reasons, Anglereye will automatically switch LEDs on/off according to the surroundings.

 

How do I get to watch the clips I have just recorded?

Anglereye has a Wi-Fi connection for you to change settings of your Anglereye, Wi-Fi is on when the Anglereye is turned on, you can watch your actions you’ve just captured, transfer your clips to your mobile device, change your Anglereye settings and even check out the real-time image just to make sure your Anglereye is working.

 

Can I really get the full action of my fishing experience?

YES! In order to maximize the fun of your fishing experience, Anglereye is equipped with a 1080p Full HD camera alongside with a built-in microphone which will enhance the joy of video sharing. From a wide range of lenses we have chosen the perfect 120∘wide-angle lens with the least image distortion making sure that you capture all underwater action at its best possible quality.

 

Is Anglereye safe for deep sea fishing?

Anglereye is designed to go deep, it has been tested with a 150m waterproof ability with a sturdy Polycarbonate (the same material riot shields are made of) casing ready to withstand 16bars of pressure at 150m down.

 

How big is Anglereye?

Anglereye is the world’s smallest fishing camera, while having all the functions you desire, it has a dimension of 26.6*112.13mm.

 

Is the stainless steel wire strong enough for my sea monsters?

The 316 stainless steel wire is strong enough to hold 160KG of tension, which is more than a fully grown female bull shark (132KG), but if you are targeting a Great white or a Killer whale, we strongly suggest you leave your Anglereye out for this one.

 

Can I watch real-time actions underwater?

Sadly, no! We are unable to get Anglereye to stream real-time footage underwater as today’s technology has not yet found a way for Wi-Fi signals to penetrate through water, but we will keep an close eye to make sure you will get underwater real-time footage as soon as technology allows.

 

Can I use any microSD card for Anglereye?

You can use most microSD cards found on the market, but we only support up to Class 10 64G microSD cards at the moment, while similar products only support 32G cards. 64Gs might not sound a lot, but it will get you around 750mins (12.5hrs) of action, so it should be more than enough for your fishing trip.

 

What format does my clips come in?

All clips recorded by Anglereye comes in .mov format, which can be played by most devices and software.

 

How long are the clips?

For your convenience, we have pre-set your Anglereye to record clips at 3 minute intervals, but if you want your clips a little longer, you can also change the settings of your Anglereye with your mobile APP to set your clips at 3, 5 or 10 minute intervals.

 

Is Anglereye really Full HD?

Of course, but if you find Full HD a little too clear or want longer recording time, you are welcome to change the settings of your Anglereye with your mobile APP to set your clip resolutions at 1080p@30fps / 720p@30 fps / WVGA / VGA.

 

 

How do I open the camera?

You can thread a piece of string or fishing line through small hole on the cap and pull or if you have no other tools beside your hands, by wiggling and pulling the cap will also do the job.

 

How do I close the camera?

Push the cap back in and turn the cap a little making sure the cap is securely fasten.

 

How do I connect Anglereye with my mobile APP?

Simply turn on Anglereye and Wi-Fi on your mobile phone, choose Anglereye (pre-set name), press connect on the APP and enjoy.

 

What can I do with the mobile APP?

You can make a variety of changes to your Anglereye via the mobile APP. Changes including the display name and password of your Anglereye, downloading clips to your mobile device, the length of each clip (pre-set to 3 minutes), qulity of clip, with/without sound recording, taking snap shots, size of photos, language etc.

 

How do I turn the LEDs on/off?

For best video capturing results, convenience and battery saving reasons, Anglereye will automatically switch LEDs on/off according to the surroundings.

 

How do I turn the Wi-Fi on/off?

Wi-Fi is on when the Anglereye is turned on, you can watch your actions you’ve just captured, transfer your clips to your mobile device, change your Anglereye settings and even check out the real-time image just to make sure your Anglereye is working.

 

Why is the Wi-Fi not working?

In order to maximize the recording time of your Anglereye, we have decided from the moment your Anglereye is turned on, upon 3 minutes of idling time, your Anglereye will put its Wi-Fi to sleep, when you want to connect to Anglereye, simply restart your Anglereye and Wi-Fi will be good to go.

 

How do I watch my videos?

Simple, you can either connect your Anglereye to your mobile APP, by using a usb cable or if your find it a little slow, you can also remove the micro SD card from your Anglereye and copy the files to your computer and edit your clips and share.
story_txt:
As an angler with over 20 years experience of fishing with professionals, what annoys me the most is not seeing what i am catching beneath the water.
We love fishing and we have fished all over the world, yet, none of us really "sees" what happens or how fish really takes the bait. We now bring you Anglereye! The smallest Full HD camera that fixes to any fishing line whatever fishing rig you are using. 
100% have reported improved fishing skills, increased fish haul and knowledge since using Anglereye, including professional anglers and boatsmen.

 

 

We know that a lot of projects face the same problem, Fulfillment! We have started making Anglereye since 2016, and the ONLY REASON WHY WE ARE JUST LAUNCHING THIS PROJECT HERE ON INDIEGOGO IS THAT WE! WANT! IT! TO! BE! READY!, unlike others, we are now as ready as it needs to be, all we need is your help, and we can get our mold ready and start mass production.
Some might wonder, why does our shipping cost more than others? Due to recent regulations on Lithium batteries, every Angerleye will only be shipped via DHL, FEDEX or UPS, so you can be rest assured that you will receive  your Anglereye within a week of dispatch.

 


 

 



 



Yes, we do have many problems we need to face and to be solved, like shipping products with batteries, we see people charging only $10 for shipping a product with Lithium batteries, so beware of products that contain Lithium batteries with a low shipping cost, because it could take months to get to you if you are half way round the world. With us, every Angerleye will only be shipped via DHL, FEDEX or UPS, so no worries, coz you know we gotcha! 
We are teamed with a trading company that is working with an overwhelming amount of well experienced suppliers and factories that have been producing great products such as Robi, R2D2 robot, Millennium Falcon and more. And all that access to different factories have allowed us to solve all sorts problem that we have encountered. From technical, molding and package problems are now an advantage to us.

Facebook

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSuqi2OFUvqwY6surusuyeg

story:
About PaKa

It shoots 8M pixels pictures and HD videos , shares via APP easily.

 

 

Video is filmed by PaKa from the First Person View

Features of PaKa 

 

Take a photo just with a blink in 0.4 seconds!

Transfer media from paka to APP via WIFI ,share with friends on social media!

Attaches most of the glasses!

Versatile&Flexiable

Put PaKa on your bike ,class room desk,car etc anywhere you like .Then you get another action camera or a recording pen or a car recorder etc.PaKa is perfect for selfie too.

PaKa compares with Gopro

 

PaKa compares with Spectacles

 

Indiegogo Rewards

 

Color Options

Light Weight 

Only 18 grams .Light  enough to be attached on glasses.

 

Outlook&Specifications

PAKA has only 3 buttons: one button is for photo and video, one is for wifi and the third one is power.

Three  ways to take a photo:

  • Take a photo just with a blink
  • Press button shortly once for taking a photo
  • Take a photo by APP

 

Two  ways to film a video:

  • Do a long press button to start filming a video    

  • Film a video by APP                                                                                                                                     

Our Team

 Our group was formed in 2013, and all of our members came from different camera products companies. Before this we’ve  supplied camera products for Apple, SamSung and Nokia , Except that there are the world‘s most professional camera engineers in our team and we own the  test lab by ourselves. 

Our members are well acquainted with every process of camera research & development and every process of camera production. To provide to our customers with high quality images, we only use the best sensors and lenses in the world. Before PaKa, we've been committing to camera products’ research and development for a long time. Of course, we only focus on fancy ones. Bringing customers different shooting experience is the goal we pursuit all the long way.

 

Our Test Lab

With a professional camera test lab, we are going to bring you the best quality images with PaKa!

 

Time Line

 

 

 

CES Fair

We participated in the 2017 CES in Las Vegas.  As you might have expected, PaKa was highly praised at the show！

 

Risks and challenges

The production of PaKa's prototype was done and it passed the test successfully. Now we are working on perfecting the function of the APP, producing the outer case mould and designing the product packaging. Our team has produced many kinds of camera products before PaKa, so that we are very familiar with these process. FOXCONN, the foundry of Apple is going to help us with production and ensure the standard high quality of every single product  .

Looking forward to sharing it with all the supporters in this July！

 

How to use 

 

FAQ

1. I live outside of United States. Will you ship to my country?
Sure! We’ll ship worldwide so this won't be a problem.

 

2.what about the ppl who don't have glasses?

You can use it on sun glasses or just attach it on any other stuff! As a wearable micro camera, there are many ways to use it like tighting it to your pet’s collar or something. Create your own way to use it!

 

3.Paka takes pics when I blink, yes?I blink 27600 times a day,does it take a pic every time I blink ?

PaKa would not take pics everytime you blink but only when you are blinking purposely.

 

4.How paka sense a wink?

There is a sensor in paka, which can record the winking data of its wearer. After you wear it on,wink purposely for five times to allow it learn your winking habits then it can distinguish the intentional wink from normal physiological wink. Of course we cannot make sure it’s 100% accurate, but our accuracy testing result is 95% above.

 

5.What if one can not wink ?

He or she could take photos by touching the side button or using the app. There are three ways to take photos and two ways to film videos.

 

6.If my eyes are dry and I blink really hard for some reason ,will it take a pic?

You got me! I guess that’s the time you should take off the glasses and do some eye massage: )

 

7.How do you know you are taking photos?

It will make a sound when you are taking a photo. And the led light on paka is lighting too.

 

8.How long can it work?

For pics taking, PaKa lasts for 10 hours long. For video shooting it can work 30mins continuously.

 

9.Does it have focus function?

There’s no focus function on PaKa. Just like any other sport camera, it’s equipped with a large depth of field lens to make the whole scene clear and need no time to adjust. All sport cameras have no focus function to catch image in the highest speed, including GoPro.

 

10. Is it able to keep attaching to glasses through severe exercise?

With the specific way, PaKa can attach to glasses tightly enough to make sure it won’t fall off during your sport time.

 

11.Which kind of glasses can put PAKA on?

It’s suitable for almost all glasses as long as your glasses temple isn’t slim like hair.

 

12．Does it involve privacy violating?

Our purpose is to make a fasion micro sport camera but not a candid camera. We want it to be as cool as google glass. In fact PaKa will make a sound and flashing light while taking photo and video. You can consider it as a wearable mini GoPro.

 

13. Is the APP useable now? What’s  the function of it?

Of Course! The debugging of the APP is over. You can download PaKa APP on the App store after receiving your PaKa. Connect your PaKa with it and use it to check out the images and videos you take. You can also set the parameter up to share stuff immediately on your SNS accounts.

Contact

General Enquiry & Support Help: pakacamera@gmail.com

Press and Sample Review: balance@a-electron.com

Follow us

We want it to be as cool as google glass. In fact PaKa will make a sound and flashing light while taking photo and video. You can consider it as a wearable mini GoPro. 13. Is the APP useable now? What’s  the function of it?Of Course! The debugging of the APP is over. You can download PaKa APP on the App store after receiving your PaKa. Connect your PaKa with it and use it to check out the images and videos you take. You can also set the parameter up to share stuff immediately on your SNS accounts.ContactGeneral Enquiry & Support Help: pakacamera@gmail.comPress and Sample Review: balance@a-electron.comFollow us

story:
Small magnetic 1080P camera

QBcam is a  USB connected, a magnetic camera that you can put it anywhere to capture any moment!

QBcam supports 1080P recording and 12 million pixels photo-taking. 

It needs only three steps: Turn on camera, adsorb it on arbitrary position, then begin to take photo or videos. 

QBcam is the world's smallest magnetic camera that is affordable for everyone.

 

Fix it! Shoot! With the built-in magnet, QBcam can be adsorbed on the magnetic surface. In addition to external magnetic disk, QBcam can be placed on an arbitrary magnetic surface.

In addition to magnetic disk, it can be placed everywhere, say the backpack.

QBcam adapts computer operating system and provides video calls with 1080P HD resolution. It provides 1080P video and 12MP pictures.

With four infrared night vision lights, QBcam can provide you a clear video recording even at night!

940nm Infrared Sensor Features infrared lamp beads as a non-invasive feature. Night vision and low disturbance just got smarter with the highest performance feature to obtain clear and high-quality images, without light.

With rigorous industrial design, QBcam is excellently waterproof to satisfy daily use.Even used by the pool. Install waterproof shell, which makes it easy to be waterproof.

 

QBcam sport

QBcam with surf(waterproof test)

Adsorb QBcam on the basketball stand to record your exciting scoring moments. How easy and convenient!

QBcam with CAR

QBcam can serve as a spare driving recorder. Switch on QBcam, connect power, then sustainable circular recording. It can’t be much easier.

QBcam with cat&dog!

Dumbo dog drinks his urine! See what happen when you are not at home!

QBcam is tiny enough. You can fix it on pets without lumping sensation. In this way, you can explore pet’s perspective and see what happened when you are out.

Motion detection. (QBcam will take a video once it detects the motion. Whereas, it will go into standby mode.)

QBcam with BIKE!

 
QBcam with fitness!
Light and handy, you can take it along. Record your fitness process and be your private coach.

 

How it works?

 

Press the power button for 1s, then press the On/Off button. Take videos after the light flashes 3 times.

Explain how the magnetic camera works!

story:
180° Flip Screen | 4K60FPS Video | 10x 1080P SlowMotion

Alpha 3 is the 3rd Generation of award winning action camera by Mokacam. It is 3m waterproof (Pro version) and empowered by a beastly processor. It delivers Super Steady 4K Video & Stunning Image Quality with HDR in any light, 4K@60FPS video to 1080P@240FPS 10x super slow motion to capture all the actions. Alpha3’s performance leaves GoPro in the dust!

 

Why Alpha3 is better than GoPro & DJI?

Alpha3 adopted the most advanced SoC (system on chip) currently on the market, H22+IMX577. The beasty processor and sensor support HDR in both photo mode and video mode up to 4K 60fps. Get enhanced image quality in all resolutions!

Electronic stabilization delivers super smooth video with vivid image.

This is how Alpha3 performance compares with some iconic camera models.

HDR in both Video & Photo

Alpha 3: Next Generation DOL HDR video up to 4K 60fps.HDR enhances image quality, restore details, and increase the layer of colors to make your video more vivid. HDR setting is especially useful for scenes that include shadows or bright areas.

GoPro: HDR is available on photo mode only.  Learn more about GoPro's HDR feature.

 

Gimbal-like Stabilization for HDR Mode

Alpha 3: With the groundbreaking 1.2GHz Ambarella H22 Quad-Core Processor, electronic stabilization can be used for HDR video.

DJI Osmo Action: Stabilization can NOT be used for HDR. Learn more (question 8)

To learn more about how stabilization on a3 differs from GoPro and DJI, please check out our FAQ tab

 

More Realistic Colors

Visit Florence (Italy) to see which one is more realistic on color reproduction.

CLICK the pic to see the full size photo

New Sample Videos

Visit Amalfi, Firenze, Rome (Italy) to see which one is more realistic on color reproduction.
 

Normal Angle Options

Distortion Correction up to 4K 30FPS

Smoother 60FPS 4K Ultra-HD Video

The higher frame rate video can capture more actions, especially when the object is moving fast.

10x 1080P Super Slow Motion Video

1080P@240FPS, Capture All The Actions in Full-HD!

Super Smooth Time Lapse Video

Every 1s/2s/5s/10s/30s/60s

 

 

Blows away the competition!

The Most Advanced SoC Ever

5x Faster Readout

Thanks to the stacked structure and quickly buffering DRAM chip (memory)

Improved picture quality in low light

To learn more about why Mokacam a3 has a more powerful chip than GoPro and DJI, please check out our FAQ tab.

Aspherical Lens to Reduce Distortion

Combining the clarity of 7-Layer Glass Lens including Aspherical Lens, Alpha3 delivers unparalleled colors, details and clarity.

Super Low Power Consumption

Much longer battery life at the same capacity

With the leading H22 Quad-Core SoC and IMX577 image sensor, the power consumption of Alpha3 is just 1.5W, resulting in much longer battery life at the same capacity. Replaceable 1050mAh Li-Poly Battery.

Perfect for Selfies and Tricky Filming Angles

180° Tiltable Touch Screen

Alpha3 Use Cases

45% Bigger Display Area Than GoPro's

2.35" IPS LCD touch screen, bright even in the sunshine

 

37mm Adapter for Extend Lenses

3.5mm Mic Adapter for Better Audio

You can connect Alpha3 with a third-party microphone through the USB-C port by the 3.5mm adapter to get even better audio quality.

Intuitive and Convenient Operations

With the 2.35" IPS Touch Screen, the operations are smooth and convenient.

200ft/60m Waterproof

3m waterproof even without case (Pro version). Up to 200 ft/ 60m underwater adventure with waterproof case, making it the perfect underwater companion.

Share Instantly with Mokacam APP

Download your videos/photos immediately to your phone through WiFi connection. The new APP also work with Alpha S camera.

Preview and Playback on Your TV

The Micro HDMI port provides a new preview and playback mode, it could live stream the video to the Flat TV in Full-HD size.

 

Designing and Prototyping

Stretch Goals

Tech Specs

Timeline

About Mokacam

Mokacam creates innovative designs focused on reliving the beautiful moments in life. From video filming, photo tagging, automatic editing and social sharing, we are trying our best to simplify each step of recording your life.

Mokacam re-invented action camera, the innovations of “Worlds Smallest 4K Camera” got the Reddot Design Award.

INDIEGOGO INNOVATIVE PRODUCT 2018

Powered by Indiegogo

Alpha S Action Camera

Jonathan Burke (Taiwan): The AlphaS is a great camera, the hardware accessories are excellent, and the software is almost perfect for my needs.

Steve (Colorado, US): THANK YOU! I just got my Alpha S Mokacam and I love it! Works great with my iPad too. Its been a long time to wait but it was worth it. Thanks so much for keeping on top of everything.

Timothy (Kentucky, US): I’ve had mine (Alpha S) for a week and I love it. Hands down the best experience I have had with an action camera (I’ve used Gopro’s and several knockoffs).

nicomeech (France): I was one that I bought the very first Mokacam and this product is amazing ! The moka camera is very good, so i trust in you and in your company. I support you again for this new project, because i was happy from the first one :)

kimvellore (California, US): I have been using the Mokacam and I love it. I am looking forward to this awesome new camera.

ticous78 (Paris, France): Thanks a lot for your awesome product ! Keep up the good work for your next camera!

Snap Wearable Camera

Ed Zee (United States): Got it (Snap) today. Wow it’s tiny!  Got it working stand alone and with iOS/Android app connect. Image quality is really good. 

ron.melton (United States): Mine showed up today in good shape. Looking forward to taking it for a run. Test pictures inside look fine. 

Lawry McCarthy (Australia):  Got mine, the photos are great, so is the video

purchases (United States): Unexpected got my camera. Build quality seems good. The video looks good.

Phillip Davis (United States): Just received my Snap today, finally — it’s even smaller than I imagined!, Hope to use it on an upcoming trip to Costa Rica.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

General
Technical
Payment and Shipping
 
 

General

 

Are you offering a warranty on Alpha 3?

Yes, we are offering a 1-Year Warranty. Warranty is only for exchange of a defective unit.

 

How can I buy more than 1 units or more batteries, is there extra shipping cost?

You can simply place muntiple orders, all the perks are FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE, so there is no extra shipping cost.

 

Technical

 

What is the difference between 30FPS and 60FPS, what can I do with this feature?

For sports and action videos, 60Frame Per Second videos are much smoother, and you can get 2x slow motion video with the footage.

 

What is Stacked and DOL HDR, why the Alpha3's sensor IMX577 is better than GoPro's IMX277 and DJI Osmo Action's IMX377?

IMX577 is Sony's new generation Exmor RS Cmos sensor, Exmor R IMX277 & 377 are old sensors which are not stacked and there is no DOL HDR.
* Stacked: Thanks to the stacked structure and quickly buffering DRAM chip, the new Exmor RS CMOS sensor realizes over 5x faster readout speed than conventional models.

* DOL HDR: Digital Over-Lap High Dynamic Range technology, delivers the data from three exposures on a line-by-line basis rather than frame by frame, resulting in improved picture quality, especially under poor light conditions, compared to common HDR.

 

Why Alpha3 is more advanced than GoPro 7 and DJI Action?

Mokacam α3: H22+IMX577. Next Generation DOL HDR at all resolutions up to 4K 60fps video, HDR video can be used with electronic stabilization simultaneously.

GoPro: IMX277. HDR on GoPro Hero7 Black is only available on photo mode. Click HERE to learn more about the limitations of GoPro's HDR feature on their website.

DJI: H2+IMX377. HDR on DJI Osmo Action can not be used with stabilization(RockSteady) simultaneously. Click HERE to confirm it in the FAQ-Camera-8 on DJI website.

 

How is image stabilization done? Is there a gyro sensor, or is part of video frame cut off via EIS?

The image stabilization is provided by both gyro sensor and the image processor to cut part of the frames, it is called EIS.

 

Gopro have their Hypersmooth which is pretty good. Osmo Action has Rocksteady which appears better again. Where would you place the image stabilization of the Alpha 3 compared to these other two cameras please?

GoPro/Osmo Action, no matter what name they call it, the stabilization is Electronic Image Stabilization, which relies on the imager processor to cut the edge of the original image that the sensor gets during the filming. So the computing power is a key to get better performance. As you can see in the campaign page, the 1.2GHz Quad-Core H22 is industry leading, even more powerful than 1.0Ghz H2 on Osmo Action.

 

Regarding HDR, GoPro Hero 7 Black only supports HDR in photo mode, DJI Osmo Action's HDR video conflicts with their stabilization. How about Alpha 3? Can we get HDR video with stabilization?

Alpha3's HDR is available for all video resolutions and there is no conflict with stabilization. So you can get HDR video and stabilization simultaneously.

 

What is the maximum bitrate? (GoPro 78 Mbit/s, DJI Osmo 100 Mbit/s)

90Mbps.

 

Is there touch lock to prevent accidentally operation?

Yes.

 

I have a back-up battery for 1st Gen. Mokacam or Alpha S. Does it match Alpha 3?

Sorry, but those batteries won't fit Alpha 3, however, we managed to lower the battery price and it's all FREE SHIPPING if you have an existing camera order.

 

What's the video recording duration for 1080P 60FPS and 64 Gig of memory?

At 60FPS, 64 Gigs will record 6 hours of footage. At 30FPS, 64 Gigs will record 12 hours.

 

What is the focus range?

The focus range is 15cm - 400cm

 

Will there be an Android App?

Yes, there is an Android and iOS APP. The APPs are ready for operation and will be released before the shipping.

 

Will the new App of Alpha S also work for 1st Gen. Mokacam, Snap or Alpha S?

The 1st Gen Mokacam and Snap share the same App which is called "Mokacam Camera" in the App Store. Alpha S and Alpha 3 share the same App since they both featured the Ambarella image processor.

 

How do you know how much power is left in the batteries?

You can see the battery status on the screen, or in the App.

 

How do you know how much memory is remaining?

You can see the remaining storage status on the screen, or in the App.

 

Does Alpha 3 come with a memory card?

No, we are not including a memory card with your order. A micro SD/TF card will be needed.

 

Will a battery come with Alpha 3?

Yes, each camera perk includes a battery and the 1xBundle perk includes 2x batteries altogether.

 

Will a charging cable come with Alpha 3?

Yes, each package will include a USB-C for charging.

 

What are the ratings for the waterproof case?

200 feet/60 meters with waterproof case.

 

How many hours will Alpha 3 last if only used for taking pictures?

There are many factors and conditions to calculate this, but generally the battery life should last you for more than 1 day.

 

Can Alpha 3 be connected to a microphone through a 3.5mm mic adapter?

Yes, the USB-C to 3.5mm Mic Adapter is included in both Accessory Pack and Bundle Perks. Unlike GoPro whose Mic Adapter costs $49.99, the Accessory Pack includes 5 very useful accessories only cost $49, and you only need to add $20 to get the bundle perks.

 

Can Alpha 3 handle extreme temperatures?

Yes, Alpga 3 has been tested to work at -20C degrees.

 

Is Alpha 3 compatible with a standard tripod?

Yes, there is standard 1/4 inch screw slot on the bottem side.

 

How long will it take to completely charge the camera battery?

This depends on the type of charger you are using, but generally it will take 1.5 hours.

 

What is the Battery Life (estimated time) of Alpha3?

In H.264 mode, 1080P30 video- 1h 47m, 1080P60-1h 18m, 4K30-1h 10m, 4K60-58m.

 

What is the WIFI range?

WIFI range is about 10m - 20m.

 

Is the focus automatic? Or is that done also through the screen?

Focus is automatic.

 

Alpha 3 can charge on 100-220 volts right?

The Snap should not be charged on 100-220 volt, it should be charged by a USB cable, which means it depends on the USB adapter in your region.

 

Is it possible to use a Bluetooth remote?

Yes, it is included in the Accessory Pack or Bundle.

 

Can I stream videos via WiFi to my smart TV?

No, but you can stream videos via HDMI cable.

 

Can Alpha 3 be controlled with a 1st generation Mokacam's or Alpha S's remote controller?

We will confirm it soon.

 

Payments and Shipping

 

How much is shipping?

All the perks are FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE this time.

 

How realistic is your suggested August delivery date?

It's very realistic, we'll share our production progress in the first update, the molds are almost ready and the electronic part of the first batch 100 units have been produced.

 

Can I pick the camera up in Mokacam office and avoid the shipping charge?

Sorry, we'd love to meet you, but the cameras are shipped from our manufacturing partners by air. We have to pay shipping on every camera. 

 

When does it ship?

The estimated shipping date is August 2019.

 

Where do you plan shipping it from? HK?

From HK to a few hubs worldwide then to your address.

 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible; please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It should be 0% in the US and varies internationally. You can check this comprehensive list to get started.

 

Can I get a refund?

The order can be 100% refunded before the campaign ends.

story:
Visit official website!

 

 

Smartta SliderMini Early Tester Reviews

 

 

 

Everything You Need

Dual Control

You may design and control shoots remotely with our intuitive user-friendly app, or simply use a hardware button on the unit to manually control how the camera slides.

 

Smooth & Silent

The macro-precise motor and cutting-edge control technology enables precise and quiet motion control over the balance among strength, duration and smoothness.

 

Great Load Capacity

Powerful motor and torque enables 33.33lb(15kg) carrying capacity (horizontally), let you work efficiently with any phone, camera and DSLR.

Ultra Portable

0.79 inch (2cm) in thickness, 1.26 lb (0.569kg) in weight, SliderMini easily fits into any backpacks, ready to meet your shooting needs anytime, anywhere.

Unibody Design

Small but compact, everything is self-contained, nothing to assemble and no external battery to deal with. All that remains outside is an ultra sleek, streamlined, beautiful shape.

 

Long Path

The slider features a travel length of 8 inches(20.32cm), which provides enough motion capture to meet 95% of shooting needs.

 

Built-in Timelapses

Select from 10 preset timelapse modes so you can be up and running very quickly. You can also customize the mode including title, picture, interval, play time, record time, FPS.

Time-lapse Library

You can add unlimited number of timelapse modes to build your own time-lapse library for future use. Simply design your own shots, save and reload the same to shot again.

Bluetooth Connection

SliderMini automatically connects with your Android/iOS phone over bluetooth as soon as you open our app Smartta Go, seamless integrated in the most convenient way.

 

How It Works?

Manual Control

 

Get the slider running quickly and easily by pressing this button only! The device moves at 100% speed of 1cm/s when controlled in this way.

 

App Control

Live Video

 

 

The live video mode allows you to take full control of real time moving easily. You may play with default settings, or change speed, length, and direction of each shot. Even during the shooting, you can always make changes instantaneously to meet new needs.

 

Our smart powerful app enables you to convert to time-lapse with a single tap and set up your time-lapse in seconds. SliderMini control unit can communicate directly with your DSLR with universal shutter release cable. It’s so simple that everyone can shoot time-lapses.

 

Have you ever seen beautiful night time-lapses and wondered how? Well, now you can shoot those too with ease. Use our built-in nightlapse modes to quickly get the perfect exposure and capture terrific night shots, well enough to meet your fun night lapse needs.

 

Want to create your own stop motion animation videos? Start with SliderMini. Set how many frames you want to shoot and continue with a single tap. With unique features and clear instructions, you can create the illusion of movements and makes all frames come to life.

Advanced Features

Loop Mode

 
Loop mode, also known as bounce feature, allows SliderMini to go back and forth continuously until you tell it to stop.
 

Silent Mode

 
SliderMini will beep to indicate that an instruction has been received/executed. You may disable Alert Sounds in the app to mute the beeping and run in silent mode. 
 
 

Technical Specifications

 

Feature Comparison

 

About Us

At Smartta, we are devoted to helping those who have video-making needs to create terrific videos, by bringing easy-to-use and affordable camera gears. We understand that a good slider is key to smooth camera movement, thus making great videos, but we found that most traditional sliders were really bulky, or quite complicated, or truly expensive ── that’s why we designed SliderMini, a very easy-to-use & ultra lightweight camera slider, at reasonably affordable price.

With a strong passionate team, especially, with Product Manager being a senior photographer & video-maker himself, we are proud that SliderMini turns out to be what we had expected: small and compact, easy and fun to play with. We believe that no matter you are a professional or an amateur, new or experienced, everyone has the possibility & capability to realize your creativity with ease, anytime, anywhere. The best thing is that our team has tested & improved product functionality strictly,  and mass production is finished, so our backers should receive SliderMini in the fastest way.

                    Spread the Word

We’d love it if you guys could tell your friends, family, and the rest of the world about SliderMini.

Sign up now on ShareASale, get a personal link to share through social media, email, or any other platform you like. Be rewarded with 5%~10% ($20~$39.9) commission per sale!

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

General

Q: How to change my perk?

Each contribution made is recorded as separate. If you would like to receive a new perk, you can do this in a separate contribution. Also, please note that Indiegogo does not allow backers to  add multiple perks in a single transaction, so if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk. However, we suggest you send an email to support@ismartta.com first if you want to change your perk, so we may work with you to find out the easiest solution. 

Q: What’s your refund policy?

1）When the campaign is live: you will be able to initiate a refund through your Indiegogo account.

2）When the campaign has ended and:

  • The contribution is not fulfilled: please send an email to support@ismartta.com to work out the method for refunds.
  • The contribution is fulfilled: we are unable to process any refunds.

Q: What's your return policy?

We are unable to process any returns for Indiegogo contributions. While all contributions are final, our standard 1 year warranty still applies.

Q: What's your warranty policy?

SliderMini comes with a standard 1 year warranty. We guarantee that SliderMini, when delivered to you, is in original packaging and is free from any defects in manufacturing, materials and workmanship. During the warranty period, we will, at our discretion, repair or replace any defective parts within a reasonable period of time. As for the shipping fee incurred for under-warranty items, we are happy to refund it within reasonable limits.

Q: Where is your company? Where is SliderMini manufactured and shipped? 

Smartta International Limited is a company registered in Cayman Islands, with the team located in China. SliderMini is manufactured in China, and will be shipped from China. 

Q: If I have other questions, who should I contact?

For product & order issue, please contact support@ismartta.com

For cooperation & partnership, please contact partner@ismartta.com

Your message will be responded within 24 hours on the business day.

 

 

Technical

Q：What’s New about Smartta SliderMini 2?

1）More Powerful Motor

SliderMini 2 comes with a brand-new motor that is more powerful. The benefits are:

l  Regarding smoothness and stability, SliderMini 2 makes camera movement smoother and more stable.

l  Vertical load capacity has been enhanced to 1.25KG/2.76lb, which increases by 25% compared to the previous version.

l  Performance of the whole motion control system has been optimized, and the test result shows a maximum power saving of up to 20%.

2）Longer Battery Life

The built-in rechargeable battery lasts around 52 hours in normal use, which increases by 25% compared to the previous version.

3）New Feature: Curve Mode

Curve Mode is an essential camera movement mode for content creators, which enables users to achieve various camera movement speeds by automatically moving towards or away from the subject. There are 4 built-in speed mode types: Zoom In, Zoom Out, A to B, Focus A. Each one will allow the slider to move with different speed and get different camera movement effects. The users can also adjust the speed simultaneously while the slider is moving, by simply swiping the speed block up and down.

4）New Feature: Stay Mode

Stay Mode is specifically added to stop slider movement temporarily when shooting time-lapse or stop motion videos, so users can have more smooth and stable footages. Tap “Stay” on the screen, the slider will stop moving until you switch back to “L-R”(Left to Right) sliding mode. We’ve also optimized the built-in settings so the interface appears more user-friendly when shooting time-lapse and stop motion videos.

Q: What system does the app support?

iOS 10.0 or above and Android 5.0 or above.

Q: How do I charge the battery?

A type-C USB is included for charging. It takes about 1.5 hours for a full charge. The battery can be charged when the device is in use.

Q: How long does SliderMini battery last?

SliderMini is powered by a built-in rechargeable 1500mAH Lithium battery. It takes around 1.5 hours to fully charge and the battery will last around 48 hours in normal use, up to 12 hours in active slide.

Q: What's the speed? How long it takes for one travel?

When controlled by app, it moves at 100% speed of 1cm/s & minimum speed of 0.1mm/s; when controlled by hardware button, it moves at 100% speed. With a 20cm travel distance, it takes 20 seconds to go from one end to the other when moving at 100% speed.

Q: What's the Bluetooth pairing range?

Within 33 ft (10m) normally.

Q: Does my phone need to stay in the Bluetooth range to keep the slider going after it is set?

Yes, please stay in Bluetooth range for better connection with the App.

Q: Do I need to keep the app open for video capture?

Yes, please keep the App open if possible.

Q: Is the loop mode available for SliderMini?

Yes, SliderMini will have the function to oscillate back and forth automatically.

Q: When will I need to use a shutter release cable?

We strongly recommend using a  shutter release cable when shooting time-lapses or stop motion with DSLR. Not needed if you are using a smartphone instead.

Q: How do I shoot timelapses with DSLR?

Set exposure in DSLR, and connect DSLR to the slider with the shutter release cable.

Q: Is it possible to use the slider upside down?

Yes it is. But we do not recommend doing this over a long period of time. 

Q: What kind of camera does SliderMini support for shooting timelapse?

SliderMini features a common 2.5mm trigger socket, and by default it comes with 3 standard 2.5mm shutter release cables for connecting SliderMini to your camera. Below is a list of them and some supported camera model# for your quick review:

  • Shutter Release for Canon (Type 1), supports:

7D/7DII/ 6D/ 50D/ 5DII/ DIII 5D/ 5D41 5DS 1 40D/ 30D/ 20D/ 10D /1D/1DS/1DX/
1Ds Mark I/1Ds Mark II/1Ds Mark IV/ EOS-1VI EOS-3

  • Shutter Release for Canon (Type 2), supports:

77D/M6/M5/8OO D/80D/ 760D/750D/ 700D/ 70D/ 650D/ 600D/ 60D/ 550D/ 500D/ 450D/400D/ 350D/ 300D /1300D/1200D/ 1100D/ 1000D/ 100D/ SX50/ SX60/G10/ G11/ G12/G15/G1X /G1XII/ T1i/T2¡/T3¡ /T3 /T4¡/T5i I

  • Shutter Release for Sony, supports:

a9 /a7/ a7R/a7S/a7 Il/a7S Il/a7R II/a7 IlI/a7R III/ a6500 / a6300 /a60O0/ a5100/ a5000/ a3000/ HX300/HX5O/ HX6O/ RX10O Il/ RX10O II/l RX100M4 1 RX100M5 1 a58/NEX-3N
Sony

Q: How many preset timelapse modes are there? what are they?

SliderMini comes with 10 timelapse presets: Star Trails/The Milky Way/The Day Road/The Night Road/Silk Texture/Cloud/Lightning Storm/Sunset/Stream of people/Bloom. You can also make your own custom presets if you wish.

Q: Can I manually control the slider totally without using the motor?

If you unscrew a few parts on the slider you will be able to push to slide, totally without using the motor. However, we do not recommend using it this way, because:

1) This may harm the sliding filament mechanism and affect its normal use; 

2) Compared to motorized sliding, it moves harder, and less smooth.

So, to ensure product performance and user experience we recommend app remote control or one-button press control.

Q: Can it be mounted on any tripod or only your own tripod?

Any tripod. Underneath the SliderMini, there’s a 3/8-16″ socket, which comes with a 1/4-20″ adapter/receptor fitted. 

Q: How do I mount my camera/smartphone on SliderMini?

A camera (or smartphone holder) can be mounted via 3/8″ or 1/4″ screw to the top of the sliding carriage. There is a single 3/8-16″ thread on the plate, and a panoramic adapter head is included to convert that into 1/4-20″ screw. You may also use the mini ball head or a gimbal to mount the camera.

 

 

Safety & Regulation

Q: Is it waterproof?

While SliderMini itself is not waterproof, the backpack cover is water-resistant. We recommend purchasing the backpack and rain cover to travel with and store your SliderMini.

Q: What certifications do you have?

Here at Smartta we are committed to your safety. SliderMini has CE and FCC certificates, as well as the MSDS document.

 

 

Shipping

Q: Where are you shipping to?

We are shipping to the following countries:

- America: United States, Canada, Mexico

- Europe: Germany, UK, France, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Denmark, Finland, Greece, Portugal, Slovakia, Hungary, Norway, Romania, Slovenia, Italy, Austria, Luxembourg, Belgium, Ireland, Poland, Czech Republic, Chile 

- Oceania: Australia, New Zealand

- Asia: Japan, Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, Philippines, Republic of Korea, Taiwan, Macao, Hong Kong, China Mainland.

If any other areas outside of the above, please contact us at: support@ismartta.com

Q: What's your shipping method?

Your orders will be shipped by international express service (DHL Express for example) or postal service. The shipping method may vary for different countries. 

All packages will be shipped with tracking numbers so you may track packages status.

Q: What is the shipping charge? Are customs charges included?

When making your contribution, select your country and shipping cost will automatically be applied, customs charges NOT included. The amount of customs charges vary by your home country. Some countries/regions may charge very high amount of import fees, such as Brazil, India, Africa, etc. You may consult a local brokerage agency to get more details.

Q: How do I change my shipping address?

Please send an email to support@ismartta.com with your updated address details.
