All that remains outside is an ultra sleek, streamlined, beautiful shape. Long PathThe slider features a travel length of 8 inches(20.32cm), which provides enough motion capture to meet 95% of shooting needs. Built-in TimelapsesSelect from 10 preset timelapse modes so you can be up and running very quickly. You can also customize the mode including title, picture, interval, play time, record time, FPS.Time-lapse LibraryYou can add unlimited number of timelapse modes to build your own time-lapse library for future use. Simply design your own shots, save and reload the same to shot again.Bluetooth ConnectionSliderMini automatically connects with your Android/iOS phone over bluetooth as soon as you open our app Smartta Go, seamless integrated in the most convenient way. How It Works?Manual Control

 
Get the slider running quickly and easily by pressing this button only! The device moves at 100% speed of 1cm/s when controlled in this way. App ControlLive Video

story:
A Travel Tripod & Camera Boom in one!

Getting great video angles with the Mighty Selfie Stick is easy but also having a functional everyday workhorse tripod with a solid steel base, bluetooth remote and GoPro compatible mount is an incredible value. 

Instantly adjusts to various height with detachable bluetooth remote.

Great Features Make Great Video!

  • Compact size 26 inches (66 cm) extends to 10 feet (305 cm)
  • Secure & strong spring action phone mount
  • Bluetooth enabled remote with ring holder clips to stick
  • Steel tripod base has stable 20 inch (50.8 cm) diameter 
  • TSA approved
  • Quick-set & release extensions (23 inches each)
  • GoPro compatible mount
  • Hand strap 

 

Captivating Video 

This is a game changer for shooting video or photos for weddings, concerts, festivals, action sports, real estate photos, political rallies and more. Get shots and views that feel like drone footage without all the tech. 

 

 Epic Group Shots


Massive Group Selfie at LIVE.me booth at VidCon

 

Unique Angles for Reporters / Journalists

Shoot incredible "on the scene" views of news events, protests, fires developing stories for journalist vloggers and citizen reporters.

 

The 10 Second Tripod 

The Mighty Selfie Stick has a fast action height adjustment means you can quickly convert from 26 inches to 6 foot tripod for interviews or hands free video in seconds.

The 1/4 base mount can also be used with a standard tripod for even more height. The solid steel tripod base can be used on it's own as a standard camera mount (1/4-20).

Extremely light and easy to carry the Mighty Selfie Stick replaces expensive bulky heavy tripods and is light enough to carry everyday or while traveling or camping.

 

Professional Grade Mounts

The super strong spring action phone mount can securely hold your phone and is easy to connect and quickly remove your mobile device. Extends to 3.5 inches (9 cm) opening. The phone mount is padded with a sponge rubber for extra grip. 

 The phone grip is also angled to ensure a strong anti slip locking grip for your mobile device. The phone mount also folds down around the pole making a minimal profile when collapsed.

 

 GoPro Compatible Mount

Hey GoPro enthusiasts, you can take your video to a whole other level with the Mighty Selfie Stick. Just imagine the angles and views you can get on any action shot and be the first to stand out from the crowd with cool new GoPro video angles. 

 

Quick release locking system

Twisting the extending poles counter-clockwise locks them into place. When the dots are aligned (twisting the extensions clockwise) you can extend them out individually to the height you require.

Twist Release and Twist Tighten for Quick Set Adjustments

Twist to tighten = Twist to loosen and adjust. Instantly adjust your height for any shot.

 

Bluetooth Remote 

 The bluetooth remote can link to your mobile device and be worn like a ring or clip to your pole so you don't have to reach up to start/stop your video or snap a pic. 

 

 

20" Diameter Steel Tripod Base

 The solid steel 1/4 mount base has a wide 20 inch diameter providing a stable and secure base. Steel base folds down to a slim profile for easy portability. 

 Make your photos Mighty!

The Origin of the Idea

The Mighty Selfie Stick began as an idea I had from seeing some long window washing poles used in NYC to wash 2nd floor windows. 

I found a substitute with a painters pole at Home Depot and made my first prototype by breaking off a paint roller handle and adding a stand photo mount 1/4 inch screw with 1/20" thread count. 

It worked and it made great video! That's what launched me on the pursuit of finding the perfect manufacturing solution.

 The first iteration was made with long painters poles used to paint ceilings adapted by removing a paint roller handle and inserting a 1/4 20 screw to hold a standard phone mount. 

 Other experiments were made with flag pole manufacturers and selfie stick manufacturers but none had the length required to get as long as 10 feet without serious bending of the poles. 

 The final manufacturing solution was found with a table top tripod company that had all the components I needed but had never yet produced a self standing 10 foot pole before. 

 This was the last step in the manufacturing research stage before I felt confident in bringing this crazy product to market while also offering all the advantages of a professional all purpose tripod at the same time.

 

  

Timeline

2016 

December - Ideation / Concept from seeing window washers in NYC

2017

January - 1st Prototype made with Painters Pole 

February - Manufacturing Research & Development 

March - Manufacturer Found 

May - 2nd Prototype Developed

June - 3rd Prototype w base 

July - Vidcon Demonstration Test 

August - Launched on Kickstarter 

September - Placing Initial Order

October (projected) - Shipping - Viral Videos hitting Internet!

Hand strap 
 Captivating Video This is a game changer for shooting video or photos for weddings, concerts, festivals, action sports, real estate photos, political rallies and more. Get shots and views that feel like drone footage without all the tech.   Epic Group ShotsMassive Group Selfie at LIVE.me booth at VidCon Unique Angles for Reporters / JournalistsShoot incredible "on the scene" views of news events, protests, fires developing stories for journalist vloggers and citizen reporters.

 
The 10 Second Tripod The Mighty Selfie Stick has a fast action height adjustment means you can quickly convert from 26 inches to 6 foot tripod for interviews or hands free video in seconds.The 1/4 base mount can also be used with a standard tripod for even more height. The solid steel tripod base can be used on it's own as a standard camera mount (1/4-20).Extremely light and easy to carry the Mighty Selfie Stick replaces expensive bulky heavy tripods and is light enough to carry everyday or while traveling or camping. Professional Grade MountsThe super strong spring action phone mount can securely hold your phone and is easy to connect and quickly remove your mobile device. Extends to 3.5 inches (9 cm) opening. The phone mount is padded with a sponge rubber for extra grip.  The phone grip is also angled to ensure a strong anti slip locking grip for your mobile device. The phone mount also folds down around the pole making a minimal profile when collapsed.  GoPro Compatible MountHey GoPro enthusiasts, you can take your video to a whole other level with the Mighty Selfie Stick. Just imagine the angles and views you can get on any action shot and be the first to stand out from the crowd with cool new GoPro video angles.  Quick release locking system
Twisting the extending poles counter-clockwise locks them into place. When the dots are aligned (twisting the extensions clockwise) you can extend them out individually to the height you require.Twist Release and Twist Tighten for Quick Set AdjustmentsTwist to tighten = Twist to loosen and adjust. Instantly adjust your height for any shot. Bluetooth Remote  The bluetooth remote can link to your mobile device and be worn like a ring or clip to your pole so you don't have to reach up to start/stop your video or snap a pic.   20" Diameter Steel Tripod Base The solid steel 1/4 mount base has a wide 20 inch diameter providing a stable and secure base. Steel base folds down to a slim profile for easy portability.  Make your photos Mighty!The Origin of the IdeaThe Mighty Selfie Stick began as an idea I had from seeing some long window washing poles used in NYC to wash 2nd floor windows. I found a substitute with a painters pole at Home Depot and made my first prototype by breaking off a paint roller handle and adding a stand photo mount 1/4 inch screw with 1/20" thread count. It worked and it made great video! That's what launched me on the pursuit of finding the perfect manufacturing solution. The first iteration was made with long painters poles used to paint ceilings adapted by removing a paint roller handle and inserting a 1/4 20 screw to hold a standard phone mount.  Other experiments were made with flag pole manufacturers and selfie stick manufacturers but none had the length required to get as long as 10 feet without serious bending of the poles.  The final manufacturing solution was found with a table top tripod company that had all the components I needed but had never yet produced a self standing 10 foot pole before.  This was the last step in the manufacturing research stage before I felt confident in bringing this crazy product to market while also offering all the advantages of a professional all purpose tripod at the same time.   Timeline2016 December - Ideation / Concept from seeing window washers in NYC2017January - 1st Prototype made with Painters Pole February - Manufacturing Research & Development March - Manufacturer Found May - 2nd Prototype DevelopedJune - 3rd Prototype w base July - Vidcon Demonstration Test August - Launched on Kickstarter September - Placing Initial OrderOctober (projected) - Shipping - Viral Videos hitting Internet!

story:
SHOCKWAVE
The World’s First Wearable Live Camera !

    Seems like a traditional sport-camera at first glance, but this is also where the similarity ends.

    The SHOCKWAVE, a wearable live camera with built-in battery, streams your live video and audio to the Internet. 

    Simply via WiFi or 4G connection, this live camera broadcasts your eyeshot to elsewhere in the world, others see immediately what you see now, isn’t it COOL?

Physical Characteristics 

    The SHOCKWAVE is by far the smallest live video broadcasting solution, sized 74 x 56 x 32mm and weighted 130g. 

    It can be easily installed on the surface of any objects by various means, such as tripod fixed, unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) suspension and sport camera wearable mounting structure, etc. 

    The SHOCKWAVE supports both indoor and outdoor mobile video broadcasting applications. It can be connected to the internet through WiFi link when indoor, while through 4G link when outdoor. 

    802.11b/g/n mode is supported for you to connect your SHOCKWAVE to the WiFi router. By setting up the access point and password via the function buttons or your smartphone one time, the SHOCKWAVE stores automatically each SSID and password without having your input the password repeatedly for the next use.

    The SHOCKWAVE 4G functions perfectly with LTE-FDD and LTE-TDD. As to WCDMA,TDS-CDMA and GSM/GPRS/EDGE standard, they are also supported but would be limited only to the 4G mode when conducting video transmission.

Media 

    In addition, the SHOCKWAVE also provides full HD 1080P video and stereo audio. The SHOCKWAVE supports three quick video mode settings, namely 1920x1080 with 2Mbps, 1280x720 with 1Mbps, 640x360 with 400kbps.

    Two-stream working mode has been designed to meet your different needs on streaming and recording. While broadcasting the video and audio in 360P through 4G or WiFi, the SHOCKWAVE is recording them to files in 1080P at the same time.

Battery 

    Thanks to the high capacity of its built-in battery, which supports all kinds of micro-usb mobile chargers and external power/battery supplies, the SHOCKWAVE has a long performance endurance of 90-120 minutes, depending on the video resolution chosen. 

Control 

    With a 0.96 inch OLED screen and function keys, the SHOCKWAVE enables you to set up the WiFi and 4G connection, to enjoy the quick access of one-key-broadcasting and one-key-recording, as well as to connect your smart phones and/or computers via WiFi to make further settings and to preview the live video. 

Cloud Service 

    Complete live broadcast cloud access with global coverage is made for you. You can use your personal computers, tablets and smart phones at any time to watch live video from any corner in the world. The APP for smart phones also provides a variety of direct broadcast video services for you to share, subscribe, search and push, as well as to establish the new social relations through mobile live video. 

Stinger 

    Surprisingly and not specifically related to a camera, the SHOCKWAVE also has a hidden function as a real MIFI (4G wireless router) via LTE/4G. Worried about the low battery of your mobile? Simply connect your laptop or tablet PC with the SHOCKWAVE through WiFi, and… enjoy the Internet!

Now, are you ready with your SHOCKWAVE?

Where are we at ? 

Ready for Mass-Production !!!

Since Jan. 2015, we've came a long way on the SHOCKWAVE concept, the Camera Hardware, the Cloud Service and of course the production sourcing and building. We can easily say that the biggest challenges and obstacles have been cleared. We are ready to go into mass-production and we need your help.


Timeline

Reward

Risks and Challenges

    There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any hardware product at scale. Fortunately, we have been working hard and have established relationships with manufacturing partners that will help us bring SHOCKWAVE to your doorstep.

    Of course, there are still risks associated with producing the PCB board. Unexpected changes in component lead times, availability, and cost are examples of factors outside our direct control that could affect our delivery timeline, but we are working hard to mitigate those risks and plan to be transparent throughout the delivery process.

    The other risk with this and any other project that involves physical delivery comes with shipping. There are a number of unforeseen circumstances that can cause problems during the actual physical shipping of the SHOCKWAVE Camera. We plan to work with proven companies to help ensure that SHOCKWAVE arrives (in perfect condition) at their delivery destination. Since unforeseen circumstances can sometimes impact the shipping world, we will also make sure to have methods/resources in place to overcome any difficulties.

We can easily say that the biggest challenges and obstacles have been cleared. We are ready to go into mass-production and we need your help.Timeline


Reward




About the antennas    There are two external 4G antennas on the prototype hardware 1.0 and 2.0 version, we have made 10 cameras to test the 4G signal strength. Then we put the 4G antennas into the camera on the mass-production hardware 1.0 and 2.0 version, so all you get is the mass-production hardware 2.0 version. Connect SHOCKWAVE to WiFi router    Here is a video clip to show how to use the camera buttons to connect to a new WiFi router, including scanning AP's SSID and setting the password.Connect SHOCKWAVE to 4G network    Here is a video clip to show how to use the camera buttons to connect to 4G network, the OLED will display the 4G operator, ip and siganl strength.Born history    There are some pictures in the Gallery to show the born history of the camera.FAQ1. Does the SHOCKWAVE camera need a SIM card for 4G broadcasting ?    Yes, it requires a normal Nano-SIM card just as the SIM card used by iPhone.2. Is there any fee on the cloud service and app software ?    The cloud service and app software is free for all bakers. the cloud bandwidth and performance will increase as the fund grows.3. Which 4G band will be supported by SHOCKWAVE camera ?    The SHOCKWAVE can be used all over the world. we provide two versions , one is for Japan and America users which can support more 4G bands, the other one is for world-wide users which can also be used in Japan and America. 
Risks and Challenges

    There are always significant challenges in manufacturing and delivering any hardware product at scale. Fortunately, we have been working hard and have established relationships with manufacturing partners that will help us bring SHOCKWAVE to your doorstep.
    Of course, there are still risks associated with producing the PCB board. Unexpected changes in component lead times, availability, and cost are examples of factors outside our direct control that could affect our delivery timeline, but we are working hard to mitigate those risks and plan to be transparent throughout the delivery process.
    The other risk with this and any other project that involves physical delivery comes with shipping. There are a number of unforeseen circumstances that can cause problems during the actual physical shipping of the SHOCKWAVE Camera. We plan to work with proven companies to help ensure that SHOCKWAVE arrives (in perfect condition) at their delivery destination. Since unforeseen circumstances can sometimes impact the shipping world, we will also make sure to have methods/resources in place to overcome any difficulties.

story:
Für deutsche Version bitte nach unten Scrollen ;-)

 

Protect your expensive Camera Lenses with the new COSYSPEED Lens Pouches

Do you own expensive camera lenses? They can scratch quickly or dirt can get in while you have them in your bag. They also quickly gather dust when stored on a shelf.

The new COSYSPEED lens pouches offer reliable protection. They are well made, lined with soft microfibre on the inside and colored classic black or African sytle on the outside. They are available in three sizes to cover the most common lens sizes.

The first photo products "Made in Africa"

The COSYSPEED Lens Pouches are produced in a development project by our partner Burundikids in Burundi. In the mother-child home in Bujumbura, Burundi's biggest city, homeless, mostly underage mothers with their children find accommodation, food, health care – and they can make an apprenticeship as a dressmaker. And here are the new COSYSPEED lens pouches made.

In a long-term COSYSPEED would like to set up a ä#-production in Burundi in order to produce the first photo accessories "Made in Africa". Burundi is the poorest country in the world with a gross domestic product of $ 660 / capita. But this is not an "aid project", we work on the principle of "service for consideration". When you buy COSYSPEED lens pouches, you get a high quality product and actively do development work. You are not just sending money, you are giving someone work and the opportunity to help her or him self. And that's a win win situation for everyone!

 

Specs

S size Lens Pouch: (Ø) 80 mm / 3.2" x (h) 100 mm / 4"

- Fits prime lenses

M size Lens Pouch: (Ø) 120 mm / 4.7" x (h) 200 mm / 8"

- Fits standard zoom lenses up to 24-70/2.8

L size Lens Pouch: (Ø) 140 mm / 5.5" x (h) 280 mm / 11"

- Fits tele zoom lenses up to 70-200/2.8

Microfibre Cleaning Cloth: 150 mm / 6" x 150 mm 6"

- For lens cleaning

Used fabrics: Micro fibre and cotton

 

Schedule

Dec. 2019 - Jan 2020 / Crowdfunding

Jan 2020 to March / April 2020 / Production

May 2020 / Shipping 

 

Risks and Challanges

The biggest risk can be political instability before the Burundi presidential elections in May 2020. It might be that fundamental functions like electricity, customs, transport etc. will not be working on a normal level, which may cause delays.

 

Team

Thomas Ludwig, CEO and founder of COSYSPEED

Thomas Ludwig has had an advertising agency in Germany for almost 20 years and was working as development aid worker for the German Development Service in African countries. He is a photo nerd since many years and has a passion for street photography (but not much time for it). He lives with his family in Bonn/Germany.

Stefan Eggers, Social Media Manager at COSYSPEED

Stefan has a wide variety of skills and is a nerdy guy who is using Moment Lenses with great passion. It was Stefans inspiration that lead to the PHONESLINGER Prime. Stefan is a Brand Ambassador to Moment Lenses and lives in Bonn/Germany.

Heike Skamper, Freelance PR Specialist

Heike knows the European photo scene since many years and is not just a kick-ass PR guy, but also one awesome photographer.

 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  Deutsche Version

 

Schütze Deine teuren Kamera-Objektive mit den neuen COSYSPEED Objektivbeuteln

Besitzt Du teure Objektive? Die können schnelle verkratzen oder Schmutz kann eindringen, wenn Du sie transportierst. Zudem stauben sie schnell ein, wenn sie im Regal stehen. 

Die neuen COSYSPEED-Objektivbeutel bieten zuverlässigen Schutz. Sie sind super verarbeitet, innen mit weichem Mikrofaserstoff ausgelegt und außen entweder klassisch schwarz oder afrikanisch bunt. Es gibt sie in drei Größen, um die gängisten Objektivformate abzudecken.

Das erste Fotozubehör Made in Africa

Und sie werden in einem Entwicklungsprojekt unseres Partners Burundikids in Burundi hergestellt. Im Mutter-Kind-Heim in Bujumbura, Burundis Hauptstadt, finden obdachlose, meist minderjährige Mütter mit ihren Kindern Unterkunft, Verpflegung, Gesundheitsversorgung und können eine Ausbildung zur Schneiderin machen. Hier werden die neuen COSYSPEED Objektivbeutel genäht.

Wir möchten mit COSYSPEED langfristig eine Produktion in Burundi aufbauen, um dort das erste Fotozubehör "Made in Africa" zu produzieren. Burundi ist mit einem Bruttoinlandsprodukt von 660 $ / pro Kopf das ärmste Land der Welt. Aber dies ist kein "Hilfsprojekt", sondern wir gehen nach dem Prinzip "Leistung für Gegenleistung" vor. Wenn Du COSYSPEED-Objektivbeutel kaufst, dann bekommst Du ein qualitativ hochwertiges Produkt und machst aktiv Entwicklungsarbeit. Du sendest nicht einfach Geld, sondern Du gibst jemandem Arbeit und die Möglichkeit sich selbst zu helfen. Und das ist für beide Seiten würdevoll.

Specs

Objektivbeutel Größe -S-: (Ø) 80 mm x (h) 100 mm

- Für Festbrennweiten

Objektivbeutel Größe -M-: (Ø) 120 mm x (h) 200 mm

- Für Standard-Zooms bis 24-70/2.8

Objektivbeutel Größe -L-: (Ø) 140 mm x (h) 280 mm

- Für Tele-Zooms bis 70-200/2.8

Mirofaser Objektiv-Reinigunstuch: 150 mm x 150 mm

- Zur Objektivreinigung

Verwendete Materialien: Mikrofasertuch und Baumwollstoff

 

Zeitplan

Dez 2019 - Jan 2020 / Crowdfunding

Jan 2020 - März / April 2020 / Produktion

Mai 2020 / Versand

 

Risiken

Das größte Risiko ist die politische Lage in Burundi vor den Präsidentschaftwahlen im Mai. Es ist möglich, dass fundamentale Infrastruktur, wie z.B. Strom, Zoll, Transportwesen etc., nicht auf dem normalen Level arbeiten. Das hätte eventuell Verzögerungen zur Folge.

 

Team

Thomas Ludwig, Geschäftsführer und Gründer von COSYSPEED

Thomas hatte lange eine Werbeagentur in Deutschland und arbeitete eitweise als Entwicklungshelfer für den Deutschen Entwicklungsdienst in afrikanischen Ländern. Er ist fotoverrückt seit vielen Jahren und hat einen Hang zur Street-Fotografie (aber zu wenig Zeit). Er lebt mit seiner Familie in Bonn.

Stefan Eggers, Social Media Manager beiCOSYSPEED

Stefan hat eine breite Palette an Fähigkeiten und war/ist in einem Enwtciklungsprojekt auf den Banda Islands engagiert. Außerdem ist er ein Foto-Nerd und lebt in Bonn.

Heike Skamper, Freelance PR Specialist

Heike kennt die europäische Foto-Szene aus dem FF und ist nicht nur eine klasse PR-Frau, sondern auch eine super talentierte Fotografin.

story:
The Warrior Wedding Project gives soldiers beautiful memories for their special day...

My husband Gil has been a fashion photographer and commercial television director for many years - we have traveled the world with his photography skills and he felt he wanted to use his talent to help soldiers build new memories that can hopefully start to replace the tragedies they've experienced overseas.

WHAT WE DO

The Warrior Wedding Project is our effort to acknowledge the service of these brave men and women who have been deployed. We memorialize one of the most joyous days in a soldier's young life, their wedding day. 

WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

Each couple involved in The WWP pays absolutely nothing for our services. The basic pay for an enlisted solider is under $20,000/year. Most of them can't afford a wedding, never mind a photographer of Gil's level.  We absorb all costs involved in photographing their wedding as well as spending a few days prior to their wedding photographing them in casual settings. The couple receive 2 beautiful hard cover printed photo books and a free website where friends and family can download all images for free.  
-
Please visit our website www.TheWWP.com to see photos from several of our weddings.

WHAT WE NEED

We're shooting a wedding on April 16th 2016 in Philadelphia for an amazing couple and need the funds for travel expenses as well as hiring a second photographer. The funds will also help us provide the couple with high-end wedding albums & a site where they can download their files for free.
-
Sarah and Patrick are both Captains in the Army.
-
Sarah is an ICU nurse whose assignment was to Walter Reed National Military Center, the first stop for the wounded warriors following stabilization in Germany. While assigned to Walter Reed, Sarah dealt first hand with treating severely wounded soldiers who now live a completely different life then they had before they deployed. What we fine so amazing about Sarah is that though she is faced with an overwhelming sense of grief and internalized pain, she uses her energy to fuel her ability to care for and help mend soldiers most in need of care. Faced with the pending deployment for her fiancée it is hard for her not to imagine and worry that something like that could happen to Pat. 



Patrick is scheduled to deploy for his third time.  His first tour was for a year - his second was for 6 months - both were in the Mid-East.  Due to the sensitive nature of his position, we can't tell you in detail the peril he's faced, suffice to say he's a true hero. What we can tell you is - unless you have a loved one whose been deployed, it's impossible to truly understand the stress that these young couples are under.  They can go weeks without contact and human nature being what it is - it's a daily struggle for them to keep the fear of the worst from taking over, especially at night. Since starting The WWP we've seen first hand what these couples go through and we're humbled by their sacrifices, grace and strength.


All donations are tax deductible and truly help us continue to offer unique experiences to each couple.
We understand that not all people are in the position to make cash donations. We hope that you will forward our information to friends and family though to help us get the word out - so we can continue to serve those who put their lives on the line for us. 


We have some fun donation PERKS: The Warrior Wedding Project tote bag and a wide array of photos to choose from at http://gilcope.wix.com/wwp-go-fund
story_txt:
The Warrior Wedding Project gives soldiers beautiful memories for their special day...
My husband Gil has been a fashion photographer and commercial television director for many years - we have traveled the world with his photography skills and he felt he wanted to use his talent to help soldiers build new memories that can hopefully start to replace the tragedies they've experienced overseas.
WHAT WE DOThe Warrior Wedding Project is our effort to acknowledge the service of these brave men and women who have been deployed. We memorialize one of the most joyous days in a soldier's young life, their wedding day. 


WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORTEach couple involved in The WWP pays absolutely nothing for our services. The basic pay for an enlisted solider is under $20,000/year. Most of them can't afford a wedding, never mind a photographer of Gil's level.  We absorb all costs involved in photographing their wedding as well as spending a few days prior to their wedding photographing them in casual settings. The couple receive 2 beautiful hard cover printed photo books and a free website where friends and family can download all images for free.  -Please visit our website www.TheWWP.com to see photos from several of our weddings.




WHAT WE NEEDWe're shooting a wedding on April 16th 2016 in Philadelphia for an amazing couple and need the funds for travel expenses as well as hiring a second photographer. The funds will also help us provide the couple with high-end wedding albums & a site where they can download their files for free.-
Sarah and Patrick are both Captains in the Army.
-
Sarah is an ICU nurse whose assignment was to Walter Reed National Military Center, the first stop for the wounded warriors following stabilization in Germany. While assigned to Walter Reed, Sarah dealt first hand with treating severely wounded soldiers who now live a completely different life then they had before they deployed. What we fine so amazing about Sarah is that though she is faced with an overwhelming sense of grief and internalized pain, she uses her energy to fuel her ability to care for and help mend soldiers most in need of care. Faced with the pending deployment for her fiancée it is hard for her not to imagine and worry that something like that could happen to Pat. 




Patrick is scheduled to deploy for his third time.  His first tour was for a year - his second was for 6 months - both were in the Mid-East.  Due to the sensitive nature of his position, we can't tell you in detail the peril he's faced, suffice to say he's a true hero. What we can tell you is - unless you have a loved one whose been deployed, it's impossible to truly understand the stress that these young couples are under.  They can go weeks without contact and human nature being what it is - it's a daily struggle for them to keep the fear of the worst from taking over, especially at night. Since starting The WWP we've seen first hand what these couples go through and we're humbled by their sacrifices, grace and strength.



All donations are tax deductible and truly help us continue to offer unique experiences to each couple.
We understand that not all people are in the position to make cash donations. We hope that you will forward our information to friends and family though to help us get the word out - so we can continue to serve those who put their lives on the line for us. 




We have some fun donation PERKS: The Warrior Wedding Project tote bag and a wide array of photos to choose from at http://gilcope.wix.com/wwp-go-fund

story:
World's First 4K Action Camera with integrated 3 Axis Gimbal


Idolcam Highlights

*4K action camera integrated with a 3 axis gimbal.
*Smallest gimbal camera in the market.
*Features lighting attachments.
*Interchangeable lens.
*Can be set down on table and control with smartphone.
*Integrated LCD for on the go action.
*protective housing to be able to operate in high wind resistance conditions when other gimbals will fail.

Idolcam is Inspired while developing a Transformer Drone.

IDOLCAM featured on ABC 7 News.

                                          

Get motion sickness watching your vacation videos on HD TV?     


Vacation video with Smartphone                     Vacation Video with IDOLCAM



*Action Cameras  *Smartphones           VS.    3-Axis Stabilization - Idolcam

                                                 

Lens will remain stable despite movements.


Powerful sensors and motors to compensate movements in all 3 axis.




                                         IDOLCAM and GOPRO


Idolcam is built for?

*Travelers & Selfie shooters             *Weddings & Special occasions

*Adventurers & Video bloggers       *Videographers and Photographers

*Drone enthusiasts

                                             


                                                1.5" LCD Monitor


THREE INTERCHANGEABLE LIGHTING ATTACHMENTS

*High Intensity Light for group shots.

*Ring Light for selfies and beauty lighting.

*Doggie Light for selfies.


IDOLCAM UNLEASHES YOUR SELFIES POTENTIALS

*Take selfies up to 40ft. away via smartphone!



Hands Free Operation Like Having a Cameraman by Your Side.


          
        
GROUP PHOTO WITHOUT ASKING STRANGERS FOR HELP

 

FEELING ADVENTUROUS?  IDOLCAM IS BUILT FOR ADVENTURES!
  

* biking              * running        *aerial filming from helicopters

*car racing      *drones            *surfing and more.

                                           

                                                OPTION for  LENS CHANGE


Turn Any Multicopters or Model Planes to a 4K Drone

*RC receiver ready.
*Weights a mere 160 grams.


Idolcam Character Masks

Since Idolcam features a robotic head, we will later explore with

character masks to enhance the emotional connection with the user.





IDOLCAM PROTOTYPEs-from 2 axis to now 3 axis.



 OUR PAST EXPERIENCE WITH DESIGNING AND MANUFACTURING 

 GIMBALS AND DRONES

 Hollywood 3 axis gimbal for professional video cameras.



Hexacopter and Helicam For Professional Cameras





 FAQ--Frequently Asked Questions

Who is the Idolcam Designed for?

 Idolcam is set out to solve issues of unsatisfied consumers using smartphones, or action cameras as their go to camera.

What are the camera specs?

4k @ 24fps, 2K@ 30fps, 1080p @ 60fps and 720p at 120fps - Up to 60 mins battery life.

How can we purchase the accessories?

For the Indiegogo campaign, we will focus on bring the Idolcam and the high intensity light to market.  Accessories will be available shortly after the Idolcam's delivery. 

How does the Idolcam stabilize video footage?

The Idolcam features a 3 axis gimbal driven by 3 motors with feedback from the gyro and accelerometer sensor  to correct abrupt movements to achieve shaky free video.

What's the rotation freedom on the gimbal?

The approximate degree of freedom is 160 for pan, 55 for roll and 150 for tilt.

What sets Idolcam apart from Smartphones and Action Cameras?

 Idolcam turns your vacation video into Hollywood style movies and the robotic lens on the Idolcam is like having a cameraman by your side.

Does the Idolcam shoot video and stills?

The Idolcam can capture 4K 24FPS video and 12MP stills.

Does the Idolcam offer live preview?

The Idolcam features a 1.5" LCD for instant preview, also can previewed on both IOS and Android smartphone via App.

Are there any zooming functions?

Zoom Lens can easily be installed for highest quality zoomed videos.

Are there any slow motion capabilities?

Yes, 1080p 60fps and 720p 120fps will be able to capture slow motion.

Do you have a Photo Burst mode?

Yes. 3 shot per second.

What is the WIFI range?

Roughly 40ft.

Where will you be shipping from? Have you calculated import fees?

We will be shipping from the US, so you will need to determine additional fees and import taxes based on your country.

Does the camera have time lapse?

Time lapses can be captured with 2-60 second intervals.

What is your FOV?

FOV is 93º with 20mm lens as standard.

What‘s the weight of Idolcam?

Approx. 160 grams.

Are you shipping internationally?

Yes, we are shipping internationally. Please keep in mind taxes and additional fees may apply.



*Enhancements may occur on production models of Idolcam, meaning you will received an even more refined Idolcam.

story:
Hello everyone, my name is Paco, I am a freelance photojournalist living in Barcelona. I work in  daily photojournalism since 17 years, I publish my photos on the world's most important newspapers, I deal with social and BreakingNews photography. I had an incident occurred during media coverage of protests in Istanbul, now I find myself with a camera in poor condition and not allowing me to do my job and because of the current market situation I do not have the financial capacity to cope this investment. I hope you guys can help me. I need to buy a professional camera equipment of about $ 2,500. Thank you very much to all who want to contribute. You can see my professionalism and my seriousness in my personal website:

Tearsheets Paco Serinelli Photojournalist
www.pacoserinelli.com
www.behance.net/PacoSerinelli
www.facebook.com/PacoSerinelli

the money you want to donate I would invest in buying the following items:

- Photo camera Fujifilm XT-1 ... 1000 $

- Fujifilm Fujinon XF35mmF1.4 R - lens Fujifilm X ... 750 $

- Fujifilm Fujinon XF14mmF2.8 R - lens Fujifilm X ... 750 $

story:
Lone video producers! Been sacrificed for the sound quality of your work due to lack of manpower or expensive equipment? No more! Hire a new audio director! It’s slim, simple and fast. It will handle all the sound recording works while you focus on video production.

FEATURED

PRESS RELEASE HERE >

WHAT IS MYPIN?

Introducing MYPIN, world’s simplest wireless microphone system for your smartphone, DSLR camera and camcorder. From spontaneous live interviews to fast field setup, MYPIN is an ideal set of systems for beginners and solo videographers. The low-cost and easy operation will save your budget and production time of video contents creation.

 

* Stabilizer's exclusive app is provided for face tracking and control setting.

MYPIN’s specially designed accessories are practical equipment providing ease of operation for self-production.

 

APP

Using MYPIN's exclusive app, smartphone users can easily take a video & audio at 'Video Mode' or 'VICA Mode', then save and share your contents with friend and followers on Facebook and Youtube by a simple touch on share buttons.

VICA Mode is a short video mode less than 10 seconds. Use this mode when you need to send your short messages with your voice.

 

WHY MYPIN?

An ordinary wireless microphone system is often too complicated to set up and need many wires to be connected to get ready for the instant interview. Sometimes, users experience the delay on a pairing between microphone and receiver.

When the battery runs out at the crucial moment of video shooting and even need to purchase the new battery, all these could be a nightmare for videographers in the field of production.

Sound recording is irrevocable once it runs out of budget, resources, and timing. MYPIN can resolve and avoid all possible problems occurred in the field, using our production friendly features.

INNOVATIVE DESIGN

MYPIN’s microphone and receiver are designed to pursue user convenience. Specially designed built-in shoe adapter and the detachable clip will provide videographer easy set-up and fast interview.

 

Built-in shoe adapter and simple user interface lead users to fast and easy setup at the field.

 

33g of weight, including built-in battery, lowers the physical burden of production.

 

9 hours of battery prevents production disruption and an extra external battery can extend both lives of battery and production time.

 

Compulsory default paring saves set-up time and prevents any interference from other electronic devices that use Bluetooth communication technology.

 

WHO CAN USE MYPIN?

MYPIN is a powerful sound recording devices for anyone who values the sound and voices for making greater self-video, live broadcasting as well as professional video production with a greater sound.

 

 

HOW TO SETUP

Smart Phone Setup

 

DSLR Setup

 

SOUND TEST

Here’s our sound test video comparing with other brands and DLSR camera vs smartphone.

* We have not applied any compilation of video or audio and honestly tested the sound without any manipulation.

 

DESIGN & PROTOTYPE

Our endless effort to innovate the product and design have been applied to thousands of our tests and prototypes.

 

PRODUCTION LINE

MYPIN is the advanced product to be produced by experienced and hi-tech manufacturers. Our partners are reliable and capable of manufacturing with the delicate electronic devices.

 

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION

*Measurement: millimeters

** Device switch & earphone features on the microphone are not working on this project, those functions will be applied to recent futures.

*** PCT(International patent) has been filed and registration is on the progress. (PCT/KR2017/012795)

 

PACKAGES 

 

REWARDS 

 

TIMELINE  

 

 

PARTNERSHIP  

 

 

 

PROMOTED BY

 

 

TEAM & COMPANY

AIRSOUND Inc. is a team of sound engineering & product design with a passion for sound and innovation. We are eager to innovate the sound recording product with a creative design that helps people to reflect their creativity and fulfill brilliant idea. Our goal is to become a top sound recording brand for video producers who value the greater sound quality for the greater video production.

 

RISK & CHALLENGES

Bringing a new inspiration and idea into a real-world face a number of unknown risks we can not imagine. We believe that there are no better ways to lower those risks than trials and errors. By constant iteration and problem-solving, our engineering and design teams have developed and renewed our numerous prototypes.

We have finalized all the product designs and tested all the features that will be provided by the products, within product design concepts we were inspired. For the mass production, agreement has been already made with our multiple manufacturing 
partners who have many years of experience and capable of making elaborate sound electronic devices.

Agreements with multiple manufacturing partners are to avoid risks such as significant cost increases in production, a minimum quantity guarantees required by manufacturing partners, import/export regulations and government agency requirements on specific products.

story:
The Story

A GoPro user usually has a lot of accessories, like the selfie pod, floating grip, tripod mount, etc,. However, your backpack may have not enough room for all the equipments. So can we combine some of them and  make room for other stuff?

 

MEET ROGETI Mount

ROGETI Mount is the world's first action camera mount which integrates the tripod mount and the bottle mount. It is incredibly portable and powerful. Own it equals to own a selfie stick, a floating grip and a tripod mount at the same time.

The ROGETI Tripod/Bottle Mounts Suite package includes two mounts. Each of the two has a bottle thread and a tripod thread.

 

The yellow mount fits on all kinds of pop drink (eg., Coca-Cola) and the universal 1/4" threaded tripod.

 

The blue mount fits on regular water (eg., Evian) and the universal 3/8" threaded tripod.

 

Bring the two little mounts equals to bring a super portable selfie pod, a super portable floating grip + a tripod mount 1/4" + a tripod mount 3/8"

 

 

About the Perks

 Know more about the SLOPES Black

 Know more about the Pano5+1 MarkII

 

About Us

We are ROGETI, a tiny and young team produces innovative photography equipments. In the past two years we invented the popular GoPro accessory SLOPES and the Pano5+1. The ROGETI tripod/bottle mount is our fifth product aiming the action camera and remains the same phylosphy: Less weight, more uses.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I get the product if it didn't achieve the crowdfunding goal?

Yes.

What payment options do I have?

You can pay via credit card or PayPal. Select a perk and you'll see the available payment methods at checkout.

When does it ship? When will I receive my order?

The shipping will begin on July16, 2017.

Generally we will send out the item from HongKong in three days after you make the order. The regular shipping period is less than 15 working days.

If you need the product urgently, we suggest you take the perk 'Upgrade to Express Delivery' so that you could get the item in ten days.

 

 

Retailers/Dealers

Want to sell ROGETI products at your store? Just email us with your info.

 

Follow Our Campaign On

story:
Please visit us at www.eclipserover.com


Why We Need Your Help

The vendors are lined up, manufacturing dialed in and a patent pending but we need your help to put the Eclipse Wheels into production and build out our marketing. It will cost over thirty thousand dollars for the injection molds necessary to manufacture the Eclipse Wheels and attachment hubs. Injection molds will allow us to produce the Eclipse Wheels at an affordable price point.
About half of the funds will be used to purchase and produce the backer rewards and pay for the fees associated with the campaign.The balance of the funds will be used to build out and implement our marketing. 

We have set several stretch goals.
If the campaign exceeds our goal. We will be able to use the additional funds to participate in major trade shows like the Consumer Electronics Show, National Association of Broadcasters and others. We would also be able to expedite adding autonomous capabilities and new product development such as UGV with sensors for under water exploration, mapping, fire fighting, law enforcement, search and rescue, and agriculture.
Your backing will allow us to take the Eclipse Rovers to the world, create jobs, and inspire people. 

Ways That You Can Help

Besides backing us financially, you can share what we are doing with the people in your world. Tell your friends and family about us and share our campaign on Social Media. We are always open to suggestions, so please give us your feed back so we can continue to improve our products.

Eclipse Rovers fill the gap between drones and traditional camera equipment.

Eclipse Rovers are radio controlled unmanned mobile ground systems also known as UGS, that not only can be operated on the ground, but on on pipes, cables and other rigid shapes and surfaces.

Eclipse Rovers give you the ability to acquire never before available moving shots and do it from places and in ways you may have never before thought possible.
They’re designed to run on four tires and have a suspension system with oil filled shocks. This provides an exceptionally stable platform for capturing beautiful rolling shots.With an Eclipse Rover you can put your equipment in places where you don’t want to be seen, you don’t want to go, or are unsafe for you to be in.  Like when doing structure inspections or documenting hazards. 

The Eclipse Wheel

The Eclipse Wheel is what gives the Eclipse Rovers the ability to be taken from the ground, then without any changes to the vehicle, be operated on cables, pipes and other ridged surfaces. When your done running on the ground the Eclipse Wheel allows you to operate your Eclipse Rover on cables in obstructed environments that just wouldn’t be feasible with any other device. When your done operating on cables outside, you can move your equipment inside, and with our aluminum truss system, safely operate your equipment over and around people and things.

Operating on Cables


The Eclipse Wheel is designed so it can be operated on inch and a quarter pipes which can be easily found at most hardware stores or fencing suppliers. In some setups you won't need anything but the pipes because the wheels self align the pipes to the proper width. 

Operating on Pipes

When that’s not possible we offer pipe hanger hardware that can be attached to our truss system, to ceilings or crank stands. When using our short crank stands and operating your Eclipse Rover upside down you’ll have the ability to capture shots at ground level. Then you can turn it upright and work from a height of around four feet. Our tall crank stands give you a way to use your equipment up to a height of about fifteen feet. 

Another design element of the Eclipse Rovers is the detachable mounting plate.
You can turn just about any surface into an Eclipse Rover. Just remove the mounting plate and reattach your equipment to another surface.
The plates are made to work with our magnetic or suction cup attachments as well as ratchet straps. Sort of like an action camera but you have the option of using bigger and better cameras and attachments.

Detachable Mounting Plates

Eclipse Rovers are available in a variety of models. Consumer models that work great with cell phones, action cameras and small camcorders all the way to a commercial model that can be configured to carry up to a hundred pounds. They are all four wheel drive, have splash or water proof electronics, and will come ready with everything you need to run right out of the box.

Just For Fun



Besides being used for work, you can take your attachments and equipment off and have yourself some serious fun. But when the fun is over and you need to get some work done… attachments are what transform the Eclipse Rovers into useful tools. They can be fitted with an amazing variety of attachments like wireless pan & tilts,  gimbals, stabilizers, lights, sound equipment, and sensors and most attachments can be quickly taken off and be used independently or with other set ups. 

Born out of  "FRUSTRATION"

I've been using camera equipment for over forty years and have watched with amazement at the changes. One of the most transforming technologies has been the advancements in UAS (drones) or as I like call them, "Flying Cameras". They are great tools for capturing aerial shots but as you know, there are a lot of places and situations where they are just not an appropriate choice. So when I found myself needing to capture moving shots but couldn't use my flying camera I had to revert to traditional equipment like sliders, dollies, and single cable set ups. I found myself constantly frustrated with how specialized the equipment was. That frustration was what led me to the idea of developing the Eclipse Rovers and the invention of the Eclipse Wheel.

It's my hope that the Eclipse Rovers will open a      whole new world for your  creativity


Backer Rewards

We are excited to be able to offer our backers Eclipse Rovers as well as some fun rewards like the Sumo RC vehicle, the amazing Zugo Flying Camera (drone) that captures HD video and photos, and the adrenalin rushing RC Blackout EXB 1/10 scale Electric Buggy.


                       Getting Your Rewards

It is our intention to ship all of our backer rewards within our campaign goal before Christmas of 2015. If for some reason we are not able to do that for you, we will communicate with you in a timely manner.             

                          Risks & Challenges

Lack of Funds
The most important and identifiable risk to our business is not being able to raise the funds we need to purchase the injections molds. If that happens we will have to attempt to move ahead with a machined version of the the Eclipse Wheels and attachment hubs. This would make them very expensive reducing our customers ability to afford them.
Vender Reliability
 Although we have done our best to establish good relationships with our vendors it is always a risk that a product or essential component could be discontinued, changed or become price prohibitive.
We will always be looking for alternative venders that can be put into place
if need be.
Copy Cats and knockoffs
It's a shame and unacceptable practice for products to be copied. We have done our best to establish our trademark and patent in a unique enough way that copy cats will be obvious and can be legally challenged.
story_txt:
Please visit us at www.eclipserover.com
Why We Need Your Help

The vendors are lined up, manufacturing dialed in and a patent 
pending but we need your help to put the Eclipse Wheels into production 
and build out our marketing. It will cost over thirty thousand dollars 
for the injection molds necessary to manufacture the Eclipse Wheels and 
attachment hubs. Injection molds will allow us to produce the Eclipse 
Wheels at an affordable price point.About half of the funds will be 
used to purchase and produce the 
backer rewards and pay for the fees associated with the campaign.The 
balance of the funds will be used to build out and implement our 
marketing. We have set several stretch goals. If the campaign exceeds 
our goal. We will be able to use the additional funds to participate in 
major trade shows like the Consumer Electronics Show, National 
Association of Broadcasters and others. We would also be able to 
expedite adding autonomous capabilities and new product development such
 as UGV with sensors for under water exploration, mapping, fire 
fighting, law enforcement, search and rescue, and agriculture.Your backing will allow us to take the Eclipse Rovers to the world, 
create jobs, and inspire people. Ways That You Can Help

Besides backing us financially, you can share what we are 
doing with the people in your world. Tell your friends and family about 
us and share our campaign on Social Media. We are always open to 
suggestions, so please give us your feed back so we can continue to 
improve our products.

story:
We are KIOO Project.

We teach photography to children from communities with limited access to creative resources. Our nonprofit helps young girls and boys develop self-confidence & discover self-expression. We put cameras in the hands of young people who learn to visually tell stories about who they are & how they see the world. We have previously worked with restaveks (child slaves) in Gressier, Haiti & students living in Nairobi, Kenya's Lenana slum. The moments they capture take our breath away.

These photographs were taken by students in our January 2014 Kenya workshop.

Where KIOO is going next.

This November we are focusing our lens on gender equality. In partnership with She’s the First & Shanti Bhavan School in Baliganapalli, India we will host a 10-day workshop with young girls and boys from the Dalit caste (also known as the Untouchables). Girls will learn photographic techniques the first week. During the second week, boys will join the workshop to learn photography from a special group of newly-minted teachers – the girls.

This unique journey ensures that both girls and boys experience the rewards of an arts education. Girls develop valuable leadership & presentation skills along with the confidence to become active agents of change in their own lives & communities. Boys understand the value & worth of girls in their community by learning a new skill through them. At the end of the 2 weeks, a gallery show exhibiting the students’ work presents the local community with the opportunity to celebrate the creativity blossoming from budding photographers.

All the camera & printing equipment we bring to India remains at the school. Our goal is for our young graduates to continue teaching & learning photography long after the workshop is over.

Young female photographers & their local gallery show at the school in the Lenana slum, Nairobi, Kenya, January 2014.

How you can help KIOO.

The estimated cost of bringing a KIOO workshop to India & creating a long-term photography program is $40,000. We've raised half that amount & need your help raising the other half. We'd love for you to get the word out about our fundraising campaign too. How? Before & after you donate, kindly make some little & big noise about our India workshop. Share this campaign link on Facebook & Twitter.

Our gallery of student prints are collector items for our donors. If you'd like a print for your wall, or you'd like to send a gift to someone who you feel would be moved by the work of our alumni artists, please kindly peruse our SHOP page.

Photographs taken by the young students who participated in our Kenya workshop.

What your generous donation buys.

    + Cameras and printing equipment*
    + Basic travel & living expenses for 4 volunteers (3 photography teachers + 1 Program Officer) during a 2.5 week span

*Price List
              $15 : camera case
             $20 : international converters
             $25 : memory card
             $30 : ink cartridge
             $75 : ream of paper
           $150 : camera 
           $175 : hard drive 
          $250 : printer 
       $1,500 : flight

Budding photographers in Gressier, Haiti & Nairobi, Kenya.

What your generosity gets you.

Besides a very big, heartfelt thank you, some warm & fuzzy feelings, and a truly beautiful story to share with your friends, we present you with some highly desirable tangible perks for you to have as your very own:
     + A beautiful 50-page digital book of photographs taken by our students in India
     + A gorgeous print of one Indian student’s work to hang on your wall
     + A dazzling 60-page coffee table book with images taken by the children in India
     + A stunning 20" x 30" photograph of India by KIOO founder & humanitarian photographer, Babita Patel
     + A signed copy of the documentary (director's cut) of our India workshop made by an award-winning filmmaker!

*All perks will be distributed after the end of the workshop.

Thank you, धन्यवाद, merci, asante!

Big & small, your donation makes it possible for 10 girls and then 10 boys living in Baliganapalli, India to explore their world through a camera lens. We can't wait to share with you what they discover about themselves.

Photographs snapped by the students in our Haiti workshop. January 2013.

Donate now!

Photography. It’s more than an art form.
It’s a catalyst for hope, possibility, and social change.

www.KIOOproject.org

        
Facebook   |   Instagram   |   Twitter   |   Vimeo

*Images of students at Shanti Bhavan School in this campaign
were taken by Kate Lord & provided by She's the First.

story:
Stock-Graphics is a collaboration between Webmaster-Deals, Bundlestorm, Graphstock, Insanelyart and Bistock. We are a team of designers involved in everything from photography, to app design, to web design, book and print layout and much much more.

We've been working on this type of designs for years and already have many of the Stock-Graphics resources made ( Over 11.000 Stock Photos and over 2900 vector files )

Our Goal:

With your help we want to make this website even bigger, better, and more organized so you can find more items when you need them.

We plan to add at least 500 new resources per month.

Backing this project means we can spend more time designing new resources and adding new sets of stock photos and vectors.

Your generous pledge means more cool stuff for everyone.

Once we get certain levels of support we can get into the really exciting stuff:

  • $25,000 -- We can add another designers and increase the size of the website.
  • $50,000 -- More designs, We will add over 10,000 resources.
  • $100,000 -- We will add an extra 20.000 resources and we will add more categories on our website  ( Photoshop Addons, Illustrator Addons and PSD files )
  • $125.000 -- We don't think we will hit this level, and that's why we do not want to think about what we will offer, but it will be HUGE.

We'll keep everyone posted about this as the project continues. In the meantime please back us if you are interested!

The Impact

This campaign and the funds that we raise here will determine the future of the Stock-Graphics website! If you would like to see the website much bigger please donate here and spread the word!  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't make a donation to the campaign, you can still help Stock-Graphics succeed by contributing in other ways.  

We would love it if you spread the word! 

Please forward this campaign on to all friends, colleagues, and family. Help us get the word out about this campaign!

FAQ

When will I access the membership?

You will get a unique coupon code with 100% discount once the campaign will end. You can redeem the coupon code when you want.

Do i have daily download limits ?

NO. You can download everything without limits.

How long will the sponsor link stay on the website?

FOREVER! As the site grows and more viewers tune in, those slots will become more valuable!

What license do we get ?

You can use our stock photos, and stock vectors for personal and commercial projects.

story:
Rated #1 by TopTenReviews.com!

 

 

 

 

A Powerful Rear View Camera System that Installs in Minutes!

 

We all recognize the benefits of having a vehicle backup camera.  But who wants to drill holes in your bumper or cut into your car's electrical system to install one?  Now you can add a high quality backup camera to just about any vehicle or trailer in a matter of a few minutes.
The  wireless backup camera is completely wireless and installs on top of your license plate with your license plate screws.  The dedicated monitor can be adhered or suctioned to your dash area and plugged into a power port for ready access.  
We have developed the Quickvu™ Digital wireless rear view camera to make it easy to upgrade any vehicle with a backup camera.  We want you to be able to see what's back there! 
 
 

Rugged Weatherproof Camera

Our highly efficient, low power camera has been designed to operate on batteries.  One pair of Energize Ultimate Lithium batteries will power the camera for a good year or more under normal use. 
 

Dedicated 4.3" Monitor

 

 

 

The monitor can be attached via adhesion or suction to the most suitable place on your dash - up high or down low.  The wide angle image allows you to see directly below the bumper as well as above the horizon, and in a wide angle side to side.  

 

Powerful Communication Link

Quickvu™ Digital's communication link is designed for quick connectivity and highly reliable transmission of video, even across long distances.  Line-of-sight testing yielded good, clear images over 1200' away!  Mount the camera on the back of your car or on the back of your trailer. 

 

Automatic Active NightVision

QuickVu’s image sensor works in low light conditions.  But if it is really dark back there, Six LED's turn on to light up the scene. 

 

 

Quickvu™ Digital Features 

 

 

 

Who Are We?

 

Trail Ridge Technologies was founded in 2008 by Mitch and Bob, two veteran inventors from Hewlett-Packard Company who had successful careers developing and bringing multiple quality HP products to market.  With over 40 granted patents between the two of them, Bob and Mitch have a proven record of innovation.  

 

 

 

                                            

TRT is a small company committed to making technology simple for our customers, and our QuickVu™ Wireless Backup Camera systems do just that.  Instead of sweating the installation process of drilling holes in your vehicle and splicing into its electrical system (or paying technicians to do so), our customers can install QuickVu™ in minutes with no special tools, no risk to the vehicle, and no expensive shop bills.  

 

Why Are We Passionate About Backup Cameras?

When  a teenager, Bob was a passenger in a car that was involved in a back-over accident.  In seconds, an unseen two-year-old girl ended up under the rear wheel of a station wagon.  While the injuries she sustained were not life threatening, the vision of gravel embedded in the tiny girl's legs persists in Bob's memories.  We hope to help all families avoid such tragedies in the future.

 

        

 

Five years ago we introduced the first truly wireless general purpose after-market rear view camera system for cars and small trucks. This innovation made it possible for the average car owner to upgrade to a luxury, rear view option without major expense, effort, or risk to vehicle warranties. And sad experience shows how important enhanced rear visibility really is.  Each year, thousands of children fall victim to back-over accidents and millions of dollars of property damage are incurred when drivers back into shopping carts, mailboxes, other vehicles, and more.  Studies have shown that drivers using a rear view camera are less likely to have accidents when backing up.  

             

Now virtually every family can protect loved ones and property with enhanced rear view capabilities.  Young drivers experience increased confidence when backing up. Aging drivers with stiffening necks and shoulders benefit from the added convenience a backup camera provides.  And anyone who hitches a trailer, for the occasional boating trip or for the daily needs of the tradesman, can streamline the process with a QuickVu™ camera.

 

What Are We Doing Now?

While several hundred QuickVu™ owners have been enjoying the safety and convenience afforded them by this breakthrough product, we have been working on making it even better.  Being the first and the best wasn't good enough—we knew we could delight our customers even more.  We are now ready to launch the new, improved, all-digital Quickvu™ Digital wireless backup camera system.

 

 

 

Our Current Status

 

Prototypes Are Complete and Testing Passed

While we have been anxious to release our new design (and many customers have been anxiously waiting for it to be ready), we have taken the time to work out the kinks, make it right, and keep costs down.  We have completed the design and testing of prototypes and are readying a pilot production run. 

The Factory Is Preparing for Production

Our testing has surpassed even our best expectations, and we are thrilled to be ready to start volume production.  The factory has produced several prototypes and is now gearing up for a pilot production run of several hundred units. Thereafter, the factory should be prepared to produce thousands of units per month.

 

How You Can Help

Did we mention that we are a small company?  We chose to fund development ourselves and so have had to manage our resources and expenditures carefully. When you purchase one of our perks, you help us pay for the initial production run in advance, helping us manage our cash flow.  You can help in a number of ways.

 

 

  • We are seeking  pre-orders to allow us to pay for the pilot production run. If you are willing to wait a brief period for delivery after ordering now, we can raise cash to pay for the first run.  Of course, we will reward you with a discount for helping us out.
  • If you already have a rear view camera in your vehicle, but you want to see a simple, low-cost rear view upgrade on the market to protect lives and property, your generous contribution will help us fund the production and keep Quickvu™ Digital affordable.
  • Millions of drivers need a backup camera, but few of them have heard of QuickVu™.  You can spread the word to family, friends, co-workers, associates, PTAs, soccer clubs, drama and dance troupes, landscapers, handymen, and everyone who may benefit from this innovation.  Send emails, share on social media, and use the telephone.

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need funds to pay for the initial production run.  And we need to build awareness of this great product that will allow every driver to have the safety and convenience of a rearview camera.

Our perks are designed to give you a low priced opportunity to obtain a backup camera that can go from box to installed in minutes. Or, if you and all your loved ones already have a backup camera, our perks provide you the opportunity to make sure this product is available to all families by contribution funds.

This project is important to us, and we will proceed with production, even if we don't reach our entire goal.  Meeting our funding goal will help us make Quickvu™ Digital available even sooner.

 

 

The Impact

Your help with our project will ensure that the new Quickvu™ Digital wireless backup camera becomes available for all families and drivers. It's possible that the life or property you save will belong to someone dear to you.

We have been selling QuickVu™ for several years, so we know the need and interest is great.  We have been honored to receive high praise from our customers, both for the product we deliver and for the customer care we provide.  We are anxious to provide even greater value to the customers we serve.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We have tried to take on all the risks before offering this project to you.  We have already designed, prototyped, and tested the new model.  The new product has passed FCC testing, functionality testing, testing for waterproofness, and much more.  It is ready to be built.

We have also begun lining up volume customers who have long anticipated this product, so we are confident of enduring success.

The remaining challenge is to get the factory geared up for production.  We expect this to go quickly, but minor hitches may cause some delays. This is why we need customers willing to order now and wait a few weeks for delivery.

 

 

Spread the Word!

There are millions of drivers in the US alone driving vehicles without adequate rear visibility. How many of your friends, family, neighbors, and coworkers would be thrilled to know how easily they can upgrade their car or truck? You can let people know about Quickvu™ Digital via

 

  • Face-to-face
  • Phone call
  • Text message
  • Email
  • Facebook
  • Twitter
  • Pinterest
  • Instagram
  • Linked-In
  • Reddit
  • Your organization's newsletter
  • And more!
Don't let anyone miss this fantastic deal!
story_txt:
Rated #1 by TopTenReviews.com!
 
    A Powerful Rear View Camera System that Installs in Minutes! We all recognize the benefits of having a vehicle backup camera.  But who wants to drill holes in your bumper or cut into your car's electrical system to install one?  Now you can add a high quality backup camera to just about any vehicle or trailer in a matter of a few minutes.The  wireless backup camera is completely wireless and installs on top of your license plate with your license plate screws.  The dedicated monitor can be adhered or suctioned to your dash area and plugged into a power port for ready access.  We have developed the Quickvu™ Digital wireless rear view camera to make it easy to upgrade any vehicle with a backup camera.  We want you to be able to see what's back there!   Rugged Weatherproof Camera
Our highly efficient, low power camera has been designed to operate on batteries.  One pair of Energize Ultimate Lithium batteries will power the camera for a good year or more under normal use.  Dedicated 4.3" Monitor
 
  
The monitor can be attached via adhesion or suction to the most suitable place on your dash - up high or down low.  The wide angle image allows you to see directly below the bumper as well as above the horizon, and in a wide angle side to side.  
 
Powerful Communication Link

Quickvu™ Digital's communication link is designed for quick connectivity and highly reliable transmission of video, even across long distances.  Line-of-sight testing yielded good, clear images over 1200' away!  Mount the camera on the back of your car or on the back of your trailer. 
 
Automatic Active NightVision


QuickVu’s image sensor works in low light conditions.  But if it is really dark back there, Six LED's turn on to light up the scene. 
 
 
Quickvu™ Digital Features 
  
 

Who Are We?
 
Trail Ridge Technologies was founded in 2008 by Mitch and Bob, two veteran inventors from Hewlett-Packard Company who had successful careers developing and bringing multiple quality HP products to market.  With over 40 granted patents between the two of them, Bob and Mitch have a proven record of innovation.  
 
 
 
                                            
TRT is a small company committed to making technology simple for our customers, and our QuickVu™ Wireless Backup Camera systems do just that.  Instead of sweating the installation process of drilling holes in your vehicle and splicing into its electrical system (or paying technicians to do so), our customers can install QuickVu™ in minutes with no special tools, no risk to the vehicle, and no expensive shop bills.  
 
Why Are We Passionate About Backup Cameras?When  a teenager, Bob was a passenger in a car that was involved in a back-over accident.  In seconds, an unseen two-year-old girl ended up under the rear wheel of a station wagon.  While the injuries she sustained were not life threatening, the vision of gravel embedded in the tiny girl's legs persists in Bob's memories.  We hope to help all families avoid such tragedies in the future. 
        


 
Five years ago we introduced the first truly wireless general purpose after-market rear view camera system for cars and small trucks. This innovation made it possible for the average car owner to upgrade to a luxury, rear view option without major expense, effort, or risk to vehicle warranties. And sad experience shows how important enhanced rear visibility really is.  Each year, thousands of children fall victim to back-over accidents and millions of dollars of property damage are incurred when drivers back into shopping carts, mailboxes, other vehicles, and more.  Studies have shown that drivers using a rear view camera are less likely to have accidents when backing up.  
             
Now virtually every family can protect loved ones and property with enhanced rear view capabilities.  Young drivers experience increased confidence when backing up. Aging drivers with stiffening necks and shoulders benefit from the added convenience a backup camera provides.  And anyone who hitches a trailer, for the occasional boating trip or for the daily needs of the tradesman, can streamline the process with a QuickVu™ camera.
 
What Are We Doing Now?While several hundred QuickVu™ owners have been enjoying the safety and convenience afforded them by this breakthrough product, we have been working on making it even better.  Being the first and the best wasn't good enough—we knew we could delight our customers even more.  We are now ready to launch the new, improved, all-digital Quickvu™ Digital wireless backup camera system. 
 
 
Our Current Status
 
Prototypes Are Complete and Testing Passed
While we have been anxious to release our new design (and many customers have been anxiously waiting for it to be ready), we have taken the time to work out the kinks, make it right, and keep costs down.  We have completed the design and testing of prototypes and are readying a pilot production run. 
The Factory Is Preparing for ProductionOur testing has surpassed even our best expectations, and we are thrilled to be ready to start volume production.  The factory has produced several prototypes and is now gearing up for a pilot production run of several hundred units. Thereafter, the factory should be prepared to produce thousands of units per month. 
How You Can HelpDid we mention that we are a small company?  We chose to fund development ourselves and so have had to manage our resources and expenditures carefully. When you purchase one of our perks, you help us pay for the initial production run in advance, helping us manage our cash flow.  You can help in a number of ways. 
 

We are seeking  pre-orders to allow us to pay for the pilot production run. If you are willing to wait a brief period for delivery after ordering now, we can raise cash to pay for the first run.  Of course, we will reward you with a discount for helping us out.
If you already have a rear view camera in your vehicle, but you want to see a simple, low-cost rear view upgrade on the market to protect lives and property, your generous contribution will help us fund the production and keep Quickvu™ Digital affordable.
Millions of drivers need a backup camera, but few of them have heard of QuickVu™.  You can spread the word to family, friends, co-workers, associates, PTAs, soccer clubs, drama and dance troupes, landscapers, handymen, and everyone who may benefit from this innovation.  Send emails, share on social media, and use the telephone.

 
What We Need & What You Get
We need funds to pay for the initial production run.  And we need to build awareness of this great product that will allow every driver to have the safety and convenience of a rearview camera.
Our perks are designed to give you a low priced opportunity to obtain a backup camera that can go from box to installed in minutes. Or, if you and all your loved ones already have a backup camera, our perks provide you the opportunity to make sure this product is available to all families by contribution funds.
This project is important to us, and we will proceed with production, even if we don't reach our entire goal.  Meeting our funding goal will help us make Quickvu™ Digital available even sooner.
 
 
The Impact
Your help with our project will ensure that the new Quickvu™ Digital wireless backup camera becomes available for all families and drivers. It's possible that the life or property you save will belong to someone dear to you.
We have been selling QuickVu™ for several years, so we know the need and interest is great.  We have been honored to receive high praise from our customers, both for the product we deliver and for the customer care we provide.  We are anxious to provide even greater value to the customers we serve.
 
 
Risks & Challenges
We have tried to take on all the risks before offering this project to you.  We have already designed, prototyped, and tested the new model.  The new product has passed FCC testing, functionality testing, testing for waterproofness, and much more.  It is ready to be built.
We have also begun lining up volume customers who have long anticipated this product, so we are confident of enduring success.
The remaining challenge is to get the factory geared up for production.  We expect this to go quickly, but minor hitches may cause some delays. This is why we need customers willing to order now and wait a few weeks for delivery.
 
 
Spread the Word!
