story:
Description

The Pano5+1 is a panoramic photography head for GoPro camera. With the two carefully designed intersected cradles, it enables the users to achieve accurate and easy-to-stitch panoramic compositions in minutes. Its flexible base mount can be mounted on both 1/4" and 3/8" thread tripod, or even a PET beverage bottle instead to set up an unobtrusive support.

---> Click to see our sample panoramas captured with Pano5+1



Compatible with:

GoPro Hero 3 White/Silver/Black
GoPro Hero 3+ Silver/Black
GoPro Hero 4 Silver/Black


Features

  • Easiest camera locating achieved by two drop-in cradles
  • The nodal point of the lens stays fixed when camera in different positions
  • Two options: spherical panorama or cylindrical panorama
  • Compatible with 1/4" and 3/8" thread tripod
  • Availability to be fixed on kinds of beverage bottles, when with no tripod
  • The anodized aluminum base mount with a bubble level integrated
  • The one-step injection molding rotary part ensures the accuracy of the product
  • Non-cranebracket structure to ensure the stability of the camera
  • Six 12mega pixels GoPro shots add up to a super high resoulution panorama
  • Great performance benifits from Gopro’s manual ISO and WB









Stitching Software

  • If you have any panorama stitching software on hand, we suggest you try it first.
  • If you have not such stitching software, we recommend Panorama Studio 3 Pro. Through our tests with this software, in most cases, a correctly captured panoramic images sequence by Pano5+1 could be seamlessly stitched through a fully automatic procedure.   ---> See our tutorial to stitch a panorama



    About SLOPES in our Perks

    SLOPES is an innovative support for Gopro camera. Thanks to its polyhedron bottom and the 3in1 slot, SLOPES provides 20 different ways to point your Gopro camera in seconds. It is extremely portable and can be brought with your Gopro always.

    ---> Go to campaign page of SLOPES for more info




    For more info, please visit our official website: www.rogeti.com

    THANK YOU !

story:
Self-stabilizing 4K Action Camera

GimbalCam captures shake-free smooth cinematic videos. Anyone can shoot like a Pro!

Why gimbalcam

Normally you will need to carry an SLR, an action camera, a handheld gimbal, a tripod as well as a lot of accessories for a sports video.

We introduce today, the world’s first self-stabilizing action camera to you — GimbalCam.

The Most Versatile Action Camera

GimbalCam can be mounted to the body, making it possible to deliver creative images in various scenarios.

What’s more, you don’t need to buy any additional accessories, GimbalCam can be easily mounted to your UAV for stable 4K videos.

Shoot Stunning HD Videos

An action camera has to be high permormance. GimbalCam is packed with amazing features: 16 million effective pixels, 170° wide-angle, 4K (30fps) video, and more. 

AS SEEN ON 

 

GimbalCam integrated 7-lens design, filters out light flares so you always get the perfect footage .

Built-In 3-Axis Gimbal

Good videos, especially those by action cameras, should not have dizzy shakes.

To outperform other action cameras, we spent over a year to make the 3-axis gimbal smaller until it could be loaded into GimbalCam’s compact body. GimbalCam is an ultra-lightweight camera with a 1.5-inch screen for rear view monitoring.

Removes Shaky Videos

GimbalCam removes unwanted video shakes and hand movements, which is one of the worst things while shooting with Action Cameras.

We designed and developed a hardware structure that integrates the 3-axis Gimbal and 6-gyroscope stabilizing system.

The GIS anti-shake algorithm allows real-time shake compensation, so that even a tiny vibrations are eliminated.

 

Ultra Lightweight

Only weights 170g and the all-in-one structure, GimbalCam is an engineering miracle, a real game changer.

 

And powerful

By constantly optimizing the engineering design understratum, GimbalCam 900mha has a battery life of 120 minutes, which meets the vast majority of photographing needs while beating most of the mainstream products and.

The GimbalCam App for iOS and Android

- High performance Wi-Fi chip

- Multiple shooting modes and custom presets

- Supports remote control, enables more creative ways of filming

- Review and share your moments at any time

 

One Second Fast Start

GimbalCam starts working with a single click. Without complex adjustment and adaptation, it enables you to really start recording at any time.

 

Our Efforts — Only for Everyone to Make Professional Cinematic Videos

Each accessory takes an important role. The specially designed IP68 waterproof case makes you free from worrying about Underwater shooting; the wristband makes you no longer afraid of accidental fall; the multi-purpose assembling components allow GimbalCam to be mounted to any equipment...

Our Mission is to Make Professional Cinematic Videos Available for Everyone 

 

Specifications

story:
- Arabic below

Story in a nutshell

I participated in the revolution from 2011 to 2014 as a photographer . I was training and working as a photojournalist up to the point I was injured. I started working again a year after my injury and I even bought new cameras. Then I was kidnapped by the state security and they took possession of all of my equipment.

Whole story

When I arrived in Cairo back in 2010 I bought my first professional camera. I learnt how to use it and I wouldn't go anywhere without it. Ever since I was a little girl everywhere I went, the happiest I've been was when I was taking pictures and doing something that counts. I participated in all of the events of the Revolution from January 2011 and I always had my camera with me.I trained as a photojournalist for many newspapers and then became an independent photojournalist.

On the 25th of January 2014, as I went to cover the anniversary of the revolution in Mohandesin in Giza I was shot by the security service police. The nerves in my legs were injured and I was temporarily paralysed. I stopped covering events and photography for a year due to the injury.

In April 2015 - about a year and a half after my injury - I bought two new cameras and new equipment so I can start working.

On June the 1st I was having dinner in Zamalek with some friends and as we were leaving the restaurant we were kidnapped by the security service police. I was 'forced disappeared' for 15 days in the headquarters of the security service. They interrogated me about my photography. I was then sent to appear before state security prosecution office with the false crime of 'disseminating false information'. They took possession of my equipment and was placed as evidence in the case along with 5 laptops they took from my home. I was arrested for 6 months and 20 days. I was let go on 20 December. I tried to ask for my equipment back but they refused. I need new equipment so I can work again. I will do photo sessions and have a small studio in my house.

It would be great if you can contribute  in the campaign online and I would be grateful to you. You can contact me via FB or via e-mail (esraa.eltaweel286@gmail.com) for more information about contributing  . Sharing the campaign on Facebook and Twitter would be much appreciated !

Why 10000$ ?

This is the list of equipment I want to get + 5% Indiegogo fees (500$) :

Sony Alpha a7r II Camera 3200$ 

metabone 400$

Canon EF 50mm f/ 1.4 USM  340$

Canon EF 70-200mm f/2.8L IS II USM 1960 $

Canon EF 17-40mm f/4 L USM 750$

Canon Speedlite 600EX-RT 480$

Memory cards 200$

Tripod 150 $

Lighting equipment 500$

Batteries 140$

Cleaning kit and accessories 300$

Laptop 1000$

External hard drive 150$

Links - International media covering my story

The Washington Post  - Aljazeera English - NYTimes - BBC Arabic - Telegraph - DW - TheTimes  - USNews - ABC News - Spiegel

* Perks :

Flickr photostream  (unfortunately I lost access to my old Flickr account when I was arrested ) 

Crochet : I learnt crochet while I was imprisoned.  I will make a very special piece of crochet (bracelet /purse/bag) for you :-)


 باختصار

كل تركيزي من 2011 حتى 2014 على الثورة في مصر  . كنت بتعلم وبشتغل تصوير صحفي لغاية ما اتصابت. رجعت أصور بعدها بسنة وجبت كاميرات جديدة لغاية ما اتخطفت من امن الدولة واتصادرت معداتي .

تفاصيل

بحب التصوير من صغري ولما جيت القاهرة في آخر 2010 جبت أول كاميرا بروفيشنال واتعلمت عليها ومبقتش تفارقني ابدا في أي مكان بروحه  ، أكتر وقت كنت بكون مبسوطة فيه وبحس إني بعمل حاجة فعلا لما بصور . شاركت في كل أحداث الثورة من يناير 2011 ومعايا كاميرتي دايما وكنت بتعلم تصوير صحفي واتدربت في كذا صحيفة مصرية وبقيت مصورة مستقلة.

في 25 يناير 2014 لما نزلت  أغطي ذكرى الثورة في المهندسين في الجيزة اتصابت برصاصة من قوات الأمن ، جزء منها أصاب أعصاب رجلي واتسببت في شلل مؤقت وفضلت سنة بعيدة عن التصوير بسبب وضعي الصحي.

في ابريل 2015 جبت كاميرتين ومعدات جديدة عشان ارجع لشغل التصوير بعد سنة ونص تقريبا من اصابتي ، وفي يوم 1 يونيو كنت بتعشى في الزمالك مع أصدقائي واحنا خارجين من المطعم اتخطفنا من قوات الأمن . اختفيت قسريا 15يوم في  أمن الدولة وكان بيحققوا معايا عشان كنت بصور زمان! . ظهرت في نيابة أمن الدولة بتهمة ملفقة "نشر أخبار كاذبة" و معداتي اتحطت في أحراز القضية ليا مع 5 لابتوب أخدوهم الأمن من البيت واتسجنت 6 شهور و 20 يوم . أُخلى سبيلي على ذمة القضية في 20 ديسمبر ، حاولت أطلب من النيابة إنهم يرجعولي معداتي لكنها رفضت .

أنا عايزة معدات جديدة عشان أرجع أصور واشتغل من جديد ، هصور فوتوسيشنز وهعمل ستوديو صغير في البيت .

ممكن  تشاركوا أونلاين هنا أو التواصل معايا على ايميلي الشخصي esraa.eltaweel286@gmail.com أو فيسبوك . لو مش هتقدر تشارك ممكن تعمل شير على فيسبوك وتويتر وتنشر الحملة هكون ممتنة جدا .

الثورة في المهندسين في الجيزة اتصابت برصاصة من قوات الأمن ، جزء منها أصاب أعصاب
رجلي واتسببت في شلل مؤقت وفضلت سنة بعيدة عن التصوير بسبب وضعي الصحي. 
في ابريل 2015 جبت كاميرتين ومعدات جديدة
عشان ارجع لشغل التصوير بعد سنة ونص تقريبا من اصابتي ، وفي يوم 1 يونيو كنت بتعشى
في الزمالك مع أصدقائي واحنا خارجين من المطعم اتخطفنا من قوات الأمن . اختفيت
قسريا 15يوم في  أمن الدولة وكان بيحققوا معايا عشان كنت بصور
زمان! . ظهرت في نيابة أمن الدولة بتهمة
ملفقة "نشر أخبار كاذبة" و معداتي اتحطت في أحراز القضية ليا مع 5
لابتوب أخدوهم الأمن من البيت واتسجنت 6 شهور و 20 يوم . أُخلى سبيلي على ذمة
القضية في 20 ديسمبر ، حاولت أطلب من النيابة إنهم يرجعولي معداتي لكنها رفضت . 
أنا عايزة معدات جديدة عشان أرجع أصور واشتغل
من جديد ، هصور فوتوسيشنز وهعمل ستوديو صغير في البيت . 
ممكن 
تشاركوا أونلاين هنا أو التواصل معايا على ايميلي الشخصي esraa.eltaweel286@gmail.com أو فيسبوك . لو مش هتقدر تشارك ممكن تعمل شير
على فيسبوك وتويتر وتنشر الحملة هكون ممتنة جدا .

story:
Why Xplore Cameras? 

Have you ever wanted to capture life’s experiences with a POV (point of view) /action camera and when you go to look at the footage you’ve captured, you discover the camera wasn’t even pointing in the right direction? Now you've missed out on capturing that moment, and life doesn’t have too many replay opportunities.  We’re sure it’s happened to you because it’s happened to us one too many times. 


The Watch/Live-View Remote

We’re Xplore and we have a solution for this very problem.  Xplore cameras are high quality, high definition POV/action cameras that act and operate like the “other guys” but every Xplore camera comes with a watch that also acts as a live-view remote.  It’s Awesome!  You can see what your camera is seeing right from your wrist.  You can actually start and stop recording and snap pictures with a quick push of a button.  Oh yeah, and you can do this for up to six cameras from a single watch/remote.            

The Xplore live view watch remote has a 1-3/8" LED screen that is completely water proof up to 60 meters.  It is complete with full watch functions, such as standard and military time settings, change colors of digits, timers, stop watch, and alarms as well as being your controller to manage all your filming.  Not only is it completely functional as a day-to-day watch, but it has a style that allows you to wear it wherever you go.  You get all this AND you don't have to pay an extra $100+ dollars on top of those already over priced cameras.  Every Xplore camera comes packaged with a watch/remote.


The Xplore Camera

The Xplore camera is a high definition action/POV camera that shoots 1080p60fps along with many other settings to fit your needs.  It has multiple settings for still photography with a 16MP image, photo bursts (7 shots per second), time-lapsed video and photos and many others.  Xplore cameras have 1GB internal memory for those moments you just need to capture a quick video or picture but you forgot your MicroSD card.  Xplore has built-in WiFi to wirelessly connect your camera to your mobile device and manage your images and videos remotely.  To see a full list of camera specs, visit the Xplore Video site.


The App   

At Xplore, we use the Action Cam! app that is available for both iOS and Android smartphones and tablets.  The app allows you to connect through private WiFi to view your cameras live feed as well as manage your files.  You can preview and set up your camera shots with your device as well as download and manage files directly. You can even trim the videos on your device and immediately share them with your friends, fans and family through social networks.

                               

Mounts & Accessories

All Xplore cameras come with a set of mounts and attachments that work exclusively with our designs.  Our mount designs are exclusive to Xplore and do not work with mounts used by other POV/action camera manufacturers.  However, we understand that a lot of you may already have selfie sticks, head/chest mounts or other mounts from a previous camera.  We will provide a universal adapter that makes all Xplore mounts compatible with GoPro mounts and accessories.  You can see a list of available Xplore mounts and accessories here.

                   

Our Goal and Why We Need Your Help

Xplore is working with its overseas manufacturing partner to make this product available to everyone in the United States.  We need your help in bringing this product to the masses and to do it for a price that is cheaper than the “other guys”. 

We are just like you, technology and adventure geeks wrapped into one, and we are always looking for the next adventure but never wanting to leave our gadgets at home.  We love the idea of preserving memories in the format of .mp4s and .jpegs.  Plus, now you won't miss out on those priceless moments by not knowing where your camera is pointing.

With your help, we can enhance the design of the watch/remote, create a new Apple Watch app, and get Xplore cameras into the hands of users like you for a price that everyone can afford. 

Below are some design ideas we have been working on for a new watch/remote.

             


We're Ready to Ship

We have a limited quanity of Xplore camera packages in stock and ready to ship to our earliest supporters within the month.  Our manufacturers are on standby and waiting for our call to begin the next production run.  Back us today and we'll be ready to ship on time.  We are super excited to get an Xplore into your hands and want to have you start sharing your experiences and footage with us.  We need your support to get our order made and start on the road to developing an Apple Watch app, updating the design of the watch/remote (coming late 2016) and building the brand and user base in the U.S.

Supporter Perks 

We know you've worked hard for your money and we really appreciate any and all the support you can offer to help us make Xplore a further reality.  Below are some designs of the shirts, hats, and stickers we will be sending to our supporters.  As we grow, so will the swag collection. As a supporter, you will be recognized on  the Xplore website and through our social media channels.  We want everyone to know who contributes and make sure they are recognized!  See them here.


An Aggressive Timeline

We can't see the future, but we've got plans beyond this timeline... With an initial product ready to ship for early adopters and a production run on its heels. Only with your help and support we can grow this technology together, the market is ripe for the next action cam and we're bringing it. We think you're gonna like it!

Please Share

We know you're really popular, so can you help us out and share this campaign with your friends and family? It's a lot more fun to have friends with cameras too.  Go ahead and share this on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Text, Email, Smoke signals or how ever you communicate these days.  Please use the hashtag #GoXplore and #YourPointOfView in your social media posts so we can like and share your posts. Any and all the support you can provide is greatly appreciated.  Thanks for helping make Xplore a reality.                       

               



Featuring the Best

Get your 3 minutes of fame on! We're reviewing footage taken with the Xplore camera and featuring the best of the best on our website come August. Every supporter will have a chance at getting their material priority reviewed by us for consideration. We're in search of quality footage from extreme sports to the ultra unique. If your footage is killing' it we want to see. Those who win might just receive some swag apparel in addition to the spotlight. Stay tuned on details for submitting your footage.

story:
Click Props Backdrops offer a vast range of high quality and long-lasting photography backdrops that allow you to build lifelike sets in minutes.

Why choose a Click Props Backdrop?

✅ Multiple award-winning photography backdrops

✅ Over 600 different designs 

✅ 3 of our most popular sizes are available 

✅ 450GSM vinyl material 

✅ Made by photographers for photographers 

✅ Made in Great Britain

✅ Packable and Portable 

 

Yes, Click Props Backdrops are available for delivery now! As we are already in production, as soon as back a perk you will be sent an email with a unique code to use within the click props website.

 

Click Props is already an established business www.clickprops.co.uk so you may be wondering why we are crowdfunding?

Well, Click Props is crowdfunding to expand the company in order to better serve our clients and widen our international foot holding in the backdrop market!

Where will the money go? We will be able to expand into the new premises shown below and buy a new and improved printer. This expansion and improvement to our assets will allow us to:

  • Quadruple our size
  • Double our production 
  • Develop new and improved products

This is where crowdfunding comes in. With your support to get behind us and back us, you will enjoy a one-time offer that will never be repeated again. This is all being done in order to achieve our mission statement which can be read below.

 

 

 

If you want to look over the 600 designs available and see which ones you like then head over to our website - www.clickprops.co.uk.

 

 

Want to get the most of our campaign? How does 25% off for 10 YEARS sound? This will be available with our Diamond Loyalty Card.

 

When Click Props Backdrops Founder, Charlie Kaufman started in the photography industry he discovered a few common themes with backdrops. They were often:

  • Expensive backdrops - often in the regions of £2,500 - £5,000
  • Low quality
  • Dated designs
  • Unrealistic

His mission was to solve this and create affordable backdrops, that were high-quality and lifelike and provided choice for any photographer’s needs, so Click Props Backdrops was born!

Utilizing 450 GSM vinyl material he started manufacturing backdrops that were weatherproof, non-reflective, wrinkle-resistant, hardwearing and the process meant that creating new lifelike designs was easy.

Since then, he has never looked back and now there over 600 designs presently available …

After all Click Props Backdrops are made by photographers, for photographers.

 

 

Our backdrops is available for delivery NOW. Due to our backdrops being in production right now you will be able to order your backdrop as soon as you get your voucher code. This will be sent to you once you back the campaign. If you don't want your backdrop right away that is completely fine! The codes are valid for 12 months.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Click Props Backdrops offers over 600 different designs of backdrops that are available in our 3 most popular sizes. All of which are easily interchangeable and portable, allowing you to set up multiple sets in minutes.

Visit www.clickprops.co.uk to choose your design!

 

 

 

Get creative with Click Props Backdrops!

Our backdrops are made from heavyweight 450GSM vinyl material which means you can throw your worst at Click Props Backdrops and then easily wipe it down. Unlike other backdrops, you can use Click Props Backdrops time and time again!

 

 

 

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

Click Props Backdrops are already in production and are made in-house by the Click Props Backdrops team at their factory in the UK. 

 

 

 

Early Bird - Single Backdrops

Early Bird - 5 x Bundle Backdrops

Is there more than one design you are interested in? If so, why not take advantage of bigger discounts by ordering 5 backdrops in our bundle deal. 

 

Early Bird - 10 x Bundle Backdrops

Interested in getting a collection of backdrops, check out these discounts on 10 backdrops in our bundle deals.  

 

 

 

 

Here are some examples of images you can get when using our backdrops 

 

Spearheaded by a long-standing production manager, Click Props Backdrops is made up of an enthusiastic collection of hardworking creatives who all strive to ensure that each and every backdrop manufactured by us will arrive at its final destination in perfect condition. Over the coming months, the team will increase in size to accommodate the new workload that will come with our continued international expansion. CEO, Charlie Kaufman – still designs the majority of the Click Props Backdrop range and oversees the daily running of manufacturing.

"Click Props Backdrops was ‘born’ out of my desires to offer each and every one of my own clients as much variety of images as possible during their shoots with me. With nearly 30 years’ experience as a portrait and fashion photographer I have tried most types of backdrops available. However, I have found most to be expensive, some very limited in size or designs and others not good enough in quality, so I set up what I believe to be the World’s Number 1 backdrop brand. Now, thanks to Click Props Backdrops every photographer and also videographer can build lifelike sets anywhere in minutes." Charlie Kaufman Founder

 

 

If you love what we do and know people that would love what we do too, we would really love it if you could share our campaign. THANK YOU! 

 

 

 

 

Click Props Backdrops are all designed by our in-house digital artists and manufactured in our factory in Great Britain. We have been producing our award-winning backdrops for many years so we don't envisage any issues with delivering the product to market with the highest quality standard by the suggested deadlines. However, as with any physical product, unforeseen issues with manufacturing or shipping could inevitably become an issue. We do have contingency plans in place but if in the unlikely events problems do occur we will endeavour to keep backers fully updated on progress.

story:
SkyVideo.pro Gimbal

World’s most affordable full featured and easy to use DSLR Gimbal with focus control* for shooting professional video. 


Camera control handle. 

You don’t need to close the aperture and sacrifice background blur anymore! You can start/stop recording, adjust iris and most importantly - Focus, to get beautiful blurred backgrounds and right focus on your subject.*



Designed for one man band. 
You don’t need an expensive wireless camera focus control and assistant to adjust your focus*, you can do it by yourself. Joystick, multiple shooting modes, auto pan and auto tilt are incorporated for easy and comfortable shooting.


One battery powers everything. 

No need to change batteries for your camera, monitor and Gimbal separately, one powerful Lipo battery powers the whole system for a few hours.


Carbon fiber frame. 

No need for an expensive support rig, the Gimbal is easy enough and durable to work for a continuous shooting.


Maximum stability. 

World's newest 32 bit controller along with two gyro sensors guarantees best performance.


High torque motors. 

SkyVideo.pro Gimbal has three powerful brushless motors and is able to lift up to 2 kg.


*Focus control works only with Canon DSLR

Compatible with Canon: 

5D Mark II, 5D Mark III, 6D

7D, 7D Mark II,  60D, 70D

750D/T6i, 760D/T6s, 700D/T5i, 650D/T4i, 600D/T3i,  550D/T2i, 500D/T3i,  1100D/T3

Canon EOS 1D Mark IV

  • All Canon, Sigma, Tokina and Tamron autofocus lenses are known to function. We recommend to use lightweight prime lenses. 



Specifications:

  • Weight: 1320g without camera

  • Up to 2 kg camera support

  • 20 mm Carbon fiber tubes

  • Quick release and tool less adjusting camera mount

  • 5208 12N14P hollow shaft brushless motors.

  • 32bit Gimbal controller.


Availability

We ship Worldwide. Shipping cost's 
20 € to Europe
50 € to the rest of the World.

Our team


What We Need & What You Get

SkyVideo.pro Gimbal is field tested during three months duration. We'll include video tutorials on how to use and maintain it. 

There's things we're planning to do with the funds:

  • Hide the wires on the Gimbal and finish the cosmetics
  • Add joystic
  • Order parts in bulk
  • Hire people and start a production
  • Shoot video tutorials
  • Deliver SkyVideo.pro to customers 


The Impact

Camera focus control is critical when  shooting on Gimbal or Steadycam. Being an independent shooters, we know that wireless follow focus with wireless monitoring and additional person to control the camera focus is unreachable for many of us. There are only few solutions on the market offering this feature, however it's very expensive and out of reach for an independent shooter, especially in the Europe. We are happy users of our SkyVideo.pro Gimbal and we'd like to share it with the independent shooters around the world. 

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge is starting the production process and building outstanding customer services. We will overcome these hurdles by hiring people that are experienced in production and customer support.

750D/T6i, 760D/T6s, 700D/T5i, 650D/T4i, 600D/T3i,  550D/T2i, 500D/T3i,  1100D/T3
Canon EOS 1D Mark IV
All Canon, Sigma, Tokina and Tamron autofocus lenses are known to function. We recommend to use lightweight prime lenses. 


Specifications:





Weight: 1320g without camera
Up to 2 kg camera support
20 mm Carbon fiber tubes
Quick release and tool less adjusting camera mount
5208 12N14P hollow shaft brushless motors.
32bit Gimbal controller.




Availability
We ship Worldwide. Shipping cost's 
20 € to Europe
50 € to the rest of the World.
Our team









What We Need & What You Get

 SkyVideo.pro Gimbal is field tested during three months duration. We'll include video tutorials on how to use and maintain it. 
There's things we're planning to do with the funds:



Hide the wires on the Gimbal and finish the cosmetics

Add joystic

Order parts in bulk


Hire people and start a production


Shoot video tutorials

Deliver SkyVideo.pro to customers 


The Impact

Camera focus control is critical when  shooting on Gimbal or Steadycam. Being an independent shooters, we know that wireless follow focus with wireless monitoring and additional person to control the camera focus is unreachable for many of us. There are only few solutions on the market offering this feature, however it's very expensive and out of reach for an independent shooter, especially in the Europe. We are happy users of our SkyVideo.pro Gimbal and we'd like to share it with the independent shooters around the world. 


    Risks & Challenges
Our biggest challenge is starting the production process and building outstanding customer services. We will overcome these hurdles by hiring people that are experienced in production and customer support.

story:
You'll never have to worry about mounting your GoPro.

No more lugging around your bag of mounts on a leisure stroll. No more fidgeting around it for the right mount, No duct tape hacks to keep your GoPro still for that one shot that needs to happen now. 




ParaCage is the most compact and convenient way to attach your GoPro to almost anything.

Fits most of your casual mounting needs - and fits in your pocket.




Attach it to a thin fence post

or a thick slanted tree,

to a smooth stainless steel railing

or a rough low hanging branch.

Set up / pack up in seconds.



Compact, sturdy and versatile

ParaCage omes with a 7 ft / 2.1 m long bungee paracord wrapped around a sturdy stainless steel reinforced case. 
The whole package is the size of an average point & shoot yet has the mounting options that until now you needed a separate bag for.
The camera sits snugly sandwiched between two precision milled plates protected on all corners by eight massive stainless steel bumpers. 


Mount in seconds


> Unwrap the bungee cord


> Loop around a tree, pole, railing or whatnot


> Loop back and zip it 


Unless you plan to encounter hurricane level winds or face melting G forces the bungee cord tension is more than adequate to firmly hold your GoPro in place.


Accessorize at will

In fact, you can easily attach almost any other item to your GoPro. 
A simple flashlight can become a great handle / light source combo; any random stick can become a selfie stick. No need for a special mount - the bungee will hold it tight.




GoPro+tripod combo mount

If you need a standard mounting, there is a GoPro+tripod combo mount included - you can even adjust the tilt. 

When not in use, the mount folds conveniently into the case.




Access every button and port - even the battery

All buttons and ports are easily accessible - and you can change the battery without removing the case. 

Lens protrusion is also protected by bumpers yet has enough space around it to accommodate most lens caps or add-on filters. 




Funding goal perk

If the campaign reaches it's funding goal every ParaCage will have magnetic bumpers on the back side so you will be able to stick it to metal surfaces.


Ready for the next Hero

ParaCage's modular design is upgradable as well as dowgradable. This means that when inevitably the Hero 5 comes out, you'll only have to replace the front and back plates of ParaCage (1 minute tool-free process) to accommodate the new camera.
ParaCage for Hero 3  / 3+ and similar form factor cameras are listed as perks and will be made upon demand.


FAQ

(from reddit)

Q. Why should I use ParaCage instead of GorillaPod?

A. You can attach ParaCage to a tree up to 1.5 ft thick and it fits in your pocket. GorillaPod cannot do any of this.

Q. How do I select the the ParaCage version?

A. After the campaign is over you will fill out a poll where you will be able to select the exact version - the price is the same for all versions.

Q. How will the funding be used and will I receive my ParaCage if the goal is not reached?

A. The funds will be used for a limited production run to produce and shipping ParaCages to the backers. ParaCage is designed in such a way that it requires no initial investment in tooling. This makes even a very low production quantity feasible.

Q. Love your design, it's quite ingenious. Just curious, do you have any background in manufacturing products?

A. I have a product design education and my first job was for a company making promotional materials - various branded trinkets - before moving to creative job in an agency. So I am well aware of the noisy and dusty environment, weekly sketch-to-shipment deadlines and the mantra of "simplify design, use off-the-shelf parts, simplify again."


State of affairs & challenges

A fully functioning prototype is tested and ready (you can see it in pictures). All needed parts are sourced/ready for manufacture. 


Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't have a GoPro surely you don't need ParaCage. But if you have some GoPro-wielding friends - tell them; any publicity is much appreciated.

story:
Hi Everyone! /Bonjour à tous!

I'm a french student, working thanks to photography. I take pictures for birthdays, weddings, engagements and so on for my studies, because I like photography and it's something I share with my father. (professional photographer) but I can't offer me a new camera), because this one start to be old and I don't know when it's gonna let me down. (More than 150 K pictures took with it).
To be honest, it's not the only reason why I want to change this camera. My skills increased and this one I have (Nikon D3100- Got in 2011) don't fit anymore sadly..

I can't imagine being without a camera. I can live without a cellphone or anything but not without it. I earn money to live and, as I already said, to pay my studies and also, a car.

This camera would be a perfect thing to carry on my projets (as an exposition on galaxies, and the next one about women on horses throughout ages).

With my studies in psychology in France, I'd like to include photography within.. Why?

Photography help people feeling better. It helps people to feel better in their mind, body and they finally can learn to love them selves. But again, why? That is the question I'd like to study with this mix of psychology and photography.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bonjour à tous !

Je suis une étudiante française, travaillant grâce à la photo. Je prends des photos d'anniversaires, mariages, fiançailles et autres, pour payer mes études, car j'aime la photographie et c'est quelque chose que je partage avec mon père. (Photographe pro) mais je ne peux pas m'acheter un nouvel appareil photo, car celui ci commence à être vieux et je ne sais pas encore quand il va me lâcher. (plus de 150000 déclenchements).
Pour être tout à fait honnête, ce n'est pas seulement la raison pour laquelle je veux changer mon appareil.
Mes compétences en la matière ont augmentées et cet appareil que je possède (le Nikon D3100 - je l'ai eu en 2011) ne me convient plus malheureusement. 

Je ne me vois pas être sans appareil photo. Je peux vivre sans mon portable ou autre, mais pas sans ça. Je gagne mon argent ainsi pour vivre, et comme je l'ai déjà mentionné, pour payer mes études et aussi, mon permis et voiture.

Avec mes études en psychologie, je voudrais y inclure la photographie, mais pourquoi cette drôle d'idée me direz vous?

La photographie aide les gens à se sentir mieux, que cela soit dans leurs corps, têtes et ils peuvent enfin commencer à s'apprécier, ou du moins apprendre à le faire. Mais pourquoi encore? Comment le peuvent ils?
C'est la question en effet, que je voudrais explorer en incorporant à la psychologie, la photographie.

 What I need? / Ce dont j'ai besoin?


This is the camera I'm dying to have/Voici l'appareil photo que je convoite :

    ___________


    It costs on the website MissNumerique as you can check, 3700 euros, that's to say around 4135, 28$.
    With it, I will take galaxies pictures as wished and deep underwater's pictures.
    There's also a dream I want to realize... Taking pictures of Estonia and some other countries, especially at the Svalbard (I've been already there) far from 1200 miles of the North Pole, for taking pictures of Norway Lights.

    My prizes are so uncommon. Helping me making this wish come true, I may offer you a picture of galaxy (or portraits, or a shooting) taking from the top of a moutain or down from the ground with beautiful stars. Printed in few formats, of your choices (according to your donation, of course!) but I will be really pleased to send it to you! For the Norway Lights, you might wait until next year, because of the sun during 6 months and it's already too late for me to get there.

    And,... If unfortunetly, I can't raise the amount... Surely I'll buy the Nikon D750 or D610 to wait... But, I'm truly hoping you will help me ! You have to help !

    I'm won't take a lense with the camera, because I already got 3 that I always use, as the Nikon 500 mm f/1.4 and the 35 mm f/1.8 (Nikon again).
     
    --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

    Il coute, sur le site MissNumerique (lien plus haut) comme vous pouvez le vérifier environ 3700 euros.
    Avec celui là, je pourrai prendre des photos de galaxies et après, avec un caisson étanche, des photos sous marines.
    Il y a avec ça des rêves que je voudrais réaliser, et je sais que je le ferait: prendre des photos en Estonie, mais plus spécifiquement encore, en Norvège au Svalbard ( à 1300km du Pole Nord) où j'ai déjà été, pour prendre des photos d'aurores boréales.

    Mes prix ne seront pas communs. Si vous m'aidez à réaliser ce rêve, cet objectif, je vous offrirez alors une photo de galaxie (ou de portraits, ou encore un shooting si vous le voulez!) prise du haut d'une montagne, ou au ras du sol avec de magnifiques étoiles. Elles seront imprimées à différents formats, ceux de votre choix (en fonction du montant de votre donation bien entendu!) mais cela me fera un grand plaisir de vous les envoyer!
    Pour les aurores boréales, il me faudra, et vous faudra attendre l'an prochain, car à cette période ci, les 6 mois de jours ont déjà débutés, et donc, il est trop tard pour y aller.

    Et.. si malheureusement je n'arrive pas à obtenir le plafond fixé... Sans doute que je me rabattrai à contre coeur sur une gamme moins élevé, comme le Nikon D750 ou D610.. Mais j'espère de tout MON COEUR et mon AME que vous m'aiderez. Vous devez m'aider!

    Il y a des prix beaucoup plus élevés pour l'appareil photo, si l'on prend un objectif avec, mais je ne le ferai pas. Car j'utilise déjà mes 3 objectifs qui me conviennent parfaitement, dont les deux principaux : le 50 mm f/1.4 et le 35 mm f/1.8 par Nikon.



    This is the last picture I took with my boyfriend on it.  Of course, the stars aren't true on it, but so is the rest.
    Ceci est la dernière photo que j'ai prise avec mon copain dessus. Bien entendu, les étoiles ne sont pas réelles, mais le reste l'est.

    I'm sharing with you different pictures I took, between january 2015 and now, and you can also look at my little video backstage of the shoots.
    Je vous partage les différentes photos que j'ai prises entre janvier 2015 et maintenant, vous pouvez aussi regarder la vidéo des backstages des shoots que j'ai fais.






       


For more pictures, it's Here!
Pour plus de photos, c'est Ici !


 Impact/L'impact:

I don't have to explain you more I guess why is this mean so much to me. I did so much shoots (for free) but now that my camera is almost done/out/dead, I'm asking to you, people, if you can just give 1$ or 2$ each, we can make a difference, instead of buying a soda in a cash point!
It's not much, it'll take time, but I don't want to ask you something you don't have..

I want to expose in different train stations and rooms my pictures, to begin.. with galaxies as I already said. Because I do love stars, I do love dreaming and fantasy, and I want to share you my world, the world I see and imagine. That's the meaning of all of it. I can't live without dreaming, so I can't live without taking pictures and share them.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Je n'ai pas à expliquer davantage je pense, pourquoi ça représente autant pour moi. J'ai tellement fais de shootings gratuitement sans rien demander en retour que maintenant, mon appareil photo est presque mort, pour au final, faire essentiellement plaisir autour de moi, et me faire plaisir aussi, il faut l'avouer.
Je vous le demande, à vous, de donner ne serait ce qu'un euros, ou deux, car ça pourrait faire la différence! Si chacun le faisait, je pourrais rapidement obtenir cette merveille qui me fait rêver, et cela ne vous coutera pas plus cher qu'acheter une boisson dans un distributeur.

Je voudrais les exposer par la suite dans des gares, aéroports et salles, pour commencer... avec les galaxies comme dit plus haut. Car j'adore les étoiles, j'adore rêver et j'aime le fantastique, et je veux vous partager mon monde, le monde que je vois et imagine. C'est le but de tout ceci.
Je ne peux pas vivre sans rêver alors, je ne peux pas vivre sans prendre de photos et les partager. 



 

Risks/ Risques:

There's no real risk, except for reaching the goal. If I can't, I'll might buy a low quality camera but, that's all good.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Il n'y a pas de réel risque, excepté le fait de réussir à atteindre le but. Si je ne le peux pas, et bien.. Je prendrais un appareil photo de moins bonne qualité, mais c'est déjà ça de pris!




 Want to Help? / Façon d'aider?

If you truly and deeply want to help me, so please, I beg you to share my project, talk about it to everyone. It's free to share so please SHARE IT as you can !
Thanks to everyone and I'm waiting you in 2016 for big projects! You can contact me here either to build your project or for a question : kayako.phenix@gmail.com !

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Si vous voulez réellement m'aider, alors s'il vous plait, je vous supplie de partager ce projet. Partager ne vous coûte rien du tout, alors faites le ! PARTAGEZ autant que vous le pouvez!

Merci à tous et je vous attend en 2016 pour de nombreux projets! Vous pouvez me contacter à mon adresse mail pour construire votre projet, ou que je réponde à vos questions: kayako.phenix@gmail.com



This is the order of price of cameras with the money you give me!
Voici une idée de prix des appareils photos que je peux m'acheter en fonction de ce que vous m'aidez ! :)

story:
Short Summary of our quest

  • My name is Daniel and my passion is photography. Well and its my job. 
  • I am running this campaign so that I can afford to get a new camera and some new lens
  • All who contribute will be furthering the quality and reach  of my photography business and passion.  

What I Need & What You Get

  • I will need 1500 dollars. I know that's a lot but so are cameras and lens!
  • The perks range from a few head shots to me photographing entire events for you and everywhere in between. 
  • Even if I don't reach my goal all proceeds will go toward my camera and lens. 

The Impact

  • The money you donate for me to get my camera will make it so that I can do more events for more people and possibly hire someone to assist me with my photography events and sessions.
  • It will also let me continue to improve my photography skills and business. 

Risks & Challenges

  • It is a really large goal and I believe I can reach it. I will be working the whole summer getting more money so I am not just sitting around. There is a possibility we wont reach it and even if we dont I am still appreciative of your help and donations. 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • You can use the Indigogo share tools to spread the word 
  • Even if you cant help with money you could share this page with everyone! Well not everyone. That weird guy down the street probably doesn't care

   What I Need & What You Get  I will need 1500 dollars. I know that's a lot but so are cameras and lens! The perks range from a few head shots to me photographing entire events for you and everywhere in between.  Even if I don't reach my goal all proceeds will go toward my camera and lens.     The Impact  The money you donate for me to get my camera will make it so that I can do more events for more people and possibly hire someone to assist me with my photography events and sessions. story:
What is SwapBounce?

SwapBounce is a simple yet versatile flash diffuser designed for event photography. In a single event, event photographers have to react instantly to ever-changing shooting conditions and adjust their camera setting accordingly. With SwapBounce, event photographers can instantly modify the usage of flash one-handed to suit different shooting conditions, without sacrificing any precious moments to be captured. SwapBounce is not bulky at all such that it will not affect the photographers’ movements.


 Advantages

  • Versatile and Easy to use
Easily setups and allows instant switching among horizontal/vertical shooting with fill-in flash light and bounce-up flash light, shooting with bounce flash off of nearby large surface, and direct flash shooting.

  • Create Soft flash light
Provides ample and even soft light to minimize harsh shadow on subjects’ face or neck. Hence a natural look is captured. Even though high power flash light is fired, the light will still be soft.


  • Slim and Light weight
Built in durable and non-deformable plastic. By using frameless design, SwapBounce spreads flash light out evenly. It is only 60 grams (2 ounces), equivalent to the weight of 2 Eneloop® AA batteries.


  • Less annoying to surrounding people
Photographers capture precious moments with camera; others records the same moments with eyes and brain. SwapBounce prevent 50% of flash light from hitting others’ eyes.


  • Creating distinct Catchlight in eyes
  • Fit most medium and large External Hotshoe Flashes

 Disadvantages

SwapBounce contains super strong Neodymium magnets. Neodymium magnet is very magnetically sensitive to iron and magnet. Neodymium magnets on SwapBounce might detach if they are interfered with external magnetic force for long time. So, please keep SwapBounce away from iron and magnetic things.

  • However, are magnets safe around your camera gear?
YES. Please don't worry about that. It is safe around your camera, flashes, lenses and common electronic devices.


 Specifications

SwapBounce is made of top-quality material.
Let's take a closer look at the details of SwapBounce.


 Timeline

I always believe good photography could be achieved with useful yet not expensive equipment. So, I have invented a simple and handy flash diffuser for event photography. I hope to share it with other photographers. I have spent two years designing the diffuser, sourcing for suitable materials and refining the end products.


 Thank you for your support

As a micro entrepreneur, I have single-handedly created this diffuser, from designing, assembling, packing, and advertising to shipping. I hope you will find it useful and support it. Thank you.


 More Examples

All photos were directly outputted as JPEG from Canon 6D.

* Please contact me if I offend your portraiture right *

story:
REAL ARMOR FOR YOUR CAMERA!

Call it a Tough Box, a Tight Box, or an all-Terrain Box; our time-tested TBOX TANK is a universal multi-purpose and weatherproof protective case for your favorite cameras to capture action scenes and long-term time-lapse sequences in various environments and mounting positions effectively and safely. 

Fortified by a Pelican case, it’s as tough as a tank! Imagine putting on an armor for your camera! Now your camera can do crazy fun stuff like the action camera, without compromising on image quality and controllability, or losing the pleasure of using your favorite camera! 

So, go on, bring your camera in the TBOX TANK on dangerous missions, go near the water or mud, mount it on a moving vehicle, bury it in the sand, or even ambush a tiger. It’s especially effective for capturing long-term time-lapse sequences too. 

The possibilities are just endless.



FROM FILM-MAKERS TO PRODUCT DESIGNERS!


The TBOX TANK came together three years ago out of necessity, when we had to specially design a hard protective case for our DSLR cameras to perform a long-term time-lapse recording on a building construction project. 

When the first TBOX TANK prototype was completed and deployed on-site, it delivered amazing results. With this special capability, the number of our projects grew. We started getting many more long-term time-lapse projects for  construction, land-reclamation, ship-building and oil rigs. And before we knew it, we had installed more than 20 units of our TBOX TANK in the field at various sites.

We also realized the TBOX TANK improved the versatility of our DSLRs. We made more modifications along the way for the TBOX TANK to capture some shots that we ourselves think it's a little crazy.  

[DISCLAIMER: The TBOX TANK is watertight to a depth of 3.3 feet (or 1 meter) for 30 minutes (IP67) if properly closed with undamaged o-ring in place, as well as all lens rings and extension rings adequately tightened.  It is splash-proof only and not meant to replace the underwater housing. But, please feel free to take it to the pool or sea for a quick dip to get that quick below-the-water-surface shot with your DSLR that you've always wanted!] 

Encouraged by this, we kept refining the TBOX TANK as we put it into action in real projects. With enhanced usability, it greatly increased the number and variety of our projects.




We then thought about it, and said 'Why not share this with the world?'

This sparked off intensive efforts into research and development to ensure every technical aspect is covered. We spared no expense in testing out various materials, CNC-machinining different parts, and sacrificing several DSLRs too! 


Finally, after two years of perfecting the concept and design, the TBOX TANK is now ready for commercial release.



MAKING THE TBOX TANK AFFORDABLE

If we were to make each TBOX TANK individually, the retail value of a single TBOX TANK can be as high as US$2,000 because most of the parts require precision CNC-machining of solid metal blocks for that perfect fit and quality. It would not make sense for any protective case to cost more than a standard camera. We aim to bring the retail value to under US$1,000 for the TBOX TANK so more people can enjoy using this product to capture the great moments that they need.

The retail value can be as low as US$900 each - only if we manufacture 100 units at a go - which we think will totally work for most people. Therefore, we need your help to cross this manufacturing hurdle to make the TBOX TANK even more affordable.


And for the super early bird supporters of the TBOX TANK on Indiegogo, we want to offer all of you an additional discount off the Launch Price because we want you to use the TBOX TANK! We want you to cross the finishing line with us!


MEET THE REST OF THE TBOX TANK FAMILY

During the course of our development, we added these three members to the TBOX TANK series:

The TANK pro is essentially a pimped out version of the TBOX TANK equipped with an add-on Solar Module which includes a customized solar panel, a solar charger, a distribution box, and a Canon-compatible intervalometer. 

Solar energy is the ideal power source for long-term time-lapse projects. Our solar panel charges up the lead acid battery (not included in the system) via a solar charger, and keeps your time-lapse camera running without the need to change any camera batteries. Backed by this arsenal of unlimited solar power, your Canon DSLR can now be deployed for lengthy periods on any mission. 

The best part is you do not need to get a separate device to set your time-lapse intervals, as the TANK pro comes fitted with a Canon-compatible intervalometer. Batteries are not included because it is also solar-powered. 




The TANK lite is for all mirrorless camera lovers. Almost all DSLRs, and the mirrorless GH4 will fit into our TBOX TANK. But, we also know there are many ardent fans of mirrorless cameras. So, we decided that we should not leave anyone out. Every camera deserves a hard protective case. And this is how the TANK lite is created to fit all popular mirrorless cameras, including the Sony A7 series and the micro 4/3 cameras from Panasonic and Olympus. 


The TANK mini is a special protective case with built-in extended power for the GoPro Hero 4, allowing it to record non-stop for up to 20 hours on time-lapse mode (without WiFi). You can now capture longer time-lapse sequences on your GoPro Hero 4! Another dream made into reality! 



PERKS FOR ALL OUR SUPPORTERS

For all our supporters, we want to show our deepest gratitude by offering special discounts on every TBOX product.


MORE PERKS

  1. When we reach 200 supporters for the TBOX TANK - All supporters of the TBOX TANK will get the opportunity to customize their TBOX TANK with a choice of three different colored lens ring.

  2. When we reach 500 supporters for the TBOX TANK - All supporters of the TBOX TANK will get the Swivel Mount absolutely FREE (regular price is US$100).

  3. When we reach 500 supporters for the TANK lite - All supporters of the TANK

    lite will get the Swivel Mount Lite absolutely FREE (regular price is US$70).              
  4. When we reach 500 supporters for the TANK mini - All supporters of the TANK mini will get the opportunity to customize their TANK mini with a choice of three different colored lens ring.                                                                                         

VISUAL HISTORY of SOMETHING GOOD

We believe that a product cannot be as good if it does not help to make the world a better place. We have an exciting project involving another member of our TBOX family and time-lapse videos that could greatly contribute to society and humanity. 

Developed specially as a robust and heavy-duty industrial grade product, the solar-powered and weather-proof TBOX TITAN is designed and engineered to record long-term time-lapse over several years with the following capabilities and features: 3G/4G-enabled remote monitoring, cloud storage, as well as instant access to the 4K-resolution images anytime and anywhere.   

When we reach US$600,000, we will partner a non-profit housing organization by installing several of our TBOX TITAN systems to document some of their key building or reconstruction projects.

TBOX TITAN Website


IF WE DO NOT REACH OUR GOAL

We will top up any shortfall and proceed to manufacture the products for those who have pledged their support. We will keep remaining stocks as we believe the TBOX will find its way to many other users in the future.

It's an investment risk that we are willing to take to make sure that those of you who want the TBOX will get it at the Indiegogo Price we promised!

We appreciate all your support and are delighted that your cameras will be protected!


SHARE THE TBOX

Do you know someone who might need a TBOX for his or her project? 

It could be a friend who is passionate about photography and long-term time-lapse, a camera enthusiast, a director, or a film-maker. They will be grateful to you for sharing this product with them.
