story:
TCAM : The first wearable video camera ever made for live broadcast!

MAKE LIVE VIDEO GREAT AGAIN!

STAYIN' LIVE ANYTIME!


Thanks to the current coverage provided by 4G networks, TCAM is the only device that allows you to stay connected, while still enjoying everything you see around you!

SMARTPHONES ARE BUILT FOR CALLS - TCAM IS MADE FOR LIVE BROADCAST!

 

​

Everything you are filming can be watched live from anywhere instantly.​

You can broadcast on all your favorite social networks and more right now!​

 

 

WHY TRANSPARENT?

In 1986, Fujifilm revolutionized the world of photos by launching "Quicksnap", the first camera that allowed everyone to take beautiful high-quality pictures. Like the classic cameras, Quicksnap was usable immediately. It was an innovation and a single year of Quicksnap sales exceeded one million units (1.7 billion in total).

In 2018, with TCAM 4G, we believe that anyone should be able to film and share live videos as easily as Quicksnap allowed people to take photos. Just press a button and you are live worldwide! Easier than a smartphone, and lighter than a video camera - here comes the TCAM!

Currently, there is no platform made exclusively for live video broadcasting. Sharing a video instantly from anywhere is difficult. If you want to share something right now, how long can you hold onto your phone to show it exactly as you want to? Everything could be ruined by an unexpected call, or because you couldn’t connect properly!

Already have a cam? Okay, but are you sharing live? No! Everything is hidden away on a memory card forever :(

Now, it's time to change and unlock everything.​

People need easy, fast, and reliable technology to share their videos right now!

With Transparent, everything is instantly visible.

No setup, no smartphone, no wifi....no worries!

 

 

 

 

 

No configuration needed. Once it is turned on, the TCAM connects directly to the 4G network through its integrated sim card (eSIM). No smartphone or wifi needs to be connected. You can start broadcasting right now!​

Stay connected when you’re away from your phone.

All TCAM plans are ready to broadcast!

You can broadcast with your current operator by simply pairing it with your current DATA plan on your smartphone, and you don’t need to subscribe to anything more.

Transparent works with carriers from all over the world, to offer the best connectivity.

Only one button to start sharing your live video

 Turn on the CAM and hang it up. 

WIRELESS FAST CHARGING

 

 TCAM has a battery life that allows you to shoot a whole two hours of live video.  Just what you need to stream a great musical concert!

 

 

 

 

DIGITAL SOCIAL SCREEN


Want to see how many followers you have on your live stream?
Take a look at your TCAM and see how many people are watching in real time! Make sure that you're sharing all the coolest stuff.

 

 

 

 

2-HOUR BATTERY LIFE

HIGH-DEFINITION CAPTURE

The camera instantly calculates the best resolution, based on the network quality, to keep your video stream sharp.

Best live experience guaranteed!​

 

THE APP

We created an app to help you connect to the world.

Androïd or iPhone? Just connect all your social network accounts at once and when you switch on your TCAM, you won't have to worry anymore about sharing your video, it's on!

Watch your live video in real time through the Apple Watch App​

                       

 

Broadcast at the same time ​

You can stream to multiple pages or platforms at the same time, or stream to a custom RTMP destination

TCAM allows you to simulcast your stream to multiple destinations at once,
so you can reach a larger audience.

Improve your Live experience​

HANDS UP!

Your video is on the air

Wearing TCAM is very easy, with its strong magnet fixture.

Free your hands and share your feelings with your audience.

Your TCAM is made to work alone. ​

Once connected to the network, your only limit is your creativity!​

No 4G network available?

Don't worry, TCAM 4G includes internal memory, to allow you to broadcast what you have captured as soon as the network is available again!

HOW DOES IT WORKS?

eSIM, or embedded sim card, is a new way to connect. Your SIM card is directly inside the cam. Pair it with your current data plan at no extra cost and TCAM does the rest.

 

HOW TO CONNECT?

WHAT'S INSIDE?

 

What's in every box:

 

Additional Accessories: TCAM 4G Holder Stand

Silver, Red, Black, the Freely Adjustable Magnetic sucker rotates in any direction. There is always a view for you! Aluminium Alloy / All-Metal / 360 Rotation Adjustable / Size: 14.8 cm x 6.9 cm ( H x W ).

 

WHAT ABOUT DATA?

Here are some networks that are compatible with TCAM:  AT&T, Verizon, T-Mobile, Vodafone, Orange, Telekom, 1O1O, CSL, SmarTone, NTT Docomo, Singtel, Sunrise, Swisscom, TrueMove H, China Mobile…

 

4G NETWORK AVAILABLE IN 78 COUNTRIES

 

ADDICTED TO BROADCASTING?

Most operators offer additional packages on data plans for 10$/month and soon it will probably be less. This allows you to broadcast live at will. Please check with your carrier before subscribing. In many cases you can add additional devices to your existing data plan for free.

WE NEED YOU - YOUR CREATIVITY IS OUR LIMIT

We know that our project will really change the way we all watch and share live videos. A lot of projects only involve surveillance cameras and so limit creativity, but we decided to go much further.

From now on, wherever there is a 4G network, there can be a TCAM. Whether for fun, for information, for sharing something cool or just seeing what's happening in real time, you now have the best device for that.

No reception? No problem, TCAM also saves your videos to its internal memory.

With existing sharing solutions, we believe that the world of video has reached its limits. It is time to take the next step and make the world TRANSPARENT.

Our team comes from different backgrounds, and all of us have completed several exciting projects in our careers. Today, we face a new challenge with the TCAM. And for that, we need you.
 

So, if you believe in the project, please support us!​

TIME LINE

INDIEGOGO Goal:

With this sum we will be able to finalize the prototype phase, including financing the final PCB (wiki page). And then we will be able pay the factory to launch a first series of the product, to 1000 units.

If we do not reach our goal, we will be able to finalize the prototype and launch production, but with a smaller number of units. This is not a problem in itself for those who will contribute. The TCAM will only be used by a small elite group, ready to dive into the world of live video! :)

 

Other ways to help:)

Maybe you can’t contribute right now but you still want to help us? There is nothing easier. Simply share our Indiegogo page or social media website and tell your friends. You can also repost our news articles, or discuss about them on different blogs or forums.

And, if you are a journalist or work in a media outlet, do not hesitate to contact us. We can provide you with a press kit and other types of media.

 

Risks and challenges:

To finalize the TCAM project and be able to deliver on time, the main difficulty will be to find a mass production plant in China, and follow the assembly circuit day by day. But don’t worry, we have everything planned! Part of our team is located in Asia, which will allow us to have one or more partners on site who will follow this important step. They will produce regular reports that we will communicate to you, so that you are kept informed of all that is happening during this phase. And then, you will only have to worry about enjoying your TCAM ;)

 

WHO'S BEHIND THE SCENES?

An experienced and effective team!

Transparent’s founders earned their stripes at Apple and eBay in support, IT and sales.

The whole team strives to ensure the success of the project.

Q&A

What is an eSIM?​

it's an integrated SIM card that cannot to be removed from a device.

The eSIM allows the TCAM 4G (LTE) to connect to your network operator, to get data independently without Bluetooth® pairing to your smartphone.

How do I activate my TCAM eSIM card?​

TCAM is activated by scanning a QR code, and then uses data from the data plan you currently have.

What if I don't have 4G signal?​

TCAM includes internal memory, so, if you don’t have signal, your camera saves the content and sends it out when the network is available. You will never lose what you are filming or have filmed!

Is there a cost for cloud storage ?

Every plan includes 7 days of free cloud recordings. If that's not enough, you can subscribe to one of our paid offers.

Can I use the usual data plan I have with my smartphone? 

Of course, if you already have a plan for your smartphone, you can easily pair your TCAM with it.

How much data does the TCAM use?​

The amount of data used will be based on the type of plan and camera being used. This can also fluctuate based on whether you stream constantly or in bits.

How long does it take to charge the battery?​

TCAM needs about 3 hours to fully charge.

Is TCAM splash and dust resistant?

Yes, TCAM benefits from the IP44 protection rating.

When will my TCAM be delivered?

TCAM is currently in the final prototype conception phase, and delivery date is set at November 2018. We will be in touch if there are any changes.
story_txt:
TCAM : The first wearable video camera ever made for live broadcast!MAKE LIVE VIDEO GREAT AGAIN!STAYIN' LIVE ANYTIME!
Thanks to the current coverage provided by 4G networks, TCAM is the only device that allows you to stay connected, while still enjoying everything you see around you!SMARTPHONES ARE BUILT FOR CALLS - TCAM IS MADE FOR LIVE BROADCAST! ​Everything you are filming can be watched live from anywhere instantly.​You can broadcast on all your favorite social networks and more right now!​  WHY TRANSPARENT?In 1986, Fujifilm revolutionized the world of photos by launching "Quicksnap", the first camera that allowed everyone to take beautiful high-quality pictures. Like the classic cameras, Quicksnap was usable immediately. It was an innovation and a single year of Quicksnap sales exceeded one million units (1.7 billion in total).In 2018, with TCAM 4G, we believe that anyone should be able to film and share live videos as easily as Quicksnap allowed people to take photos. Just press a button and you are live worldwide! Easier than a smartphone, and lighter than a video camera - here comes the TCAM!Currently, there is no platform made exclusively for live video broadcasting. Sharing a video instantly from anywhere is difficult. If you want to share something right now, how long can you hold onto your phone to show it exactly as you want to? Everything could be ruined by an unexpected call, or because you couldn’t connect properly!Already have a cam? Okay, but are you sharing live? No! Everything is hidden away on a memory card forever :(Now, it's time to change and unlock everything.​People need easy, fast, and reliable technology to share their videos right now!With Transparent, everything is instantly visible.No setup, no smartphone, no wifi....no worries!     No configuration needed. Once it is turned on, the TCAM connects directly to the 4G network through its integrated sim card (eSIM). No smartphone or wifi needs to be connected. You can start broadcasting right now!​Stay connected when you’re away from your phone.All TCAM plans are ready to broadcast!You can broadcast with your current operator by simply pairing it with your current DATA plan on your smartphone, and you don’t need to subscribe to anything more.Transparent works with carriers from all over the world, to offer the best connectivity.Only one button to start sharing your live video Turn on the CAM and hang it up. WIRELESS FAST CHARGING  TCAM has a battery life that allows you to shoot a whole two hours of live video.  Just what you need to stream a great musical concert!    DIGITAL SOCIAL SCREEN

Want to see how many followers you have on your live stream?Take a look at your TCAM and see how many people are watching in real time! Make sure that you're sharing all the coolest stuff.    2-HOUR BATTERY LIFEHIGH-DEFINITION CAPTUREThe camera instantly calculates the best resolution, based on the network quality, to keep your video stream sharp.Best live experience guaranteed!​ THE APPWe created an app to help you connect to the world.Androïd or iPhone? Just connect all your social network accounts at once and when you switch on your TCAM, you won't have to worry anymore about sharing your video, it's on!Watch your live video in real time through the Apple Watch App​                        Broadcast at the same time ​You can stream to multiple pages or platforms at the same time, or stream to a custom RTMP destinationTCAM allows you to simulcast your stream to multiple destinations at once,so you can reach a larger audience.Improve your Live experience​HANDS UP! Your video is on the airWearing TCAM is very easy, with its strong magnet fixture.Free your hands and share your feelings with your audience.Your TCAM is made to work alone. ​Once connected to the network, your only limit is your creativity!​No 4G network available?Don't worry, TCAM 4G includes internal memory, to allow you to broadcast what you have captured as soon as the network is available again!HOW DOES IT WORKS?eSIM, or embedded sim card, is a new way to connect. Your SIM card is directly inside the cam. Pair it with your current data plan at no extra cost and TCAM does the rest. HOW TO CONNECT?WHAT'S INSIDE? What's in every box: 
Additional Accessories: TCAM 4G Holder Stand
Silver, Red, Black, the Freely Adjustable Magnetic sucker rotates in any direction. There is always a view for you! Aluminium Alloy / All-Metal / 360 Rotation Adjustable / Size: 14.8 cm x 6.9 cm ( H x W ). WHAT ABOUT DATA?Here are some networks that are compatible with TCAM:  AT&T, Verizon, T-Mobile, Vodafone, Orange, Telekom, 1O1O, CSL, SmarTone, NTT Docomo, Singtel, Sunrise, Swisscom, TrueMove H, China Mobile… 4G NETWORK AVAILABLE IN 78 COUNTRIES ADDICTED TO BROADCASTING?Most operators offer additional packages on data plans for 10$/month and soon it will probably be less. This allows you to broadcast live at will. Please check with your carrier before subscribing. In many cases you can add additional devices to your existing data plan for free.WE NEED YOU - YOUR CREATIVITY IS OUR LIMITWe know that our project will really change the way we all watch and share live videos. A lot of projects only involve surveillance cameras and so limit creativity, but we decided to go much further.From now on, wherever there is a 4G network, there can be a TCAM. Whether for fun, for information, for sharing something cool or just seeing what's happening in real time, you now have the best device for that.No reception? No problem, TCAM also saves your videos to its internal memory.With existing sharing solutions, we believe that the world of video has reached its limits. It is time to take the next step and make the world TRANSPARENT.Our team comes from different backgrounds, and all of us have completed several exciting projects in our careers. Today, we face a new challenge with the TCAM. And for that, we need you. So, if you believe in the project, please support us!​TIME LINEINDIEGOGO Goal:With this sum we will be able to finalize the prototype phase, including financing the final PCB (wiki page). And then we will be able pay the factory to launch a first series of the product, to 1000 units.If we do not reach our goal, we will be able to finalize the prototype and launch production, but with a smaller number of units. This is not a problem in itself for those who will contribute. The TCAM will only be used by a small elite group, ready to dive into the world of live video! :) Other ways to help:)Maybe you can’t contribute right now but you still want to help us? There is nothing easier. Simply share our Indiegogo page or social media website and tell your friends. You can also repost our news articles, or discuss about them on different blogs or forums.And, if you are a journalist or work in a media outlet, do not hesitate to contact us. We can provide you with a press kit and other types of media. Risks and challenges:To finalize the TCAM project and be able to deliver on time, the main difficulty will be to find a mass production plant in China, and follow the assembly circuit day by day. But don’t worry, we have everything planned! Part of our team is located in Asia, which will allow us to have one or more partners on site who will follow this important step. They will produce regular reports that we will communicate to you, so that you are kept informed of all that is happening during this phase. And then, you will only have to worry about enjoying your TCAM ;) WHO'S BEHIND THE SCENES?An experienced and effective team!Transparent’s founders earned their stripes at Apple and eBay in support, IT and sales.The whole team strives to ensure the success of the project.Q&AWhat is an eSIM?​it's an integrated SIM card that cannot to be removed from a device.The eSIM allows the TCAM 4G (LTE) to connect to your network operator, to get data independently without Bluetooth® pairing to your smartphone.How do I activate my TCAM eSIM card?​TCAM is activated by scanning a QR code, and then uses data from the data plan you currently have.What if I don't have 4G signal?​TCAM includes internal memory, so, if you don’t have signal, your camera saves the content and sends it out when the network is available. You will never lose what you are filming or have filmed!Is there a cost for cloud storage ?Every plan includes 7 days of free cloud recordings. If that's not enough, you can subscribe to one of our paid offers.Can I use the usual data plan I have with my smartphone? Of course, if you already have a plan for your smartphone, you can easily pair your TCAM with it.How much data does the TCAM use?​The amount of data used will be based on the type of plan and camera being used. This can also fluctuate based on whether you stream constantly or in bits.How long does it take to charge the battery?​TCAM needs about 3 hours to fully charge.Is TCAM splash and dust resistant? Yes, TCAM benefits from the IP44 protection rating.When will my TCAM be delivered?TCAM is currently in the final prototype conception phase, and delivery date is set at November 2018. We will be in touch if there are any changes.

story:
• Process video from 4 — 180° AHD cameras, displaying a composite footage as if there is a single birds-eye view camera right above the vehicle. This makes parking much easier.
  • Eliminate all blind spots by 360-degree 3D virtual reality technology
  • 4 channel 720P AHD DVR
  • IP67 Waterproof Rating
  • Night Vision
  • 30FPS CVBS 720H*480V Video output to your car dashboard monitor(MONITOR NOT INCLUDED)
  • Auto brightness and colour balance Image Control feature to ensure images from all four cameras stitch together seamlessly and realistically.

Compared to the driving recorder with only one camera on the market, ADASISAN has four cameras installed on the front, rear,  left and right of the car to let you view the surroundings
of the car 360 degrees.

What if I have to parallel park in a tiny parking spot, what if I have to drive down a narrow alley, what if someone hits my car, or, what if someone tries to break into it ? Now, you can get rid of those irritating worries with the ADASISAN 360-degree 3D 720PHD car cam. It’s a real-time witness. It’s a second set of all-seeing eyes, watching over you so you don’t have to watch over yourself. It’s an insurance policy on the go. So you can enjoy the freedom your car gives you, and peace of mind in case anything untoward happens.

 

We're giving away $30 Toolbox for the first 50 backers which including Car radio removal tool set & Professional car repair kits.

As soon as you get into your car, the ADASISAN system starts recording  mode. And when you close the door to leave, it settles back into watch  mode,  ready to activate should the car be hit by another vehicle or object, or when a break-in is attempted. The recording is in full 720PHD video, and the ADASISAN system can record up to a 16-hour loop (depending on the size of your hard drive). It is also fitted with highly sensitive gyroscopic motion-activated sensors. So when the car encounters vibrations or even light impact, the cameras kick in to record what’s happening around it.

 

What does ADASISAN say :

 

Never again will you have to worry about blind spots while you’re driving. You won’t have to creep gingerly while turning down claustrophobic parking lot ramps, or wonder how close
you are to a low concrete wall while parking. Narrow back lanes  - what a breeze.As they say, information is power. The ADASISAN generously showers you with a wealth of visual information to make using your car a completely stress-free activity.

 

Through its unique Virtual Scene Reconstruction technology, the ADASISAN system is able to continuously stitch together a near-seamless, extremely life-like, video of the entire
environment surrounding your car. And it does it in real time, at 33 frames per second, with no lag or fuzziness in the video it produces.

 

4 super-wide angle High Definition cameras, each capable of seeing nearly 180 degrees.One goes on your front bumper, one on your back bumper, one on your left sideview mirror
and one on your right sideview mirror. Together, the ADASISAN system monitors Every single angle and never misses a thing.

With typical rear view cameras, the ultrawide fisheye lens distorts the image so badly that the guidelines are provided to give you a better sense of your car’s width. On the other hand, the ADASISAN’s Seamless Image Splicing Technology automatically adjusts the images you see to provide a more realistic, easily-understood picture.

But what about when your car is parked and you’re not around ? We’ve all experienced the horror of returning to our cars and seeing scratches made by some other driver backing into or out of a neighbouring parking spot. Most of the time, the driver would have fled the scene, knowing that you won’t who it was that hit your car. Guess what? The ADASISAN senses the
tiniest of movements and immediately reacts by recording video. Result? The offender will be captured on video, so you can track down his or her car using its license plate number.

 

16GB Built-in to store every moment of the car experience. You can check the records at any time to get a real-time situation by remote control.

 

IP67 waterproof rating, which means that the cameras can even be submerged in 1-metre deep water for up to half and hour.

Whether you are driving a small compact car, sedan, SUV, pick-up truck or minivan, the ADASISAN’s 4 Cameras can be installed in your vehicle.

 Because the interface of our output video is RCA(the same as Universal Vehicle Backup Camera), it will work well if your monitor screen or radio has the RCA input connector.

Step 1. Install the main board power cable: Need install 4pcs power cables, they are : Positive electricty (yellow), ACC (Pink), parking reverse input wire(white) and ground wire(black)

Step 2. Mount and fix 4 cameras: Front view camera : usually it mounted in the middle of central grille ; Rear view camera: at the rear bumper; Left and right view camera: under the left and right mirror separately;

Step 3. Connect with DVD/Navigator displayer, cameras and main board Connect the main board 40PIN wires with video input wire of DVD/Navigator displayer(or the reverse parking output wire) and left/right cameras.

Select lens parameters and calibration cloth type, enter the distance value(the unit is cm) of AB, BC , click CLB to calibrate, there will be two options: auto / manual calibration,  “auto” is recommended, manual type please refer to the installation and calibration manual.

 

 

 

 

Have a question?

Production Status

Thank you so much for your support us. We started production in this week. We are currently producing connecting cables and the host. There are many accessories for this product. We need to carry out production step by step. We will continue to update the progress. Thank you for your attention!

 

About Weboo

Shenzhen Weboo Technology Co., Ltd. is a company engaged in the development and sales of products such as 360 degrees panoramic parking images, intelligent reversing trajectory, and car camera (driving recorder). For 8 years, we have been committed to escort customers' travel by consistent R&D and innovation of automotive electronics products. The company's R&D department has a number of senior R&D experts who graduate from Peking University with master's degree, standing out in the area of 360 panoramic parking system. The innovation of this technology clears away the potential danger from the blind spot when driving. Our products are well received by customers domestically and abroad, and the company is devoting itself to creating highly integrated and intelligent automotive electronics to make driving safer with no blind spots.

story:
Hey There!

My name is Andrey and I love photography. For many years  I have been chasing my own  dream of becoming the best I can be at what I love doing. My photography is my life and it has given me experiences that I could never forget. I have worked at London Fashion and been a part of raising money for Breast Cancer research.   

I have recently faced a worst situation of my life. On my way home from a location shoot my bag filled with my equipment got stolen.  I have never been so depressed in my life. For me it felt like a part of me had disappeared. I have tried everything possible to get my bag pack but nothing has worked out. I can't live without my equipment, I can't work without my equipment. My life has lost its purpose and I really need your help! I am in a desperate need!


With this money i cannot fully replace my kit, but it can get me the equipment I need in order to get back to doing what I love, Photography. I will be able to work again and continue living a dream of becoming a photographer that I have always wanted to become.

story:
We have a limited supply of Berlin tripods available at a discounted price of $749.00. Includes tripod, flat plate, tripod bag, tool kit and USA/Canada shipping.

Please contact me at

ari @ flmcanada dot com

 

Nick Page's new review of the Berlin 38.4:

 

Are you ready for stills? Landscapes? Architecture? Ready for video & cinema? Pano? Macro? Ready for large format or ultra-large format? FLM's new tripod is ready for you.

 

    

My name is Ari, I'm the FLM distributor for the US and Canada.  We're very fortunate to work with a great company like FLM because of the high quality of their ball heads and tripods, backed up by an excellent 10-year warranty.

We're thrilled about last year's incredibly successful crowdfunding for the CP26-Travel tripod, and we're still having trouble keeping up with demand; we're in our sixth production run, demand keeps growing, and great reviews keep coming in. We set out to make the best travel tripod in the world, and we accomplished that, but we don't want to rest on our laurels.

A Little Background...

The Berlin 38.4 will be the first tripod to be introduced by FLM Canada/USA. We've also assumed sole responsibility for FLM's crowdfunding program in North America, the aim of which is to introduce new FLM products to the public before they are sold in retail stores.

A New Series - The Berlin

We'll be introducing at least two tripods in the course of the next 8-12 months as part of our new "Berlin" series. The Berlin tripods all share these specs and features:

  • 10-layer carbon fibre tubes
  • one-piece milled aluminum apex
  • removable center plate or bowl adapter
  • allow use of both 75mm and 100mm bowl systems
  • an extremely high weight-to-load-capacity ratio
  • one-piece leg shims

The first tripod in this series is the Berlin 38.4, or simply, the 38.4: "38" refers to the largest carbon tube diameter (38mm), and "4" is the number of sections per leg. It promises to be the steadiest, most rock-solid tripod in its class, and one that you can pre-order right now. You have the chance to own this amazing tripod before it arrives in stores, and you can buy it here at up to 31% off the retail price.

The only significant part left to work on is completing the design of the flat plate; the flat plate sits on top of the tripod, supports the ball head, and will have an integrated hook. We're also finalizing details on levelling bowls for both 75mm and 100mm adapters.

The flat plate design modifications, and refinements to the design of the levelling bowls, will be the basis of our progress updates.

What We Need

We're a small company, but we've managed to build a loyal following because of the excellence of our ball heads and tripods, and by having great customers who tell others about FLM. Our success with the CP26-Travel helped us become much better-known, and we hope that the promotion and success of the 38.4 tripod here at Indiegogo will allow us to offer this tripod, and other interesting models, as part of our regular catalogue, not only as a limited-production item.

We need your help to do this: use the tripod, review it, or tell others about it; recommend it, and give us feedback on how good it is, or if it can be better.

We are doing this both to create a buzz around our new tripod, as well as to see if it should be made in larger quantities and become a catalogue mainstay. Our goal of $9500.00 is needed only to start the first production run. Our primary motivation with this crowdfunding is to offer the Berlin 38.4 to as many people as possible, and hope to build enough momentum through word-of-mouth promotion so that it will become a mainstay of our line-up. If successful, this will also give us the freedom in the future to have other tripods designed and built, and thus be able to make a wider variety of tripods than what we currently offer.

Ultimately, this benefits everyone: we'll have an expanded, more interesting line-up of tripods, and you, the customer, will have better and more varied choices when it comes to deciding on a high-quality tripod.

What You Get: Fantastic Tripod, Great Price

The Berlin 38.4 is a lightweight, 10-layer carbon fibre tripod, equally at home in the studio as it is on the street; in a rainstorm or a blizzard; at the South Pole or in the Namibian Desert. The tripod is light enough to carry with you all day, and folds compactly enough to bring with you on long trips. Whereas the CP26-Travel was a great lightweight and strong solution for the specific purpose of travel, the 38.4 should be almost as easy to transport, while being well-suited to very large and heavy cameras, and able to withstand a lot of daily abuse.

The 10 layers of carbon fibre are made from our patented weaving process for maximum strength and minimal weight. Why should that matter? As you'll see below, the 38.4 is capable of carrying loads many times its own weight, at a much higher ratio than any tripod we've previously made. And like our other tripods, the 38.4 is easy to use, unobtrusive, portable, and capable of supporting the heaviest cameras and lenses with ease. Its deceptively simple design means less internal parts, so less things can go wrong, and it's an excellent all-day companion.

We wanted to keep weight and bulk to a minimum, wherever possible, so we've designed an apex that is equally comfortable supporting both a 75mm bowl and a 100mm bowl, and we're offering those accessories here. You'll be able to use your choice of 75mm or 100mm bowl adapters and accessories on one tripod, making the 38.4 a greatly enhanced and versatile tripod.

We expect the retail price for the 38.4 to be $809.00 USD, which, when compared to similarly-sized tripods (i.e., Gitzo Series 4 or RRS TVC-34), is a great price. But we're offering it here for as little as $558.00, and you'll have yours before the tripod hits the stores. 

If you purchase a tripod here, you'll get it; it's that simple. If we fail to meet our $9500 target, all buyers will get their perks, on time, no matter the outcome of the Indiegogo campaign.

If we sell only one tripod, then that one tripod will be delivered on time, as promised. But if enough people buy the tripod here, that will enable us to make the tripod for years to come. Our CP26-Travel tripod, which is still a top-seller one year later, is becoming an industry standard for its class.

But our immediate goal is to get this tripod into as many peoples' hands as is possible through our crowdfunding platform because we know how well a good project attracts good attention.

 

Quality

We will not sacrifice stability or build-quality for flashy, gimmicky features, especially if they do not serve the serious photographer.

We use only the highest-quality materials, superb design, and we offer world-class products that are meant to last for many years under hard use. Our unofficial motto has always been "Buy well, buy once" and we happily stand behind that.

Our 10-year warranty is the best in the business. That means you'll always have spare parts and expert help when it's needed. We get fewer than 1 in 1,000 returns due to manufacturing errors, we've had a proven track record for over 24 years, and our quality-control has always been among the best.

 

NEW: A review of the Berlin 38.4 for Tech.co online gear: https://tech.co/flm-berlin-tripod-professional-2017-11/amp

 

The Berlin 38.4 Tripod

Photographers around the world have been asking us for a big tripod for several years; they asked for absolute stability and top performance no matter how large or heavy their photo or video gear; they also wanted modularity in using tripod accessories, like bowls and ball heads. And they wanted portability as well as packability.

So we're very pleased to finally offer the ​Berlin series of tripods. Here are the specs for the 38.4:

  • Tripod Name: Berlin 38.4
  • Materials: interwoven 10x carbon fibre, aluminum alloy CNC-milled apex bowl
  • Leg Sections: 4
  • Leg section diameter: 38mm, 34mm, 30mm, 26mm
  • Weight: 2,25 kg (4.96 lbs.) - without centre post/plate
  • Load capacity: 40kg (88.18 lbs)
  • Weight-to-Load-Capacity Ratio: 1 : 17.7
  • Max height: 143cm (56.29")
  • Min height: 8cm (3.14")
  • Folded length: 52cm (20.47")
  • Folded diameter (at apex): 16.4cm (6.45")
  • Apex bowl mount: 75mm & 100mm
  • Ball head mount: 3/8" & 1/4"
  • Foot assembly: integrated steel spikes, rubber screw-on feet 
  • Leg locks: aluminum alloy
  • Other materials: cork/rubber surface on flat plate
  • Bubble level: integrated 

The apex of our tripod is CNC-milled from a solid block of aluminum; this gives it unparalleled strength while keeping a low profile, and helps in keeping the overall weight down as well. The apex is specially anodized in black for a sleek, low-key finish.

What are Bowls and Why Use Them?

Bowls are used in larger tripods in place of a center post, and also in place of a head, in some cases. Motion and video shooters have been using this system for decades. Bowl adapters clamp into the empty space at the tripod's apex, and using the adapters, you can then attach a number of different accessories, the most common being leveling bowls. Leveling bowls usually consist of a half-sphere with a stud screw, all atop a short stem that tightens or loosens the bowl inside its adapter. Most manufacturers follow a standard size and dovetail when designing their bowls and adapters, making most of them interchangeable across different brands.

Berlin 38.4 with FLM 100mm bowl adapter and Desmond Photo 100mm bowl

Using a leveling bowl instead of a ball head makes your kit lighter, less bulky - and less expensive. Many bowls offer 15˚- 20˚ of leveling in any direction, which is sufficient for most applications. In our tests, we used the Berlin 38.4 with a Gitzo Series 2,3,4 bowl adapter and a Manfrotto 75mm leveling bowl; the parts worked together seamlessly. Most manufacturers design their tripods to accept either 75mm or 100mm bowls, but not both. The Berlin 38.4 can use both sizes. Just make sure your other-brand accessories will fit to the Berlin's 85mm apex diameter. 

The Berlin 38.4 is thus set up to be a perfect companion to still and motion picture photographers. It uses both 75mm and 100mm bowl adapters, so you can use a variety of bowls and accessories from FLM; if you already own standard-size bowl adapters and other parts from other manufacturers, those will work, too (see FAQ #1). The 75mm & 100mm bowl system is ideal for videographers, cinematographers, documentarians, birders and spotters.  

Don't want to use the bowl system? No problem, the 38.4 tripod ships with a flat plate and hook assembly. Just attach your favourite head and start shooting.

This tripod is our second, after the CP26-Travel, to use 10 layers of high-grade carbon fibre. These extra layers add very little to the overall weight, but greatly enhance the tripod's load capacity.

To put the weight of the Berlin 38.4 in perspective:

  • FLM CP26-Travel --- 1.28kg (2.82 lbs.)
  • FLM Berlin 38.4 ----- 2.25kg (4.96 lbs.)

The Berlin 38.4 weighs only 0.97kg (2.14 lbs) more than the CP26-Travel tripod. The CP26-Travel can carry more than 9 times its weight, which is very impressive, especially for a 5-section travel tripod. But the 38.4 can carry almost 18 times its weight, which guarantees that your gear will be safe, steady and as free from vibration as possible at all times.

We're also continuing with one-piece leg shims; these were introduced on the CP26-Travel, and so far, after one year, we haven't had a single request for leg shim replacement. The design is working perfectly, we're happy with it, so we're keeping this feature with the 38.4 tripod.

And we're leaving our leg grips in bare brushed aluminum. We like to keep potential problems to a minimum, especially for a tripod that's going to give some heavy-duty support. The aluminum grips will work in all kinds of weather, and will last much longer than their rubber-covered counterparts. The feel of aluminum grips is more precise, so over-tightening/under-tightening problems are minimized. The overall weight has been further reduced by using leg locks made of a lighter and thinner aluminum alloy that still provide all the gripping power needed for a tripod of this caliber.

The 38.4's legs will only fold down, they won't reverse and fold back; while we've designed fold-back legs on every tripod we've ever made, it wasn't possible on the 38.4 because of the larger apex and the modified design of the load arms. These load arms were made to absorb more vibration and keep the tripod steady under extreme weight, and that design prevents the legs from folding back.

Another noticeable aspect of the tripod is that the apex is tightened and loosened by a screw, which takes an allen key; some manufacturers use a lever or ratchet design to tighten the apex, while others have kept the simpler screw design. We've considered this part for a while, and decided to keep the screw function because:

  • the hex screw can be precisely adjusted
  • less moving parts, less things to go wrong
  • a lever requires regular adjustment 
  • it can be over-tightened, or flipped open by accident
  • it only takes slightly more time to use the allen key as it would a lever

The tripod includes heavy-duty integrated steel spiked feet with rubber-foot screw covers; simply unscrew and remove the rubber feet to use the spikes.

 

What's Included With Your Tripod Purchase?


The central component to all the perks is, of course, the tripod. The tripod outfit includes:

  • Berlin 38.4 tripod
  • flat plate with hook
  • tool kit
  • tripod bag

All perks include these items, denoted by the "38.4" listed in each perk.

    We supply a flat plate so you can start using your tripod right away. This aluminum flat plate includes the 3/8" stud screw and is covered in our special cork/rubber material which provides superior protection against slippage; it won't dry out in the sun, or get slick in the rain. The bottom of the flat plate has a short centre post ending in a hook assembly. That means you'll be able to use the tripod at its minimum height of 8cm (3.14") and still keep the flat plate attached. Three nylon-covered screws are countersunk to secure ball heads. We'll keep you updated on that as we finalize the design and production.

    The tool kit includes:

    • 3.0 allen key - for tightening apex, leg struts, and 3/8" stud screw
    • 1.3 allen key - for tightening smaller set screw and 1/4" stud screw
    • one stud screw 1/4" (3/8" stud screw comes attached to flat plate)

    We wanted a tripod bag that offers good protection and quick access to gear with a minimum of fuss, and we've sourced just such a carrying bag for the tripod. This conical padded tripod bag has enough room to hold the 38.4 tripod with a CB-58FTR ball head mounted, it's tough enough to last years under hard use, and it's comfortable to carry in the field. There's an adjustable strap for over-the-shoulder use, and the bag can be opened at the top only, if preferred, for quick access to the tripod. There are also carrying handles, and inside the bag is a small zippered pouch for carrying your tripod tool kit.

    Now, let's talk bowls. Again.

    We offer two accessory kits for your tripod: a bowl adapter with a levelling half-bowl, available in both 75mm and 100mm sizes. The leveling bowl and adapter are sold together and permit the use of a variety of photo and video heads for your tripod.

    Once a bowl is attached, you're ready for anything. Ready for still. Ready for video & cinema. Ready for pano. Ready for macro. Ready for large format. Ready for ultra-large format. Ready for anything you want to do.

    The levelling bowl does a great job of replacing a ball head in many situations. The levelling bowl gives 20˚ of movement in any direction, more than enough for many applications. It can easily handle 40kg of camera and lens as well, making it a great choice for multi-format shooters. It locks down solid and tight.

    The bowl adapters are made from a solid piece of aluminum, CNC-machined to perfection, with holes drilled into them for lighter weight and to reduce friction.

    If you opt for a perk that includes a ball head, your ball head will come with the Arca-compatible SRB-60 clamp installed. The SRB-60 clamp has a large tolerance for all widths of Arca-compatible plates, and is considered a universal clamp. Our highly-rated ball heads are solid, strong and don't creep in the slightest, meaning you can always count on them for critical work. Use the ball head and bowl together for maximum versatility and endless possibilities of precision positioning.

    The bowl adapters, levelling bowls, ball heads and clamps, are also under warranty for 10 years.

    FLM CB-48FTR ball head with SRB-60 clamp

     

    Challenges

    We've already eliminated many of the risks to you, the customer. We're finalizing the details for the flat plate assembly and levelling bowls, but otherwise, small-scale production of the Berlin 38.4 is ready to begin.

    Support

    If you have any questions of any kind related to the Berlin 38.4, please write us anytime. We answer emails pretty quickly, even if we're on the road.

    Refunds

    If you're not 100% satisfied with the Berlin 38.4, simply notify us and return it for a full refund within 14 days of receiving it. If you're not sure that you'll keep it, we ask that you try to keep it as new-looking as possible until you've decided. That's it.

    Shipping the Perks

    Orders will ship from Canada to any Paypal-verified US or Canada address. There is no duty to pay if you are in the US. But if it happens, let us know, and we'll re-imburse your Duty fees.

    Shipping is extra and depending on the perk chosen, ranges from $24 to $34. Canadian and US customers pay the same shipping fees. We've arranged for special reduced shipping rates for North America using Purolator/UPS. All shipments will be by courier and will require a signature.

    Contact me by email if you have any special requests, be it for shipping or for other FLM items not listed here. I'll make sure you get it.

    Delivery Date

    We estimate the delivery date to be roughly 8-10 weeks after the Indiegogo campaign ends, which takes us to late January/early February. But this is usually an extremely busy time for shipping companies and many supplier delays tend to occur around this time. The post-Xmas shipping season is very busy and causes unforeseen delays. It happened to us last year, which was the cause of one significant delay in shipping the CP26-Travel.

    For this reason, I'm going to set a shipping date of February 15. This means that the tripods will ship from Canada to our supporters no later than February 15. 

    If it can be done earlier, I'll certainly make it happen, but given the time of year and based on past experience, I'd like to have a little wiggle room. 

     

    Other Ways You Can Help

    You can help us promote our crowdfunding appeal, and help make the 38.4 the new star of the FLM line-up. If you don't want to buy a tripod, you can:

    • Tell others about our tripod campaign
    • Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the page and help us spread the word

    We appreciate every effort, big or small, that you can make; we know that we can't do this alone, and we're very grateful for any plug, recommendation, review, share, like, and thumbs-up you can give us.

    Thank you very much!

    -------------------------------

    Comments about our previous Indiegogo project, the CP26-Travel tripod:

    "The FLM CP 26 travel tripod I received today is a high quality precision product with absolutely beautiful fit and finish. Many thanks !" - Paul L., Indiegogo supporter

    "If you want to enjoy the multiple benefits of using a tripod in any photographic situation, there’s no excuse not to have the FLM CP-26 with you all the time." - Robert Rodriguez, Jr., photographer, teacher, reviewer

    "The quality is really excellent! If someone had told me, I had never believed, that a tripod with 4 extractable leg-sections can be so stiff and stable!" - Oliver W., Indiegogo supporter

    "Just by unpacking and holding the tripod, I could immediately see the high levels of quality and precision which went into its design and manufacture." - Dennis W., Indiegogo supporter

    "Congratulations on producing such an outstanding product. Frankly, it is so sturdy that I am not sure why I would want to travel with my original FLM which is so outstanding unto itself." - Jeffrey B., Indiegogo supporter

     

    Some online reviews of the CP26-Travel tripod:

     
     
     

    More reviews and information about the CP26-Travel Indiegogo campaign

     

    FAQs:

    1. Can I use my Gitzo/Manfrotto/Induro/RRS, etc. accessories on the Berlin 38.4? The short answer is "Yes, but...". Here's the long answer: while we've tested the Berlin with some other brand's accessories, we have not done exhaustive tests to make sure all brands conform to the same shape and size for the apex. The Berlin 38.4 has an inner apex diameter of 84.9mm (85mm), so please make sure that if you already own, for example, a Gitzo center post from Series 4 or 5, that its plate will fit the Berlin's apex.

    2. Why can't you ship to me in Europe/Asia/Australia? This campaign is a US/Canada initiative, Europe and Asia-Pacific are not our distribution territories. In the near future, this tripod may be available in other territories as well. As Canada/US distributors, we cannot sell FLM gear outside of North America.

    3. Who can buy the tripod? Anyone can buy the tripod, but we need either a US or Canada shipping address, verified through Paypal or through your credit card.

    4. Why is this only an FLM Canada/USA project? In order to gauge whether the Berlin 38.4 will become a regular catalogue item, we will test it in North America first. Based on Indiegogo interest, peer and user reviews, we will either continue making it, or produce for existing orders, then only make a small run once a year of about 3-5 tripods. FLM Germany are not involved at this stage.

    5. Do you offer the same warranty as before? Absolutely, yes. We offer FLM's standard 10-year warranty. Parts and repair are in Canada, same as always.

    6. What is your refund/return policy? If you aren't 100% impressed by the 38.4, contact us and send back your tripod for a full refund. We'll give you 15 days from the date of delivery to decide. All we ask is that if you're not sure about the tripod, please try to keep it looking new and scratch-free.

    7. What if I have a problem with my new tripod? Call or write us; if needed, we'll ask that you send us the problem part, or the whole tripod. We'll take care of the problem within 48 hours. If it can't be repaired quickly, we'll issue you a new tripod.

    8. Do you have a US address for sending repairs? Yes, but response time will be slower. Contact us ahead of time and we'll send you the US shipping address.

    9. Are replacement parts going to be made available? Not for general sale at stores, but replacement parts can be ordered from FLM Canada, and they're free if it's the result of a manufacturing flaw.

    10. Can I ask you any question, anytime, about the Berlin 38.4 tripod or other FLM gear? Yes, absolutely!

We have a limited supply of Berlin tripods available at a discounted price of $749.00. Includes tripod, flat plate, tripod bag, tool kit and USA/Canada shipping.
Please contact me at
ari @ flmcanada dot com
 
Nick Page's new review of the Berlin 38.4:

 
Are you ready for stills? Landscapes? Architecture? Ready for video & cinema? Pano? Macro? Ready for large format or ultra-large format? FLM's new tripod is ready for you.
 
    
My name is Ari, I'm the FLM distributor for the US and Canada.  We're very fortunate to work with a great company like FLM because of the high quality of their ball heads and tripods, backed up by an excellent 10-year warranty.
We're thrilled about last year's incredibly successful crowdfunding for the CP26-Travel tripod, and we're still having trouble keeping up with demand; we're in our sixth production run, demand keeps growing, and great reviews keep coming in. We set out to make the best travel tripod in the world, and we accomplished that, but we don't want to rest on our laurels.

A Little Background...
The Berlin 38.4 will be the first tripod to be introduced by FLM Canada/USA. We've also assumed sole responsibility for FLM's crowdfunding program in North America, the aim of which is to introduce new FLM products to the public before they are sold in retail stores.

A New Series - The Berlin
We'll be introducing at least two tripods in the course of the next 8-12 months as part of our new "Berlin" series. The Berlin tripods all share these specs and features:

10-layer carbon fibre tubes
one-piece milled aluminum apex
removable center plate or bowl adapter
allow use of both 75mm and 100mm bowl systems
an extremely high weight-to-load-capacity ratio
one-piece leg shims

The first tripod in this series is the Berlin 38.4, or simply, the 38.4: "38" refers to the largest carbon tube diameter (38mm), and "4" is the number of sections per leg. It promises to be the steadiest, most rock-solid tripod in its class, and one that you can pre-order right now. You have the chance to own this amazing tripod before it arrives in stores, and you can buy it here at up to 31% off the retail price.

The only significant part left to work on is completing the design of the flat plate; the flat plate sits on top of the tripod, supports the ball head, and will have an integrated hook. We're also finalizing details on levelling bowls for both 75mm and 100mm adapters.
The flat plate design modifications, and refinements to the design of the levelling bowls, will be the basis of our progress updates.
What We Need
We're a small company, but we've managed to build a loyal following because of the excellence of our ball heads and tripods, and by having great customers who tell others about FLM. Our success with the CP26-Travel helped us become much better-known, and we hope that the promotion and success of the 38.4 tripod here at Indiegogo will allow us to offer this tripod, and other interesting models, as part of our regular catalogue, not only as a limited-production item.
We need your help to do this: use the tripod, review it, or tell others about it; recommend it, and give us feedback on how good it is, or if it can be better.
We are doing this both to create a buzz around our new tripod, as well as to see if it should be made in larger quantities and become a catalogue mainstay. Our goal of $9500.00 is needed only to start the first production run. Our primary motivation with this crowdfunding is to offer the Berlin 38.4 to as many people as possible, and hope to build enough momentum through word-of-mouth promotion so that it will become a mainstay of our line-up. If successful, this will also give us the freedom in the future to have other tripods designed and built, and thus be able to make a wider variety of tripods than what we currently offer.
Ultimately, this benefits everyone: we'll have an expanded, more interesting line-up of tripods, and you, the customer, will have better and more varied choices when it comes to deciding on a high-quality tripod.


What You Get: Fantastic Tripod, Great Price
The Berlin 38.4 is a lightweight, 10-layer carbon fibre tripod, equally at home in the studio as it is on the street; in a rainstorm or a blizzard; at the South Pole or in the Namibian Desert. The tripod is light enough to carry with you all day, and folds compactly enough to bring with you on long trips. Whereas the CP26-Travel was a great lightweight and strong solution for the specific purpose of travel, the 38.4 should be almost as easy to transport, while being well-suited to very large and heavy cameras, and able to withstand a lot of daily abuse.
The 10 layers of carbon fibre are made from our patented weaving process for maximum strength and minimal weight. Why should that matter? As you'll see below, the 38.4 is capable of carrying loads many times its own weight, at a much higher ratio than any tripod we've previously made. And like our other tripods, the 38.4 is easy to use, unobtrusive, portable, and capable of supporting the heaviest cameras and lenses with ease. Its deceptively simple design means less internal parts, so less things can go wrong, and it's an excellent all-day companion.
We wanted to keep weight and bulk to a minimum, wherever possible, so we've designed an apex that is equally comfortable supporting both a 75mm bowl and a 100mm bowl, and we're offering those accessories here. You'll be able to use your choice of 75mm or 100mm bowl adapters and accessories on one tripod, making the 38.4 a greatly enhanced and versatile tripod.
We expect the retail price for the 38.4 to be $809.00 USD, which, when compared to similarly-sized tripods (i.e., Gitzo Series 4 or RRS TVC-34), is a great price. But we're offering it here for as little as $558.00, and you'll have yours before the tripod hits the stores. 


If you purchase a tripod here, you'll get it; it's that simple. If we fail to meet our $9500 target, all buyers will get their perks, on time, no matter the outcome of the Indiegogo campaign.
If we sell only one tripod, then that one tripod will be delivered on time, as promised. But if enough people buy the tripod here, that will enable us to make the tripod for years to come. Our CP26-Travel tripod, which is still a top-seller one year later, is becoming an industry standard for its class.
But our immediate goal is to get this tripod into as many peoples' hands as is possible through our crowdfunding platform because we know how well a good project attracts good attention.
 
Quality
We will not sacrifice stability or build-quality for flashy, gimmicky features, especially if they do not serve the serious photographer.
We use only the highest-quality materials, superb design, and we offer world-class products that are meant to last for many years under hard use. Our unofficial motto has always been "Buy well, buy once" and we happily stand behind that.
Our 10-year warranty is the best in the business. That means you'll always have spare parts and expert help when it's needed. We get fewer than 1 in 1,000 returns due to manufacturing errors, we've had a proven track record for over 24 years, and our quality-control has always been among the best.

1.3 allen key - for tightening smaller set screw and 1/4" stud screw
one stud screw 1/4" (3/8" stud screw comes attached to flat plate)


We wanted a tripod bag that offers good protection and quick access to gear with a minimum of fuss, and we've sourced just such a carrying bag for the tripod. This conical padded tripod bag has enough room to hold the 38.4 tripod with a CB-58FTR ball head mounted, it's tough enough to last years under hard use, and it's comfortable to carry in the field. There's an adjustable strap for over-the-shoulder use, and the bag can be opened at the top only, if preferred, for quick access to the tripod. There are also carrying handles, and inside the bag is a small zippered pouch for carrying your tripod tool kit.
Now, let's talk bowls. Again.
We offer two accessory kits for your tripod: a bowl adapter with a levelling half-bowl, available in both 75mm and 100mm sizes. The leveling bowl and adapter are sold together and permit the use of a variety of photo and video heads for your tripod.

Once a bowl is attached, you're ready for anything. Ready for still. Ready for video & cinema. Ready for pano. Ready for macro. Ready for large format. Ready for ultra-large format. Ready for anything you want to do.
The levelling bowl does a great job of replacing a ball head in many situations. The levelling bowl gives 20˚ of movement in any direction, more than enough for many applications. It can easily handle 40kg of camera and lens as well, making it a great choice for multi-format shooters. It locks down solid and tight.
The bowl adapters are made from a solid piece of aluminum, CNC-machined to perfection, with holes drilled into them for lighter weight and to reduce friction.


If you opt for a perk that includes a ball head, your ball head will come with the Arca-compatible SRB-60 clamp installed. The SRB-60 clamp has a large tolerance for all widths of Arca-compatible plates, and is considered a universal clamp. Our highly-rated ball heads are solid, strong and don't creep in the slightest, meaning you can always count on them for critical work. Use the ball head and bowl together for maximum versatility and endless possibilities of precision positioning.
The bowl adapters, levelling bowls, ball heads and clamps, are also under warranty for 10 years.

FLM CB-48FTR ball head with SRB-60 clamp

 
Challenges
We've already eliminated many of the risks to you, the customer. We're finalizing the details for the flat plate assembly and levelling bowls, but otherwise, small-scale production of the Berlin 38.4 is ready to begin.

Support
If you have any questions of any kind related to the Berlin 38.4, please write us anytime. We answer emails pretty quickly, even if we're on the road.
Refunds
If you're not 100% satisfied with the Berlin 38.4, simply notify us and return it for a full refund within 14 days of receiving it. If you're not sure that you'll keep it, we ask that you try to keep it as new-looking as possible until you've decided. That's it.
Shipping the Perks
Orders will ship from Canada to any Paypal-verified US or Canada address. There is no duty to pay if you are in the US. But if it happens, let us know, and we'll re-imburse your Duty fees.
Shipping is extra and depending on the perk chosen, ranges from $24 to $34. Canadian and US customers pay the same shipping fees. We've arranged for special reduced shipping rates for North America using Purolator/UPS. All shipments will be by courier and will require a signature.
Contact me by email if you have any special requests, be it for shipping or for other FLM items not listed here. I'll make sure you get it.
Delivery Date
We estimate the delivery date to be roughly 8-10 weeks after the Indiegogo campaign ends, which takes us to late January/early February. But this is usually an extremely busy time for shipping companies and many supplier delays tend to occur around this time. The post-Xmas shipping season is very busy and causes unforeseen delays. It happened to us last year, which was the cause of one significant delay in shipping the CP26-Travel.
For this reason, I'm going to set a shipping date of February 15. This means that the tripods will ship from Canada to our supporters no later than February 15. 
If it can be done earlier, I'll certainly make it happen, but given the time of year and based on past experience, I'd like to have a little wiggle room. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help
You can help us promote our crowdfunding appeal, and help make the 38.4 the new star of the FLM line-up. If you don't want to buy a tripod, you can:

Tell others about our tripod campaign
Use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of the page and help us spread the word


We appreciate every effort, big or small, that you can make; we know that we can't do this alone, and we're very grateful for any plug, recommendation, review, share, like, and thumbs-up you can give us.
Thank you very much!
-------------------------------
Comments about our previous Indiegogo project, the CP26-Travel tripod:
"The FLM CP 26 travel tripod I received today is a high quality precision product with absolutely beautiful fit and finish. Many thanks !" - Paul L., Indiegogo supporter
"If you want to enjoy the multiple benefits of using a tripod in any photographic situation, there’s no excuse not to have the FLM CP-26 with you all the time." - Robert Rodriguez, Jr., photographer, teacher, reviewer
"The quality is really excellent! If someone had told me, I had never believed, that a tripod with 4 extractable leg-sections can be so stiff and stable!" - Oliver W., Indiegogo supporter
"Just by unpacking and holding the tripod, I could immediately see the high levels of quality and precision which went into its design and manufacture." - Dennis W., Indiegogo supporter
"Congratulations on producing such an outstanding product. Frankly, it is so sturdy that I am not sure why I would want to travel with my original FLM which is so outstanding unto itself." - Jeffrey B., Indiegogo supporter
 
Some online reviews of the CP26-Travel tripod:

 

 


 

More reviews and information about the CP26-Travel Indiegogo campaign
 
FAQs:
1. Can I use my Gitzo/Manfrotto/Induro/RRS, etc. accessories on the Berlin 38.4? The short answer is "Yes, but...". Here's the long answer: while we've tested the Berlin with some other brand's accessories, we have not done exhaustive tests to make sure all brands conform to the same shape and size for the apex. The Berlin 38.4 has an inner apex diameter of 84.9mm (85mm), so please make sure that if you already own, for example, a Gitzo center post from Series 4 or 5, that its plate will fit the Berlin's apex.
2. Why can't you ship to me in Europe/Asia/Australia? This campaign is a US/Canada initiative, Europe and Asia-Pacific are not our distribution territories. In the near future, this tripod may be available in other territories as well. As Canada/US distributors, we cannot sell FLM gear outside of North America.
3. Who can buy the tripod? Anyone can buy the tripod, but we need either a US or Canada shipping address, verified through Paypal or through your credit card.
4. Why is this only an FLM Canada/USA project? In order to gauge whether the Berlin 38.4 will become a regular catalogue item, we will test it in North America first. Based on Indiegogo interest, peer and user reviews, we will either continue making it, or produce for existing orders, then only make a small run once a year of about 3-5 tripods. FLM Germany are not involved at this stage.
5. Do you offer the same warranty as before? Absolutely, yes. We offer FLM's standard 10-year warranty. Parts and repair are in Canada, same as always.
6. What is your refund/return policy? If you aren't 100% impressed by the 38.4, contact us and send back your tripod for a full refund. We'll give you 15 days from the date of delivery to decide. All we ask is that if you're not sure about the tripod, please try to keep it looking new and scratch-free.
7. What if I have a problem with my new tripod? Call or write us; if needed, we'll ask that you send us the problem part, or the whole tripod. We'll take care of the problem within 48 hours. If it can't be repaired quickly, we'll issue you a new tripod.
8. Do you have a US address for sending repairs? Yes, but response time will be slower. Contact us ahead of time and we'll send you the US shipping address.
9. Are replacement parts going to be made available? Not for general sale at stores, but replacement parts can be ordered from FLM Canada, and they're free if it's the result of a manufacturing flaw.
10. Can I ask you any question, anytime, about the Berlin 38.4 tripod or other FLM gear? Yes, absolutely!

story:
Vision

The best camera is the one you have with you.

I’m Marc Serota, and I’m the founder of Polaroid University. I’ve been a pro photographer for 30 years, covering the raw, awesome power of nature, the history of our world, and the triumph and agony of sports. I earned my fair share of awards and recognition, but I really like teaching about photography.

In the next year, millions of photos will be taken on smartphones. I started Polaroid University to teach people how to make great photos and videos on their smartphones and tablets. The smartphone is the most popular type of consumer camera, in the hands of billions of photographers. So, to reach the greatest number of photographers, I chose to focus on the smartphone. Here's what we offer our members:

  • Learn smartphone photography from pro photographers
  • Digital download access code or a physical gift box
  • Video lessons are organized for learning in a logical order

Brand Power

My partners and I teamed up with Polaroid, the iconic brand that has a long history and is universally recognized in the field of photography and known for innovation. The fit was a natural for our vision, and so we executed an exclusive licensing agreement for the use of the Polaroid brand.

Why not learn to be a great photographer with your smartphone? We want to teach smartphone owners how to use their camera and to see through the lens like photographers. By participating with us, you can help us achieve this in a couple ways. Your backing allows us continue to produce fresh, topical content. The other benefit is for you: get a membership which includes a access to all our content (over 40 episodes)! Will you end up being a better smartphone photographer?

A Review from NYT ★★★★★

The New York Times recently (11/30/2016) reviewed our iOS app and they said:

"This app starts with photography basics like how to compose a good shot. It also has videos on how to achieve more complicated goals, like slow-motion video or low-light photography. The videos are professional, friendly and interesting." *

* http://www.nytimes.com/2016/11/30/technology/personaltech/take-your-smartphone-photography-to-the-next-level.html?_r=1

That's great, what now?

  • Contribute to our campaign, perks starting at $10
  • Tag us: #PolaroidU #PolaroidUniversity
  • Join our Contest: polaroiduniversity.com/win
  • Buy on Amazon: amzn.to/2gihms2
  • Give as a Gift: polaroiduniversity.com/gift
  • Download our free iPhone and iPad App: apple.co/2es9WBX
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to let others who might be interested our campaign know about Polaroid University

Use of Funds

Our goal to raise $15,000. Whether or not we achieve our goal, after we pay our expenses (production, shipping, etc.), the net proceeds will go back into the business.

1. We will make more episodes

Specifically, we will re-invest in producing new “On the Road” episodes, which is a destination-focused series of episodes in which we travel to iconic places around the globe, shoot some great photography, and also meet some of the people that make those places special. It’s like Anthony Bourdain with a camera. We plan for the “On the Road” episodes to be about 7-10 minutes long, and we will be able to produce up to 10 episodes for $10,000.

2. We will make an Android app

The other $5,000 will be devoted to developing, testing, and some marketing for our Android app. We’ve already developed an iOS app that has been rapidly evolving, and now has the ability to add, extend, and upgrade memberships, and supports purchasing individual episodes. We’ll produce an Android app that is feature-comparable (as much as possible) with the iOS app. We’ll test it, and launch it on Google Play.

What We Need & What You Get

All of our backers (e.g., Trial Membership and above) get full access to all of our episodes. They are videos that take you from the very basics like composition and lighting and take you all the way to pro-level topics like digital rights and business management.

Our premium perk is a Lifetime Membership to Polaroid University. This membership never expires and entitles the member to unlimited access to all Polaroid University episodes forever.

With the Annual Members Digital perk, you get a full year of unlimited access, plus any new episodes we release over the next year. Our plans call for over 100 episodes by this time next year, so this is the best way to get stay up-to-date with all of our latest content.

Opt for the Annual Membership Box perk, and get a real-life physical product in meatspace. It’s the coolest retro experience to wait for a package in the snailmail and physically scratch off a Membership card. It’s like a lottery ticket that you’re guaranteed to win!

Choose a Crew Member T-Shirt perk, and sneak on to the set of a Polaroid University production with our authentic crew member t-shirt. 100% cotton, with a contrasting monochromatic logo, featuring the iconic Polaroid Pixel. Your choice of color and size. So far, only crew and cast have these, so they're pretty rare in the wild.

Why not go for a Dry-Fit Jersey perk? Synthetic dry-fit material is favored by pro photographers everywhere comfort, breathability, and protection from sun and wind is important. Our version includes bold Polaroid University graphics, including the iconic Polaroid pixel.

Our on-camera talent, photo pros, and guests wear the Instructor Polo, which made from dry-fit material and features an embroidered Polaroid University logo.

Fans can select the Annual Membership + Crew Shirt perk to get a Crew Member T-Shirt and a premium membership, the Annual Membership + Dry-Fit Jersey, or the Annual Membership +  Instructor Polo.

The Product

  • Learn smartphone photography from pro photographers
  • Digital download access code or a physical gift box
  • Video lessons are organized for learning in a logical order

We’ve got over 3.5 hours of professional-led, professionally-produced video instruction that is geared toward smartphone photographers, but is based on proper photographic principles like composition and lighting. Over the past year, we’ve completed our initial rounds of production, resulting in 40 episodes in our shipping our product today, and as we add more episodes, members get access to those as well.

With virtually no paid marketing, hundreds of people have already purchased an Annual Membership at Polaroid University. The primary source of these new members is the website, but since introducing the iOS app a couple of months ago, we’ve seen a great conversion rate among our iOS-using members.

We’ve been focused on getting our video production process to be as cost-effective as possible, including concept, scriptwriting, filming, post production, and distribution. We offer entertaining photography instruction at a higher quality than most other paid online courses.

The main way people watch our paid content is on our website, https://polaroiduniversity.com. Some watch episodes on their iOS devices, which uses the same membership database, so Members’ episodes are simultaneously available on all platforms. It will be that way for the Android app too.

Our members are mostly from the US, but we’ve been successful internationally as well, particularly in English-speaking countries, but also in Spanish-speaking countries and in Europe where the Polaroid brand is especially well regarded. Some of these members joined at the very beginning, when the number of episodes was just a fraction of what it is now. It is also notable that not one of our paid members has requested a refund or even contacted us with any complaint about the quality or content of the episodes.

Product Status: SHIPPING!

To support our efforts in the retail space, we’ve produced 15 thousand retail boxes, which are in our warehouse, ready to ship. Those boxes include a membership card with a unique scratch-off code that can be activated on our website or through the Polaroid University iPhone app (Android app is coming soon).

It is these boxes that we will offer as part of several of our perks in they campaign, and all non-apparel (e.g., box-only) perks will ship within days of the end of this campaign.

The t-shirts, jerseys, and polos are sourced from our US suppliers, and will be shipped as soon as possible, but no more than a month after the end of the campaign. We’ve worked with all of our apparel suppliers before on multiple projects, and we’ve worked with these suppliers in the past to produce these same t-shirts, jerseys, and polos.

Say What? Selling digital downloads in Retail?

We’re pursuing a slightly unusual retail strategy, especially for an online company producing digital content: we’ve produced a retail product. Our retail product is an Annual Membership in box. The box includes a heavy-stock card that has a scratch-off that reveals a unique membership id and membership code. Memberships can be activated on the website or in the iOS app.

We’re actively exploring relationships with several nationwide US retailers, and our strategy calls for us to be in national (US) retail by the second quarter of 2017.

We’ve also begun selling Polaroid University Annual Memberships on Amazon and we’ve implemented an automatic fulfillment system for digital memberships using the Amazon API. Currently, we’re working to achieve the Buy Box, which becomes available once Amazon detects a level of interest in the product. Our plans for 2017 include getting the Buy Box on our Amazon product page, and eventually to enter the Fulfilled By Amazon (FBA) program.

Risks & Challenges

There’s little risk if you’re happy with getting a full program that teaches you smartphone photography and shows you how to apply that knowledge in real world situations. We’ve produced that, and hundreds of people are enjoying their Polaroid University episodes today. We have the physical product in our warehouse, and we’re poised to ship to our backers as soon as this campaign ends.

OK, there's some risk...

Our backers face a slight risk that we will not be able to produce the sixty episodes we planned for 2017. There are various reasons why we might not reach this goal, but the primary one is that we do not obtain the additional funding we need to meet our production goals. Right now, we’re planning on getting some of that funding from our retail and online sales. Additionally, some funding will come from debt we may issue, and some may come from an equity-based capital raise.

If we do not reach our goal for this campaign, we risk not being able to produce the number of “On the Road” episodes we planned, and we might not be able to devote the funds needed to build, test and market the Android app.

As far as the core knowledge, skills, and abilities required for success, our team has already proven that we can execute our core business (i.e. make and distribute videos). Over the next year, we will continue executing our core business, and expand our library of episodes, which will drive both physical/retail and digital sales.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Tag us: #PolaroidU #PolaroidUniversity.
  • Join our Contest: polaroiduniversity.com/win
  • Buy on Amazon: amzn.to/2gihms2
  • Give as a Gift: polaroiduniversity.com/gift
  • Download our free iPhone and iPad App: apple.co/2es9WBX
  • We’ve got free videos on YouTube, take a look. If you like them, subscribe to our YouTube channel, since we often post samples there when we release a new episode.
  • We also have a presence of Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter. We often post announcements, offers, as well as pro tips and examples of interesting smartphone photography. Please check us out on social— let’s connect!
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools to let others who might be interested our campaign know about Polaroid University.
