story:
The all-new TTcam provides a smooth, continuous system of unique removable modules allowing the camera to be used in virtually any conditions and under any circumstances:

Whether you’re shooting a fast action sports game - or capturing perfect images and footage for security surveillance at home or at work, this unique system gives you the results you want.

The camera also has infinite settings to allow variable viewing angles to suite all circumstance in a range of 360°-180°-90° 

 

 

 

With High-quality image stabilization, 60 fps, 4K resolution, simultaneous recording function from all lenses, and unique preset settings - breathtaking shooting, regardless of the operator’s skills, is guaranteed.

We understand how important it is for you to meet the challenge of creating great video and perfect still images that will bring pleasure time after time.

 

The camera control is intuitive.

 

 

The TTcam’s design is based on a pyramid of equilateral triangles (tetrahedron) with three 180° lenses capable of capturing 360° horizontally and nearly 320° vertically. It also has an additional (optional) modular assembly providing circular panoramic view of 360° x 360°.

Simple modular construction makes the camera easy to use and maintain.

The camera enclosure is made of shockproof plastic material with colour-matched components of black and white.

Around the perimeter of camera there is an RGB-LED backlight (red-green-blue indication) changing frequency and colour depending on operational status of the device.

 

Below you will find the TTcam’s key technical features, which distinguish it from ordinary cameras:​

 

 

 

Our specially designed TTcam software is able to perform a great number of tasks.

Images from the TTcam can be displayed on screen in separate windows as well as being immediately integrated into one picture allowing you to create panoramic view in online mode.

The control of camera parameters is also performed through the program. You can move a panoramic view by using a computer mouse, directional keys on keyboard or a touch screen.

      The software compatibility with iOS, Windows OS and Android platforms make it easy to use with tablet PC or smart phone.

The standard version of the TTcam program contains the necessary number of image and control settings. Extended versions of the program have wider functionality for professional use.

Multiplex mode

product development

The program is simple and easy to use. It allows users to switch the camera over several preset modes by categories, automatically setting it to a required operational mode including: Automobile, Security, Sport, and Creative Activity etc.

Supported languages include: English, German and Russian (other languages pending).

TTcam has the capability of allowing the use of existing simple to understand standard free operations, plus paid, and conditionally paid, compatible programs for creating, editing, processing and viewing photo and video panoramas.

For example: Kolor Autopano, PTGui Pro, Panoweaver, krpano and others.

 

 

 

Attention! Not all devices support a maximum video format.

Test 1:

Test 2:

(The quality of stitching and other aspects will be improved)

 

The camera’s scope of application is almost unlimited.

For specific condition use, additional modules are available to facilitate the following:

EVERYTHING that you can imagine, TTcam is ready to perform and is fully adaptable for just about any purpose.

 

 

 

you should support us?

Our unique device, we hope, will be extremely useful supplement improving quality of your every-day life and leisure time. The device is to facilitate the solving of many routine and business tasks. This multifunctional device waits when you get it. Your help and your support are quite essential for our camera to come true! In our turn we guarantee the fulfillment of all our obligations, high quality product in scheduled time.

For your help we guarantee:

- Functional capabilities of our product will surpass all your expectations.

- To fulfill obligations to everyone who will provide financial aid!

- Not to be satisfied with what will be achieved and continue the improvement of the product.

- Timely to inform you of every changes in the project.

- Every participant will reliably receive technical and informational support!

 

 

What makes our camera fundamentally distinct from all the others ?
Major distinguishing features of TTcam are: 
•    Ergonomic, pyramidal design providing stability even on rough or uneven surfaces.
•    Flexibility due to its adaptive modules for use in a multitude of conditions for just about any purpose. 
•    Shooting at any viewing angle 360°-270°-180°-90° and technical properties robust enough to withstand mechanical damage. 
•    Full function capability though the use of cost effective modules. You only buy what you need. No unnecessary parts required. 
•    Although each lens is not able to shoot in 4K format, we consider that an amateur camera doesn’t need this. If included it would have an impact of the price. 
•    With all cameras working together a 4K image is achieved. But if each camera separately made an image of that format it would be very heavy to transfer all data online or to upload to the cloud through LTE module. Along with that, saving the data on a flash drive would take large amounts of memory.


Why each lens of the camera is not able to shoot in 4K format ?
We consider that an amateur camera doesn’t need this. This would lead to unreasonable increase of price. All the cameras together make 4K image. But if each camera separately made an image of that format it would be very heavy to transfer all data online or to upload them in cloud storage through LTE module. Along with that, saving the data on a flash drive would take large amounts of memory.


What is the impact of a sudden power outage on the camera ?
If, for example, the camera works for video surveillance and is permanently connected through a power-line - in the event of a complete power outage the camera continues functioning for about 1,5 hours maintaining security.
How can I order TTcam and additional modules and where can it be delivered ?
You can order the camera and/or one of the additional modules in one of three colours. Check the website at the “PRODUCT” section. 
The delivery can be made to any point of the world that you indicate.


Do I pay for delivery ?
No, delivery is part of our service. Another unique element to buying the new TTcam.


What are the aims, objectives and prospects of TTcam ?
Since the invention of cinematography only the quality of the image has changed… but now it’s time to move away from “tunnel-frame” viewing that’s actually unnatural for humans - and switch to a new level of optical perception. 
With the development of internet-based technologies a true breakthrough is not far off. We, and our like-minded people want to be in leading positions… we know what we need and to what we want. 
We decided to make a 360 camera better than anything on the market, so we set to work to push the technology to make the best. 
The shortcomings of previous cameras have been taken into consideration. 
TTcam is not one more expensive toy or the next needless gadget! We’ve created a comparatively inexpensive, robust, multi-function modular 360 camera. 
To get a glimpse of the future, we’re creating a whole new sector of software and technological products. We are constantly developing and adjusting TTcam to improve and enhance all possible VR services. As we find solutions we’ll create the products.


What kind of photos can I make with my TTcam ?
In photo mode the camera is able to make both ordinary high-quality and panoramic photos, which can be printed onto photo regular paper if you wish. 
Also you can stop the video footage at any frame (locked picture) and save it as a photo, rather like a screen shot


Is TTcam waterproof ?
The camera itself is deliberately not a waterproof device to avoid overheating in normal use. For use in water, we’ve created separate special waterproof protective cases made of strong plastic. 


How long can I shoot on a full charge of TTcam battery ?
Battery life depends on the mode chosen for video shooting. The average batter time on continuous use, on one full charge, is 1,5-2,5 hours.


Is it possible to return the product after purchase ?
If you find any of the features of TTcam unsuited (colour, size, weight, assemblage and other) we are ready to provide a full refund within 14 days after receipt as long as TTcam is returned in original condition with original packaging intact.


Can I choose the colour of my TTcam ?
You may choose from 2 colours: White or Black.


I’m a member of the media/press, how can I reach the TTcam team ?
For media inquiries please use the ‘Contact Us’ form on the website. For Press photos and logos, please send your request by e-mail.


Where is TTcam made ?
The TTcam is engineered in Russia. We have several industrial partners located in Asia, and have also identified several manufacturing partners in Europe and Canada who are capable of assembling the TTcam for us. However, at this stage, the final decision has not been made.


Can I purchase several cameras in bulk ?
We have a pre-order web page on our site. If your request is urgent, please do not hesitate to contact us at Tripletcam.com


What is your warranty ?
We offer 1 year warranty on TTcam.

________________________________________________________________________________________

"Although we have elaborately designed every block and every component, we reserve the right to introduce modifications to make the final product better. Hope for your active participation."
story_txt:
The all-new TTcam provides a smooth, continuous system of unique removable modules allowing the camera to be used in virtually any conditions and under any circumstances:
Whether you’re shooting a fast action sports game - or capturing perfect images and footage for security surveillance at home or at work, this unique system gives you the results you want.
The camera also has infinite settings to allow variable viewing angles to suite all circumstance in a range of 360°-180°-90° 
 



 

 

With High-quality image stabilization, 60 fps, 4K resolution, simultaneous recording function from all lenses, and unique preset settings - breathtaking shooting, regardless of the operator’s skills, is guaranteed.
We understand how important it is for you to meet the challenge of creating great video and perfect still images that will bring pleasure time after time.
 

The camera control is intuitive.  

 


 

The TTcam’s design is based on a pyramid of equilateral triangles (tetrahedron) with three 180° lenses capable of capturing 360° horizontally and nearly 320° vertically. It also has an additional (optional) modular assembly providing circular panoramic view of 360° x 360°.

Simple modular construction makes the camera easy to use and maintain.
The camera enclosure is made of shockproof plastic material with colour-matched components of black and white.
Around the perimeter of camera there is an RGB-LED backlight (red-green-blue indication) changing frequency and colour depending on operational status of the device.

story:
My name is Matthew Dudley. I'm 39yrs old from a suburb of Detroit Mi. I am a husband, a father to 3 boys, and most importantly a United States Marine Corps Veteran. My former Marine Corps roommate (Mike Lose) had a great idea and decided to share it with me and we’ll get to that in a minute. Mike and I have been discharged from active duty for about 16yrs. Which essentially means we haven't seen our brothers face to face since the day we were discharged. One of the things that make veterans special is that it doesn't matter the amount of time spent apart, when we reconnect it's as if we haven't missed a day. I know this because of the times that I have spoken with a few guys over the phone and ended up talking for well over an hour without missing a beat!
    Now to Mikes idea, it is to get in the car and drive across the country hitting as many cities and towns that we can where people that we served with live. The objective of this trip is to not only see as many people as possible but to also not sleep in a hotel. With this trip not being a vacation but more like a marathon, it means there will be many miles covered. There will be some guys that we will just stop in and have lunch with in which they will be paying for since we drove all this way. Then it’s back on the road to get to where we will be sleeping for the night. While at the house that we sleep at, this guy will provide our dinner meal for us. We aren't looking for handouts, we are just letting our brothers take care of us along the way. I know both Mike and I would do the same if someone came through our hometowns. Thats just what Marines do…. we take care of each other.
    Once Mike introduced this idea to me my production mindset kicked in and I couldn't help but think about how I could document this trip and produce a very cool short documentary or even a short series. It’s right up my alley since that’s what I do for a living. I have worked in Television for about 15 years as well as serve as a director of photography for a full video production company that I own with a friend. While serving in the Marines I bought my first camera and I would always have it in hand and recording at all times. So it will only make sense to these guys when they see us pulling up and I have a camera in my hand getting the shot! I plan on mounting my 4 Go Pro’s inside and sometimes outside of the car for some driving footage. Mike has also been informed by myself that there will be times that I will need to fly my drone along our path while we drive. It will be important to see us driving along the road or seeing any big city that we may be entering as well as seeing that we may just be in the middle of nowhere.          With all of this production in mind I decided to create a Facebook page which we have just over 200 likes at this point. The page can be shared with as many people as possible and they can follow us along our journey. I will be editing short videos to post daily and update people so that they can almost keep up with us in realtime.     This is a story of bringing veterans together that haven't seen each other in 16 years. That in itself is a big deal. What rounds everything out is upon the completion of our trip I will only have a few days before I make my way down to Parris Island SC. to watch my oldest son walk across the parade deck and graduate from Marine Corps Bootcamp. This will bring my trip full circle and round out nicely for the completion of everything. It will also be 20yrs to almost the exact day that I was there graduating. It wasn’t planned that way at all but he will graduate on February 10th 2017 and I graduated on February 7th. 1997.     What we are trying to do is get some  funding/backing to take this trip to the next level. The big picture of OPERATION RECONNECT is to make this a series so that other veterans can apply to be on the show and take their own journey across the country and see their buddies. With every different group there will be different guys, cities and stories. There will also be veterans of different branches of the military being featured from show to show.  Right now our trip is only 8 days and about half way through the country. If the funding goes above what we are asking then we would be able to make the addition of another 7 days and we would be able to make if from coast to coast. Also stopping in on about 8 to 10 more guys. What I can guarantee is that you would be helping to reconnect veterans. This is going to be an epic trip one way or another. I just thought it would be great if we were able to get some support to help take this idea and make it something bigger than what we initially thought it to be.
    Thank you for taking the time to read over the document. This will be an exciting trip and one for the ages!
Thank you
#HelpReconnectVets
Sincerely, Matthew Dudley & Mike Lose

story:
Our mission was simple; create a mount that could keep up with today's cameras and the active lifestyle that comes with them.

With our focus on versatility through simplicity,  we looked toward engineering trusted in extreme situations when all else fails. Through the use of high performance backcountry utility straps we've created the single most versatile, yet reliable camera mount on the market.

 

 

 

THE IMPACT

We have spent the last 9 months fine-tuning and perfecting this vision. Now, we need your help to finally bring it to market. Your contribution will not only help us fund commercial quality production, it will give us an opportunity to get reviews from a core group of supporters. Your feedback is essential to the success of the Sognar Strap, as it is our mission to provide the highest quality products possible.

RISKS & CHALLENGES

To meet our specific needs and high quality standards, we hand craft each individual fastener for each strap.  Right now, crafting them by hand is our best option but in order to produce higher quantities we need to move to a machine made fastener. Campaign funds will go straight to funding the high upfront costs of doing this right.

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Hey, times can be tight and money just isn't a plentiful resource for most. We can absolutely relate. Just help us get the word out there. Share us on your social media feeds or tell people the old fashioned way!  We love when people are as excited about our projects as we are :)

story:
Lensta Kit:  A set of Camera Gear for iPhone. Wear Your Everyday Camera!
 

 

Lensta helps you capture amazing photos with three Professional-Level lenses:

Wide Angle

Capture more per frame, whether it's the perfect selfie or a breathtaking landscape.

Fisheye

Master artistic flair with perfectly round, panoramic photos.

Macro

Bring even the most minute of objects into crisp focus.


Lensta is a full iPhone photography kit complete with fashionable straps which you can wear around your neck and hand, to carry and protect your phone, and stabilize photo taking

 

Turn your iPhone into a Professional Camera with Lensta

 

 

Comparison Photos


iPhone                                                                      iPhone + Lensta Macro
iPhone                                                                     iPhone + Lensta Fisheye

iPhone                                                                     iPhone + Lensta Wide Angle

 

Photos by Lensta


iPhone with Fisheye Lensta

iPhone with Macro Lensta
 
iPhone with Wide Angle Lensta
 
iPhone with Wide Angle Lensta

 

Perks

 

Easy to Mount

Each Lensta can be mounted on your iPhone in less than two seconds using our special mounting technique, which is a leather iPhone camera case which allows for easy and fast screwing of the lenses on the iPhone.

Once Lensta's special and fashionable iPhone camera case is mounted on your iPhone, you can easily screw any Lensta lens you want on your iPhone and start using it in two seconds.

 

Lensta Kit Package

This is our proposed Lensta iPhone Kit package, which offers our three new lenses, with a strap, holster leather bag, and an iPhone leather camera case in navy, black or brown. Choose your favorite color:

 

Technology and Development

Building hardware is pretty hard, but our team has been working with Lensta for almost two years now, and have successfully finished one full cycle of manufacturing for Lensta Wide Angle already. This means that our suppliers and manufacturers are already lined up in Shenzhen, China, and have started working on producing Lensta Kit.

Lensta lenses are composed of professional camera lens glass, which is altered according to a very accurate formula to suit the iPhone camera and size.

 

FAQs

- How is Lensta Kit different from your first Lensta campaign?

Lensta's first campaign offered a Wide Angle Lensta only, along with its accessories. We developed two new lenses with different capabilities (Fisheye and Macro Lenstas), and also upgraded the product to a full lifestyle kit with different leather camera cases, leather bags and straps. Lensta Kit is an integrated kit which has all you need to get started on taking brilliant photos.

- Which Phones is Lensta compatible with?

Our Lensta Kit is compatible with iPhones, as we are offering a supplementary iPhone leather camera case with each kit. We will send you a form to choose your iPhone model after the campaign. 

- Why will it take you until December to ship?

We already started production. And since we already successfully manufactured Lensta Wide Angle before, we are confident that Lensta Kit manufacturing will be faster and easier. However, producing high quality lenses is a long process, because each lens glass has to be positioned accurately in place to guarantee achieving the right measures according to the formula we developed. After this is done, we need to test all lenses to make sure they are accurately prepared and ready for use. 

- Were all the photos in the campaign taken by Lensta?

All the sample photos were indeed taken by Lensta using an iPhone 7. All the comparison photos that show how the photo looks like without Lensta were taken by the original iPhone 7 camera lens. We gave away some samples to great Instagramers who tested the lenses, took great photos, and came back to us with these photos you see on the campaign.

- How do I upgrade my order from the first Lensta campaign?

If you have already ordered Lensta Wide Angle from our previous campaign, and you don't want to get the full kit which includes another Wide Angle Lensta along with the new elements, you can order our Lensta Dual Kit, which allows you to choose only two lenses of our new collection, and also still have all the other Kit's leather gear. In this case, you can choose to have the Fisheye Lensta, and the Macro Lensta.

 

Previous Development (First Campaign)

Lensta iPhone Kit is Lensta's second campaign on Indiegogo, and it is a follow up campaign to our first Indiegogo campaign: Lensta Wide Angle Lens: igg.me/at/lensta which marked our breakthrough into the market of camera lenses. Our valuable backers from the first campaign helps us to reach where we are today. They supported us through our first campaign, and all through manufacturing, up until shipping and fulfilment. 

We were able to successfully manufacture the first version of Lensta's first ever phone lenses, and now it is time for a new challenge with Lensta Kit
story_txt:
Lensta Kit:  A set of Camera Gear for iPhone. Wear Your Everyday Camera!  Lensta helps you capture amazing photos with three Professional-Level lenses:Wide AngleCapture more per frame, whether it's the perfect selfie or a breathtaking landscape.FisheyeMaster artistic flair with perfectly round, panoramic photos.MacroBring even the most minute of objects into crisp focus.Lensta is a full iPhone photography kit complete with fashionable straps which you can wear around your neck and hand, to carry and protect your phone, and stabilize photo taking Turn your iPhone into a Professional Camera with Lensta  Comparison PhotosiPhone                                                                      iPhone + Lensta MacroiPhone                                                                     iPhone + Lensta FisheyeiPhone                                                                     iPhone + Lensta Wide Angle Photos by LenstaiPhone with Fisheye LenstaiPhone with Macro Lensta iPhone with Wide Angle Lensta iPhone with Wide Angle Lensta
 
Perks



 
Easy to MountEach Lensta can be mounted on your iPhone in less than two seconds using our special mounting technique, which is a leather iPhone camera case which allows for easy and fast screwing of the lenses on the iPhone. Once Lensta's special and fashionable iPhone camera case is mounted on your iPhone, you can easily screw any Lensta lens you want on your iPhone and start using it in two seconds. Lensta Kit PackageThis is our proposed Lensta iPhone Kit package, which offers our three new lenses, with a strap, holster leather bag, and an iPhone leather camera case in navy, black or brown. Choose your favorite color: Technology and DevelopmentBuilding hardware is pretty hard, but our team has been working with Lensta for almost two years now, and have successfully finished one full cycle of manufacturing for Lensta Wide Angle already. This means that our suppliers and manufacturers are already lined up in Shenzhen, China, and have started working on producing Lensta Kit.Lensta lenses are composed of professional camera lens glass, which is altered according to a very accurate formula to suit the iPhone camera and size. FAQs- How is Lensta Kit different from your first Lensta campaign?Lensta's first campaign offered a Wide Angle Lensta only, along with its accessories. We developed two new lenses with different capabilities (Fisheye and Macro Lenstas), and also upgraded the product to a full lifestyle kit with different leather camera cases, leather bags and straps. Lensta Kit is an integrated kit which has all you need to get started on taking brilliant photos.- Which Phones is Lensta compatible with?Our Lensta Kit is compatible with iPhones, as we are offering a supplementary iPhone leather camera case with each kit. We will send you a form to choose your iPhone model after the campaign. - Why will it take you until December to ship?We already started production. And since we already successfully manufactured Lensta Wide Angle before, we are confident that Lensta Kit manufacturing will be faster and easier. However, producing high quality lenses is a long process, because each lens glass has to be positioned accurately in place to guarantee achieving the right measures according to the formula we developed. After this is done, we need to test all lenses to make sure they are accurately prepared and ready for use. - Were all the photos in the campaign taken by Lensta?All the sample photos were indeed taken by Lensta using an iPhone 7. All the comparison photos that show how the photo looks like without Lensta were taken by the original iPhone 7 camera lens. We gave away some samples to great Instagramers who tested the lenses, took great photos, and came back to us with these photos you see on the campaign.- How do I upgrade my order from the first Lensta campaign?If you have already ordered Lensta Wide Angle from our previous campaign, and you don't want to get the full kit which includes another Wide Angle Lensta along with the new elements, you can order our Lensta Dual Kit, which allows you to choose only two lenses of our new collection, and also still have all the other Kit's leather gear. In this case, you can choose to have the Fisheye Lensta, and the Macro Lensta. Previous Development (First Campaign)Lensta iPhone Kit is Lensta's second campaign on Indiegogo, and it is a follow up campaign to our first Indiegogo campaign: Lensta Wide Angle Lens: igg.me/at/lensta which marked our breakthrough into the market of camera lenses. Our valuable backers from the first campaign helps us to reach where we are today. They supported us through our first campaign, and all through manufacturing, up until shipping and fulfilment. We were able to successfully manufacture the first version of Lensta's first ever phone lenses, and now it is time for a new challenge with Lensta Kit

story:
MEET KAPCHR

KAPCHR unlocks the power of a DSLR as a webcam for live video and audio streaming.

Designed for use with a DSLR, KAPCHR's simple plug and play functionality easily works with a Mac, PC or Linux computer. KAPCHR works with all the apps that use with an internal webcam. It is the most compact solution of its kind to feature an auxiliary audio input as well as an HDMI video input port. KAPCHR gets all the power it needs from a USB port, using the highest quality in components for real-time performance and stays cool during extended use.

EVERYTHING YOU NEED

KAPCHR gives you all the ports you need to start streaming live, broadcast quality video directly from a DSLR and comes with an extra audio port for synchronized audio capture. KAPCHR connects to a USB equipped Mac or PC running Windows 7 (or later), MacOS 10.7 (or later) and Linux 4.0 or later.

 

Combine Audio and Video into a Single Stream

KAPCHR lets you combine an additional audio source such as a mixer with multiple inputs with audio and video from your DSLR. Ideal for adding live music production to your video stream.

 

Go Live with DSLR Quality

Use KAPCHR to stream live content recorded by a DSLR directly to
Youtube, Facebook, Periscope and many other platforms.

ENGINEERED WITH COMPONENTS

We've designed KAPCHR with some of the best chipsets found in professional, digital broadcasting equipment for reliable, long-term performance.

 

WORKS WITH MAC, WINDOWS & LINUX

We've made KAPCHR compatible with many of today's popular operating systems. It doesn't require a fast computer to work and gets its best performance from a USB 3.0 port

PLUG & PLAY SIMPLICITY

We designed KAPCHR to be as simple to use as possible. Just plug it into a USB 3.0 port and it's ready to go! No drivers, special software or complicated set-up required.

KAPCHR is small and lightweight– yet made with a metal enclosure for maximum
durability and mobility.

WORKS WITH ALL DSLR/DSLM CAMERAS (with HDMI)

KAPCHR works with many of today's popular DSLR/DSLM cameras that feature HDMI output. You can also use KAPCHR with any video cameras, video game consoles or any device with an HDMI output port.


 

What We Need 

We have perfected the design and even completed the prototype, so we are asking your support in raising $10,000 so that we can begin production and meet our production minimum.

 

The Impact

Today, live video content is becoming a stronger driving force in the online content we digest - and creators are taking notice.  KAPCHR will let live video producers go beyond the built-in webcam to give their audience broadcast level, professional video and audio.  KAPCHR gives DSLR owners the control they are used to for real-time, online video and audio streaming!

Risks & Challenges

The obstacle we face on the way to achieving our goal is not being able to meet our production minimum to bring KAPCHR to market for all DSLR owners and live streamers to benefit from.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you want to support KAPCHR and just can't contribute, you can still help!

We ask you to get the word out and make some noise about KAPCHR by using the Indiegogo share tools.  Share KAPCHR on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and other social media platforms to tell your family, friends and colleagues who may be interested in contributing and supporting KAPCHR.

If you would like to be considered as a reviewer for KAPCHR, send us information on your blog, vlog or Youtube channel and we'll get back to you.

Become a Reseller

We would like to work with resellers and distributors. Take advantage of the KAPCHR 10 Pack or email us with your inquiries.

With your help we can change the webcam forever and further unlock the power of the DSLR.  

Thank you all for your support!

-Team KAPCHR

FAQ

 

Is KAPCHR compatible with my camera?

KAPCHR is compatible with any camera that outputs clean HDMI. DSLR cameras typically feature mini or micro HDMI output.  An HDMI cable is require to connect your camera through the video output jack to KAPCHR’s HDMI port.

 

What is clean HDMI and why is it important?

Clean HDMI is the ability to feed a live signal from your camera's sensor through the HDMI port without any of the onscreen info you might have displayed in your view finder or LCD back. It also would need to be a non-compressed signal as some cameras do. The purpose is to use an external recorder instead of your camera's engine. 

Once your DSLR camera is connected via HDMI, check to ensure the extra information overlays are disabled.  Your camera’s manual should outline how turn of all the overlays in the menu.

 

Does KAPCHR come in different colors

KAPCHR currently only comes in its signature black and red color scheme.

 

What are the technical specifications of KAPCHR?

Maximum Input Resolution - 1920x1200p@60fps

Recording Mode - Software Compression, Real-Time Mode

Interface - USB3.0 (SuperSpeed) UVC

Video Input - 1x HDMI

Video RAW Data Format - YUY2

Video Input Resolution - All Resolution up to and below 1920x1200p@60fps

Recording Video Format - YUY2 (USB3.0)

UVC Video Output Resolution 

1920×1200p@60/50/30/25/24fps

1920×1080p@60/50/30/25/24fps

1280×1024p@60/50/30/25/24fps

1280×720p@60/50/30/25/24fps

1024×768p@60/50/30/25/24fps

800×600p@60/50/30/25/24fps

640×480p@60/50/30/25/24fps

Audio Input - HDMI Embedded Audio / 3.5mm Analog Stereo Audio

UAC Audio Output Format - Stereo / 16-bit / 48000Hz

System Requirements / OS Support 

Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 8.1

Windows 10 (32-bit and 64-bit)

Linux / MAC OS / Android

Size and Weight 

36.3 x 89.3mm x 20mm

USB 3.0 extension cable (9 inches long)

0.3lbs

Does KAPCHR require a battery?

No, KAPCHR gets all the power it needs from its USB3.0 port.

 

What applications can I use KAPCHR with?

You can use KAPCHR with any application that uses a webcam.

 

What software is needed with KAPCHR?

KAPCHR does not require any special software to use it as a webcam.

You can use KAPCHR with any application that uses a webcam.

 

Can my DSLR take video for an extended period of time?

Many DSLRs do have a limit on how long the shutter can remain open.  Check your users manual or research other users experience with recording video on your camera.  Your user manual will outline whether your DSLR camera can be operated in video mode continuously.   To safeguard the camera’s sensor, many DSLR cameras automatically power down after a 30 minutes of continuous use - this can typically be avoided by disabling the battery save mode.

 

Can I stream my video gameplay with KAPCHR?

Yes!  KAPCHR’s HDMI port allows gamers to stream their video gameplay at 1080p as opposed to the usual 780p.  Typical gaming capture cards usually stream at 780p.

 

What is USB 3.0?

USB 3.0 adds the new transfer rate referred to as SuperSpeed USB (SS) that can transfer data at up to 5 Gbit/s (625 MB/s), which is about ten times as fast as the USB 2.0 standard. You can distinguish USB 3.0 connectors from their USB 2.0 counterparts by blue color-coding of the Standard-A receptacles and plugs, and by the initials SS.

 

Can I use multiple KAPCHR devices at once?

Yes, you can use as many KAPCHR devices as you have USB ports.

 

Does KAPCHR work with unencrypted HDMI sources?

Yes. KAPCHR will not display or receive video if you connect an HDMI signal that has HDCP protection.

 

What is HDCP?

High-bandwidth Digital Content Protection (HDCP) is a digital copyright protection system that is associated with HDMI connections.

 

I supported KAPCHR, when will I receive my shipment?

KAPCHR pre-orders are scheduled to be shipped as early as February, 2018.  Please contact our support team by January, 2018 if you have any specific shipping instructions and or questions at kapchr@iSkin.com. 

 

What is the warranty on KAPCHR?

KAPCHR warrants this hardware product against defects in materials and workmanship under normal use for a period of ONE (1) YEAR from the date of retail purchase by the original end-user purchaser (“Warranty Period”).

More Info:

KAPCHR website

Follow us on Instagram / Facebook / Twitter

Email us at kapchr@iSkin.com

story:
Following the huge success of the Pinhole Pro and Pinhole Pro S Series, we were super excited to debut our latest Pinhole prime lens addition – Pinhole Pro X at the The Photography Show in the UK. Pinhole Pro X 18-36mm is the world's first ever pinhole zoom lens, bolstering our line-up of professional pinhole primes, designed specifically for video production and art photography.



Never before, is professional pinhole motion pictures so easy and achievable. The vivid yet stunningly unique look of the pinhole cinema is something that’s simply non-reproducible by digital.  


Pinhole photography predates any form of modern photography as the most fundamental form of photographic art. The forerunner to the photographic camera was the camera obscura — a permeative photographic device with no lens but a single pinhole aperture.  

Contemporary cameras use state-of-the-art lenses, mirrors, mounts, AF/MF techniques, and endlessly higher pixel density to deliver amazing images, but those images are too life-like, lacking the charm of raw, naturally vintage look of pinhole photos boasting the most original saturated colours. 

Pinhole is photography in its most original form. However achieving that unforgettable photographic aesthetics requires high precision engineering and modern state of the art manufacturing technologies. With so many subpar quality options on the market, as well as the ability for anyone to build their own, we saw an opportunity to not only build a pinhole lens that’s beautiful with exceptional build quality, but also with prevision engineering and rich inputs from the photographers and cinematographers themselves — the result was the world’s first ever multi-aperture professional pinhole lens that supports virtually all modern digital cameras with interchangeable lenses.

In the early 20th century, the development of high speed films and mass production of glass lens almost made pinhole photography forgotten. It’s a lost art form, only to be kept alive by the few enthusiasts.  

Create photos and videos exactly the same way photos were taken hundreds of years ago, and pair that with modern high speed, high ISO technologies. The result is stunning and timeless.  

Experiment and have fun!

What lies in every Pinhole Pro lens, is the secret of how each tiniest yet perfectly precious pinhole aperture is made. The shape and edge smoothness of the pinhole aperture is one of the most critical factors in image quality and sharpness. 




Each of the above methods result in an imperfect pinhole, with pinhole apertures that are either too large, not round in shape, thick walls of the pinhole or with fuzzy edges — each of which will result in poor image quality. 


Unlike most DIY and commercial pinhole cameras and pinhole lenses that use either mechanical pin punching, chemical etching or laser etching, Thingyfy uses a robotic controlled tiny micro-drill that is only 0.05mm in diameter, to preciously drill a perfectly round and smooth pinhole aperture. This process requires state-of-the-art environmental control and vibration reduction, in order to produce the stunning quality of each Pinhole Pro in mass production. Below is a table that compares the attributes of each pinhole production method:





Pinhole Pro X is the world's first pinhole zoom lens, designed for modern digital cameras and made for video making. 

In order to produce a zoom lens with an aperture less than 0.25mm, the pinhole wall has to be leas than 0.1mm to eliminate the tunnel effect, or dark corners on the picture. The result is stunning and unique. 





This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best  Kickstarters with 800+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $350MM  raised between them.

story:
Pre-order available at http://polyhelo.com/nanotornado/

Check out where we're at using the updates tab above this text.  Still on schedule for September!




Own the Sky.

Take it out. Throw it. Your Nano Tornado makes flying ridiculously easy and fun.
A new and different drone made just for you.



Ready when you are

Instantly storable and deployable, just tuck it away when you're done and it's ready to go the second that you are. Switch on to get to the action you want to capture and share.



Grab, Throw and Fly

You may never take-off or land a drone on the ground again. You're free to grab and throw the Nano Tornado. No propellers = good.



The safe drone

Throw, catch and bump it. Fly up close and personal without fear of injury from flying, breaking propellers. Crashing from hitting stuff will happen to the other guy - not you.



"Ooops" Protection

No other drone gets you up close like Nano Tornado. Fully enclosed bump and contact resistance allows you to get close to walls, tree trucks, lampposts, etc. with almost no risk. If there's something really cool up there that you want to capture in stunning 1080p, toss it up and find out.



It goes where the others can't

No other drone lets you get right up to stuff - and even hit it. A flying bumper car, it can go anywhere. Explore those aerial nooks and crannies that only you can.



Keep Flying with Quick Change Battery

Just pop out the battery and pop in a spare. You're good to go in seconds - all day long. Tornado's compact size will typically keep the Tornado circulating for about five minutes.



Time spent flying, not setting up

You'll never miss the action because you don't have to spend precious time assembling, dissassembling and packing. Without delicate arms and blades to break, you can let the other guys worry about crashes and breakage. Nano Tornado's unique interior blades reduce the likelihood of damage when stowed. The ducts and framework act as packing material, keeping the blades safe when not in use.



This campaign is all about getting you your own Nano Tornado flyer.  The research is done, the 3D printed prototypes are all test-flighted out, and we're ready to cut molds for plastic. The Nano-T is based around our own flight control computer and flight control software that are tuned up and ready to go. Support us in our development and you can get an awesome, super smooth plastic injection molded Nano Tornado.  If we reach our stretch goals, we’ll add color options to the injected plastics.  For now, you can have any color you want as long as it’s black.

The Nano Tornado comes with a FlySky twin sticks controller (Tx and Rx) and Lipo battery for the flyer. 

The Nano Tornado was designed to accommodate a number of different cameras. We’ve built camera housings for both the Polaroid Cube camera and a live feed (5.8GHz) camera.  The camera sits far enough forward that even with a wide angle panoramic view, you never see legs or blades in your video – unlike essentially every “open blade” drone on the market.


With the live feed camera, we offer the complete package with a 5.8GHz Tx and a 7” TFT Boscam screen / Rx for the FPV aficionado.



We would like to bring the Nano Tornado experience to as many people as possible and for that we need your support. The funds from the campaign will be used to start the first production run of the official Nano Tornado. We have completed over 10 separate design-build-test loops to refine and fine-tune the Nano Tornado vehicle. That's the power of 3D printer rapid prototyping! The result is a Nano Tornado that we find fun to fly and we think you will, too. We are ready to bring the Nano Tornado to the next level and would be extremely happy if you would join us on this journey. 

Thank you!

The Polyhelo team designs and builds software and hardware for open blade multirotor systems and other unmanned aerial systems (UAS). We have experience in spacecraft sensor design and spacecraft instrumentation and our team of electrical, mechanical, and software engineers solve current UAS problems and influence the future of UAS technology.

*Special Thanks To: 

http://fourtentwo.jimdo.com

The Nano Tornado team has been working on ducted fan flyers for several years, and the four rotor Nano-T concept since August 2014. We build end-to-end drone vehicles, from control computers and software to the fuselage and whole-package concept. The core development team has extensive experience from spacecraft and NASA-related projects over the last couple of decades, including working on missions to Mars and Venus.

We know from prior projects that slips can be significant, especially in manufacturing. We try very hard to mitigate these problems by doing this a little different from some crowd funded projects. First, we intentionally worked much deeper through the development cycle for Nano Tornado before releasing it on Indiegogo. Second, we have established a deeper and large team of engineers across the range of required disciplines required for Nano Tornado a year ago. Third, we have spread development risk over several different projects. Finally, we have developed deep relationships with our plastics, PCB, and motor vendors.

We have also tried to set realistic delivery deadlines. Getting very deep into the development cycle before launching this campaign is a big part of that, but there always remains the desire to set "success oriented schedules": If everything works great, we could ship sooner! While we want you to get your Nano Tornados as soon as possible, we know from our prior fabrication experiences that things will go wrong along the way. Quality is always the first thing to suffer in these cases. And while we are very confident we can deliver Nano Tornado by October, there are always unforeseen challenges or small changes that could cause delays. But be assured: we will keep you up to date on what's happening all along the way!

Thank you so much for supporting Nano Tornado! We are dedicated to keeping you informed on the status of our progress with at least monthly updates. We are committed to being transparent and keeping fans and Indiegogo backers informed and up-to-date.

Purchasing Questions

How do I know my purchase went through?

You will receive a confirmation email within the first 24-36 hours after your purchase. Sometimes the orders take longer to process.

I haven't gotten my confirmation email yet, should I be worried?

We're getting to everyone's emails as quickly as we can, but it could take as long as 48 hours to hear from us. If it's been longer than that then something might be wrong. Not to worry, just email us at dc@polyhelo.com and we'll help get everything straightened out.

When will we ship?

We're expecting to ship to our backers in the beginning of October. We're confident that your Nano Tornado will get to you by then. If it looks as if we are going to get your Nano Tornado to you before or after October then we'll let you know.

Does shipping cost extra?

Shipping for the United States is free. International shipping is an extra $39 per kit.

How do I add international shipping to my purchase?

You can pay for shipping by purchasing the International Shipping Add-On perk. 

I forgot to add my international shipping cost... what should I do?

Oops! No worries, you can go ahead and pay the shipping cost now. Make sure you are logged in with the same Indiegogo account you used to purchase your Nano Tornado. When the campaign ends we will make sure everything is as it should be. If you haven't added the shipping cost or if you paid too much by the end of the campaign we'll send you an email and get everything worked out.

Do you have a warranty?

Yes, we have a 60 day warranty that covers any manufacturing defects. If you ever have a problem with any part of your Nano Tornado just contact us and we'll do our best to make it right.

Can I return my Nano Tornado?

Unfortunately no, all of our sales here on Indiegogo are final. But, if you are having a problem or are unhappy with your Nano Tornado you can always contact us and we will try to work something out.

I want to become a distributor. Who should I contact?

Please reach out to our team at dc@polyhelo.com.
story_txt:
Pre-order available at http://polyhelo.com/nanotornado/Check out where we're at using the updates tab above this text.  Still on schedule for September!







Own the Sky.

Take it out.  Throw it.  Your Nano Tornado makes flying ridiculously easy and fun.  A new and different drone made just for you.





Ready when you are

Instantly storable and deployable,  just tuck it away when you're done and it's ready to go the second that you are.  Switch on to get to the action you want to capture and share.





Grab, Throw and Fly

You may never take-off or land a drone on the ground again.  You're free to grab and throw the Nano Tornado.  No propellers = good.





The safe drone

Throw, catch and bump it.  Fly up close and personal without fear of injury from flying, breaking propellers.  Crashing from hitting stuff will happen to the other guy - not you.





"Ooops" Protection

No other drone gets you up close like Nano Tornado.  Fully enclosed bump and contact resistance allows you to get close to walls, tree trucks, lampposts, etc. with almost no risk.  If there's something really cool up there that you want to capture in stunning 1080p, toss it up and find out.





It goes where the others can't

No other drone lets you get right up to stuff - and even hit it.  A flying bumper car, it can go anywhere.  Explore those aerial nooks and crannies that only you can.





Keep Flying with Quick Change Battery

Just pop out the battery and pop in a spare. You're good to go in seconds - all day long.  Tornado's compact size will typically keep the Tornado circulating for about five minutes. 





Time spent flying, not setting up

You'll never miss the action because you don't have to spend precious time assembling, dissassembling and packing.  Without delicate arms and blades to break, you can let the other guys worry about crashes and breakage.  Nano Tornado's unique interior blades reduce the likelihood of damage when stowed. The ducts and framework act as packing material, keeping the blades safe when not in use.

story:
Hello everybody,

My name is Aggelos Barai, I am an Albanian photojournalist, living in Athens, Greece.

My work focuses mainly on political and social issues, migration, the effect of the ongoing economical crisis in the Greek society and the rediscovering of my birth country, Albania.

My parents came to Greece as economical migrants, I was two when they left Albania.

In order to sustain myself, I worked as an assistant photographer with some of the most important Greek photographers such as Maro Kouri, Dimitris Bouras and Panagiotis Stamatakos.

Afterwards, to build up my career as a photographer, I started collaborating with various Greek newspapers and magazines such as Lifo, Greka, AIFF (cinema) and many others.

I wanted to go further and fulfill my desire of picturing life and people, so I started collaborating with national and international Non-governmental  organizations such as The smile of the child, Amnesty International, Greenpeace as much as local collectivities and initiatives.

By collecting experiences and knowledge, I work now as a freelance photojournalist for online media in Greece and abroad.

Some of my pictures are distributed by photo agencies and above everything, I am focusing on personal projects regarding Albania and migration in Greece.

On October 5th, my camera and the its lens got stolen while I was picturing central Athens's daily life.

As everybody knows, times in Greece are difficult, a lot of people are struggling, including me, and I can't afford to buy new equipment and even by working hard everyday to collect money, it won't be enough to replace my camera as I participate in covering the living cost of my family, rent, bills, no need to explain, you know what I am talking about...

 

GOALS

I need to raise the amount of 2000 EUR so that i will be able to continue to work and to improve my skills as a photographer. Please take a glance on the right side to check out the range of perks I provide for your donation.

 

OTHER WAYS TO PARTICIPATE

If it's not possible for you to contribute financially, you can still help me by sharing the campaign around your friends, family and above all, spread the word!

Thank you so much for your support.

Aggelos Barai

 

GREEK / Ελληνικά 

Γεια σε όλους,

Το όνομά μου είναι Άγγελος Μπαράι, είμαι Αλβανός φωτορεπόρτερ, και ζω στην Αθήνα.

Η δουλειά μου επικεντρώνεται κυρίως στα πολιτικά και κοινωνικά θέματα, την μετανάστευση, ή την επίδραση της συνεχιζόμενης οικονομικής κρίσης στην ελληνική κοινωνία.

Οι γονείς μου ήρθαν στην Ελλάδα ως οικονομικοί μετανάστες, ήμουν δύο χρονών όταν άφησαν την Αλβανία.

Προκειμένου να επιβιώσω ο ίδιος, εργάστηκα ως βοηθός φωτογράφου με μερικούς από τους σημαντικότερους Έλληνες φωτογράφους όπως την Μάρω Κουρή, Δημήτρη Μπούρα και Παναγιώτη Σταματάκο.

Στη συνέχεια, για να χτίσω την καριέρα μου ως φωτογράφος, άρχισα συνεργασία με διάφορες ελληνικές εφημερίδες και περιοδικά όπως το Lifo, Γκρέκα, AIFF (κινηματογράφος) και πολλούς άλλους.

Ήθελα να πάω παραπέρα όμως, έτσι άρχισα τη συνεργασία με τις εθνικές και διεθνείς μη κυβερνητικές οργανώσεις όπως Χαμόγελο του παιδιού, η Διεθνής Αμνηστία, η Greenpeace και πολλοί άλλοι, αλλά και με τοπικές συλλογικότητες και πρωτοβουλίες.

Με τη συλλογή εμπειριών και γνώσεων, δουλεύω τώρα ως ανεξάρτητος φωτορεπόρτερ για online μέσα μαζικής ενημέρωσης στην Ελλάδα και το εξωτερικό.

Μερικές από τις εικόνες μου διανέμονται από τους οργανισμούς φωτογραφίας οι οποίοι δίνουν έμφαση στις προσωπικές δουλειές μου σχετικά με την Αλβανία και τη μετανάστευση στην Ελλάδα.

Στις 5 Οκτωβρίου, η φωτογραφική μηχανή και ο φακός μου κλάπηκαν, ενώ φωτογράφιζα την καθημερινή ζωή στο κέντρο της Αθήνας.

Όπως όλοι γνωρίζουν, στην Ελλάδα είναι δύσκολα, πολλοί άνθρωποι αγωνίζονται, συμπεριλαμβανομένου και εμού, και δεν μπορώ να αντέξω οικονομικά το να αγοράσω νέο εξοπλισμό, ακόμα και δουλεύοντας σκληρά καθημερινά για να συλλέξω τα χρήματα, αυτό δεν θα είναι αρκετό για να αντικαταστήσει τη φωτογραφική μηχανή μου γιατί συμμετέχω στην κάλυψη του κόστους διαβίωσης της οικογένειάς μου, ενοίκιο, λογαριασμοί, δεν χρειάζεται να εξηγήσω, ξέρετε τι εννοώ ...

 

ΣΤΟΧΟΙ

Με το ποσό των 2000 ευρώ, θα είμαι σε θέση να αγοράσω νέο εξοπλισμό και να συνεχίσω να εργάζομαι και να βελτιώσω τις ικανότητές μου ως φωτογράφος. Παρακαλώ ρίξτε μια ματιά στη δεξιά πλευρά για να δείτε τι μπορώ να προσφέρω για τη δωρεά σας.

 

Άλλοι τρόποι ΣΥΜΜΕΤΟΧΗΣ

Αν δεν είναι δυνατό για σας να συνεισφέρετε οικονομικά το καταλαβαίνω, μπορείτε να με βοηθήσετε ακόμα και με το να μοιραστείτε την καμπάνια με τους φίλους, και την οικογένεια σας ώστε να εξαπλωθεί όσο το δυνατόν περισσότερο!

Σας ευχαριστώ πολύ για την υποστήριξή σας.

Άγγελος Μπαράι

story:
My name is Angélique Stehli, I am 23 years old. I was born in Paris and raised between San Francisco and Europe. I am in the final year of my studies in Switzerland at l'ECAL. I will be graduating in June with a bachelors degree in photography. This project is the closing of a chapter and the most important project in our four years of studying, since the sum of our achievements at l'ECAL will be judged by the result of this photo essay. Once finished, this project will be presented in front of a jury composed of prestigious members of the art world.

Gold Rush is part of a continued interest in the reinterpretation and the reworking of the idea of the Atlas. I will be creating images to develop a narration between past and present, memory, identity, myths and dreams.

A Bachelors project usually costs between 2000 and 4000 euros, I am looking to raise 3000 euros. This budget will cover my analog film rolls and film processing needs, equipment rental for the five weeks I will be on the road between California and Switzerland, plus my expenses (lodging, food, transportation) This budget also covers the costs of printing and binding my book in the five required copies as well as the printing large scale images to be displayed as part of the exhibition during which I will present my book.

I am creating this page to ask for your help and support ,and to have the opportunity to share my journey with you as I develop this project which is so meaningful and important to me.

In exchange for your help I will offer prints, cards, books, and more. If you want to support a young artist through the beginning of a new project and adventure this is your chance :)  I would be forever grateful if you would accompany me in the process of making one of my dreams into a great book.

You can also follow my work and older projects on my website: http://angeliquestehli.allyou.net 

Thank you in advance for your time, attention and generosity. Please share with other people who enjoy art, photography, books, anything mentioned above or just me :)  they might be interested as well in participating!

Once finished, this project will be presented in front of a jury composed of prestigious members of the art world.Gold Rush is part of a continued interest in the reinterpretation and the reworking of the idea of the Atlas. I will be creating images to develop a narration between past and present, memory, identity, myths and dreams.A Bachelors project usually costs between 2000 and 4000 euros, I am looking to raise 3000 euros. This budget will cover my analog film rolls and film processing needs, equipment rental for the five weeks I will be on the road between California and Switzerland, plus my expenses (lodging, food, transportation) This budget also covers the costs of printing and binding my book in the five required copies as well as the printing large scale images to be displayed as part of the exhibition during which I will present my book.I am creating this page to ask for your help and support ,and to have the opportunity to share my journey with you as I develop this project which is so meaningful and important to me.In exchange for your help I will offer prints, cards, books, and more. If you want to support a young artist through the beginning of a new project and adventure this is your chance :)  I would be forever grateful if you would accompany me in the process of making one of my dreams into a great book.You can also follow my work and older projects on my website: http://angeliquestehli.allyou.net Thank you in advance for your time, attention and generosity. Please share with other people who enjoy art, photography, books, anything mentioned above or just me :)  they might be interested as well in participating!

story:
CREATED BY: Alexandra Boskovich & Max Seiler

PUBLICIST: Sam Reetz

press.polaroidkingdom@gmail.com

www.polaroidkingdom.com

Facebook: @polaroidkingdomthefilm

IG: @polaroidkingdom

#polaroidkingdom

From left to right: Sonia Foltarz, Alex Boskovich, Diego Cordero, Max Seiler, and Sam Reetz. 

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

POLAROID KINGDOM

Nothing’s more dangerous than a familiar face.

New York, NY--January 20, 2017--Coping with the death of a child is unfathomable, but imagine what it’s like for the child lost? POLAROID KINGDOM gives us a haunting-yet-imaginative glimpse into the childlike perception of death and the aftermath of grief as we experience a day in the life of Lisa, a big sister longing for what once was, and Tammy, her little sister who struggles to hold on to what will no longer be.

Created by Alex Boskovich and Max Seiler, POLAROID KINGDOM puts us in the headspace of what it’s like to be and to perceive death as a child, showing us the flaws in ourselves and how we understand and cope with sudden loss. The film is currently in development, having just launched on Indiegogo. For more information on how to contribute, visit: www.polaroidkingdom.com

Making Movies is Expensive...

Currently, we've filmed and self-produced promos for POLAROID KINGDOM and are excited to get started on the pre-production thrill ride. Costs add up fast, though, and we'd like to secure the equipment and locations needed to bring the film to life in an authentic and memorable way AND pay our stellar cast and crew for all their hard work in making this short film concept a reality. We need YOUR help to make this possible, get our name out there to horror film festivals and sponsors AND get production funded in time to meet our April 2017 production slate. Here's what we need to bring Tammy's world to life:

Support our ghost adventure for a chance at an IG feature, an IMDB credit, a VIP invite to the POLAROID KINGDOM wrap party and so much more! 

Thanks for stopping by and joining the POLAROID KINGDOM community! Your support means the world!
