story:
THE SV RIG
+ WIRELESS (6000mAh) CHARGER.

#DesignedInSweden #DevelopedInSweden

Introducing the all new SV RIG + CHARGER, a game changing piece of gear for content creators on the move.
This Rig will enable you to create content on your own terms, attach any 3rd party accessories, including (but not limited to): 
Lights, Microphones, lenses, DOF adapters, lens support rail systems, filters, chargers, handles, Action cameras, etc. The possibilities with this piece of gear is endless.

Are you a fan of shooting your videos in Vertical- or Horizontal mode?
THE SV RIG is designed to change & adapt to any given situation. Making it now possible for content creators to shoot in both a vertical set up or Horizontal set up - whilst still being able to use any kind of 3rd party accessories with ease.

THE SV RIG does not compromise on the comfort, user friendliness or design. 
The Side handles & Top Handle can be mounted anywhere on the rig itself, the Counter Weights is integrated into the Side handles, and the layout of interface points for 3rd party accessories is well thought out.  

Ever felt that you need a bit of an extra charge to your phone?
Then THE SV RIG will have you sorted out with its 6000mAh WIRELESS CHARGER, which is fully integrated into THE SV RIG itself. 

-"For Content Creators, By Content Creators.
Start Creating Without Limits."

NOTE! 
Several images & videos in this campaign shows the prototype status of THE SV RIG (Rig Color: Grey), Final appearance of THE SV RIG (Rig Color: Black). Contact us if any questions.

1. STORY & BACKGROUND: 

Our company was founded in late 2017, with one single thing in mind - to develop & create the best possible gear for Content Creators. 

This project has been running for about a year now, and the idea came to life in late 2019 when some of us got tired of constantly running out of charge while out creating content on our smartphones. 

With our product design (patent pending), we have solved this issue once and for all.

The wireless charger is fully integrated into THE SV RIG and can easily be swapped out for a new battery in a matter of seconds, just like you would do on a DSLR camera. Giving you the confidence to finally be able to use your smartphone out on the field for a full day of shooting.

The Rig, battery and all other accessories have been designed at our HQ in Sweden.
The great team which has made this all possible consists of people from all around the world - ranging from experts, partners, customers, suppliers and ourselves. 

Some of you might remember our Kickstarter Campaign from January this year, which showcased an very early design of THE SV RIG. This was clearly a prototype, and much different from what we can see now. 

Now, more than half a year later - we proudly present to you the finished product.

(Note! Some Accessories shown on the picture above needs to be purchased separately, check out our homepage, click here.)

Want to know more about us? Then check out our IG page and our homepage:

  • ​www.SVoptics.com​
  • Instagram, @sv_assets

2. THE SV RIG + CHARGER

This smartphone rig has been created with one single thing in mind:
- Making the life easier for Content Creators around the world. 

THE SV RIG is truly a unique piece of gear, which offers multiple attachment points (Cold shoes & 1/4" female threads), a wireless charger, 2 shooting modes (Vertical- & Horizontal) and the possibility to mount SV lenses (and of course other 3rd party lenses). 

"Landscape Rig Set-Up" showcased below. 
- Photo by @andrey.tian

"Vertical Rig Set-Up" showcased below. 
- Photo by @andrey.tian

THE SV RIG features: 

  • Integrated Wireless Charging - 6000 mAh (Max. 15W wireless charging output)
  • 1x Lens mount (17x3mm thread)
  • 1x Top Handle
  • 2x Side Handles
  • 2x Counter Weights (à 200 grams)
  • Easy cable management
  • 18x quarter inch threads
  • 6x cold shoes
  • Unique, Swedish design
  • THE SV RIG will accommodate the following sizes of smartphones.
    • Width: From 64mm to 87mm
    • Length: All smartphones
    • Thickness: Up to 11mm
  • THE SV RIG will accommodate the following filter & lens sizes when mounted directly onto the cage: 
    • Up to 52mm in diameter
    • When mounting the filters directly onto your phone cases or lens, larger filter sizes can be accommodate . (Contact us at info@SVoptics.com if any questions, or drop a comment to us here on Indiegogo) 
  • 99% of all Smartphones which supports wireless charging is compatible with our rig.
    (The full list of smartphones can be seen under our FAQ section)

(Note! Some Accessories shown on the picture above needs to be purchased separately, check out our homepage, click here.)

Are you still asking yourself if its all worth it?

Let us sit back and enjoy @smartphonefilmmakingpro first impressions about our new SV RIG + WIRELESS CHARGER.

Be sure to check this one out. 

Keep a look out under our project updates!
Julian over at Smartphone Filmmaking Pro has promised us to give his first impressions on the "Final" design of THE SV RIG very soon. 
 

2.1 "Tested By Creatørs."

To assure this products capability we made sure it went through tests with true creators. Drew from Creatørs Isle was able to give us a great review on his experience from their campaign in Key West, Florida. 

We have a strong feeling that this is not the last we see from the Creatørs Isle team, so stay tuned, more project updates dropping soon! 

An Exclusive Look at the campaign they filmed in Florida can be seen below, together with @drewcastaneda first impressions of THE SV RIG.

"Key Largo Project - THE SV RIG." 


"THE SV RIG Experience" 

2.2 The SV CHARGER (WIRELESS - 15W)

Our new developed Wireless Charger which will take things to the next level.

The SV Charger have been developed from scratch, in order to fit THE SV RIG in the best possible way.
We have gone through all the needed certifications & testing - making it a "state of the art", in terms on battery safety. 

Local Swedish battery experts have been working closely with the SV Team & its suppliers, in order to ensure a safe battery design. 

The SV Charger uses a 6000mAh cell which can both charge your phone wirelessly and another item at the same time using the included USB cable - this functionality has never been available on a smartphone rig before. 

The SV Charger features: 

  • 15W wireless power output (Wireless Fast Charging)
  • USB A input
  • USB C output (Charge a second item whilst still charging your phone wirelessly)
  • LED status indicators
  • IP65 rated (Bring it on your next adventures & travels which confidence) 
  • Unique, Swedish design (Both internally, and externally).  

2.3 SMARTPHONE RIG ACCESSORIES

THE SV RIG will come with multiple accessories which has been tailor made to fit the rig. Some of them are available to purchase as separate perks, whilst others will be included in the bundles. (Stay tuned on our homepage after the Indiegogo campaign for more great accessories which is in development now, and which will be released Q1 2022.)

"Vertical Rig Set-up" showcased above. 

The accessories which will be ready at launch (10/2021): 

  • TOP HANDLE 
    Made from aircraft grade aluminum, featuring 8x quarter inch female threads and 2x cold shoes. Giving you full flexibility. 
     
  • COUNTER WEIGHTS 
    These counter weights keeps your rig in balance, and weighs in at ~200 grams per piece. Many times you are forced to attaching accessories to your rig on either the left or right side, which makes your rig unbalanced and more uncomfortable to work with. These counter weights is mounted inside the Side handles so they dont compromise the overall design and looks of THE SV RIG itself. 
     
  • SIDE HANDLES
    The side handles can be mounted anywhere on THE SV RIG, giving you the opportunity to shot in both a Horizontal set-up or a Vertical set-up. That is unique.
    The handles is ergonomically designed and made from ABS plastic in order to give you a solid grip whilst shooting. 
     
  • THE SV CHARGER
    Did you ever run out of charge whilst creating out on the field? Need some “extra juice”? Then this SV CHARGER will sort that out, with its 6000mAh charging capacity, and max. 15W wireless charging output. Did you know that you can still use the USB C port to charge other units whilst still charging your phone wirelessly?

Accessories for THE SV RIG which will be released after launch (10/2021): 

  • LENS BRACKET (37mm mount) 
    This bracket will give you the possibility to attach any 3rd party optics or filters which uses the 37mm mount system. 
     
  • LENS BRACKET (Bayonet mount)
    And in the same way, this bracket will give you the possibility to attach any 3rd party optics or filters which uses the bayonet mount system. 
     
  • "THE SV" - SIDE HANDLE
    This one is still a secret, sorry for that. Patent pending items included which can not be displayed as per todays date. 
     
  • And many more to come 2022...

3. DISCOUNTS & PERKS

It is with great pleasure that we finally announce the packages which will be available 2021 Q4.

CREATORS EDITION, Retail price: 159:- EUR. 

This package includes the following items: 

  • 1x THE SV RIG
  • 2x Side Handles
  • 1x Lens bracket (17mm thread mount)
  • Product Manual

CREATORS PRO EDITION, Retail price, 209:- EUR

This package includes the following items: 

  • 1x THE SV RIG
  • 2x Side Handles
  • 1x Top Handle
  • 2x Counter Weights (á 300 gram, total 600 gram)
  • 1x Lens bracket (17mm thread)
  • Product Manual


TRAVELERS EDITION, Retail Price 219:- EUR

This package includes the following items: 

  • 1x THE SV RIG
  • 2x Side Handles
  • 1x Wireless Charger (6000 mAh - 15W)
  • 1x Lens bracket (17mm thread)
  • Product Manual


FILMMAKERS EDITION, Retail price: 279:- EUR

This package includes the following items: 

  • 1x THE SV RIG
  • 1x Wireless Charger (6000 mAh - 15W)
  • 2x Side Handles
  • 1x Top Handle
  • 2x Counter Weights (á 300 gram, total 600 gram)
  • 1x Lens bracket (17mm thread)
  • Product Manual

THE SV Charger, Retail price 89:- EUR

This package includes the following items: 

  • 6000 mAh Battery (Wireless charger, Max. power output 15W)
  • USB C to USB C - Cable (Length 0.5m)
  • Product Manual

All discounts on Indiegogo are set to ~20% off the retail price.  
We want to offer some special giveaways when we reach the following milestones:  

  • 1x Giveaway - Creators Edition (Sales reached 12.500:- EUR)
  • 5x Giveaways - Creators Edition (Sales reached 20.000:- EUR)
  • 10x Giveaways - Creators Pro Edition (Sales reached 35.000:- EUR)

When we get closer to each milestone, we will advertise on how to enter each giveaway!

Stay tuned here on our Indiegogo campaign page! Additional discounts, giveaways, and promotions to come.  

3.1 AVAILABILITY & RELEASE PLANS

We are launching THE SV RIG within the EU with full force, ramping up production in late 2021! 

The certifications for THE SV Charger is currently ongoing, and we will complete all the necessary certifications which is related to EU (CE) and UK (UKCA) legislation in October 2021. 

We aim to release a "state of the art" battery design in terms of battery safety on all markets that we enter. The last thing we want to do is to compromise your safety. 

Your safety, and those around you, is our top priority. 

Here is a short summary showing where our products will be available to purchase from October 2021: 

  • Creators Edition - Available Worldwide
  • Creators Pro Edition - Available Worldwide
  • Travelers Edition - Available in EU, UK, Switzerland & Norway
  • Filmmaker Edition - Available in EU, UK, Switzerland & Norway
  • THE SV Charger - Available in EU, UK, Switzerland & Norway

THE SV Charger - Release plan. 

NOTE! The above release plan is only related to THE SV CHARGER. 
THE SV RIG (Without Charger) will be available for shipping worldwide directly upon release, 2021 Q4. 

    We will be launching THE SV Charger in the US, GCC region & Asia during 2022! 

    We are truly sorry for any inconvenience that this may cause you, and we thank you for your understanding.

    Still unsure if you can purchase THE SV CHARGER in your region during 2021?
    Do not hesitate to contact us on: Info@SVoptics.com, or write us an comment here on Indiegogo. 

    3.2 FULFILMENT (10/2021)

    This is the greatest part of it all - fulfilment! 

    As mentioned, we aim to ship out to customers beginning 18th of October 2021. 
    According to our current time plan, we will be able to reach that. 

    Please note that these dates might change with short notice, since there can be some unforeseen issues related to logistics, packaging, shipping, local customs, project delays, etc. 

    We will keep you updated here on Indiegogo, through our social media channels and through our site blog over at www.SVoptics.com

    For Retailers & Wholesale: 

    All inquiries related to retail agreements, product catalogues, wholesale, etc. shall be directed to the following email adress: 

    Sales@SVoptics.com

    For more information about our current warehouses, logistics, supply chain solutions etc. Please contact our sales team. 

    3.3 FUNDING GOAL

    Our funding goal is fixed, and set to 12.000:- EUR. 

    This is a minimum sales target that is calculated in order to cover for all necessary costs related to the "SOP" (Start Of Production) of THE SV RIG + CHARGER. 

    The first batch of any given product, always has initial higher production costs, mainly due to fulfilment, additional labor costs, quality inspection (which is a bit tougher the first time around), etc. 

    We have taken into account the following, but not limited to: 

    • Fulfilment costs
    • Custom costs
    • Labor costs
    • Higher initial costs for quality assurance of the first batch (500-1000 pcs)
    • Warehouse costs
    • Etc. 

    Let´s do this! We definitely think that we can reach these targets together. 

    4. R&D, MANUFACTURING & CERTIFICATION

    We have been surrounded by a great team of people this past year, and we can not thank each and everyone of you enough for all your efforts, and long hours that have been put into this project to make it all happen in time. 

    THE SV RIG project has been quite a ride, thats for sure.
    Please note! The video above shows an early design of THE SV RIG. 

    We have been developing both THE SV RIG and Charger over at out HQ in Sweden. The team have included external experts, partners, employees and suppliers just to name a few. 

    Some pictures from our ongoing manufacturing can be seen below. 

    4.1 THE SV CHARGER

    - Some early pictures of the tooling for the Battery Covers on the Factory floor, waiting to produce some first "off tooling samples" - good times. 

    - Testing ongoing at TÜV SÜD, a trusted 3rd party certification company worldwide.


    - And finally, some SV CHARGERS at the final assembly line, shots taken end of week 35. 

     

    ​4.2 THE SV RIG.

    - Some shots of all the Aluminum parts, before we sent them for "painting" (Oxidization process) 


    - Starting to look like something now, oxidation completed, just a bit tweaking left to do. 


    - Let’s look at the raw material, which will be used to produce the tooling for THE SV RIGs "ABS - plastic parts". 

    It is difficult to show the manufacturing process in a fair way, but the SV team really want to thank the professional team which has been dealing with the day-to-day tasks, ensuring great quality & control throughout the whole process.

    What we have done with THE SV CHARGER, is to do all the certifications which is mentioned & "recommended" under the CE (European conformity) & UL (Underwriters' Laboratories).

    Please note that many of these certifications is not actually needed for companies to do in order to release a product on the marketplace, therefore we see a lot of "unsafe" batteries out there, especially when we talk about 3rd party accessories.  

    The SV team have gone further, we have made more certifications than what is regulated by the law.

    Then what does this mean for you?
    It means that you will get a "state of the art" battery in terms of battery safety, meaning that you can always rest assure that this is a safe product to use.  

    5. PARTNERS

    As mentioned previously, this wouldn´t have been possible without all these great people involved. We have been testing prototypes since January this year, ensuring that all aspects and functions of the final product is taken into consideration. 

    During April this year, we announced a part of our "product testing team", which would take THE SV RIG through its paces.
    We just finalized all the user testing, and we have been thrilled working together with you all.

    It is with a warm heart we extend our deepest gratitude to all of you. 

    - Smartphone Filmmaking Pro.

    - Couple In Video. 

    - Courtney G. Jones. 

    - Creatørs Isle.

     

    - Dublin Smartphone Film Festival.

    • And many more... 

    Would you like to be part of our product testing team in the future? Then please write to us at info@SVoptics.com. Mark your email with "PRODUCT TESTER". 

    We are gearing up for some new product releases during 2022, so mount up!

    7. RISKS AND CHALLENGES

    All ongoing projects comes with a risk, lets face it. But it is how you minimize and mitigate each risk that counts, and it is what makes some projects successful and some not. 

    Now, when we are so close to the finish line, we believe that we have mitigated and accounted for all risks related to the SOP (Start Of Production) which is due to start week 39.

    Unforeseen issues can always come up in a project, and it is normal. But rest assure, we will keep you updated about the progress and about any eventual delays. 

    8. ENVIRONMENTAL- SOCIAL & CORPORATE COMMITMENTS

    SV ASSETS strives to make an impact in this world, with the help of implementing a correct management system which can control the complete value chain in a better way.
    We focus on 3 key areas (ESG), which are Environmental aspects, Social aspects and Governance aspects. 

    Environmental aspects

    • Reducing CO2 footprint
    • Strategies for greener batteries:
    • Energy efficiency in cell production.
    • Renewable energy in cell production.
    • Recycling of material (including e.g. scrap in cell production.)

    Social aspects

    • Social sustainability in the battery value chain
    • Develop a responsible sourcing management system.
    • Cobalt: risk of forced- and/or child labor
    • Consider Li-ion chemistries with less cobalt (e.g. NMC) or no cobalt (e.g. LFP).

    Governance aspects

    • Anti-corruption practices, especially down the value chain

    What we will heavily focus on for this campaign is the "social aspects", when it comes to the mining of the raw materials (Cobalt in this case).
    Cobalt is the raw material which is used in almost all our electronic powered devices, and the mining is far from safe, fair and good for the environment. 

    Therefore, our first step is to minimize the amount of Cobalt used in our cells, by using a cell which is called "NMC". This means that there is less Cobalt in our lithium batteries than what it is in other products which uses lithium. 

    Furthermore, we will also donate money to PACT.
    For each battery we sell, we will donate 5% of the sales.     The donation will be directed to the mining projects. They have some amazing projects up and running now concerning mining of these metals. Read more about the projects here 

    We fully support their great work around the globe, and we are proud to become a donor.

    8. ENDING NOTES

    All our products come with a 1 year warranty. That goes for all our current listed products on www.SVoptics.com

    You can rest assure that we have taken into account several factors, following all relevant design guidelines from all the relevant norms & standards in order to ensure safe, and long lasting products.
    All our electronic products will be certified against CE & UL.

    We have also taken great care in the selection of our suppliers, we embrace the care for the workers and we are supporting the workers union wherever we can. Our suppliers fulfill relevant standards and norms that are to be expected such as ISO9001, etc.

    Our supply chain is constantly working hard towards creating an optimal distribution of our products. All concepts and prototypes have been sourced and produced in Sweden using local suppliers, everything to minimize the environmental impact throughout the project.

    We will take into account all factors, and check all possible distribution channels by sea, air and road before shipping out the products to our backers. We will choose the "greenest routing" wherever, and whenever possible.

    We will ship our products from our 2 main sites.
    EU customers will get their products from our local warehouse in Sweden, whilst customers outside of the EU will primarily get their products directly from our factory warehouse. (Which is based outside of Hong Kong).
    All to be able to reach a sustainable supply chain.

    9. LAST, BUT NOT LEAST

    THANKS FOR SUPPORTING OUR IDEA, PROJECT AND OUR BRANDS VISION. 

    See you all soon. 
    /CEO, Daniel Vallentin
    SV ASSETS AB

    DISCLAIMER

    Product names, logos, brands, and other trademarks featured or referred to within SV ASSETS AB products and services within SVoptics.com and this Indiegogo campaign are the property of their respective trademark holders. These trademark holders are not affiliated with SV ASSETS AB, our products or our website. They do not sponsor or endorse our materials. 

    Actual delivered product may differ in appearance from what is shown in this project presentation. 

    The project time plan might be changed due to unforeseen circumstances. We will keep you updated here on our Indiegogo campaign page and via our social media channels about the progress of this project.
story_txt:
THE SV RIG+ WIRELESS (6000mAh) CHARGER.
#DesignedInSweden #DevelopedInSweden

Introducing the all new SV RIG + CHARGER, a game changing piece of gear for content creators on the move.This Rig will enable you to create content on your own terms, attach any 3rd party accessories, including (but not limited to): Lights, Microphones, lenses, DOF adapters, lens support rail systems, filters, chargers, handles, Action cameras, etc. The possibilities with this piece of gear is endless.
Are you a fan of shooting your videos in Vertical- or Horizontal mode?THE SV RIG is designed to change & adapt to any given situation. Making it now possible for content creators to shoot in both a vertical set up or Horizontal set up - whilst still being able to use any kind of 3rd party accessories with ease.
THE SV RIG does not compromise on the comfort, user friendliness or design. The Side handles & Top Handle can be mounted anywhere on the rig itself, the Counter Weights is integrated into the Side handles, and the layout of interface points for 3rd party accessories is well thought out.  
Ever felt that you need a bit of an extra charge to your phone?Then THE SV RIG will have you sorted out with its 6000mAh WIRELESS CHARGER, which is fully integrated into THE SV RIG itself. 

-"For Content Creators, By Content Creators.Start Creating Without Limits."
NOTE! Several images & videos in this campaign shows the prototype status of THE SV RIG (Rig Color: Grey), Final appearance of THE SV RIG (Rig Color: Black). Contact us if any questions.
1. STORY & BACKGROUND: 
Our company was founded in late 2017, with one single thing in mind - to develop & create the best possible gear for Content Creators. 
This project has been running for about a year now, and the idea came to life in late 2019 when some of us got tired of constantly running out of charge while out creating content on our smartphones. 
With our product design (patent pending), we have solved this issue once and for all.
The wireless charger is fully integrated into THE SV RIG and can easily be swapped out for a new battery in a matter of seconds, just like you would do on a DSLR camera. Giving you the confidence to finally be able to use your smartphone out on the field for a full day of shooting.
The Rig, battery and all other accessories have been designed at our HQ in Sweden.The great team which has made this all possible consists of people from all around the world - ranging from experts, partners, customers, suppliers and ourselves. 
Some of you might remember our Kickstarter Campaign from January this year, which showcased an very early design of THE SV RIG. This was clearly a prototype, and much different from what we can see now. 
Now, more than half a year later - we proudly present to you the finished product.

(Note! Some Accessories shown on the picture above needs to be purchased separately, check out our homepage, click here.)
Want to know more about us? Then check out our IG page and our homepage:

​www.SVoptics.com​
Instagram, @sv_assets


2. THE SV RIG + CHARGER
This smartphone rig has been created with one single thing in mind:- Making the life easier for Content Creators around the world. 
THE SV RIG is truly a unique piece of gear, which offers multiple attachment points (Cold shoes & 1/4" female threads), a wireless charger, 2 shooting modes (Vertical- & Horizontal) and the possibility to mount SV lenses (and of course other 3rd party lenses). 
"Landscape Rig Set-Up" showcased below. - Photo by @andrey.tian

"Vertical Rig Set-Up" showcased below. - Photo by @andrey.tian

THE SV RIG features: 

Integrated Wireless Charging - 6000 mAh (Max. 15W wireless charging output)
1x Lens mount (17x3mm thread)
1x Top Handle
2x Side Handles
2x Counter Weights (à 200 grams)
Easy cable management
18x quarter inch threads
6x cold shoes
Unique, Swedish design

THE SV RIG will accommodate the following sizes of smartphones.
Width: From 64mm to 87mm
Length: All smartphones
Thickness: Up to 11mm



THE SV RIG will accommodate the following filter & lens sizes when mounted directly onto the cage: 
Up to 52mm in diameter
When mounting the filters directly onto your phone cases or lens, larger filter sizes can be accommodate . (Contact us at info@SVoptics.com if any questions, or drop a comment to us here on Indiegogo) 


99% of all Smartphones which supports wireless charging is compatible with our rig.(The full list of smartphones can be seen under our FAQ section)


(Note! Some Accessories shown on the picture above needs to be purchased separately, check out our homepage, click here.)
Are you still asking yourself if its all worth it?
Let us sit back and enjoy @smartphonefilmmakingpro first impressions about our new SV RIG + WIRELESS CHARGER.
Be sure to check this one out. 


Keep a look out under our project updates!Julian over at Smartphone Filmmaking Pro has promised us to give his first impressions on the "Final" design of THE SV RIG very soon. 
 
2.1 "Tested By Creatørs."
To assure this products capability we made sure it went through tests with true creators. Drew from Creatørs Isle was able to give us a great review on his experience from their campaign in Key West, Florida. 

We have a strong feeling that this is not the last we see from the Creatørs Isle team, so stay tuned, more project updates dropping soon! 
An Exclusive Look at the campaign they filmed in Florida can be seen below, together with @drewcastaneda first impressions of THE SV RIG.


"Key Largo Project - THE SV RIG." 
"THE SV RIG Experience" 
2.2 The SV CHARGER (WIRELESS - 15W)


Our new developed Wireless Charger which will take things to the next level.

The SV Charger have been developed from scratch, in order to fit THE SV RIG in the best possible way.We have gone through all the needed certifications & testing - making it a "state of the art", in terms on battery safety. 
Local Swedish battery experts have been working closely with the SV Team & its suppliers, in order to ensure a safe battery design. 
The SV Charger uses a 6000mAh cell which can both charge your phone wirelessly and another item at the same time using the included USB cable - this functionality has never been available on a smartphone rig before. 
The SV Charger features: 

15W wireless power output (Wireless Fast Charging)
USB A input
USB C output (Charge a second item whilst still charging your phone wirelessly)
LED status indicators
IP65 rated (Bring it on your next adventures & travels which confidence) 
Unique, Swedish design (Both internally, and externally).  


2.3 SMARTPHONE RIG ACCESSORIES
THE SV RIG will come with multiple accessories which has been tailor made to fit the rig. Some of them are available to purchase as separate perks, whilst others will be included in the bundles. (Stay tuned on our homepage after the Indiegogo campaign for more great accessories which is in development now, and which will be released Q1 2022.)

"Vertical Rig Set-up" showcased above. 
The accessories which will be ready at launch (10/2021): 


TOP HANDLE Made from aircraft grade aluminum, featuring 8x quarter inch female threads and 2x cold shoes. Giving you full flexibility.  

COUNTER WEIGHTS These counter weights keeps your rig in balance, and weighs in at ~200 grams per piece. Many times you are forced to attaching accessories to your rig on either the left or right side, which makes your rig unbalanced and more uncomfortable to work with. These counter weights is mounted inside the Side handles so they dont compromise the overall design and looks of THE SV RIG itself.  

SIDE HANDLESThe side handles can be mounted anywhere on THE SV RIG, giving you the opportunity to shot in both a Horizontal set-up or a Vertical set-up. That is unique.The handles is ergonomically designed and made from ABS plastic in order to give you a solid grip whilst shooting.  

THE SV CHARGERDid you ever run out of charge whilst creating out on the field? Need some “extra juice”? Then this SV CHARGER will sort that out, with its 6000mAh charging capacity, and max. 15W wireless charging output. Did you know that you can still use the USB C port to charge other units whilst still charging your phone wirelessly?

Accessories for THE SV RIG which will be released after launch (10/2021): 



LENS BRACKET (37mm mount) This bracket will give you the possibility to attach any 3rd party optics or filters which uses the 37mm mount system.  

LENS BRACKET (Bayonet mount)And in the same way, this bracket will give you the possibility to attach any 3rd party optics or filters which uses the bayonet mount system.  

"THE SV" - SIDE HANDLE This one is still a secret, sorry for that. Patent pending items included which can not be displayed as per todays date.  
And many more to come 2022...

3. DISCOUNTS & PERKS
It is with great pleasure that we finally announce the packages which will be available 2021 Q4.
CREATORS EDITION, Retail price: 159:- EUR. 
This package includes the following items: 

1x THE SV RIG
2x Side Handles
1x Lens bracket (17mm thread mount)
Product Manual


CREATORS PRO EDITION, Retail price, 209:- EUR
This package includes the following items: 

1x THE SV RIG
2x Side Handles
1x Top Handle
2x Counter Weights (á 300 gram, total 600 gram)
1x Lens bracket (17mm thread)
Product Manual


TRAVELERS EDITION, Retail Price 219:- EUR
This package includes the following items: 

1x THE SV RIG
2x Side Handles
1x Wireless Charger (6000 mAh - 15W)
1x Lens bracket (17mm thread)
Product Manual


FILMMAKERS EDITION, Retail price: 279:- EUR
This package includes the following items: 

1x THE SV RIG
1x Wireless Charger (6000 mAh - 15W)
2x Side Handles
1x Top Handle
2x Counter Weights (á 300 gram, total 600 gram)
1x Lens bracket (17mm thread)
Product Manual


THE SV Charger, Retail price 89:- EUR
This package includes the following items: 

6000 mAh Battery (Wireless charger, Max. power output 15W)
USB C to USB C - Cable (Length 0.5m)
Product Manual


All discounts on Indiegogo are set to ~20% off the retail price.  We want to offer some special giveaways when we reach the following milestones:  


1x Giveaway - Creators Edition (Sales reached 12.500:- EUR)

5x Giveaways - Creators Edition (Sales reached 20.000:- EUR)

10x Giveaways - Creators Pro Edition (Sales reached 35.000:- EUR)

When we get closer to each milestone, we will advertise on how to enter each giveaway!
Stay tuned here on our Indiegogo campaign page! Additional discounts, giveaways, and promotions to come.  
3.1 AVAILABILITY & RELEASE PLANS
We are launching THE SV RIG within the EU with full force, ramping up production in late 2021! 
The certifications for THE SV Charger is currently ongoing, and we will complete all the necessary certifications which is related to EU (CE) and UK (UKCA) legislation in October 2021. 
We aim to release a "state of the art" battery design in terms of battery safety on all markets that we enter. The last thing we want to do is to compromise your safety. 
Your safety, and those around you, is our top priority. 
Here is a short summary showing where our products will be available to purchase from October 2021: 


Creators Edition - Available Worldwide

Creators Pro Edition - Available Worldwide

Travelers Edition - Available in EU, UK, Switzerland & Norway

Filmmaker Edition - Available in EU, UK, Switzerland & Norway

THE SV Charger - Available in EU, UK, Switzerland & Norway

THE SV Charger - Release plan. 

NOTE! The above release plan is only related to THE SV CHARGER. THE SV RIG (Without Charger) will be available for shipping worldwide directly upon release, 2021 Q4. 

We will be launching THE SV Charger in the US, GCC region & Asia during 2022! 
We are truly sorry for any inconvenience that this may cause you, and we thank you for your understanding.
Still unsure if you can purchase THE SV CHARGER in your region during 2021?Do not hesitate to contact us on: Info@SVoptics.com, or write us an comment here on Indiegogo. 
3.2 FULFILMENT (10/2021)
This is the greatest part of it all - fulfilment! 
As mentioned, we aim to ship out to customers beginning 18th of October 2021. According to our current time plan, we will be able to reach that. 

Please note that these dates might change with short notice, since there can be some unforeseen issues related to logistics, packaging, shipping, local customs, project delays, etc. 
We will keep you updated here on Indiegogo, through our social media channels and through our site blog over at www.SVoptics.com
For Retailers & Wholesale: 
All inquiries related to retail agreements, product catalogues, wholesale, etc. shall be directed to the following email adress: 
Sales@SVoptics.com
For more information about our current warehouses, logistics, supply chain solutions etc. Please contact our sales team. 
3.3 FUNDING GOAL
Our funding goal is fixed, and set to 12.000:- EUR. 
This is a minimum sales target that is calculated in order to cover for all necessary costs related to the "SOP" (Start Of Production) of THE SV RIG + CHARGER. 
The first batch of any given product, always has initial higher production costs, mainly due to fulfilment, additional labor costs, quality inspection (which is a bit tougher the first time around), etc. 
We have taken into account the following, but not limited to: 

Fulfilment costs
Custom costs
Labor costs
Higher initial costs for quality assurance of the first batch (500-1000 pcs)
Warehouse costs
Etc. 

Let´s do this! We definitely think that we can reach these targets together. 
4. R&D, MANUFACTURING & CERTIFICATION
We have been surrounded by a great team of people this past year, and we can not thank each and everyone of you enough for all your efforts, and long hours that have been put into this project to make it all happen in time. 

THE SV RIG project has been quite a ride, thats for sure.Please note! The video above shows an early design of THE SV RIG. 
We have been developing both THE SV RIG and Charger over at out HQ in Sweden. The team have included external experts, partners, employees and suppliers just to name a few. 
Some pictures from our ongoing manufacturing can be seen below. 
4.1 THE SV CHARGER
- Some early pictures of the tooling for the Battery Covers on the Factory floor, waiting to produce some first "off tooling samples" - good times. - Testing ongoing at TÜV SÜD, a trusted 3rd party certification company worldwide.- And finally, some SV CHARGERS at the final assembly line, shots taken end of week 35.  
​4.2 THE SV RIG.
- Some shots of all the Aluminum parts, before we sent them for "painting" (Oxidization process) - Starting to look like something now, oxidation completed, just a bit tweaking left to do. - Let’s look at the raw material, which will be used to produce the tooling for THE SV RIGs "ABS - plastic parts". 
It is difficult to show the manufacturing process in a fair way, but the SV team really want to thank the professional team which has been dealing with the day-to-day tasks, ensuring great quality & control throughout the whole process.
What we have done with THE SV CHARGER, is to do all the certifications which is mentioned & "recommended" under the CE (European conformity) & UL (Underwriters' Laboratories).
Please note that many of these certifications is not actually needed for companies to do in order to release a product on the marketplace, therefore we see a lot of "unsafe" batteries out there, especially when we talk about 3rd party accessories.  
The SV team have gone further, we have made more certifications than what is regulated by the law.
Then what does this mean for you?It means that you will get a "state of the art" battery in terms of battery safety, meaning that you can always rest assure that this is a safe product to use.  
5. PARTNERS
As mentioned previously, this wouldn´t have been possible without all these great people involved. We have been testing prototypes since January this year, ensuring that all aspects and functions of the final product is taken into consideration. 
During April this year, we announced a part of our "product testing team", which would take THE SV RIG through its paces.We just finalized all the user testing, and we have been thrilled working together with you all.
It is with a warm heart we extend our deepest gratitude to all of you. 
- Smartphone Filmmaking Pro.

- Couple In Video. 
- Courtney G. Jones. 
- Creatørs Isle.

 

- Dublin Smartphone Film Festival.


And many more... 
Would you like to be part of our product testing team in the future? Then please write to us at info@SVoptics.com. Mark your email with "PRODUCT TESTER". 
We are gearing up for some new product releases during 2022, so mount up!

7. RISKS AND CHALLENGES
All ongoing projects comes with a risk, lets face it. But it is how you minimize and mitigate each risk that counts, and it is what makes some projects successful and some not. 
Now, when we are so close to the finish line, we believe that we have mitigated and accounted for all risks related to the SOP (Start Of Production) which is due to start week 39.
Unforeseen issues can always come up in a project, and it is normal. But rest assure, we will keep you updated about the progress and about any eventual delays.

SV ASSETS strives to make an impact in this world, with the help of implementing a correct management system which can control the complete value chain in a better way.We focus on 3 key areas (ESG), which are Environmental aspects, Social aspects and Governance aspects. 
Environmental aspects

Reducing CO2 footprint
Strategies for greener batteries:
Energy efficiency in cell production.
Renewable energy in cell production.
Recycling of material (including e.g. scrap in cell production.)

Social aspects

Social sustainability in the battery value chain
Develop a responsible sourcing management system.
Cobalt: risk of forced- and/or child labor
Consider Li-ion chemistries with less cobalt (e.g. NMC) or no cobalt (e.g. LFP).

Governance aspects
Anti-corruption practices, especially down the value chain
What we will heavily focus on for this campaign is the "social aspects", when it comes to the mining of the raw materials (Cobalt in this case).Cobalt is the raw material which is used in almost all our electronic powered devices, and the mining is far from safe, fair and good for the environment. 
Therefore, our first step is to minimize the amount of Cobalt used in our cells, by using a cell which is called "NMC". This means that there is less Cobalt in our lithium batteries than what it is in other products which uses lithium. 
Furthermore, we will also donate money to PACT.For each battery we sell, we will donate 5% of the sales. The donation will be directed to the mining projects. They have some amazing projects up and running now concerning mining of these metals. Read more about the projects here 

We fully support their great work around the globe, and we are proud to become a donor.
8. ENDING NOTES
All our products come with a 1 year warranty. That goes for all our current listed products on www.SVoptics.com
You can rest assure that we have taken into account several factors, following all relevant design guidelines from all the relevant norms & standards in order to ensure safe, and long lasting products.All our electronic products will be certified against CE & UL.
We have also taken great care in the selection of our suppliers, we embrace the care for the workers and we are supporting the workers union wherever we can. Our suppliers fulfill relevant standards and norms that are to be expected such as ISO9001, etc.
Our supply chain is constantly working hard towards creating an optimal distribution of our products. All concepts and prototypes have been sourced and produced in Sweden using local suppliers, everything to minimize the environmental impact throughout the project.
We will take into account all factors, and check all possible distribution channels by sea, air and road before shipping out the products to our backers. We will choose the "greenest routing" wherever, and whenever possible.

(Which is based outside of Hong Kong).All to be able to reach a sustainable supply chain.

See you all soon. /CEO, Daniel VallentinSV ASSETS AB

story:
Multi-Tool Accessory 

Our Multi-Tool Accessory has been designed to extend the KeyVault with functionality beyond what you expect in a keyholder. It includes a high quality stainless steel Screw Driver, Hexagonal Pry Bar, Spanner, Bottle Opener and Keychain Ring

 

 

 

Designed to put the EASE back in KEYS

FAQ

Product: How do i carry larger keys such as car keys?

All KeyVault orders include a  Ring to allow for larger items such as car keys, grocery cards accessories and key fobs.


Product: How many keys can I use?

KeyVault can cater up to 12 standard keys. For anything that doesn’t fit, KeyVault also comes with a Ring to allow for extra or larger items. 

Perks: How can i choose the color and style of my KeyVault?

At the end of the campaign, we will send you a survey to confirm your color choice, accessories and shipping details.

Shipping: When will I receive my KeyVault?

We aim to have manufacturing completed and start Q/A  by March 2017 .We plan to ship out all your orders by the end of April for arrival in May 2017. We will keep all of our backers updated and be completely transparent with progress.

Shipping: What shipping method will you be using?

United States: All orders will be sent from our fulfillment center located in Dallas,TX, orders will be shipped via USPS with tracking.

International: Orders outside US will incur additional shipping cost of US $15 for each perk. You will be responsible for any customs duty applicable for your country. Here is a helpful link to calculate the import duty for your country - https://www.dutycalculator.com/

story:
You may experience the following problems or challenges:

  • No idea of how to fold strap neatly while , having no choice but to wind it on hand untidily?
  • Once camera mounts on plate, straps have to be removed, or camera can’t be positioned steadily and properly with?
  • Straps become annoying when storing camera?
  • Wouldn’t like to put on the table directly in case there’s any rub on and head?

DUO CAMERA PLATE can be compatible with multi-purpose to conquer above troubles.

You can just plug it in and go with DUO CAMERA PLATE (DCP), follow your heart to do whatever you want, can be adjusted to meet any purpose and even be turned into immediately without constraint of traditional ones. That's how it's called DUO plate.

Design of DCP Quick-Lock System

compatible with tripod platform, Arca- and Manfrotto RC5501PL) spec. both compatible.

 

Compatibility on DSLR and EVIL

DCP is currently designed in two styles, one is in Manfrotto RC5 plate spec., another is in Arca- plate spec. RC5 type performs the best on DSLR while both perform well on EVIL, it’s up to whether  can be positioned well on a flat surface or not.

Width of DCP is of common dimension, which makes it fit most DSLR well, replacement of battery and memory card won’t be disturbed.

Picking the best spec.

DCP can also be the protector of camera. Following phenomena may not be new to you: Once camera is mounted on, it’s not easy to be positioned steadily and properly, not to mention if the camera goes with a heavier lens, drop-down camera head is unavoidable even it’s without plate.

If none of above happens to you, you’re the luckiest one. Nevertheless, are you hardhearted enough to let your camera rub directly on table or even rugged ground?

 

Transform Strap Mode in a Second 

Strap length is 160cm, it can be switched to sling strap or neck strap instantly, specialized decompressed breathable design can ensure the maximum comfort and breathability under long-term use, just perfect for traveling.

 

Transform into Hand Strap instantly

Hand Strap applies decompressed material with ergonomic design, specialized triangular ring can make it be detached swiftly. Strap length can be adjusted instantly to fit the size of palm accordingly to ensure the stability and comfort level while shooting.

 

Belt & bag hook quick replaced rapidly

Multiple cameras can be replaced rapidly with DUO belt & bag hook which can release your hands freely, much more convenient and leave more space in your bag. Let go the camera on strap without missing any stunning moment, it will be the best partner for the photographer.

Please help us share on community websites(ex: IG, Twitter, Facebook...) so that more potential sponsors can see us. Your sharing will be the greatest promoter of our project's success!


  • For Manfrotto RC5 tripod heads (compatible 501PL)
  • Material: body- forged AL6061, rivet SUS302, button ZINC, anti-slip rubber TPR,  1/4" stainless steel screw
  • Surface treatment: fine sandblasting anodizing (black)
  • Dimension: Length 9.7cm, Width: 5cm, Thickness: 1.3cm
  • Enlarged anti-slip rubber can ensure screw won’t loose after fastened, length 9.7cm can make DSLR stand steadily.

  • For ARCA-Swiss tripod heads
  • Material: body- forged AL6061, rivet SUS302, button ZINC, anti-slip rubber TPR,  1/4" stainless steel screw.
  • Surface treatment: fine sandblasting anodizing (black)
  • Dimension: Length 7cm, Width: 3.8cm, Thickness: 1.3cm
  • Enlarged anti-slip rubber can ensure screw won’t loose after fastened, length 9.7cm can make DSLR stand steadily.

Goes with a Quick-Look structure, it can not only make strap transform modes freely but also protect the camera bottom without being damaged by rubbing on desktop or floor. Just take your camera for a travel light even it’s without strap.

 

  • Pad + strap length 160cm
  • Strap material: thickened POLY ribbon
  • Decompressed pad material: Inner- breathable mesh with TPE decompressed material. Outer- polyester fabric.
  • Dimension of decompressed pad: Length- 60cm, Width- 7cm, Thickness- 8mm
  • Material: hook- forged AL6061, Shaft- forged AL6061, Strap ring- forged AL2014, Screw- AL7075
  • 360-degree Quick-lock hook is included in strap assy.

  • Polyester dust bag 

 

  • Hand strap + pad length: 45cm
  • Strap material: POLY ribbon
  • Hand pad material: Inner- breathable mesh with TPE decompressed material. Outer- polyester fabric.
  • Dimension of decompressed pad: Length- 14cm, Width- 6cm, Thickness- 18mm
  • Material: hook- AL6061, Triangle ring- stainless steel
  • Quick- lock hook, minor hook and triangular ring are included in hand strap assy.
  • Polyester dust bag 

 

  • Strap dimension: Length- 62mm, Width-26mm, Thickness-15mm(This dimension is based on adhering as shown above)
  • Strap material: POLY ribbon
  • Hook material: AL6061
  • Quick-lock hook is included in belt hook assy.

 

  • Strap dimension: Length-38mm, Width- 26mm, Thickness-5mm
  • Strap material: POLY ribbon
  • Velcro strap length: 20cm (haven’t been adhered)
  • Hook material: AL6061
  • Quick-lock hook is included in bag hook assy.

 

The major feature of DCP quick-lock structure is its quick release mechanism. However, it won’t work if you press one-side button singly, furthermore, there’s a safety lock, which should be pressed after pressing two-side buttons to ensure a successful release. This safety lock may affect its convenience of quick-release for sure, so it’s designed to be demountable. Keeping it or not is all up to you.

 

The strength of DCP had been tested in laboratory based on its CNC sample, its structure can be pulled by force above 564KG without distortion, performance of actual forged part will be even better.

If you’re by our side on this product, please back us up, take part of this project and make it come true by your action.

"Fast" is the initial of our design, so the idea of QUICK-LOCK came into being.

Material and manufacturing are in cooperation with foreign well-known manufacturers.

Unique TPE decompressed material with breathable mesh can avoid the sweat mark under melting hot sunny day.  



DCP will be a forged part, why choosing forging? Forging is structured in higher density, which brings DCP better strength than others.

The material of DCP is AL6061 and AL2014 alloy that’s commonly used in bike and aerospace field. Furthermore, CNC craft gives DCP the best precision and quality steadily for mass production.

  • Test and function verification of CNC sample are well done already.
  • We have complete manufacturing experience and processing supply chain.
  • All drawings are done, pending for tooling kick-off after reaching the goal.

Strap samples are handmade currently, will kick template off after meeting the goal.

Logo tooling hasn’t been started, so DUO Logo on photos are composite presently.

Once the goal is reached, tooling of Logo and the anti-slip rubber will be kicked off as shown 3D rendering.


All components are made in Taiwan, including the straps. They’re  sewed by hands in Taiwan. Thanks to manufacturers who have cooperated for years during my career.

They’re the greatest supporters behind this project.  This project can't be come true without their professional technical assistance and your support.

 

How is the goal set? It's tooling cost for the project actually. This product is one of a kind in the market, we’ll make all-out effort to promote it in the future, furthermore, we’ll extend more possibilities continuously.

Please help us share on community websites(ex: IG, Twitter, Facebook...) so that more potential sponsors can see us. Your sharing will be the greatest promoter of our project's success!

Actual schedule will be based on tooling kick-off date. Once fundraising amount is over the goal, tooling may be kicked off immediately even the fundraising project haven’t been ended.

 

Why DUO CAMERA PLATE is called DUO?

Since it’s of dual-use mode, and the designer of it is Duo. That’s why we stick to the name with dogged persistence.


Duo Chung had been in bike designing field for years and has been a camera fancier for a long period. That’s why he’d like to make this product come true insistently.

If your camera had been put in dry box for years, let DUO CAMERA PLATE bring your enthusiasm back.
Portfolio  Duo Chung Profile 


Whale Tsai is a RD engineer in automobile field who’s the finance minister and technical support of DUO CAMERA PLATE

It takes us almost 1 year to improve and fine the DCP, we believe it can bring a brand-new shooting experience to users. Duo CAMERA PLATE goes with full commitment and best offer from manufacturers and component suppliers which gives us abundant confidence. We’re ready for mass production.


Even there may probably be some unexpected dilemmas and delays during the process just like other startups and new projects. We promise that we’ll make all-out effort and do our best to minimize the risks in production process and we will keep working hard in order to ensure delivering low-risk, high-quality products on time.

Aim at conveying our passion for the product to every user, making them feel it and trust our products. Deep understanding products, continuous innovation, simplified design & implementation, and ongoing improvement are our Warranties to users.

No idea of how to fold strap neatly while , having no choice but to wind it on hand untidily?
Once camera mounts on plate, straps have to be removed, or camera can’t be positioned steadily and properly with?
Straps become annoying when storing camera?
Wouldn’t like to put on the table directly in case there’s any rub on and head?
DUO CAMERA PLATE can be compatible with multi-purpose to conquer above troubles.You can just plug it in and go with DUO CAMERA PLATE (DCP), follow your heart to do whatever you want, can be adjusted to meet any purpose and even be turned into immediately without constraint of traditional ones. That's how it's called DUO plate. story: Hey. My name is Sasha.By my example, I want to show and prove that you can raise the necessary amount at indiegogo to solve your problems! After all, this is a wonderful platform for everything :) I ask you $ 1. It's funny you think ... but no. For all people, including for me $ 1 is a bit. But if you think and imagine ... that every third or even the second will donate $ 1. That person can change life. Each of us has dreams that can not be reality. I will show you and prove that everything is real. People who read this text can think about everything. but I want you to understand that this is important to me. but for you it's only $ 1. Let's run this wheel and calculate how many people are willing to donate $ 1 to another person when asked. When we collect the required amount, we will make sure that everything is real. and everyone can fulfill your dreams in spite of obstacles. If I do this, it will help me. Give people happiness. Appreciate every moment with your family and be not indifferent to other people. it makes us human. Feel free to ask if needed. and life will sparkle with new colors. Thanks for reading this. It's important for me.

story:
We are MOON. We design tools for photographers. Analog & digital.

There are a lot of exciting ideas and innovative products we want to realise and put in the hands of photographers. This is the first one.

Tiny Flash

As photographers, we realised there wasn't a small camera flash on the market. We decided to address this and set out to design the world's most compact unit.

Here is Tiny Flash.

 

 

Designed around portability and practicality, it has an integrated battery that’s rechargeable via a conventional smartphone’s USB-C cable. It is small enough to remain unobtrusive when mounted on a camera, helping photographers more easily approach their subjects. Tiny Flash was created for enthusiasts and professional documentary photographers, with a focus on film camera users.

Prototypes have been made and tested, and the next step is to fund the project. This is where you come in. We need your help to start manufacturing and turn Tiny Flash into a real product.

 

 

Ultra Compact

 

 

With Tiny Flash, we managed to cram a decent amount of light into a very compact form- factor. Using a flash no longer means carrying a bulky device in your bag or on your camera. In fact, it’s so small and inconspicuous that you will likely want to keep it mounted onto your camera at all times.

We believe we have designed the World’s most compact camera flash. It is simply the smallest flash we know.

 

 

 

USB-C Charging. Just Like Your Smartphone.

 

 

To make things even easier and convenient, we have designed Tiny Flash with an integrated battery. This means you will no longer have to go through the logistics of carrying a battery-charger, taking out the batteries of your flash, charging them, and putting them back in. Tiny Flash recharges via its own USB Type-C port, just like the majority of smartphones. You can charge it from the mains, from a laptop, or from any other USB power socket. You can even charge it on-the-go, directly from your Android smartphone. This will give you a few bursts of light in just a couple of minutes.

 

 

 

 

For Most Cameras, Analog or Digital. 

 

 

Whether you shoot analog or digital, the latest high megapixel sensor or a vintage camera, Tiny Flash has you covered. Stripping it down from any complexity and keeping the bare essentials means that it is compatible with the vast majority of cameras, old or new. That likely includes your camera.

For cameras designed during or after the 70s, Tiny Flash is simply mounted onto the hot-shoe, like any modern flash. And if your camera is older, like an older Leica M body, then you can connect Tiny Flash via the PC sync port of your camera.

 

 

 

 

Effortless

 

One button. One mode. From powering ON and OFF to testing and to shooting, Tiny flash has only one button to do everything. We’ve stripped down the concept of flash from its redundant functions, and counterproductive automations, and reduced it to its bare essence.

Controlling exposure is simply achieved through adjusting aperture on your camera (and ISO for digital ) in relation to the distance. Turn it on, adjust aperture, shoot.

 

 

 

 

Unobtrusive 

 

 

One crucial consideration for many photographers is how our gear looks. Not so much for the sake of aesthetics, but because our tools will influence the behaviour of our subjects.

A flash can be an intimidating object that doesn’t always help approaching people.

Tiny Flash addresses this issue by being the most inconspicuous piece of lighting equipment. Its size and design, carefully crafted after modernist aesthetics principles, make it barely noticeable when mounted on a camera.

 

 

For Photographers Who Don’t Use Flash

 

 

With Tiny Flash, we aimed at developing a tool for all photographers, from the ones who invariably use strobes, to the ones who never use flash, and those among us who only occasionally need that extra dose of photons. It is for pro photographers on their personal time, or photojournalists that need to travel light and only need flash punctually, or on the streets with advanced enthusiasts.

 

 

Smart Power Management

 

Another first for Tiny Flash is the implementation of a smart power management function. Traditional timers on a flash meant that your flash would power off without you realising, making you miss decisive shots. With Tiny Flash, a motion-sensing accelerometer coupled with an algorithm will detect your movements, and keep the flash ready-to-fire until you put your camera to rest. You won’t miss that precious street shot again.

 

 

 

 

Designed to Last

 

We all value long-lasting devices, particularly in photography. Made to last, we designed Tiny Flash so it can be serviced by most camera repairs shops, and the integrated battery and its connectors are standard, widely-available parts.

 

 

 

 

Product Specifications

 

 

Dimensions

W57.5 x D44 x H26.5mm (H30.5mm with the hot-shoe)

W2.2” x D1.7” x H1” (H1.2”with the hot-shoe)

Guide number: 12

Focal length: 30mm at 35mm equivalent

Flash recycle rate: 4 seconds

Bursts per charge: >100

Compatibility: The vast majority of camera hot-shoes (ISO 5182006), and older cameras with cold-shoes via the PC sync port. If your flash has a shoe, then it's probably compatible.

 

 

 

 

More About the Project

 

As photographers, we sometimes miss crucial shots because there is just not enough light at hand. Some of us address these situations with a flash, but these are often added bulk we just don’t want to carry around. The operation of a conventional camera flash also tends to involve overly technical settings, the cumbersome logistics of carrying batteries and chargers; not to mention the compatibility issues that arise with older camera models. These can make using a flash a daunting process, especially for those among us who favour a more candid approach to their practice.

At MOON we wanted to address these issues. We set out to produce a camera flash that breaks from those impracticalities, and gets photographers a strobe always at hand.

 

 

In order to achieve this, we applied the same underlying principles of industrial and user experience design that were at the heart of some of the most practical innovations in photography: from Oskar Barnack’s invention of the compact 35mm Leica bodies, to Yoshihisa Maitani’s compact and efficient Olympus camera systems. Our aim was to devise and fine-tune the most optimal compromise between size, burst-power, battery life, recycle time, and ease-of-use.  The result is an elegant solution - a flash that’s compact enough to be with you at all times, in your pocket or mounted onto your camera. One that is effortless to operate, and does only what you need, perfectly.

 

 

We're really excited about Tiny Flash and we think it will become a really useful tool for many photographers. And for this to happen, we need your help.

 

 

Next Steps

We have developed Tiny Flash into full prototypes with the aim of having something that can go straight into production. So design for manufacturing is complete and Tiny Flash is ready to go into mass-manufacturing. There will only be minor adjustments for tooling and assembly. The next step is to get the funds to start manufacturing.

 

 

Preparation for production and the production itself will take a few months. We set the shipping date for July 2021, however we want to try our best to deliver before that. This is important for you; and also for us, because we want to build trust for our future products and campaigns, and establish Moon as a reliable maker of photography tools.

 

Risks

There is always a risk associated with creating and making electronic products. However we are confident Tiny Flash is ready for production. We do not foresee any major challenge with manufacturing as this is a conventional product for a factory assembling this type of product.
Before going into production, we will need to verify compliance and certify for safety requirements. And although there is always a risk Tiny Flash doesn't comply, we have designed it with certification in mind. and we do not foresee any challenge here either.
In case a problem was to arise, we would simply make the necessary changes to the product in order to proceed.

 

 

Commitment

One of the best ways to make sustainable products is to make them as long-lasting as possible. For that reason, Leica cameras are one of the greatest examples of sustainability.
Tiny Flash is designed with just that in mind. We aimed to engineer it so it lasts many years. The body is solidly built, and the integrated battery is a widely available standard component that can be easily replaced by a professional camera repair technician.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are not able to back the campaign, you can still help us by sharing the project with other photographers around you. You can do this by posting on social media (use the sharing tools here) or the old way, by talking directly to other people.

Thank you for investing in Moon and backing the project. We can't wait to see Tiny Flash on your cameras and see the photos you will take!

 

The MOON team
