At MOON we wanted to address these issues. We set out to produce a camera flash that breaks from those impracticalities, and gets photographers a strobe always at hand.
 

 
In order to achieve this, we applied the same underlying principles of industrial and user experience design that were at the heart of some of the most practical innovations in photography: from Oskar Barnack’s invention of the compact 35mm Leica bodies, to Yoshihisa Maitani’s compact and efficient Olympus camera systems. Our aim was to devise and fine-tune the most optimal compromise between size, burst-power, battery life, recycle time, and ease-of-use.  The result is an elegant solution - a flash that’s compact enough to be with you at all times, in your pocket or mounted onto your camera. One that is effortless to operate, and does only what you need, perfectly.
 

 
We're really excited about Tiny Flash and we think it will become a really useful tool for many photographers. And for this to happen, we need your help.
 
 
Next Steps
We have developed Tiny Flash into full prototypes with the aim of having something that can go straight into production. So design for manufacturing is complete and Tiny Flash is ready to go into mass-manufacturing. There will only be minor adjustments for tooling and assembly. The next step is to get the funds to start manufacturing.
 

 
Preparation for production and the production itself will take a few months. We set the shipping date for July 2021, however we want to try our best to deliver before that. This is important for you; and also for us, because we want to build trust for our future products and campaigns, and establish Moon as a reliable maker of photography tools.

 
Risks
There is always a risk associated with creating and making electronic products. However we are confident Tiny Flash is ready for production. We do not foresee any major challenge with manufacturing as this is a conventional product for a factory assembling this type of product.Before going into production, we will need to verify compliance and certify for safety requirements. And although there is always a risk Tiny Flash doesn't comply, we have designed it with certification in mind. and we do not foresee any challenge here either.In case a problem was to arise, we would simply make the necessary changes to the product in order to proceed.
 
 
Commitment
One of the best ways to make sustainable products is to make them as long-lasting as possible. For that reason, Leica cameras are one of the greatest examples of sustainability.Tiny Flash is designed with just that in mind. We aimed to engineer it so it lasts many years. The body is solidly built, and the integrated battery is a widely available standard component that can be easily replaced by a professional camera repair technician.
 
 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you are not able to back the campaign, you can still help us by sharing the project with other photographers around you. You can do this by posting on social media (use the sharing tools here) or the old way, by talking directly to other people.
Thank you for investing in Moon and backing the project. We can't wait to see Tiny Flash on your cameras and see the photos you will take!
 
The MOON team

story:
X-Chec

Die Weltneuheit!

Das erste drahtlose Gesundheitschecksystem zur Schnellprüfung und – falls notwendig – zur Ferndiagnose Ihres Arztes

 

Lieben Sie Zahnarztbesuche?

                           Reduzieren Sie sie:

Früherkennung von Mundhygieneproblemen

STATUS QUO – Was mache ich heute?

DIE LÖSUNG:

X-Chec, ich mache eine Schnellprüfung!

X-Chec

Weltneuheit:

Ein drahtloses Basisgerät zur Überwachung Ihres Gesundheitszustandes.
Wir glauben, die Zukunft der Gesundheitsüberwachung wird drahtlos gestaltet. Deshalb haben wir uns mit all unserer Passion die letzten 24 Monate mit der Entwicklung eines völlig neuen, drahtlosen Basisgerätes zur Durchführung von Gesundheitschecks befasst.

Wir haben es X-Chec

(für Cross-Check = Gegenprüfung) getauft.

 

 

Dieses Basisgerät wird zunächst zur Schnelldiagnose Ihrer Mundhygiene genutzt. In den nächsten Stufen werden wir Adapter zur drahtlosen Überprüfung von Haut, Augen und Ohren entwickeln.
Aufgrund unserer open source Strategie gehen wir davon aus, dass auch andere Gesundheitsdiagnosesensoren (Blutdruck, Puls, Temperatur, Hautfeuchtigkeit etc.) gekoppelt werden können. Damit haben Sie ein einzigartiges Basisgerät zur Überwachung, der Dokumentation und Information für die Ärztinnen oder Ärzte Ihres Vertrauens.

Übersicht

X-Chec auf einen Blick

 

Die Zukunft ist Drahtlos

(The  Future is Wireless)

Fragen sie Ihre Ärztin oder Ihren Arzt ohne ihn besuchen zu müssen.Bei Zweifeln einfach die Daten senden. Schon nach kurzer Zeit hat sich das Investment in einen X-Checker bezahlt.

Tauche ein in Deine eigene Real  World 

(Halter für Smartgerät nicht im Lieferumfang)

Schwarz und weiss

X-Chec wird in einer eleganten Schwarz / Weiß Farbkombination geliefert.

Die X-Chec Funktionen im Detail:

Nutzung:

Die X-Chec APP ist unabhängig von Android, IOS oder anderen Betriebssystemen. 

Wir betrachten unser System als Basis für zukünftige Gesundheitsscreening und Überwachungsgeräten. Durch die offene Architektur können auch andere Hersteller Sensoren andocken, deren Daten verarbeiten, speichern oder weiterleiten.

Unsere APP kann mit den wichtigsten Browsern genutzt werden.

Was nützt mir X-Chec?

Entdecken Sie Essensreste oder Zahnbeläge (Plaque), die selbst von Ihre Zunge nicht aufspürt werden!

Sehen Sie sich Ihre Mundhöhle auf Ihrem Lieblingsgerät an.

Dokumentieren Sie Problemzonenentwicklungen bis eine Behandlung wirklich nötig wird.

Bei Unsicherheit senden Sie das Bild an Ihre Zahnärztin oder Ihren Zahnarzt und fragen sie bzw. ihn um Rat. Ein unnötiger Besuch Ihres Doktors finanziert bereits die Anschaffung eines X-Chec Systems.

Für wen ist es?

Der X-Chec Sustainer ist für alle da.
Die Zahngesundheit bei Kindern unter 14 Jahren (empfohlenes Alter) können von Mama oder Papa bequem angesehen und im Verdachtsfall vom Arzt geprüft werden.
Jugendliche ab 14 prüfen Ihren Mundhygienezustand am besten selbst. So werden sie nicht von den Eltern gegängelt und Flirtprobleme lassen sich am besten verhindern!
Erwachsene werden schon aus Kostengründen unsere Sustainer lieben. Eine unnütze Fahrt inklusive Wartezeit zum Arzt und der entstehenden Behandlungskosten holt die Anschaffungskosten schon wieder rein.
Ältere Leute ersparen sich mühsame Fahrten zum Arzt und durch die Projektionsfähigkeit der Bilder auf beliebig große Bildschirme können sogar die meisten Einschränkungen bei Sehbehinderungen überbrückt werden.

Hygiene?

Natürlich können alle X-Chec Bestandteile leicht gereinigt oder sterilisiert werden. Aber - mal ehrlich, wie oft sterilisieren Sie Ihre Zahnbürste?

 

Für das Basisgerät genügt eine normale Reinigung mit einfachen Mitteln:

 

Unser Design Prozess:

Unser Designprozess basiert auf den neuesten Erkenntnissen der Ingenieurwissenschaften. Von der Skizze bis zum fertigen Produkt nutzen wir die modernsten und naturschonendsten Technologien.

Die Stilelemente der X-CHEC Cross Checker:

  • Nutzung natürlicher Formen und Farben
  • Sinnvolle Einfügung in die Umgebung
  • Anpassung an die Materialeigenschaften
  • Harmonische Abstimmung aller Bauelemente
  • Bevorzugung nachwachsender Rohstoffe
  • Bevorzugung wiederverwendbarer Materialien
  • Bevorzugung recycle-fähiger Materialien
  • Vermeidung von verlorenen Materialien 

Im ersten Schritt werden im Design Team die ergonomischen
Anforderungen definiert und über diverse grobe Skizzen erstellt. 
Danach legen wir das finale Aussehen fest, um die ersten 
3-D-Modelle materialschonend mit neuester 3-D-Printing Technologie
im eigenen Labor zu produzieren.
In einem Iterationsprozess legen wir dann die finale
Produktform fest.

Um Kosten zu vermeiden, nutzen wir modernste 3-D-Design Programme um mit 3-D-Printing Technologie unsere Prototypen zeitsparend und materialschonend zu produzieren. Auf diese Weise können wir extrem wirtschaftliche Design-Prozesse sicher stellen.

Ein Vorteil, den Sie als Kunde auch im Geldbeutel spüren können. Ökologisch und ökonomische Produkte auf höchstem Qualitätsniveau. 

Made in Germany      

X-Chec, die Weltneuheit mit seinen Entwicklungsschritten:

Ein drahtloses Basisgerät zur Überwachung Ihres Gesundheitszustandes.

Wir glauben, die Zukunft der Gesundheitsüberwachung wird drahtlos gestaltet. Deshalb haben wir uns mit all unserer Passion die letzten 24 Monate mit der Entwicklung eines völlig neuen drahtlosen Basisgerätes zur Durchführung von Gesundheitschecks befasst. Wir haben es X-Chec (für Cross-Check gleich Gegenprüfung) getauft. 

 


Dieses Basisgerät wird zunächst zur Schnelldiagnose Ihrer Mundhygiene genutzt. In den nächsten Stufen werden wir Adapter zur drahtlosen Überprüfung von Haut, Augen und Ohren entwickeln.
Aufgrund unserer open source Strategie gehen wir davon aus, das auch andere Gesundheitsdiagnosesensoren (Blutdruck, Puls, Temperatur, Hautfeuchtigkeit etc.) gekoppelt werden können. Damit haben Sie ein einzigartiges Basisgerät zur Überwachung, der Dokumentation und Information für die Ärztinnen oder Ärzte Ihres Vertrauens.

Unser Team

Enthusiasmus,

es gibt kein besseres Wort für die Motivation unserer Teammitglieder.
Für alle Teammitglieder ist es eine Tatsache, dass sie an einem Projekt arbeiten welches Ihnen eine große Kosteneinsparung, ein hohes Maß an zusätzlicher Sicherheit und Zeiteinsparung bietet.
Das ganze Team arbeitet hochmotiviert an diesen Zielen.
Alle Mitglieder des Teams sind leidenschaftlich daran interessiert, Ihnen Topqualität, Langlebigkeit und ein umweltgerechtes Produkt zu liefern.

Ihr Spaß bei der Arbeit, ihre Ruhe bei den Produkttests und ihr Wille eine Toptechnologie und einen Topservice zu liefern, begeistert mich immer wieder.
Und das besonders schöne an der Sache, alle ticken so.
Kaufen Sie unser X-Chec tracking device und wir liefern Ihnen ein Gerät, welches Ihre Sicherheit, Ihre Gesundheitsüberwachung und Ihre Freizeit erhöht bzw. erheblich verbessert.
Eine neue Technologie hat auch immer eine besondere Faszination.

Stretch Goals (Dehnbare Ziele)

No 1.: 

Alle Unterstützer der X-Chec Technologie erhalten bei Erreichung einer Umsatzschwelle von 1 Million Euro einen kostenlosen sterilisierbaren Zusatzmundspiegel. Dieses Geschenk entspricht einem Zusatzrabatt von 5 %.

No 2.:

Wenn wir eine Umsatzschwelle von 1,5 Millionen Euro überschreiten, bieten wir 4 weitere coole Farben der X-Chec Basisgeräte an. Sollten wir dieses Ziel erreichen, fragen wir am Ende der Kampagne nach Ihren persönlichen Farbwünschen.

Black & White und zukünftige Optionen

Coole Farben

X-Chec Farbvariationen nach Ihrem Geschmack: 
Wenn Sie es wollen!


Was bekomme ich?

Perk No 007

Leider geheim. Aber wenn Sie sich auf unserer Webseite als potenzieller Kunde der Zukunft eintragen, laden wir Sie gerne in unseren VIP-Club ein und senden Ihnen den geheimen Indiegogo Link  der Ihnen den Zugang zu diesem besonderen Angebot ermöglicht. 

FAQ´s - Die häufig gestellten Fragen zum Produkt

Wichtig! Gegenanzeige

Der X-Chec Sustainer ist kein Ersatz für Ihre Zahnärztin oder Ihren Zahnarzt!
Der X-Chec Sustainer hat nur die Funktion Sie bei der Überwachung Ihres Mundhygienezustandes zu unterstützen.
In Zweifelsfällen sollten Sie immer Ihre Zahnärztin oder Ihren Zahnarzt konsultieren.

Was macht unser Produkt so besonders?

Der X-Chec Sustainer ist die erste Mundkamera mit App- Verbindung zur Kommunikation mit all Ihren elektronischen Geräten und zur Verbindung mit Ihrem Doc für eine Schnelldiagnose ohne aufwändigen Arztbesuch.
Die mitgelieferte App erlaubt Ihnen die vergrößerte Übertragung Ihrer Bilder wahlweise auf Smartphone, Smartwatch, Pad, Laptop oder anderen digitalen Darstellungsgeräten (z.B. Fernseher). Die Bilder können wahlweise archiviert oder zum Beispiel auch an Ihren Arzt versendet werden.
Mit der App werden Bilder mit typischen Erkrankungen der Zähne in verschiedenen Stadien geliefert , sodass Sie eine erste grobe Einschätzung haben, ob die von Ihnen festgestellten Mängel schon behandlungsfähig sind oder ob Sie noch warten können. Die endgültige Entscheidung sollte aber immer Ihre Ärztin oder Ihr Arzt fällen.


Welche Probleme löst unser Produkt?

Mit dem X-Chec Sustainer können Sie zu jeder Zeit den Gesundheitszustand Ihrer Zähne auch an den Stellen beobachten, die normalerweise nur Ihr Zahnarzt sieht.
Sie können den Reinigungszustand Ihrer Zähne in jeder Ecke beurteilen. Mundgeruch kann so extrem sicher bekämpft werden.
Sie müssen nicht mehr routinemäßig zum Zahnarzt, sondern nur, wenn es auch einen Anlass gibt.
Sie ersparen sich unnötige Kosten, Fahr- und Wartezeit.


Wo funktioniert unser Produkt?

Ein X-Chec Sustainer ist eigentlich nichts anderes als ein Zahnarztspiegel mit angebauter Kamera und Übertragungssystem.
Das im Sustainer befindliche Kamerasystem sendet die Bildinformationen via Bluetooth-Schnittstelle auf Ihre Peripheriegeräte.
Im Gehäuse des X-Checkers befindet sich außerdem eine Batterie-Ladeeinheit, die per Induktion aufgeladen werden kann. Deshalb funktioniert das Gerät auch kabellos.
Die W-LAN Schnittstelle hat eine Reichweite von bis zu 5 Metern. Die Bildübertragung funktioniert nur mit Ihrer persönlichen App. So ist sichergestellt, dass kein anderer die Bilder Ihres X-Checers empfangen kann!
Das Ladegerät ist ein Standardcharger wie Sie es von vielen Geräten (z.B. elektrische Zahnbürste oder Munddusche) kennen.


Wo kann man unser Produkt gut gebrauchen?

Ein X-Chec Sustainer funktioniert fast überall. Sein Temperatureinsatzbereich liegt inklusive dem Ladegerät bei -10 bis +40 Grad Celsius. Er ist wasserdicht bis zu einem Meter Tauchtiefe und kann unter fließendem Wasser mit einer Temperatur von bis zu 40 Grad Celsius (Handwarm) mit einem für Kunststoff zugelassenes Reinigungsmittel gereinigt werden.
Die Spiegelsysteme können bequem im kochenden Wasser sterilisiert werden.
Das Ladegerät sollte nur mit für Kunststoff zugelassenem Reinigungsmittel gesäubert werden und darf keinesfalls unter fließendem Wasser gereinigt werden. Bitte nur mit einem feuchten Tuch reinigen. Bei der Reinigung des Ladegerätes ist grundsätzlich der Netzstecker zu ziehen!

Natürlich können Sie Ihren X-Chec Sustainer auch zweckentfremden um verloren gegangene Gegenstände in unzugänglichen Ecken zu suchen oder um in Geräte hineinzuschauen, die Sie mit bloßem Auge nicht erreichen können. Eine Spiegelsterilisation ist allerdings nach solchen Aktionen obligatorisch.
Und selbstverständlich können Sie mit dem X-Chec Sustainer auch den Zahnzustand Ihres Lieblings bzw. Ihrer Lieblinge kontrollieren (dazu empfehlen wir allerdings einen oder mehrere weitere Spiegel (;-) und die Nutzung eines Beißholzes, damit der Spiegelhalter nicht durch einen ungewollten Kauversuch verbogen wird). Besonders Hunde mögen keinen Blick in ihr Maul (Katzen sind auch nicht besonders glücklich darüber).


Wer könnte unser Produkt brauchen?

Der X-Chec Sustainer ist für alle da.
Die Zahngesundheit bei Kindern unter 14 Jahren (empfohlenes Alter) können von Mama oder Papa bequem angesehen und im Verdachtsfall vom Arzt geprüft werden.
Jugendliche ab 14 prüfen Ihren Mundhygienezustand am besten selbst. So werden sie nicht von den Eltern gegängelt und Flirtprobleme lassen sich am besten verhindern!
Erwachsene werden schon aus Kostengründen unsere Sustainer lieben. Eine unnütze Fahrt inklusive Wartezeit zum Arzt und der entstehenden Behandlungskosten1 holt die Anschaffungskosten schon wieder rein.
Ältere Leute ersparen sich mühsame Fahrten zum Arzt und durch die Projektionsfähigkeit der Bilder auf beliebig große Bildschirme können sogar die meisten Einschränkungen bei Sehbehinderungen überbrückt werden.


Wessen Probleme löst unser Produkt?

Der X-Chec Sustainer löst einige Probleme von Ihnen und denen Ihres Arztes.
Sie haben eine „wann immer ich es will“ Kontrolle Ihres Mundgesundheitszustandes, spart Ihnen unnötige Kosten, Fahr-, Warte- und Untersuchungszeiten. Damit schonen Sie sogar die Umwelt!
Ihr Arzt hat keine gefüllten Wartezimmer mit Patienten, die noch keine Behandlung benötigen und hat mehr Zeit für die, die seiner Aufmerksamkeit bedürfen.
Ihre Bilder kann er prüfen, wann es in seine Zeitpläne am Besten passt, Ihre Diagnose sendet er Ihnen bequem per App zurück. Er kann Ihnen gleich Terminvorschläge mitsenden, die Sie bequem per App bestätigen können.
Sie entscheiden den besten Zeitpunkt für Ihre Behandlung bei Ihrem Doc. Bei Unsicherheiten können Sie sich anonym auch noch eine Gegenmeinung einholen, ohne Ihrem Arzt misstrauen zu signalisieren.

Wer möchte unser Produkt haben?

Der X-Chec Sustainer ist grundsätzlich für alle da.
Vom Kleinkind bis zur Seniorin oder Senior ist es die ideale Ergänzung zur täglichen Mundhygienekontrolle.
Besonders empfehlenswert ist der Cross Checker für:

  • Kostenbewusste
  • Umweltbewusste
  • Termingeplagte
  • Gesundheitsbewusste und vom Mundgeruch geplagte Menschen

Positive Effekte durch die Nutzung?

Mit einem X-Chec Sustainer entwickeln Sie das angenehme Gefühl, den Gesundheitszustand Ihrer Zähne immer unter Kontrolle zu haben. Die von den meisten Menschen empfundene Unsicherheit in den Wartezimmern der Zahnärzte können Sie getrost vergessen. Völlig schmerzfrei werden Ihre eventuell notwendigen Behandlungen dadurch natürlich auch nicht. Aber Sie sind ja für die Pflege Ihrer Zähne verantwortlich und können durch die häufige (möglichst tägliche) Kontrolle alle nachteiligen Veränderungen wahrnehmen und entsprechend behandeln. Die meisten Schädigungen unsers Gebisses entstehen ja nicht durch mangelnde Pflege sondern dadurch, dass wir die Gründe für die Kariesbildung nicht entdecken können. Ein Sustainer X-Chec nach der Pflege deckt sofort übersehene Verunreinigungen auf. Zahnsteinbildung wird schon im Frühstadium erkannt und kann erheblich einfacher behandelt werden.

X-Chec your body

Unser Team
Enthusiasmus,
es gibt kein besseres Wort für die Motivation unserer Teammitglieder.Für alle Teammitglieder ist es eine Tatsache, dass sie an einem Projekt arbeiten welches Ihnen eine große Kosteneinsparung, ein hohes Maß an zusätzlicher Sicherheit und Zeiteinsparung bietet.Das ganze Team arbeitet hochmotiviert an diesen Zielen.Alle Mitglieder des Teams sind leidenschaftlich daran interessiert, Ihnen Topqualität, Langlebigkeit und ein umweltgerechtes Produkt zu liefern.

Ihr Spaß bei der Arbeit, ihre Ruhe bei den Produkttests und ihr Wille eine Toptechnologie und einen Topservice zu liefern, begeistert mich immer wieder.Und das besonders schöne an der Sache, alle ticken so.Kaufen Sie unser X-Chec tracking device und wir liefern Ihnen ein Gerät, welches Ihre Sicherheit, Ihre Gesundheitsüberwachung und Ihre Freizeit erhöht bzw. erheblich verbessert.Eine neue Technologie hat auch immer eine besondere Faszination.
Stretch Goals (Dehnbare Ziele)
No 1.: 
Alle Unterstützer der X-Chec Technologie erhalten bei Erreichung einer Umsatzschwelle von 1 Million Euro einen kostenlosen sterilisierbaren Zusatzmundspiegel. Dieses Geschenk entspricht einem Zusatzrabatt von 5 %.

No 2.:
Wenn wir eine Umsatzschwelle von 1,5 Millionen Euro überschreiten, bieten wir 4 weitere coole Farben der X-Chec Basisgeräte an. Sollten wir dieses Ziel erreichen, fragen wir am Ende der Kampagne nach Ihren persönlichen Farbwünschen.
Black & White und zukünftige Optionen

Coole Farben
X-Chec Farbvariationen nach Ihrem Geschmack: Wenn Sie es wollen!


Was bekomme ich?

Perk No 007
Leider geheim. Aber wenn Sie sich auf unserer Webseite als potenzieller Kunde der Zukunft eintragen, laden wir Sie gerne in unseren VIP-Club ein und senden Ihnen den geheimen Indiegogo Link  der Ihnen den Zugang zu diesem besonderen Angebot ermöglicht. 
FAQ´s - Die häufig gestellten Fragen zum Produkt
Wichtig! Gegenanzeige
Der X-Chec Sustainer ist kein Ersatz für Ihre Zahnärztin oder Ihren Zahnarzt!Der X-Chec Sustainer hat nur die Funktion Sie bei der Überwachung Ihres Mundhygienezustandes zu unterstützen.In Zweifelsfällen sollten Sie immer Ihre Zahnärztin oder Ihren Zahnarzt konsultieren.
Was macht unser Produkt so besonders?
Der X-Chec Sustainer ist die erste Mundkamera mit App- Verbindung zur Kommunikation mit all Ihren elektronischen Geräten und zur Verbindung mit Ihrem Doc für eine Schnelldiagnose ohne aufwändigen Arztbesuch.Die mitgelieferte App erlaubt Ihnen die vergrößerte Übertragung Ihrer Bilder wahlweise auf Smartphone, Smartwatch, Pad, Laptop oder anderen digitalen Darstellungsgeräten (z.B. Fernseher). Die Bilder können wahlweise archiviert oder zum Beispiel auch an Ihren Arzt versendet werden.Mit der App werden Bilder mit typischen Erkrankungen der Zähne in verschiedenen Stadien geliefert , sodass Sie eine erste grobe Einschätzung haben, ob die von Ihnen festgestellten Mängel schon behandlungsfähig sind oder ob Sie noch warten können. Die endgültige Entscheidung sollte aber immer Ihre Ärztin oder Ihr Arzt fällen.

Welche Probleme löst unser Produkt?
Mit dem X-Chec Sustainer können Sie zu jeder Zeit den Gesundheitszustand Ihrer Zähne auch an den Stellen beobachten, die normalerweise nur Ihr Zahnarzt sieht.Sie können den Reinigungszustand Ihrer Zähne in jeder Ecke beurteilen. Mundgeruch kann so extrem sicher bekämpft werden.Sie müssen nicht mehr routinemäßig zum Zahnarzt, sondern nur, wenn es auch einen Anlass gibt.Sie ersparen sich unnötige Kosten, Fahr- und Wartezeit.

Wo funktioniert unser Produkt?
Ein X-Chec Sustainer ist eigentlich nichts anderes als ein Zahnarztspiegel mit angebauter Kamera und Übertragungssystem.Das im Sustainer befindliche Kamerasystem sendet die Bildinformationen via Bluetooth-Schnittstelle auf Ihre Peripheriegeräte.Im Gehäuse des X-Checkers befindet sich außerdem eine Batterie-Ladeeinheit, die per Induktion aufgeladen werden kann. Deshalb funktioniert das Gerät auch kabellos.Die W-LAN Schnittstelle hat eine Reichweite von bis zu 5 Metern. Die Bildübertragung funktioniert nur mit Ihrer persönlichen App. So ist sichergestellt, dass kein anderer die Bilder Ihres X-Checers empfangen kann!Das Ladegerät ist ein Standardcharger wie Sie es von vielen Geräten (z.B. elektrische Zahnbürste oder Munddusche) kennen.

Wo kann man unser Produkt gut gebrauchen?
Ein X-Chec Sustainer funktioniert fast überall. Sein Temperatureinsatzbereich liegt inklusive dem Ladegerät bei -10 bis +40 Grad Celsius. Er ist wasserdicht bis zu einem Meter Tauchtiefe und kann unter fließendem Wasser mit einer Temperatur von bis zu 40 Grad Celsius (Handwarm) mit einem für Kunststoff zugelassenes Reinigungsmittel gereinigt werden.Die Spiegelsysteme können bequem im kochenden Wasser sterilisiert werden.Das Ladegerät sollte nur mit für Kunststoff zugelassenem Reinigungsmittel gesäubert werden und darf keinesfalls unter fließendem Wasser gereinigt werden. Bitte nur mit einem feuchten Tuch reinigen. Bei der Reinigung des Ladegerätes ist grundsätzlich der Netzstecker zu ziehen!
Natürlich können Sie Ihren X-Chec Sustainer auch zweckentfremden um verloren gegangene Gegenstände in unzugänglichen Ecken zu suchen oder um in Geräte hineinzuschauen, die Sie mit bloßem Auge nicht erreichen können. Eine Spiegelsterilisation ist allerdings nach solchen Aktionen obligatorisch.Und selbstverständlich können Sie mit dem X-Chec Sustainer auch den Zahnzustand Ihres Lieblings bzw. Ihrer Lieblinge kontrollieren (dazu empfehlen wir allerdings einen oder mehrere weitere Spiegel (;-) und die Nutzung eines Beißholzes, damit der Spiegelhalter nicht durch einen ungewollten Kauversuch verbogen wird). Besonders Hunde mögen keinen Blick in ihr Maul (Katzen sind auch nicht besonders glücklich darüber).

Wer könnte unser Produkt brauchen?
Der X-Chec Sustainer ist für alle da.Die Zahngesundheit bei Kindern unter 14 Jahren (empfohlenes Alter) können von Mama oder Papa bequem angesehen und im Verdachtsfall vom Arzt geprüft werden.Jugendliche ab 14 prüfen Ihren Mundhygienezustand am besten selbst. So werden sie nicht von den Eltern gegängelt und Flirtprobleme lassen sich am besten verhindern!Erwachsene werden schon aus Kostengründen unsere Sustainer lieben. Eine unnütze Fahrt inklusive Wartezeit zum Arzt und der entstehenden Behandlungskosten1 holt die Anschaffungskosten schon wieder rein.Ältere Leute ersparen sich mühsame Fahrten zum Arzt und durch die Projektionsfähigkeit der Bilder auf beliebig große Bildschirme können sogar die meisten Einschränkungen bei Sehbehinderungen überbrückt werden.

Wessen Probleme löst unser Produkt?
Der X-Chec Sustainer löst einige Probleme von Ihnen und denen Ihres Arztes.Sie haben eine „wann immer ich es will“ Kontrolle Ihres Mundgesundheitszustandes, spart Ihnen unnötige Kosten, Fahr-, Warte- und Untersuchungszeiten. Damit schonen Sie sogar die Umwelt!Ihr Arzt hat keine gefüllten Wartezimmer mit Patienten, die noch keine Behandlung benötigen und hat mehr Zeit für die, die seiner Aufmerksamkeit bedürfen.Ihre Bilder kann er prüfen, wann es in seine Zeitpläne am Besten passt, Ihre Diagnose sendet er Ihnen bequem per App zurück. Er kann Ihnen gleich Terminvorschläge mitsenden, die Sie bequem per App bestätigen können.Sie entscheiden den besten Zeitpunkt für Ihre Behandlung bei Ihrem Doc. Bei Unsicherheiten können Sie sich anonym auch noch eine Gegenmeinung einholen, ohne Ihrem Arzt misstrauen zu signalisieren.
Wer möchte unser Produkt haben?
Der X-Chec Sustainer ist grundsätzlich für alle da.Vom Kleinkind bis zur Seniorin oder Senior ist es die ideale Ergänzung zur täglichen Mundhygienekontrolle.Besonders empfehlenswert ist der Cross Checker für:

Kostenbewusste
Umweltbewusste
Termingeplagte
Gesundheitsbewusste und vom Mundgeruch geplagte Menschen

Positive Effekte durch die Nutzung?
Mit einem X-Chec Sustainer entwickeln Sie das angenehme Gefühl, den Gesundheitszustand Ihrer Zähne immer unter Kontrolle zu haben. Die von den meisten Menschen empfundene Unsicherheit in den Wartezimmern der Zahnärzte können Sie getrost vergessen. Völlig schmerzfrei werden Ihre eventuell notwendigen Behandlungen dadurch natürlich auch nicht. Aber Sie sind ja für die Pflege Ihrer Zähne verantwortlich und können durch die häufige (möglichst tägliche) Kontrolle alle nachteiligen Veränderungen wahrnehmen und entsprechend behandeln. Die meisten Schädigungen unsers Gebisses entstehen ja nicht durch mangelnde Pflege sondern dadurch, dass wir die Gründe für die Kariesbildung nicht entdecken können. Ein Sustainer X-Chec nach der Pflege deckt sofort übersehene Verunreinigungen auf. Zahnsteinbildung wird schon im Frühstadium erkannt und kann erheblich einfacher behandelt werden.

X-Chec your body

story:
I Don't know how many times I've sat on the shore, watching Whales, Dolphins, Seals and more drift by...

Wondering what it would be like to see into their world. What's going on below that tiny spot of the whale's back I can see. How the dolphins are playing and interacting together. What else might be going on in that seal colony. Are there sharks out there? What about that spot that looks perfect for fishing but I'd spend half my afternoon trying to get to?

You don't have to wonder any more!

The DroneSnorkl attaches to Any drone that can lift at least 2 pounds or so (it weighs 1/2 a pound - about 230 grams - but you need some excess lifting capacity). You can film using a GoPro Hero 4 or GoPro Hero 5/6 (Not included), or you can buy the LIVE version and use your drone's camera to see into the underwater world REAL TIME!

The ability to view the feed in real time can be critical- imagine getting your drone back after managing to get it right over the top of a pod of killer whales... Only to find out the killer whales were on the very edge of the shot the whole time and you missed it... But, as you can imagine, transmitting video live from a water-tight container 20 feet below your drone - and while avoiding even an extra gram of weight... Well, that's not easy to do at all.

Additionally, the system is designed to fit any camera of your choice! As long as your camera is under 2.5" wide and your drone can lift it, you can use it! 

It's easy to fly as well! It lets you fly the drone 20 feet off the water while peering into it, and we worked so hard to keep every aspect of the system lightweight that the flight controls of your drone will still work exactly as they are supposed to.

The DroneSnorkl is sealed on either end by dual o-rings, and has a carbon fiber stabilizer and float that holds the housing so that the camera and lens point downward - allowing you to film and see into any lake, stream, or the ocean! The drone hovers 20 feet above the water, while the DroneSnorkl is towed on the surface by a tether to the drone.

Oh, and by the way - We'll fulfill the FIRST 50 ORDERS PLACED BEFORE DECEMBER 12 by Christmas!! We might be able to fulfill a lot more than that, but we can do at least that many! Order now and we'll ship yours within a week!

A drone is BY FAR the best platform for exploring underwater ecosystems. If you're on a kayak or paddle board, you're going to go about 2 miles per hour, while still needing a GoPro and something like a selfie stick to do any filming. You'll never catch whales, dolphins, sharks, etc that way - and you won't be able to explore numerous fishing locations, either. SCUBA diving and using boats are great, but they're expensive, difficult to do at any point in time, not allowed with some marine animals, and it can be dangerous to SCUBA dive around other marine animals. Underwater Remotely Operated Vehicles (ROVs) are generally limited to a short tether, slow speeds, and high costs... In other words, using a drone for underwater filming opens up possibilities that have never before existed!

In the video, we are testing the DroneSnorkl on a stock DJI Phantom 3 drone at 7800 - 8500 feet above sea level (around 2500 meters). After doing everything we could to shave off every gram we could throughout the prototyping process, the end result flies perfectly even in the thin air with an entry level drone with no modifications, AND while adding the weight of a GoPro Hero 4 to the system. Plus the water landing gear as well!

The DroneSnorkl is built of gorgeous, high performance materials. In order to get the system to function properly, even high up in the Rocky Mountains on an entry-level drone, we had to design the system to last AS WELL as to shave every bit of weight we possibly could. As a result, the DroneSnorkl is crafted of 100% Carbon Fiber tubes for the float stabilizer, aircraft grade 6061-T6 aluminum for the main housing, Lexan (bulletproof glass) for the lens, and ultra-lightweight paracord for its tether! It uses ultra-high-quality double silicone O-rings on the seals for each closure to keep your camera dry and clear from moisture. You can use any camera that's under 2.5 inches wide (6.4cm) and under about 125 grams or more - including GoPro Hero 4, GoPro Hero 5, the DJI or other cameras from your drone's gimbal and more. If you're using the camera from your drone's gimbal, you can use cameras weighing 250 grams or more. And that's with a stock DJI Phantom 3 with about a 2.5 pound maximum lifting capacity at sea level - with a more powerful drone there really isn't much limit to your camera weight. I'm an Aerospace Engineer with a Masters degree from Stanford University - anything that flies is my expertise. We made sure the DroneSnorkl is a phenomenal product made with excellent engineering, the ultimate in materials, AND that it's easy to use.

 

As you can see, the DroneSnorkl allows your drone to fly well clear of the body of water that you're filming into - 20 feet is plenty of margin for error. When we were first filming with the DroneSnorkl, I only had 15 minutes of experience flying quadcopter drones. At Stanford we build autonomous, GPS guided, fixed wing UAVs - but I was never the one getting them up and flying under RC control before letting the software and electronics take over. Nonetheless, I had no problem piloting the DroneSnorkl as a novice and at very high altitudes. Though we highly recommend you spend at least an hour in a field practicing setting the DroneSnorkl down onto the surface, then picking it back up again.

A ton of very difficult engineering and problem solving went into the design of the DroneSnorkl. One of the most interesting solutions involved limiting the pendulum swing that the attachment causes while flying. At first, when trying to fly our prototypes in the real world, we found that the weight of the attachment combined with the long tether resulted an enormous pendulum swing effect that was almost avoidable after takeoff. This made it a very slow process to maneuver the drone and made it quite difficult to keep it where you want it. After hours and hours of thought and debating how on earth we could bring this under control, we finally arrived at a brilliant and incredibly simple solution - we attached a small parachute several feet up the tether from the DroneSnorkl, fixed to the tether line. This parachute is too small to cause significant pull in a light breeze, but when the system starts to swing like a pendulum, the drag of the parachute counters the swing and brings it under control! It works so well that while taking the picture seen above, we let the DJI autopilot hold the drone still while I adjusted the DroneSnorkl by hand as the drone held it suspended in midair! The autopilot could control it by itself just fine. AND at 7800 feet above sea level!

Finally, we designed optional floating landing gear for your drone to make sure that in the event of an emergency, you can safely set your drone down on the water and then use a kayak, paddle board, boat, or even swim out and get it. The landing gear are built of carbon fiber tubing to keep them lightweight (you can only add a few ounces to a system like a DJI Phantom 3) and strong. They are designed to fit the landing skids of DJI Phantom 3 and 4 drones, and probably earlier models as well, though I'm sure with a little ingenuity you can mount them to almost any drone. We ultimately have to hide the beautiful carbon fiber construction with foam to make sure they float - as any hollow plastic or similar floats are just too heavy. But the landing gear are extremely useful, very high quality, and we would never fly over water without them - knowing you aren't going to lose your drone if the battery drops while it is out over water is a huge relief.

The DroneSnorkl has two versions: DroneSnorkl LIVE includes a cable that goes through a seal in the top closure and then runs up the tether to your drone, so that you can put your drone's camera into the DroneSnorkl and see underwater LIVE from your drone! That does, however, require some slight disassembly because you must remove your camera from its gimbal and mount it in the DroneSnorkl and then connect the cable. The DroneSnorkl GoPro has a solid top closure and thus seals the camera in for use with GoPros and other cameras that are 2.5" wide or less - such as GoPro Hero 4, GoPro Hero 5, GoPro Hero 6. 

To make sure your drone stays safe over water, we created carbon fiber landing skids that widen and lengthen your drone's footprint, raise it farther away from the water, AND include floats to allow your drone to land on water in an emergency. We never fly over water without them- and recommend you don't either. Take a look at how cool they are!:


Make sure your drone can lift at least 2 pounds - 900 grams (as DJI Phantom 3, Phantom 4 and any equivalent or more powerful drone can). Of course you should never fly in anything more than a light breeze, and should be extremely careful of waves, as powerful waves can drag the DroneSnorkl around - and it is attached to your drone. Be sure to bring the drone home while it still has plenty of charge, as it is lifting a lot more weight than it would with nothing attached. And be sure to practice and experiment to be comfortable using your drone with the DroneSnorkl attached - we aren't responsible for any damage to your drone while using DroneSnorkl, so be sure to have a good handle on using it before taking it out on difficult missions! It really is, however, quite easy to use. Just be sure to practice enough!

The DroneSnorkl is a phenomenal system and quite honestly we've gotten addicted to flying it. Drone's are amazing because they show us our world from a different perspective... But the DroneSnorkl takes that into a completely different paradigm - and shows us a world that is normally closed off or very difficult for us to explore. From marine mammals to coral reefs to fishing spots, the DroneSnorkl opens up the rest of the world to all of us! We hope you love it as much as we do!!

story:
Short Summary

The DBPOWER N6 is a great camera at a great price, but if you’re trying to shoot underwater video with it, you’ll quickly find that there aren’t any underwater filters available for it. I’ve searched high and low for them. I’ve wasted my money on GoPro filters that looked they might fit – they did not. I even tried modifying those GoPro filters to fit the DBPOWER N6, but gave up on that idea after I lost one of them on the first snorkel outing – there’s enough plastic in the ocean, I don’t need to add to it.

Without a filter, though, my videos came out decidedly blah. It was very sad indeed to watch hours of blue images float by and try to remember the beautiful colors I actually saw.

So, I’ve decided to take matters into my own hands and find a manufacturer to custom-make filters for the DBPOWER N6.

Don’t waste your money on filters that won’t fit, or worse, end up with footage that’s so far from capturing the beauty of your experience that you might as well not have shot it to begin with.

All goes well, we should be able to ship these by February – hopefully in time for your next trip!

 

What We Need & What You Get

This parts fairly simple. You get a set of underwater filters for your DBPOWER N6 action camera. 

If we do not reach our funding goal, you don’t get charged. Unfortunately, you also probably won’t get filters that fit your camera. So please help us spread the word!

 

Risks & Challenges

The key challenge once we reach our goal will be to find a quality supplier. I will procure several prototypes from different suppliers to make sure we get the best quality for our money.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Help us spread the word by using Indiegogo’s sharing tools!

 

Chasing Coral

Lastly, as a fellow diver/snorkeler I cannot stress enough that you should watch Chasing Coral on Netflix.

It’s one of the most inspiring, beautiful, and sadly distressing documentaries I’ve watched in a long time and I sat down for hours afterwards spreading the word about it on social media and looking for ways to get involved in the fight to save our precious coral reefs.

If this project is successful and there’s a profit left over at the end of it, I’m committed to donating a large portion of it to help the conservation of coral reefs.
story_txt:
Short Summary
The DBPOWER N6 is a great camera at a great price, but if you’re trying to shoot underwater video with it, you’ll quickly find that there aren’t any underwater filters available for it. I’ve searched high and low for them. I’ve wasted my money on GoPro filters that looked they might fit – they did not. I even tried modifying those GoPro filters to fit the DBPOWER N6, but gave up on that idea after I lost one of them on the first snorkel outing – there’s enough plastic in the ocean, I don’t need to add to it.
Without a filter, though, my videos came out decidedly blah. It was very sad indeed to watch hours of blue images float by and try to remember the beautiful colors I actually saw.
So, I’ve decided to take matters into my own hands and find a manufacturer to custom-make filters for the DBPOWER N6.
Don’t waste your money on filters that won’t fit, or worse, end up with footage that’s so far from capturing the beauty of your experience that you might as well not have shot it to begin with.
All goes well, we should be able to ship these by February – hopefully in time for your next trip!
 
What We Need & What You Get
This parts fairly simple. You get a set of underwater filters for your DBPOWER N6 action camera. 
If we do not reach our funding goal, you don’t get charged. Unfortunately, you also probably won’t get filters that fit your camera. So please help us spread the word!
 
Risks & Challenges
The key challenge once we reach our goal will be to find a quality supplier. I will procure several prototypes from different suppliers to make sure we get the best quality for our money.
 
Other Ways You Can Help
Help us spread the word by using Indiegogo’s sharing tools!
 
Chasing Coral
Lastly, as a fellow diver/snorkeler I cannot stress enough that you should watch Chasing Coral on Netflix.
It’s one of the most inspiring, beautiful, and sadly distressing documentaries I’ve watched in a long time and I sat down for hours afterwards spreading the word about it on social media and looking for ways to get involved in the fight to save our precious coral reefs.
If this project is successful and there’s a profit left over at the end of it, I’m committed to donating a large portion of it to help the conservation of coral reefs.

story:
And now, I with my friend Nikolay found a solution that everyone can afford! For shooting is no longer needed a videographer! Now it's enough to install a camera with a wide angle lens before the game starts, and after to process the video with a computer program that will perform the videographer's work much better and for free.

This technology doesn't require using of different sensors and detectors, as all processes are occurring in computer, basing on already footage materials. This technology is ideal for mostly kinds of team sports, such as football, basketball, hockey, five-a-side football, handball or beach football.



Who can use this technology?
 
* Game organizers and participants
* Parents of children athletes
* And even professional teams


 To complete the development and testing the technology, we need the help of programmers. For this scope, we open a fund-raising. We will be glad to any help, and also we ask to share our project among your friends and relatives.

Let's do shooting afford to everyone!

story:
Regular size gimbal                                               Coolcam g3a

 

                           

    

                                

                

 

   

 

                                              

 

                                               

 

                                              
                                             

 

 
       
 
 
 

  REWARDS FOR BACKING          

        
 
 
        
 

                 

 

           

                     

 

                    

         

 

           

 

        

 

 

 

                       Way of use

 

          

 

 

Timeline

 

 

                                                       

 

 

           

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

General

 

Are you offering a warranty on Coolcam g3a?

Yes, we are offering a 1-year warranty. Warranty is only for exchange of a defective unit. No returns for refund.

 

Are you hiring?

No.

 

The price is very low for a g3a xis camera compared with other brand. Why is that?

Our dream is to make the innovation cameras accessible to everyone. We have worked long and hard to create cameras that are not only affordable, but also made of quality components. To help us bring Coolcam g3a to reality, you can get an exclusive up to 55% discount off MSRP.

 

Technical

 

Will there be an Android App?

Yes, there is an Android and iOS APP. The APPs are ready for operation and will be released before the shipping.

 

How do you know how much power is left in the batteries?

You can see the battery status on the screen, or in the App.

 

How do you know how much memory is remaining? 

You can see the remaining storage status on the screen, or in the App.

 

Does Coolcam g3a come with a memory card?

No, we are not including a memory card with your order.

 

Will a charging cable come with Coolcam g3a?

Yes, each package will include a Micro USB for charging.

 

How many hours will Coolcam g3a last if only used for taking pictures?

There are many factors and conditions to calculate this, but generally the battery life should last you for more than 1 day.

 

Can Coolcam g3a connect to a microphone through a 3.5mm mic adapter?

Coolcam g3a does not have a 3.5mm port because we are trying to keep the camera as small as possible.

 

Can Coolcam g3a handle extreme temperatures?

No.

 

How long will it take to completely charge the internal camera battery?

This depends on the type of charger you are using, but generally it will take 2 hours.

 

What is the Battery Life (estimated time) of Coolcam g3a?

Video recording with charged inner battery is estimated at 30min. Additional battery for example 600 mpA, can give time of video recording approximately 90min.

 

What is the WIFI range?

WIFI range is about 60m - 100m.

 

Is the focus automatic? Or is that done also through the screen?

Focus is automatic.

 

Coolcam g3a can charge on 100-220 volts right?

The Coolcam g3a should not be charged on 100-220 volt, it should be charged by a Micro-USB cable, which means it depends on the USB adapter in your region.

 

Is it possible to use a Bluetooth remote?

Coolcam g3a provides remote control via 2.4G, which is more stable than Bluetooth.

 

Payment and Shipping

 

How confident are you that you can deliver on time?

 We have built closer relationships with our manufacturing partners and the fulfillment vendors. The prototype of Coolcam g3a was ready months ago and extensive testing has already been performed. We are confident in our ability to meet the timeline. Although unforeseen obstacles can arise during any manufacturing process, we intend to run everything efficiently, transparently.

 

How much is shipping?

We ship worldwide and the cost is $20.

 

Can I pick the camera up in Cooltech office and avoid the shipping charge?

Sorry, we'd love to meet you, but the cameras are shipped from our manufacturing partners by air. We have to pay shipping on every camera. 

 

When does it ship?

The estimated shipping date is June 2017.

 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible; please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It should be 0% in the US and varies internationally.  

Can I get a refund?

Please refer to IndieGoGo's policy.

 

Risks and challenges

While we're doing a lot of the work ourselves, obviously we have to rely on others (manufacture, shipping) to provide their end. We're confident that these parts will be no problem, as we're talking to established companies here. We will also go to China ourselves to oversee production, and we were worked with the factory we wish to use before, so communication between us and the factory will not be an issue. But talking to other people who have run Indiegogo, there is always something that comes up, be it customs, shipping, the manufacturing not being up to scratch or any other of the many things that can delay the process. We will do our best, and hope to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way.

We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

Thanks from the whole team :)

 

 

   ___________________________________________________________________

Cooltech Systems Limited

                         Suite B, 29 Harley Street, London, England, W1G 9QR

                         email: cooltech683@gmail.com

But talking to other people who have run Indiegogo, there is always something that comes up, be it customs, shipping, the manufacturing not being up to scratch or any other of the many things that can delay the process. We will do our best, and hope to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way.We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!Thanks from the whole team :)     ___________________________________________________________________

story:
Watch this Complete System Overview

 

See How Versatile Cinerails Can Be

 

Why I Made it

I made the Cinerails Track and Dolly because I needed something that would give me the same quality filmmakers in LA were using, without having to mortgage my house.  Not only did I do it, but I made it even better...  a track with variable arc and you can run full camera rigs on it!

  • My background:  I've worked on feature films, network originals, etc.
  • My belief:  I love putting smiles on faces, and this product does that
  • My team:  You!  Together we can access better prices and better material in quantity

I don't need to be rich.  I just want to take this product to the top in quality.  And in doing so, give us all the ability to enjoy what we do.

Here's What Award Winning Cinematographer Shane Hurlbut is saying about Cinerails: http://www.thehurlblog.com/snaptrack-cinerails-camera-dolly-system-film-education/

 

Watch How You Can Use Cinerails to Film Like a Pro

 

See How Cinerails was Used in the Making of a Movie Trailer

 

Here's what Emm at CheesyCam says about Cinerails:  http://cheesycam.com/cinerails-track-dolly-system-and-filmmaking-tip-for-creating-better-dolly-shots/

 

What We Need & What You Get

We've already sold hundreds.  So, we've got the manufacturing down.  But now, we want to make them out of Carbon Fiber, and give you a customized production bag that's perfect for travel and storage of the Cinerails Track and Dolly System:

  • We need $36K to place an order for quality carbon fiber and bags at a volume discount . When this happens, we increase the value of the product, while passing the savings on to you.
  • Many of our product users are super excited at the possibility of going high tech and getting a custom bag, but they already have the system.  No problem.  Our list of perks allows you to get only what you need.  If all you need is a bag, we have a perk for that.  Only need the carbon fiber rails, we've got ya covered.  And If you want the full system so that you can start filming like the pros, we've got you covered there too.  Plus, I'll show you how I use Cinerails to film for film and TV, and step ahead of the next guy or gal.
  • I've done this before.  Four years ago I started a campaign on Kickstarter and that's how Cinerails came about. It was a huge success, and went without a glitch.  Not only did I get Cinerails in the hands of a lot of real filmmakers, I also helped a lot of amateurs look like pros, and I've made a lot of friends who keep in touch even today.

Every time you add something new to the process, it has to be tested and proven first:

  • We've bought and tested numerous carbon fiber materials, and now know the best to use.
  • After designing and testing the new production bag, we now have an actual prototype that is AWESOME!
  • We've been selling online for four years now to filmmakers and producers in LA, New York, Germany, Australia, Denmark, you name it.  And you'd be surprised to know who uses them.  How about a show that airs on Saturday night.  No, I can't say their name, but they bought one too.
  • I'm not going to wait.  If I see that we fund ahead of time, I'll get to work ordering and manufacturing your perks so that we meet or beat our deadline.

 

Watch How To Get Professional Results with Ease

 

Risks & Challenges

As with everything, there are risks and challenges, but having been in business and consulting with those who have even more experience than me means we expect those challenges and plan for them.

  • For the last two years, I've researched and talked to others about the possible challenges of ordering materials from overseas.  And now I'm ready.  I now know how to guarantee and enforce delivery of a quality product
  • I can't do it all myself.  That's why experienced professionals have been my go-to resource.

Want Proof of How Great Cinerails Works?

Here's what others doing with them:

Motorizing the Dolly

Curving the Track

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you have no reason to buy the system, but like me, just love being a part of something that helps others, there are two ways you can help

  • Get noisy and let others know about this campaign.  Tell them to share it through their social media like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.  Or simply click on one of the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Or, you can make a donation of $10, $25, or $50

Want Proof of How Great Cinerails Works?
Here's what others doing with them:
Motorizing the Dolly


Curving the Track

If you have no reason to buy the system, but like me, just love being a part of something that helps others, there are two ways you can help

Get noisy and let others know about this campaign.  Tell them to share it through their social media like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, etc.  Or simply click on one of the Indiegogo share tools!
Or, you can make a donation of $10, $25, or $50

story:
If you think that dashcams are only used to film the road ahead, think again!  Often, a small mistake on the road could lead to something even serious and complicated. 

 

SOLVE ALL THESE PROBLEMS WITH OCTA-EYE

 

 

Always be prepared on the road

OCTA-Eye is a versatile dash cam that can be paired with up to EIGHT additional safety integration, giving a personalized experience to suit any drivers!

Constantly keeping you informed on the road situation around you with audio reminders during your drive which greatly boosts your driving safety. Recording and safety have never been so convenient and at ease.

✅ Driving Assistance Prompts - Green Light Prompt, Front Vehicle Start Prompt, Speed Limit Sign Prompt

✅ Drowsy Driving Alerts using AI 

✅ Crime Deterrent Light

✅ Flexible Pairing Up To 8 ADDITIONAL Safety Driving Integrations*

*Note that you will require a receiver in order for integration features to work.

 

A NEW DRIVING EXPERIENCE WITHIN YOUR FINGERTIPS.

 

 

Crystal Clear and Distinct 1080P Full HD

Coated with 3 layers of glass lens and an infrared lens for crystal-clear images, even in low-light settings. These pairings enhance light transmission, reduce reflections, and prevent the cracked glass from extreme temperatures.

 

High Reliability

Our lab experts put every product through several rigorous testing before release, including several beta testings. 

The breakdown of OCTA-Eye is kept LOW even after being put through eight different harsh conditions.

 

Here are some feedbacks from our customers who bought from us previously.

THERE ARE MORE!

 

Low Battery Consumption, High Video Quality

CMOS Image Sensor allows constant FHD 1080p Front and HD 720p Rear recording during both daytime and nighttime along with a 130-degree wide-angle lens view. 

 

Always On Alert While Conserving Your Car

 

Various Recording Modes 

 

Peace Of Mind Throughout Your Journey

 

 

Personalize Your Journey For A Safer Ride

OCTA-Eye constantly notify drivers with the real-time situation on the road at the convenience and safety of the driver with the 8 SAFETY INTEGRATIONS!  

 

You won't be in these situations in the first place!

 

 

OCTA-EYE ADD-ONS

 

*The above image is for reference only.

Easily connect OCTA-Eye and all other safety integration to the real-time situations on the road with just a tap. Having all your safety within your fingertips, giving you assurance throughout your journey.

 

 

MORE ABOUT OCTA-EYE

 

EASY INSTALLATION

 

 

 

 

 

 

Each idea comes with challenges to turn it into reality. Our big team came together to put ideas together. Quality control is one key factor that we pride in our product. Our aim of a quality control system is to ensure that each product meets or exceeds specific standards. With that in mind, OCTA-Eye has undergone rigorous development, testing, and refinement. 

We know what it takes to bring a product to market and are confident that we can avoid any potential problems and stay on schedule. If some issues do unexpectedly arise, we promise to keep our backers updated about the situation and provide quick solutions.

 

 

HELP US SPREAD THE WORDS!

Facebook: @octa-eye

Instagram: @octaeye_official

Twitter: @octaeye

 Low Battery Consumption, High Video QualityCMOS Image Sensor allows constant FHD 1080p Front and HD 720p Rear recording during both daytime and nighttime along with a 130-degree wide-angle lens view.  Always On Alert While Conserving Your Car Various Recording Modes  Peace Of Mind Throughout Your Journey  Personalize Your Journey For A Safer RideOCTA-Eye constantly notify drivers with the real-time situation on the road at the convenience and safety of the driver with the 8 SAFETY INTEGRATIONS!   You won't be in these situations in the first place!  OCTA-EYE ADD-ONS *The above image is for reference only.Easily connect OCTA-Eye and all other safety integration to the real-time situations on the road with just a tap. Having all your safety within your fingertips, giving you assurance throughout your journey.  MORE ABOUT OCTA-EYE EASY INSTALLATION      Each idea comes with challenges to turn it into reality. Our big team came together to put ideas together. Quality control is one key factor that we pride in our product. Our aim of a quality control system is to ensure that each product meets or exceeds specific standards. With that in mind, OCTA-Eye has undergone rigorous development, testing, and refinement. We know what it takes to bring a product to market and are confident that we can avoid any potential problems and stay on schedule. If some issues do unexpectedly arise, we promise to keep our backers updated about the situation and provide quick solutions.  HELP US SPREAD THE WORDS!Facebook: @octa-eyeInstagram: @octaeye_officialTwitter: @octaeye

story:
The Dota 2 heroes now have a neutral item slot and can carry or equip only one neutral item at a time.

There is a Neutral Item Stash in the fountain. Apart from being more convenient to use, this place allows you to teleport your neutral items directly to it.

There are no more Shrines.

The backpack now has 3 slots instead of 4.

Outpost are now located in the primary jungles.

All GPM talents are removed from the game.

There are also various other small changes. In order to check everything that’s new, please read the entire change log.

story:
Whether you're a hobbiest or pro, take your filming to a whole new level

Offering 4K Video at 30fps using a 16MP Sensor,  you can review your footage on the built-in 2" LCD Screen. This compact waterproof camera is your all-in-one recording solution without the need for any additional and costly attachments.



More functions than you can poke a selfie stick at

Charge the ExtremeX Shot 5 camera for a breathtaking new experience in filming and photography. This easy to use device comes loaded with all the essential features to capture moments for a lifetime.

Go to migearextremex.com to see more


Boldy go where most cameras can't go

The ExtremeX Shot 5 camera can record in depths of up to 8M without the need for an additional protective case. This allows you to capture quality footage and audio with total confidence in wet conditions - rain, snow, snorkelling, swimming + more.


Powerfully sharp recordings 

Due to its superior digital processor, you can experience video recordings up to 4K Ultra High Definition. Combined with a 16MP Sensor capture crisp snapshots using an ultra wide angled lens.


Footage immediately at you fingertips 

Review your footage instantly on the built-in 2" waterproof LCD Screen. Unlike most cameras such as GoPro® and Mokacam, there is no need for an add on screen keeping your camera lightweight and compact.


Upload your content at a push of a button 

WiFi allows you to share your footage instantly to your social networks and GPS capabilities provide detailed geotagging, track timelapse, speed, location + more. Control your camera using your smartphone, tablet or wireless remote control.


All the functions with less of the fuss 

Many of our nearest competitors carry similar features but at the expense of other valuable functions, to achieve the same you have to buy further attachments adding to the weight and size... just go and take a look for yourself.


Everything you need to get started immediately  

Simply charge up and attach via the universal tripod fixing socket at the base of your camera, then get filming with included accessories such as adjustable bike and helmet mount. Take your remote control and all necessary cables to start recording your every adventure. 

Previously used a GoPro®? Good news - all the your GoPro® mounting accessories will fit the ExtremeX Shot 5!


PERK PACKS


STRETCH GOALS

It doesn't end here. The further we can reach the more we can pass back on to you.


Brought to market by E3 Style - we are one of Australia's leading technology companies. The previous successor of the ExtremeX Shot 5 went on to become a successful product, sold throughout popular retailers all over the world. Our company's expert engineers have years of experience producing technology products and have manufactured over 13 million products in China, using reliable factories with a reputation for quality.

E3's experience means that we have been able to anticipate manufacturing obstacles and put measures in place to reduce the likelihood of any delays bringing this product to market. Vigorous testing of prototypes has already taken place to verify the quality and reliability of the MGX Shot5 Device. Funds raised in this campaign will be used to produce and ship all pre-sold units by April 2016.


SUPPLY CHAIN LOGISTICS

We have a very capable team who have been developing millions of products over the last decade and more. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can sometimes occur. If that happens, we will be sure to keep you informed and up to date ensuring a quick resolve to any issues.


FAQS

Q: How does the camera mount?
A: The caseless design simply screws onto supplied mounts as you would on any
normal action camera  

Q: Is a waterproof case needed?
A: No the camera housing is waterproof itself up to 8m  

Q: Is the preview screen touchscreen? 
A: No Screen is not touch screen 

Q: Does the camera have a burst mode?
A: Yes    

Q: Does the device autofocus?  
A: Yes  

Q: Does the unit have an accelerometer?  
A: Yes  

Q: What accessories are included?  
A: Fully adjustable bike and helmet mounts, adaptor mount, remote control, cables and mounting accessories  

Q: What apps are included for the WiFi function? 
A: App will be available for IOS and Android devices 

Q: Software compatibility?  
A: Apple iOS 8 and above, Android 4.0 and above    

Q: What is the maximum support micro SD card storage?
A: 64GB  

Q: How do I charge my camera?
A: Use the charging cable provided in the box  

Q: How long does it take to recharge?
A: 4 Hours  

Q: What is the battery life?
A: Up to 2 Hours  

Q: Is the rechargeable battery removable or internal?
A: Battery is internal, it cannot be removed   

Q: How can I see how much battery or memory is left?
A: This will be shown on the preview screen 

Q: Is there any warranty on the ExtremeX Shot 5?
A: Yes, product comes with 1 year warranty

LEGAL DISCLAIMER

Images are for reference only. Final product design is subject to possible change. 


#CaptureAwesome

story:
http://www.boondoo.com
 
Review by The Lion Whisperer, Kevin Richardson:
 

 

HowToKillOnHour takes Boondoo for a test:

http://www.howtokillanhour.com/gadgets-tech/boondoo-mount?fbclid=IwAR2RtqGrTC3fTuAMC8qTLvzfqhCpR9UqaU-aY9bLEIg5VdrVYfZKOcMMbds

 

Showing off the angles of the Boondoo action camera mount with kite surfer Michelle Sky. Convenient when you can't stop the action!

 

 

 

 

Design

360 DEGREE PAN FUNCTION

Things change, angles change. With Boondoo’s snap-lock system you’ll always get the shot, without slowing down. To pan the camera, lift the mount with one hand to dislocate the locking gears, twist to find the new angle, and simply drop it to snap it back in place. Locked, loaded, and ready to shoot.

 

180 DEGREE TILT FUNCTION

With Boondoo's unique rattleproof tilt function you can find your angle on the move, and never miss the shot. With one hand, press the gear-lock button to release the tilt lock, tilt the camera to one of seven positions, and release. Dotted location markers on the mount show you which angle you’re in. No more stopping at every turn to adjust your angle, stay on the shot and follow the action!

 

Compatibility

Boondoo can be used with GoPro cameras, or any action camera that uses a GoPro mount or adaptor, and its compact, functional design fits your lifestyle.

 

Tech Specs

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Dimensions: 3.6" x 1.7" x 1.0" (92mm x 44mm x 25mm)
  • Weight: 2.9oz (82g)
  • Materials: Aluminium, Nylon and Stainless Steel
  • Pan Angle Stops: 8 angles - 0, 45, 90, 135, 180, 225, 270, 315, 360 (0)
  • Tilt Angle Stops: 7 angles - 0, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180

    Prototype specifications – the final product may vary.

    IN THE BOX

    • 1x Boondoo Camera Mount
    • 1x End Cap Tool
    • 1x Allen Key Tool
    • Bolts to fasten

     

    How to

    COVER ALL THE ANGLES

    Get the perfect angle without slowing down. On the road, on the snow, or in the water. Simply Pop, Lock, and Rock.

     

    Boondoo can be used with GoPro HERO7 Black/Silver/White, HERO6 Black, Fusion, HERO5 Black, HERO5 Session, HERO Session, HERO4 Black, HERO4 Silver, HERO+LCD, HERO, HERO3+, HERO3, HERO2, HD HERO
     
    This product is not affiliated with, endorsed by or in any way associated with GoPro Inc. or its products and services GoPro, HERO, Session, Karma and their respective logos are trademarks or registered trademarks of GoPro,Inc.

story:
Introducing stabiLens.  A super simple and super effective way to stabilize your long and heavy telephoto lens.


Sold by         

      

    

 

Exhibited at Trade Shows

        

  

Award for the Best Travel and Adventure Accessory

 

stabiLens Base set used by Big5Photos on Game Drives

"The stabiLens system was a win. Everyone used the system and the people that didn’t already have (2 out of the 9 guests had already) asked for more information. I am sure you will be getting a call."  Michael Tucker - Professional Wildlife Photographer - Johannesburg - RSA

 

 

 

 

  

 

 

 

 

What makes stabiLens so effective?

The weight of the lens disappears as it is supported- by the stabiLens. No more unsteady hand-held shots. Here my daughter spent 5 hours at an air show taking hundreds of photos with a fairly heavy lens. She could track the planes with ease on a super steady platform.

         

The center of mass of stabiLens, balanced on the base or window set, allows you to move the camera with virtually no friction and it feels almost weightless.

 

Use in sporting events

   

 

Capture action shots              

 

   

 

Follow fast moving wildlife and bird behavior

 

   

 

Why stabiLens?

  • I  need  $29 000 to manufacture molds for a plastic injection process. At present stabiLens is hand made which is expensive and time consuming. I cannot develop an international market using this process.
  • The perk contributors will be among the first photographers in the USA and Europe to receive this proven product at a discount of at least 30%.
  • stabiLens has been field tested and is in production and does not need a long development process.
  • stabiLens is a proven concept and is selling well in South Africa and in smaller numbers around the world.
  • Photographers are excited about how easy it is to use and that it is inexpensive. The closest comparison to stabiLens would be a gimbal based product which normally costs hundreds of dollars and takes time to set up.
  • stabiLens is ready to use in a matter of seconds on a car window or on a tripod, a monopod or on any flat surface.
  • There is virtually no risk in investing in this product as stabiLens has been in production for 2 years and has undergone a number of modifications to meet photographer requirements. The feedback has been overwhelmingly positive.
  • Injection molding will allow me to manufacture to tight tolerances and will simplify the assembly process. It will also allow me to cater for large order numbers.
  • Even if you cannot contribute, but like the idea, ask your photographer friends to check out this campaign.
  • stabiLens makes a perfect birthday or Christmas gifts for your photographer friends.

Sold by

What makes stabiLens so effective?
The weight of the lens disappears as it is supported- by the stabiLens. No more unsteady hand-held shots. Here my daughter spent 5 hours at an air show taking hundreds of photos with a fairly heavy lens. She could track the planes with ease on a super steady platform.

         
The center of mass of stabiLens, balanced on the base or window set, allows you to move the camera with virtually no friction and it feels almost weightless.
 
Use in sporting events
   
 
Capture action shots              
 
   
 
Follow fast moving wildlife and bird behavior
 
   
 
Why stabiLens?
I  need  $29 000 to manufacture molds for a plastic injection process. At present stabiLens is hand made which is expensive and time consuming. I cannot develop an international market using this process.

The perk contributors will be among the first photographers in the USA and Europe to receive this proven product at a discount of at least 30%.

stabiLens has been field tested and is in production and does not need a long development process.

stabiLens is a proven concept and is selling well in South Africa and in smaller numbers around the world.
Photographers are excited about how easy it is to use and that it is inexpensive. The closest comparison to stabiLens would be a gimbal based product which normally costs hundreds of dollars and takes time to set up.

stabiLens is ready to use in a matter of seconds on a car window or on a tripod, a monopod or on any flat surface.
There is virtually no risk in investing in this product as stabiLens has been in production for 2 years and has undergone a number of modifications to meet photographer requirements. The feedback has been overwhelmingly positive.
Injection molding will allow me to manufacture to tight tolerances and will simplify the assembly process. It will also allow me to cater for large order numbers.
Even if you cannot contribute, but like the idea, ask your photographer friends to check out this campaign.

stabiLens makes a perfect birthday or Christmas gifts for your photographer friends.

story:
We know that feeling - buying the latest gadget online, anxious to get it, but worried that it’ll somehow get lost upon arrival.

Enter eufy Security’s SmartDrop mailbox, an intelligent solution for protecting your packages. Designed to be idiot-proof for your delivery man, the on-device AI and 1080p camera lets you view and keep track of each delivery from start to finish. Should the courier encounter any issues, you can jump to the live-stream and communicate with them via the 2-way audio. Built using cold-rolled steel and with advanced locking mechanisms, this device will fend off and deter any potential porch pirate lurking in the distance.

 

Every year 44.8 million packages get stolen, which means 1 in 4 households suffer the consequences of porch piracy. Among them, 36% would need 7 days or more to get a replacement, and 27% would never get any form of compensation for these stolen packages, valued at around $160 on average.

 

As the courier approaches, they will be alerted to the presence of SmartDrop via voice guide and the illuminated buttons. The clear and easy-to-follow instructions allow the courier to complete the delivery in just seconds.

We performed an experiment in our home area of Seattle, WA, and found that with a sample size of 100 delivery persons, 92% of them were eager to use SmartDrop, with a 93.5% success rate, proving that SmartDrop is a welcome addition for both homeowners and delivery persons.

 

We noticed that some of you had concerns over how easy SmartDrop is to use for couriers. We put together this little video to help ease any concerns.

When SmartDrop is empty, all the courier needs to do is tap the OPEN button and place the package inside.

When a package is held within SmartDrop, the device will be locked to keep it safe. Should you receive another delivery, the courier simply needs to enter the access code on the waybill to unlock it.

To generate a Courier Code:

Step 1: Generate a Courier Code on the app, which you can change as frequently as you want.

Step 2: Include the code as part of your shipping address when you place your order online, for example: "8000 Main St., Apt 10010 (Delivery Box Code: 1234)".

SmartDrop is designed with flexibility in mind, offering a choice of access methods:

Default Mode: Tap to open when it’s empty, PIN code/App/Voice Assistants/Physical key to open when it’s not
 

  • Locked Mode: Always requiring PIN code/App/Voice Assistants/Physical key to open, empty or not
  • Unlocked Mode: Always tap to open, whether SmartDrop is empty or not
  • Deliveries Denied Mode: The only way to open it is to use the MasterPIN or physical key

The 1080p full HD camera captures the movement of people as they approach your porch. With motion-triggered recording (available with HomeBase 1 & 2 or Cloud Storage), eufy Security SmartDrop can even double up as your front door security camera.

 

Powerful night vision is capable of providing clear black and white video at night.

 

When a delivery is completed you will receive an instant notification via the app. You can check the full event by watching the recorded video (available with HomeBase 1 & 2 or Cloud Storage) from start to finish, giving you peace of mind that your delivery is safe.

 

If the courier encounters any issues, simply jump to the live-stream, and talk to them via the 2-way audio to ensure your package can be delivered smoothly.

 

 

Simply use Alexa or the Google Assistant to conveniently check on the status of your SmartDrop.

 

 

SmartDrop is designed to be water-resistant. The exterior is designed with a sophisticated water diversion system, which diverts the rainwater infiltrated from the outside to the bottom drainage trough through the surrounding inner wall to protect packages from getting wet.

 

 

Complete the full DIY assembly of SmartDrop in only 20 minutes. When you place it on your porch, bolt the device down to the ground or to the wall using expansion screws.

 

When paired with HomeBase 1 or 2 you will get 16GB of local storage space with military-grade encryption. If you wish for more storage space, you could purchase additional Cloud Storage to reach unlimited capacity for 30 days.

 

 

SmartDrop Pro comes with a HomeBase 2, which enables video recording and 16Gb of local storage. 

 

 

Born out of Kickstarter 3 years ago with eufyCam -- a product that took the world by storm, eufy Security has since developed into a complete ecosystem, while keeping our pioneering spirit, offering cutting edge features at attractive prices. This time again we’re working with Anker to bring SmartDrop to life to provide the most intelligent solution on the market for securing your valuable home deliveries. With your support, we’ll continue to offer innovative, smart home security solutions to protect you, your family, and your privacy.

 

 

Risks and challenges

An on-time delivery date for SmartDrop is anticipated. We’re wrapping up the product development phase for the main features, but we’d still like to hear great ideas to implement from you, our backers, about features we can include (as long as it doesn’t impact the delivery date). We’ve found reliable manufacturing partners, but even with the best manufacturing processes setup, unexpected hiccups can happen. Logistics issues are also being solved to ensure smooth delivery for when we’ve exceeded our goal.
