story:
*READ THIS COMMENT BEFORE BACKING PLEASE

  • "Orders that were placed after Tuesday, June 22 (Korea Time), will be shipped with the second production batch. The second production batch is expected to cargo out 9/30. This means that if you are backing right now, you will receive your product from the second production batch."

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi! We're the ORANGEMONKIE team. Thank you for supporting us and continuously giving us ideas to build upon. As many of you know, we’ve successfully launched the Foldio studio series on both Indiegogo and Kickstarter to help you create high-quality product photos and 360-degree content. Now we’re back with something more innovative than ever!

 

 

We know that professional and amateur photographers all want to take high-quality photos of their products, but without spending thousands of dollars on equipment. What they need is an all-in-one solution for their 360 product photography needs.

So now we've launched our newest Foldio360 project, the Smart Dome. We built a product that offers customizable lighting, no shadow concerns, and less photoshop editing.

 

 

We redesigned the traditional square photo studio with two main structures: the dual shell structure and the dome shape structure. Why? Because traditional photo studios are overpriced, time-consuming, and require professional training to use. The newly designed dual shell structure uniquely diffuses the light in the interior, eliminating light reflection in your photos. Additionally, the dome shape design enables precise and uniform lighting.

 

 

You don’t need to be a photographer to take a great product shot - you just need the Foldio360 Smart Dome. 

The Foldio360 Smart Dome is a product photography studio that creates high-quality 360-degree images, videos, and still shot photos. Even if you’ve never taken 360 photoshoots, you can take a beautiful 360 product image.

Our project brings photo quality to everyone. Whether you are a corporate designer, handmade designer, or amateur E-Commerce seller, blogger - anyone can add 360 product photos to their page in less than 5 minutes.

 

Not to mention how easy our Smart Dome is to use. Just set your settings and click one button.

 

 

Made to adjust to YOUR product and environment 

 

Whether you want to take a product shot of a diamond, candle, or wallet - you can do it all without moving the Foldio360 Smart Dome. Photographers no longer need to move around their equipment after every shot to find the perfect lighting. Simply just adjust the brightness and color temperature with your phone/PC, and switch the front and top covers to take different angles of your product.

 

Functions:

  •  LED light adjustment - Change the color temperature from 2300K to 5600K   
  •  Interchangeable magnetic covers - Easily create photos and 360-degree images from different angles  
  •  Sliding door cover - Preserve light to create the perfect product photo and adjust the door depending on your smartphone. 
  •  Necklace hanger - Hang your jewelry from the top cover for necklace shots  
  •  Dome stand - Raise the height of the Foldio360  Smart Dome for wider angle camera shots  
  •  3/8" Male thread - Mount your smartphone using a tripod ball head 

 

 

Built for the busy 

 

Traditionally, 360 product photography requires multiple separate purchases: lighting equipment, 360 turntable, lighting box, editing software, and so on. But, our Foldio360 Smart Dome offers all of this in one single product.

 

Functions:

  •  360 Smart turntable - Built-in mechanical turntable 
  •  Automatic 360 Shooting - One-touch to automatically shoot, and produce a 360 image 
  •  Center point indicator - Effortlessly locate the center of the turntable 
  •  Upload with ease - Share your shots with our App or PC360 Software easily

 

Smartphone, PC, DSLR Friendly

 

The Foldio360 Smart Dome works seamlessly with a smartphone, DSLR, or PC. Whether you shoot with your smartphone or DSLR, you can easily connect with the Foldio360 Smart Dome.

 

 

Functions:

  •  Control with PC or Smartphone - Wireless control of lighting and shooting options  
  •  Automatic 360 shooting - Create 360-degree images and videos with one click
  •  IR transmitter - Connect with a smartphone or PC to remotely control your camera for automatic photo shots 

 

There is nothing out there that can compare

 

The Foldio360 Smart Dome is extremely affordable compared to other professional high-quality solutions. Our team’s biggest challenge was creating a reasonably priced product that offers professional-level quality.

 

 

One-stop solution to your product photography 

 

Capture and upload your product photography easily on our App or PC360 Software. 

All Foldio360 Smart Dome Indiegogo backers will receive a free one-year subscription to the PC360 software. This special offer is only for our backers! 

The Foldio360 PC Software (PC360) was created to advance 360 photography. The PC360 Software will enable DSLR camera users to create and edit 360-degree photos via PC. (For Windows and Mac users).

 

 PC360 Software

 

We offer a one-stop solution for 360-degree imaging. Whether you took the shot with your smartphone or DSLR you can access all of your 360 images online.

 

On top of our one-year free subscription to our Foldio360 PC Software, we offer a free Foldio360 application available in the Google Play Store and Apple App Store. Through our mobile application, users can control their Foldio360 Smart Dome and upload instant photos.

 

 

Foldio360 Mobile App

 

 

 

 

Single Image

(Sony a7III, Aperture = F4.0, Shutter speed = 1/200, ISO =100, Color temp = 4700K)

 

 360 GIF 

Interactive 360 Image 

Click the image to experience the interactive 360 content.

360 Video​

 

 

 

360 Image Integration Example​

 

 

 

How to add your Add-Ons

*Add-ons can be added by backers in their cart after selecting a perk.

 

 

 

More Details

 

Who we are

We are a dedicated team located in California and Seoul. Since 2011, we have produced multiple successful Kickstarter projects, and we are back this year with our newest project ever.

We are passionate about discovering new ways to improve photography technology for everyone. Whether it’s for your hobby or business, our project is designed and developed with the utmost care and effort for quality.

We are excited to walk together again with this project. Thank you for all of your continuous support!

 

Press Kit

 

 

We encourage you to follow and get real-time updates on Facebook and Instagram

*READ THIS COMMENT BEFORE BACKING PLEASE"Orders that were placed after Tuesday, June 22 (Korea Time), will be shipped with the second production batch. The second production batch is expected to cargo out 9/30. This means that if you are backing right now, you will receive your product from the second production batch."-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Hi! We're the ORANGEMONKIE team. Thank you for supporting us and continuously giving us ideas to build upon. As many of you know, we’ve successfully launched the Foldio studio series on both Indiegogo and Kickstarter to help you create high-quality product photos and 360-degree content. Now we’re back with something more innovative than ever!  We know that professional and amateur photographers all want to take high-quality photos of their products, but without spending thousands of dollars on equipment. What they need is an all-in-one solution for their 360 product photography needs.So now we've launched our newest Foldio360 project, the Smart Dome. We built a product that offers customizable lighting, no shadow concerns, and less photoshop editing.  We redesigned the traditional square photo studio with two main structures: the dual shell structure and the dome shape structure. Why? Because traditional photo studios are overpriced, time-consuming, and require professional training to use. The newly designed dual shell structure uniquely diffuses the light in the interior, eliminating light reflection in your photos. Additionally, the dome shape design enables precise and uniform lighting.  You don’t need to be a photographer to take a great product shot - you just need the Foldio360 Smart Dome. The Foldio360 Smart Dome is a product photography studio that creates high-quality 360-degree images, videos, and still shot photos. Even if you’ve never taken 360 photoshoots, you can take a beautiful 360 product image.Our project brings photo quality to everyone. Whether you are a corporate designer, handmade designer, or amateur E-Commerce seller, blogger - anyone can add 360 product photos to their page in less than 5 minutes. Not to mention how easy our Smart Dome is to use. Just set your settings and click one button.   Made to adjust to YOUR product and environment  Whether you want to take a product shot of a diamond, candle, or wallet - you can do it all without moving the Foldio360 Smart Dome. Photographers no longer need to move around their equipment after every shot to find the perfect lighting. Simply just adjust the brightness and color temperature with your phone/PC, and switch the front and top covers to take different angles of your product. Functions:
 LED light adjustment - Change the color temperature from 2300K to 5600K   
 Interchangeable magnetic covers - Easily create photos and 360-degree images from different angles  
 Sliding door cover - Preserve light to create the perfect product photo and adjust the door depending on your smartphone. 
 Necklace hanger - Hang your jewelry from the top cover for necklace shots  
 Dome stand - Raise the height of the Foldio360  Smart Dome for wider angle camera shots  
 3/8" Male thread - Mount your smartphone using a tripod ball head 
  Built for the busy  Traditionally, 360 product photography requires multiple separate purchases: lighting equipment, 360 turntable, lighting box, editing software, and so on. But, our Foldio360 Smart Dome offers all of this in one single product. Functions:
 360 Smart turntable - Built-in mechanical turntable 
 Automatic 360 Shooting - One-touch to automatically shoot, and produce a 360 image 
 Center point indicator - Effortlessly locate the center of the turntable 
 Upload with ease - Share your shots with our App or PC360 Software easily
 Smartphone, PC, DSLR Friendly The Foldio360 Smart Dome works seamlessly with a smartphone, DSLR, or PC. Whether you shoot with your smartphone or DSLR, you can easily connect with the Foldio360 Smart Dome.  Functions:
 Control with PC or Smartphone - Wireless control of lighting and shooting options  
 Automatic 360 shooting - Create 360-degree images and videos with one click
 IR transmitter - Connect with a smartphone or PC to remotely control your camera for automatic photo shots 
 There is nothing out there that can compare The Foldio360 Smart Dome is extremely affordable compared to other professional high-quality solutions. Our team’s biggest challenge was creating a reasonably priced product that offers professional-level quality.  One-stop solution to your product photography  Capture and upload your product photography easily on our App or PC360 Software. All Foldio360 Smart Dome Indiegogo backers will receive a free one-year subscription to the PC360 software. This special offer is only for our backers! The Foldio360 PC Software (PC360) was created to advance 360 photography. The PC360 Software will enable DSLR camera users to create and edit 360-degree photos via PC. (For Windows and Mac users).  PC360 Software We offer a one-stop solution for 360-degree imaging. Whether you took the shot with your smartphone or DSLR you can access all of your 360 images online. On top of our one-year free subscription to our Foldio360 PC Software, we offer a free Foldio360 application available in the Google Play Store and Apple App Store. Through our mobile application, users can control their Foldio360 Smart Dome and upload instant photos.  Foldio360 Mobile App    Single Image(Sony a7III, Aperture = F4.0, Shutter speed = 1/200, ISO =100, Color temp = 4700K)  360 GIF Interactive 360 Image Click the image to experience the interactive 360 content.360 Video​ 

 
 360 Image Integration Example​   How to add your Add-Ons*Add-ons can be added by backers in their cart after selecting a perk.   More Details Who we areWe are a dedicated team located in California and Seoul. Since 2011, we have produced multiple successful Kickstarter projects, and we are back this year with our newest project ever.We are passionate about discovering new ways to improve photography technology for everyone. Whether it’s for your hobby or business, our project is designed and developed with the utmost care and effort for quality.We are excited to walk together again with this project. Thank you for all of your continuous support! Press Kit  We encourage you to follow and get real-time updates on Facebook and Instagram

story:
Hello!  Kevin Thomas here, the founder of GravGrip™.  GravGrip™ is a hydraulic camera stabilizer for your cell phone and action camera.  GravGrip™ is waterproof, battery free, affordable, and ultra compact!  

GravGrip's first prototype was hand made over 5 years ago!  I have dedicated the last 3 years to developing and prototyping GravGrip's design in my spare time.  What started as a side project in college is now a product I'm ready to share with the world.  

To make this happen we need your help!  Back GravGrip™ today so we can start production!  Our manufacturing partners are ready, we will signal the green light as soon as our funding goal is accomplished.  GravGrip's design is production ready, so no need for long prototyping delays!  

We are offering GravGrip™ at a price you can't beat!  Get excited to explore your world with hydraulic camera stabilization!

 

 

 

Why would I purchase GravGrip™ if my camera has amazing internal image stabilization?

We get asked this a lot! And the answer is easy.  GravGrip™ is a great tool for videographers to not only increased stabilization in their videos, but to capture those hard to reach angles that would otherwise be impossible.  I have a GoPro Hero 8 Black and GravGrip™ in the tilt position is a game changer!  Transition with ease from ultra low to up high angles.  It's easy, and everyone will wonder how you did it!

GravGrip™ + Image Stabilization = Next Level Footage

Why doesn't GravGrip™ automatically come with a pole?

GravGrip™ can be mounted to any GoPro compatible mount and we know a lot of our customers will already have these items.  This ensures we can provide you the lowest price possible!  Don't have a pole?  You're in luck, we have a combo deal that includes a GravGrip™ custom designed extension pole or a 5" hand grip.  We strive to provide premium products, and our extension pole is just that.

Is GravGrip™ waterproof?

YES!  GravGrip's design is composed of zero electronics, all components are either stainless steel, aluminum or a durable plastic (glass filled nylon).  Please note:  GravGrip™ is not functional under water, but feel free to take GravGrip™ out in the rain for some epic shots without a worry!  If you get GravGrip™ wet with salt water we do recommend a cleaning with fresh water.  

Will GravGrip™ work with plus sized phones?

YES!  GravGrip™ has been successfully tested with many plus sized phones (iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 11 Max, Galaxy S20, etc.).

Can GravGrip support added weight?  (ex: Phone Case, Phone Lens)

YES!  No need to take your case off while using GravGrip™ (unlike many electronic gimbals).  We have tested several cheap iPhone 11 lens with success (for weight testing purposes).  We do expect cell phones equipped with higher end lens to work without problems, just know there is no guaranteed.

Can GravGrip™ work on a chest or helmet mount?

GravGrip™ can mount to any GoPro® compatible mount, but we do not recommend mounting to your chest or helmet mount.  In some situations GravGrip™ will work on these mounts, but GravGrip™ is best paired with a pole.  The stabilization between your arm movement and GravGrip™ can produce amazing results. 

Can I use GravGrip™ in cold temperatures?

Yes, we have tested GravGrip™ at roughly -5 C for extended periods of time with no issue.  At colder temperatures, changes in GravGrip's hydraulic stabilization system may occur.  GravGrip's hydraulic fluid will stiffen and rotation speed will decrease.  You can counter this with adjusting the off set weight, but more testing needs to happen before confirmation. The good thing is you can disengage GravGrip's hydraulic system by removing the lid. In the roll position you can get a great balance without the use of hydraulics.  In this case, temperature will not play a roll in performance!  Hydraulics is a must in the "Tilt" position!

NOTE:  If GravGrip™ is kept indoors before use, it will take time for temperature to affect its operation.  Users will likely notice no change in performance.  If stored outside in low temperatures GravGrip™ will see noticeable changes to performance. 

Will GravGrip's weights loosen and fall off?

GravGrip's 2 counterweights are very secure when tightened against each other. Throughout all GravGrip™ testing we have completed, not once have they loosened! They take a good bit of force to break apart, but are still easily adjusted by hand.

Why wouldn't I buy GravGrip™?

We really don't know?!  Affordable, Waterproof, Ultra Compact, No Batteries?

 

Return policy.  Indiegogo is a platform that allows creators to showcase their product ideas at a discounted price.  This price is a pre-order for our product.  The funds raised throughout our campaign will be used to manufacture GravGrip™.  In accordance with Indiegogo Terms of Use we will not offer refunds or returns for items that are not defected.  If you receive a defected unit please email kevin@gravgrip.com.

Global Shipping.  We are excited to be offering international shipping.  Please note we are not responsible for additional duty and taxes that may apply to your local importation laws.

  GravGrip™ includes a 1 Action Camera and 1 Cell Phone adapter.

Mount your Cell Phone or Action Camera to GravGrip™ with the included adapters. Lock your camera into position by rotating the blue knob.
2 POSITIONS: Mount your camera in the "ROLL" position to keep a stable horizon or in the "TILT" position to easily capture those epic ultra low and high angle shots. Lock into position by rotating the blue knob.
Rotate weight set upwards to decrease gimbal speed or downwards to increase gimbal speed. Fine tune GravGrip™ to your liking. Twist the weights together to lock into position!
GravGrip's balance correction system is adjusted using hand force. Some camera's have an offset center of Gravity (hint hint: GoPro), easily level the horizon with a quick change in position. This system will NOT budge while in use!
 
 
 
 
 
  

 
Our custom extension pole is no joke! This pole has an unmatched premium feel to it. You will not be disappointed in our combo deal.
 
 
 
Enjoy a small sample of the work dedicated to GravGrip™ over the past few years. I can truthfully say blood, sweat, and tears were put into GravGrip's development.

The good thing is you can disengage GravGrip's hydraulic system by removing the lid. In the roll position you can get a great balance without the use of hydraulics.  In this case, temperature will not play a roll in performance!  Hydraulics is a must in the "Tilt" position!NOTE:  If GravGrip™ is kept indoors before use, it will take time for temperature to affect its operation.  Users will likely notice no change in performance.  If stored outside in low temperatures GravGrip™ will see noticeable changes to performance. Will GravGrip's weights loosen and fall off?GravGrip's 2 counterweights are very secure when tightened against each other. Throughout all GravGrip™ testing we have completed, not once have they loosened! They take a good bit of force to break apart, but are still easily adjusted by hand.Why wouldn't I buy GravGrip™?We really don't know?!  Affordable, Waterproof, Ultra Compact, No Batteries? 
 
  
 
  
  
  
  Return policy.  Indiegogo is a platform that allows creators to showcase their product ideas at a discounted price.  This price is a pre-order for our product.  The funds raised throughout our campaign will be used to manufacture GravGrip™.  In accordance with Indiegogo Terms of Use we will not offer refunds or returns for items that are not defected.  If you receive a defected unit please email kevin@gravgrip.com.Global Shipping.  We are excited to be offering international shipping.  Please note we are not responsible for additional duty and taxes that may apply to your local importation laws.

story:
VENTURE Has Everything You Need:

  • Records beautiful 1080P footage directly to the unit (30fps)
  • 120-degree wide angle lens with no fisheye effect
  • Critical Reconnect Technology (™) –  if any of your extra camera attachments get disconnected, VENTURE keeps recording
  • Anti-Video Deactivation Technology (™) – keeps you from accidentally turning VENTURE off
  •  4 bright LED lights allow VENTURE to be a flashlight while you record
  • Built-in Wi-Fi allows you to livestream straight to Facebook Live or YouTube Live
  • Users can livestream using their smartphone's 4G/LTE connection
  • Can be used as a car camera
  • Interactive, easy-to-use app (Andriod and iOS)

 

 

 

    Whether for fun, personal safety, or any other reason, having a body camera or car camera in today’s modern world just makes sense.  In order to simplify the process, we created VENTURE – the only everyday wearable digital camera you’ll ever need.

    Lighter, smaller, and smarter than a GoPro, VENTURE's sleek and light design and rotatable lens allows for better quality, livestreaming, and more versatility so you can use your camera any way you want. Just clip it, press the button and go! You’re in control of what you film and what you share with the world!

     

     

     

    How will you use your VENTURE? It’s easy so easy to clip it, mount it, and add it almost everywhere you need to live stream, record video, or snap that picture for posterity. Check out the video below to see just how easy VENTURE is to use for every and any way you need it.

     

    At the flick of a switch you can record and then re-live your drive as you take the scenic route home or a wild ride on a bicycle path through the mountains. Clip it on to explore new cities and urban environments, or take it with you on vacation so you can show your friends and family your trip from your own Point of View (POV) when you get back.  You can even livestream directly to Facebook or YouTube so they can share your experience in real time!

    Grant access for others to remotely view live video footage from your VENTURE and see what you see. Use the VENTURE as a security camera to monitor your babysitter while out on your date. VENTURE remote view feature is also password protected, so only people you trust will be able to see your video feed. 

    A great tool for professionals, students and those who have too many meetings to remember everything, VENTURE can record all your important activities for your review later. Can’t make that meeting or lecture on the other side of town or the world? Have your friend or business associate take it with them so you can watch via livestream or later when you have the time.

     

    Live Streaming at 720p direct to Facebook and YouTube, VENTURE can also record up to 1080P, so your video is sure to be crystal clear. Featuring a 120-degree wide angle lens, you’ll capture everything you want without any fisheye effect.   

    Pressing the Center "V" button on VENTURE snaps a photo. The digital flash makes it easy for night time photography so you can snap the shot you need the way you want it. You can even snap that pic while you’re recording video footage!

    VENTURE also features a built-in microphone for easy audio recording and a rotatable camera head so you can get that tough shot with ease.

    Splash proof and made with Aircraft Grade aluminum, your VENTURE is ready for anything, and since it’s smaller than a credit card and so lightweight (2.2 ounces), you’ll barely notice it’s there!

     

     

     

    Stay safe with VENTURE by using it as an instant car camera. Document your commute in case of an accident or take footage on the scenic route home.


    With easy-to-add accessories, VENTURE clips directly onto your sun visor or mounts to your windshield with a suction cup. Record your drive or livestream your commute hands-free.  Rideshare drivers - you can even film what’s going on inside the car by rotating VENTURE on its 360 degree clip. VENTURE gives you an added degree of safety...or fun!

     

    Ready to ride? Venture is primed for adventure. Clip it on or use the helmet or bicycle mount accessories to record your ride no matter where you may roam. VENTURE's rotatable lens will capture every moment you want, whether it's a ride through the urban jungle or a day exploring the trails in the mountains. Sleeker and more modern than a Go-Pro, VENTURE is also perfect for commuters who ride on two wheels. Let's ride!

     

     

    VENTURE's 360 degree rotating clip comes with your VENTURE and gives you multiple options for placement, allowing you to film from any angle you choose. Just clip it on your clothes, car visor, or anywhere else you want it to go for hands-free filming!

    *Separately, the Magnetic Clip will ONLY be included when our $150,000 stretch goal is reached.*

     

    If any of your extra camera attachments get disconnected, VENTURE will keep recording so you won’t miss a thing. VENTURE has you covered! (Accessory options below)

    Using our special Anti-Video Deactivation Technology (AVD), you won’t miss a beat when recording. The special switch makes sure you won’t accidentally tap the device "off" when you’re going about your everyday activities. Record with confidence!

    Four bright LED lights illuminate the darkest nights so you can get your perfect shot, even in the dark. Perfect for riding a bike at night and recording at the same time.

    Now anyone can be a star! VENTURE connects to your smart device via our free app. VENTURE creates it very own WIFI hotspot that your smart device can connect to. Once connection is made, use VENTURE’S app to remotely control your camera, playback files, and connect to Facebook or YouTube to live stream your life.

    So easy and simple you’ll wonder how you lived without it before. Don’t let your friends, family and fans miss out on your adventures!

    VENTURE provides you with 2.5 hours of battery life, but can be extended to 23.5 hours for the more heavy user with our extra battery accessory (see below).

    Supports up to 64 GB of removable memory so you can store your video footage for later viewing.

    Low battery? Don’t worry; your VENTURE will vibrate to let you know when the unit has turned on, turned off, or when you need some more juice.

    No need to wonder when and what time you filmed that awesome clip! VENTURE will time stamp everything for your convenience.

    VENTURE’s intuitive app will help you seamlessly use your footage any way you like. Here’s how:

    • Store pictures and videos to your smartphone or camera storage for posting on social media or for later use.
    • Use the app as a wireless remote control for your VENTURE camera so you can livestream, save footage or change settings.
    • Ready for a preview? No problem! View through your smartphone to adjust VENTURE'S camera angle. 
    • Playback and delete videos and photos, as well as playback videos stored in either your smartphone or VENTURE's camera in a snap!
    • Adjust record intervals and camera timeout periods to prolong your battery life!

     

     

     

     

    Get an extra battery pack for a grand total of 23.5 hours of filming. Usually worn on the belt, your extra battery pack will connect via a USB cable giving VENTURE an extra boost of battery life when it needs it most. Enjoy your filming interruption-free!

    Use VENTURE in your car with this handy clip. Easy to attach, you’ll be able to seamlessly document your ride wherever you may roam.

    VENTURE can be your new favorite car cam with this suction cup mount that adheres to your windshield. As soon as you’re done driving, you can easily snap the VENTURE out and clip it on to use as a bodycam or mount it on your bike to ride onto your next adventure!

    *The Suction Cup Mount will ONLY be included when our $100,000 stretch goal is reached.*

    Whether it’s mountain biking on your favorite picturesque trail or commuting with traffic in your own urban jungle, the Bicycle Handle Mount is there to document your wild and leisurely rides no matter where you like to bike. Easy to put on and take off, you can livestream your ride for your fans or record for later viewing so you can re-live your outdoor adventure.

    Clip on this external camera that plugs into the VENTURE for more precise Point-Of-View (POV) recording. Clip it onto your glasses, baseball cap, collar, vest, or anywhere else where a smaller device is needed. Your video will show exactly what you’re seeing from your own unique perspective without the added bulk. It’s so lightweight, you’ll barely know it’s there!

    No one has to know that you’re filming with the Pinhole Button Camera! Connect to the Venture for an instant spy camera solution! Comes with an extra spare button to sew onto your shirt so it blends in. Mission complete!

    Plug the Night Vision Camera into the venture and see and record up to 20 feet in pitch black darkness! Capture nighttime creatures in the wild or film down that dark street for an added peek into the abyss. Great for science, safety and getting that cool shot at night!

     

    Plug the Headset Camera into your Venture for another POV option.

    WOLFCOM® was founded in 2001 and in 17 years has evolved from a security surveillance company to one of the leading manufacturers and suppliers of body worn camera equipment to Law Enforcement.  

    Our body cameras are worn by thousands of police officers around the world and is in use by over 500 law Enforcement Agencies nationwide. WOLFCOM® made the INC. 5000’s list of Fastest “America's Fastest Growing Companies” twice in a row (2015 & 2016) and our body cameras has been featured on several news networks over the last several years.

    In 2012 we introduce the world’s first multi-purpose, multi-functional police body camera the WOLFCOM 3rd Eye with over 26 “First in the Industry” features and functions setting the standard for years to come.  We were the first in the industry to incorporate night vision and GPS technology into our police body cameras and the very first with 1080p recording.

    In 2014 we did it again and launched our second camera the WOLFCOM VISION that featured the world’s very first body camera with a two camera system incorporating our patent pending technology “Critical Re-Connect”.

    Our body cameras are passionately designed to be an officer’s 3rd eye. To see and remember what he forgot, and to be the truth behind false accusations when he needs it the most.

    Q. What is the warranty on the VENTURE?

    A. The Venture comes with a 1-year manufactures warranty. 

     

    Q. Is the Mobile App Free?

    Yes. 

     

    Q. Is there a Mobile App for Android?

    A. Yes, the Free Mobile App will be available in the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store.

     

    Q. How do you focus the camera?

    A. The VENTURE has automatic focus.

     

    Q. Do I need a Wi-Fi network for the live stream function to work?

    A. No Wi-Fi network is needed.  The Venture creates its own Wi-Fi hotspot to connect to your smart phone (smart device). As long as your smart device has a 4G/LTE connection, you'll be able to Livestream to Facebook and YouTube from anywhere.

     

    Q. How many additional hours of battery life does the Extra Battery Pack give the Venture?

    A. The VENTURE already gives you 2.5 hours of battery life. Adding the Extra Battery Pack will give the VENTURE an extra 21 hours of battery life. That's a total of 23 hours.

     

    Q. When will my Venture be shipped to me?

    A. The estimated ship date is set for Spring of 2018.

     

    Q. What is the view angle of the camera?

    A. 120 degrees.

     

    Q. Can you take still photos while you are recording?

    A. Yes, you can take still photos simultaneously while recording video. Just press the "V" button located in the front of the camera. V is for VENTURE.

     

    Q. Can I record videos onto my phone?

    A. Yes, with the Mobile App you are able to take photos and record video and choose to either have them stored onto your phone's memory or stored on the VENTURE.

     

    Q. What kind of memory does the VENTURE support?

    A. VENTURE supports up to a 64GB micro SD Card (minimum of Class 4).

     

    Q.Why is live streaming only at 720p and not 1080p?

    A. We wanted the video to be real live streaming.  With a higher resolution, the video would have too much lag time. 720p takes up less bandwidth and still gives you HD (high definition) resolution.

     

    Q. Does VENTURE come in any other colors?

    A. Not at this time.  If we get enough backers who request other colors, it could be possible.

     

    Q. Can I put this on my drone?

    A. Yes!  With the rotatable camera head, you will be able to get the right view angle you need.

     

    Q. Does the bike mount fit on different bikes?

    A. Yes, the bike mount has an adjustable strap so it can fit on all types of bikes.

     

    Q. Does the Covert Pinhole Button Camera come with a button?

    A. Yes, the Covert Pinhole Button Camera will come with different buttons to match your clothing.  It will even come with additional regular buttons so you can change all the buttons on your clothing to be the same.
story_txt:
VENTURE Has Everything You Need:
Records beautiful 1080P footage directly to the unit (30fps)
120-degree wide angle lens with no fisheye effect
Critical Reconnect Technology (™) –  if any of your extra camera attachments get disconnected, VENTURE keeps recording
Anti-Video Deactivation Technology (™) – keeps you from accidentally turning VENTURE off
 4 bright LED lights allow VENTURE to be a flashlight while you record
Built-in Wi-Fi allows you to livestream straight to Facebook Live or YouTube Live
Users can livestream using their smartphone's 4G/LTE connection
Can be used as a car camera
Interactive, easy-to-use app (Andriod and iOS)
   Whether for fun, personal safety, or any other reason, having a body camera or car camera in today’s modern world just makes sense.  In order to simplify the process, we created VENTURE – the only everyday wearable digital camera you’ll ever need.Lighter, smaller, and smarter than a GoPro, VENTURE's sleek and light design and rotatable lens allows for better quality, livestreaming, and more versatility so you can use your camera any way you want. Just clip it, press the button and go! You’re in control of what you film and what you share with the world!   How will you use your VENTURE? It’s easy so easy to clip it, mount it, and add it almost everywhere you need to live stream, record video, or snap that picture for posterity. Check out the video below to see just how easy VENTURE is to use for every and any way you need it. At the flick of a switch you can record and then re-live your drive as you take the scenic route home or a wild ride on a bicycle path through the mountains. Clip it on to explore new cities and urban environments, or take it with you on vacation so you can show your friends and family your trip from your own Point of View (POV) when you get back.  You can even livestream directly to Facebook or YouTube so they can share your experience in real time!Grant access for others to remotely view live video footage from your VENTURE and see what you see. Use the VENTURE as a security camera to monitor your babysitter while out on your date. VENTURE remote view feature is also password protected, so only people you trust will be able to see your video feed. A great tool for professionals, students and those who have too many meetings to remember everything, VENTURE can record all your important activities for your review later. Can’t make that meeting or lecture on the other side of town or the world? Have your friend or business associate take it with them so you can watch via livestream or later when you have the time. Live Streaming at 720p direct to Facebook and YouTube, VENTURE can also record up to 1080P, so your video is sure to be crystal clear. Featuring a 120-degree wide angle lens, you’ll capture everything you want without any fisheye effect.   Pressing the Center "V" button on VENTURE snaps a photo. The digital flash makes it easy for night time photography so you can snap the shot you need the way you want it. You can even snap that pic while you’re recording video footage!VENTURE also features a built-in microphone for easy audio recording and a rotatable camera head so you can get that tough shot with ease.Splash proof and made with Aircraft Grade aluminum, your VENTURE is ready for anything, and since it’s smaller than a credit card and so lightweight (2.2 ounces), you’ll barely notice it’s there!   Stay safe with VENTURE by using it as an instant car camera. Document your commute in case of an accident or take footage on the scenic route home.With easy-to-add accessories, VENTURE clips directly onto your sun visor or mounts to your windshield with a suction cup. Record your drive or livestream your commute hands-free.  Rideshare drivers - you can even film what’s going on inside the car by rotating VENTURE on its 360 degree clip. VENTURE gives you an added degree of safety...or fun! Ready to ride? Venture is primed for adventure. Clip it on or use the helmet or bicycle mount accessories to record your ride no matter where you may roam. VENTURE's rotatable lens will capture every moment you want, whether it's a ride through the urban jungle or a day exploring the trails in the mountains. Sleeker and more modern than a Go-Pro, VENTURE is also perfect for commuters who ride on two wheels. Let's ride!  VENTURE's 360 degree rotating clip comes with your VENTURE and gives you multiple options for placement, allowing you to film from any angle you choose. Just clip it on your clothes, car visor, or anywhere else you want it to go for hands-free filming!*Separately, the Magnetic Clip will ONLY be included when our $150,000 stretch goal is reached.* If any of your extra camera attachments get disconnected, VENTURE will keep recording so you won’t miss a thing. VENTURE has you covered! (Accessory options below)Using our special Anti-Video Deactivation Technology (AVD), you won’t miss a beat when recording. The special switch makes sure you won’t accidentally tap the device "off" when you’re going about your everyday activities. Record with confidence!Four bright LED lights illuminate the darkest nights so you can get your perfect shot, even in the dark. Perfect for riding a bike at night and recording at the same time.Now anyone can be a star! VENTURE connects to your smart device via our free app. VENTURE creates it very own WIFI hotspot that your smart device can connect to. Once connection is made, use VENTURE’S app to remotely control your camera, playback files, and connect to Facebook or YouTube to live stream your life.So easy and simple you’ll wonder how you lived without it before. Don’t let your friends, family and fans miss out on your adventures!VENTURE provides you with 2.5 hours of battery life, but can be extended to 23.5 hours for the more heavy user with our extra battery accessory (see below).Supports up to 64 GB of removable memory so you can store your video footage for later viewing.Low battery? Don’t worry; your VENTURE will vibrate to let you know when the unit has turned on, turned off, or when you need some more juice.No need to wonder when and what time you filmed that awesome clip! VENTURE will time stamp everything for your convenience.VENTURE’s intuitive app will help you seamlessly use your footage any way you like. Here’s how:
Store pictures and videos to your smartphone or camera storage for posting on social media or for later use.
Use the app as a wireless remote control for your VENTURE camera so you can livestream, save footage or change settings.
Ready for a preview? No problem! View through your smartphone to adjust VENTURE'S camera angle. 
Playback and delete videos and photos, as well as playback videos stored in either your smartphone or VENTURE's camera in a snap!
Adjust record intervals and camera timeout periods to prolong your battery life!
    Get an extra battery pack for a grand total of 23.5 hours of filming. Usually worn on the belt, your extra battery pack will connect via a USB cable giving VENTURE an extra boost of battery life when it needs it most. Enjoy your filming interruption-free!Use VENTURE in your car with this handy clip. Easy to attach, you’ll be able to seamlessly document your ride wherever you may roam.VENTURE can be your new favorite car cam with this suction cup mount that adheres to your windshield. As soon as you’re done driving, you can easily snap the VENTURE out and clip it on to use as a bodycam or mount it on your bike to ride onto your next adventure!*The Suction Cup Mount will ONLY be included when our $100,000 stretch goal is reached.*Whether it’s mountain biking on your favorite picturesque trail or commuting with traffic in your own urban jungle, the Bicycle Handle Mount is there to document your wild and leisurely rides no matter where you like to bike. Easy to put on and take off, you can livestream your ride for your fans or record for later viewing so you can re-live your outdoor adventure.Clip on this external camera that plugs into the VENTURE for more precise Point-Of-View (POV) recording. Clip it onto your glasses, baseball cap, collar, vest, or anywhere else where a smaller device is needed. Your video will show exactly what you’re seeing from your own unique perspective without the added bulk. It’s so lightweight, you’ll barely know it’s there!No one has to know that you’re filming with the Pinhole Button Camera! Connect to the Venture for an instant spy camera solution! Comes with an extra spare button to sew onto your shirt so it blends in. Mission complete!Plug the Night Vision Camera into the venture and see and record up to 20 feet in pitch black darkness! Capture nighttime creatures in the wild or film down that dark street for an added peek into the abyss. Great for science, safety and getting that cool shot at night! Plug the Headset Camera into your Venture for another POV option.WOLFCOM® was founded in 2001 and in 17 years has evolved from a security surveillance company to one of the leading manufacturers and suppliers of body worn camera equipment to Law Enforcement.  Our body cameras are worn by thousands of police officers around the world and is in use by over 500 law Enforcement Agencies nationwide. WOLFCOM® made the INC. 5000’s list of Fastest “America's Fastest Growing Companies” twice in a row (2015 & 2016) and our body cameras has been featured on several news networks over the last several years.In 2012 we introduce the world’s first multi-purpose, multi-functional police body camera the WOLFCOM 3rd Eye with over 26 “First in the Industry” features and functions setting the standard for years to come.  We were the first in the industry to incorporate night vision and GPS technology into our police body cameras and the very first with 1080p recording.In 2014 we did it again and launched our second camera the WOLFCOM VISION that featured the world’s very first body camera with a two camera system incorporating our patent pending technology “Critical Re-Connect”.Our body cameras are passionately designed to be an officer’s 3rd eye. To see and remember what he forgot, and to be the truth behind false accusations when he needs it the most.Q. What is the warranty on the VENTURE?A. The Venture comes with a 1-year manufactures warranty.  Q. Is the Mobile App Free?Yes.  Q. Is there a Mobile App for Android?A. Yes, the Free Mobile App will be available in the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store. Q. How do you focus the camera?A. The VENTURE has automatic focus. Q. Do I need a Wi-Fi network for the live stream function to work?A. No Wi-Fi network is needed.  The Venture creates its own Wi-Fi hotspot to connect to your smart phone (smart device). As long as your smart device has a 4G/LTE connection, you'll be able to Livestream to Facebook and YouTube from anywhere. Q. How many additional hours of battery life does the Extra Battery Pack give the Venture?A. The VENTURE already gives you 2.5 hours of battery life. Adding the Extra Battery Pack will give the VENTURE an extra 21 hours of battery life. That's a total of 23 hours. Q. When will my Venture be shipped to me?A. The estimated ship date is set for Spring of 2018. Q. What is the view angle of the camera?A. 120 degrees. Q. Can you take still photos while you are recording?A. Yes, you can take still photos simultaneously while recording video. Just press the "V" button located in the front of the camera. V is for VENTURE. Q. Can I record videos onto my phone?A. Yes, with the Mobile App you are able to take photos and record video and choose to either have them stored onto your phone's memory or stored on the VENTURE. Q. What kind of memory does the VENTURE support?A. VENTURE supports up to a 64GB micro SD Card (minimum of Class 4). Q.Why is live streaming only at 720p and not 1080p?A. We wanted the video to be real live streaming.  With a higher resolution, the video would have too much lag time. 720p takes up less bandwidth and still gives you HD (high definition) resolution. Q. Does VENTURE come in any other colors?A. Not at this time.  If we get enough backers who request other colors, it could be possible. Q. Can I put this on my drone?A. Yes!  With the rotatable camera head, you will be able to get the right view angle you need. Q. Does the bike mount fit on different bikes?A. Yes, the bike mount has an adjustable strap so it can fit on all types of bikes. Q. Does the Covert Pinhole Button Camera come with a button?A. Yes, the Covert Pinhole Button Camera will come with different buttons to match your clothing.  It will even come with additional regular buttons so you can change all the buttons on your clothing to be the same.
